name: X-Berg: central, quiet, bright, cosy and large
summary: In the heart of Kreuzberg, two minutes from the international, multi-cultural hustle and bustle of the famous Oranienstrasse, the room is located very quiet at the end of a large apartment with a view over a typical, historic Berlin commercial courtyard (and a chestnut tree). In the neighborhood there is a little farm, so that one may wake up in the morning by the crowing of the rooster. The guests (there is a second guest room) have their own newly renovated large bathroom.
space: The guest room is 25-m2 in size and is located on a 150-m2 large apartment opposite the guest bathroom. It has a 1.80 m wide bed with new mattress, wardrobe, sofa and a dining table with chairs. It is also equipped with a microwave, a coffee maker, kettle, crockery, coffee, tea, and a small refrigerator, so that you prepare your own meals/breakfast if you want (I don't serve breakfast! :) ) The flat (where the rental room is located) is in a very peaceful neighbourhood, and in the morning guests might even be awakened by a real cock crowing since there is a farm very nearby. Although this is an idyllic setting, the accommodation is actually very close to the authentic Berlin district of Kreuzberg, which is home to the famous street “Oranienstraße” with its numerous bars, restaurants, small terraces and international cuisine. In just a short stroll visitors can reach the famous bars „Sage-Club“, „Kater Holzig“, "SO36", "Berghain" (20 min walk) and more.
description: In the heart of Kreuzberg, two minutes from the international, multi-cultural hustle and bustle of the famous Oranienstrasse, the room is located very quiet at the end of a large apartment with a view over a typical, historic Berlin commercial courtyard (and a chestnut tree). In the neighborhood there is a little farm, so that one may wake up in the morning by the crowing of the rooster. The guests (there is a second guest room) have their own newly renovated large bathroom. The guest room is 25-m2 in size and is located on a 150-m2 large apartment opposite the guest bathroom. It has a 1.80 m wide bed with new mattress, wardrobe, sofa and a dining table with chairs. It is also equipped with a microwave, a coffee maker, kettle, crockery, coffee, tea, and a small refrigerator, so that you prepare your own meals/breakfast if you want (I don't serve breakfast! :) ) The flat (where the rental room is located) is in a very peaceful neighbourhood, and in the morning guests might even be awake
neighborhood_overview: Hey, it's Kreuzberg :)
notes: The room / apartment is located in the rear house / garden house on the 3rd floor (no elevator). Since 1.1.2014 Berlin tourists have to pay the city tax, the fee is now included in the price.
transit: The underground station Kottbusser Tor and the stop of the Metro Bus #29 are five minutes walking distance. There is also a bus directly from Ostbahnhof (#140) or Hauptbahnhof (#147), stops are next to my house.  By public transport you are in a few minutes either at Alexanderplatz, former Checkpoint Charlie and it's museum, Jewish Museum, to the Hackescher Markt, Unter den Linden, the Ku-Damm and the Memorial Church, Potsdamer Platz and or the Museum Island.  For the brave of you: I also have two new bike to rent (8€ p. day/bike with quantity discount and incl. a Berlin biking map) :)
access: All guests (there is a second guestroom) share a private bathroom (see photo).
interaction: I've been living here for 35 years and I'm happy to help, just ask.
house_rules: First Rule: Have Fun! Beside that: Please don't bring other people in my house, especially not over night! And please turn off any file-sharing software and do not stream movies on your internet connection, it's very expensive in Germany and I have to charge you...
host_about:
Mein Name ist Gabriele, ich bin Künstlerin, Fotografin, Filmemacherin und lebe seit 35 Jahren in Berlin-Kreuzberg. 

I am an artist working with photography and film, living in Berlin since 35 years.

name: Great 2bd apt perfect for a couple
space: Enjoy your holidays in Berlin! Our beautiful 2-room apartment in Berlin will be available from time to time this summer and autumn. The flat is located along the Landwehrkanal in Nord-Neukölln (Kiehlufer) and is a fully furnished, well-kept two room flat (57m2, perfect for a couple or a single person) with high ceilings and wood floors. It has a bedroom with a comfortable double bed, a fully equipped kitchen perfect for people who love to cook, a big cozy living room with a spacious working area, sofas, and TV, and a comfortable bathroom with WC, bathtub, shower, that has a beautiful view of the canal. The bedroom and kitchen have both access to the long balcony that looks over the canal. The apartment faces south, and has many windows, which guarantees sunlight, good light all day long. It is located in the Nord-Neukölln district, between the Landwehrkanal and Treptower Park, in a very green and calm area full of canals, parks, walking distance supermarkets, biomarkts, flea markets, t

house_rules: There's a lot of cool clubs and bars to go out in Berlin so no parties at home please! Don't be loud after 10pm, the neighbors are really respectful, so please be respectful too and don't spoil their dreams! Leave the place as you found it. Guests older than 28 preferable.
host_about: Hi! We are a couple who loves traveling. Juan is a photographer and I am a scholar, dedicated to philosophy and the humanities. We live between Berlin, Paris and Bogota. Since we don't have a fixed base, we are really used to subletting our lovely apartments, for long periods, a week or a couple of days... feel free to contact us if you have questions!! we are flexible with dates.

name: Beautiful, quiet, clean & central.
space: I offer a room with high ceilings and wooden floor, all nicely renovated in an old beautiful building - Berlin style.  It has a double bed with a luxury mattress, and two big windows facing a lovely back yard. The apartment is clean, quiet, and near to Hermannstrasse station. It would take you only 14 minutes to get to Alexanderplatz or to Potsdamer Platz. The area is very vivid, close to bars, cafés with live music, parks and many stores. The apartment has a wireless internet connection.  You will get bed sheets and towels, and can make free phone calls to landlines in Germany. You can use the laundry machine for 3 Euros. I have one small and sweet dog that sometimes stay in the apartment. There is free parking in the area. For me, I live in Berlin for many years, so I will be happy to help and tell everything you need to know in order to make the best out of your stay in the city. I speak english, german and hebrew, and have a non smoking household. לאלה מכם שמדברים עברית, שמי מיה שי

name: 1-room-flat in Prenzlauer Berg/WIFI
summary: The studio has a balcony, separate bathroom and kitchen. The Prenzlauer Berg is reknown for its cultural diversity and open-minded way of life. The flat is located in its center and everything is within walking distance. 3 months minimum stay for this wonderful fully furnished apartment in top location. Regular rental contract included. This apartment won't be let for touristic purposes. Employer's attestation or similar needed!
space: Come and visit the famous Prenzlauer Berg!  In the middle of the "Gleim quarter" between the historic Mauerpark and the Schönhauser Allee, the lifeline of the Prenzlauer Berg, you will reside in this nice old building flat.  You have your own 4 walls with a separate bathroom and a separate kitchen (oven, 4 plates, fridge, coffee machine, kettle, etc.), a double bed with a high quality mattress, and a table with 3 chairs in chippendale style. On one hand situated in a quiet backyard with a spacious balcony it is, on the other hand, located at a stone's throw from the Schönhauser Allee (2 min walk), where you have access to multiple public transports (S-Bahn commuter train ring, metro U2 to Mitte/Alexanderplatz, M1 tram and night bus for the nighthawks). Moreover, you will find innumerable restaurants, bars, shops and galeries right around the corner! Wifi is included in the price! Tip: Check out the flea market in the Mauerpark on sundays...especially during the warm season. Come and fi

host_about:
Liebe Mieter,

aufgrund der neuen gesetzlichen Lage habe ich meine Angebote umgestellt auf eine Mindestdauer der Miete von 3 Monaten. Alles ander ist ab dem 01.05.2016 leider nicht mehr legal. Ihr erhaltet natürlich einen Mietvertrag, mit dem Ihr Euch beim zuständigen Bürgeramt anmelden solltet.

Ihr könnt meine Wohnungen also ab sofort längerfristig mieten. Das ist ideal für Erasmusstudenten, längere berufliche Aufenthalte oder bspw. um in Berlin eine erste Bleibe zu finden :)



Dear everybody,

I changed my conditions to a minimum stay of 2 months due to the new law in place since May 1st 2016. You will be handed over a proper rental agreement so you will be able to register yourself at the "Bürgeramt".

Besides  that, I am still trying to make my places look and feel not only clean & comfortable, but also to add a special touch to them, so YOU hopefully feel at ease from the first moment on.

I'm constantly trying to improve, often only on details, to make everything just a touch better so you have a good start in Berlin :)



Apart from that I'm part of a multicultural couple and speak various languages more or less well. So at least one of us is quite sure to be able to communicate with YOU if the standard english is not sufficient:)



Please drop me a line, and I will get back to you asap to answer whatever question you might have.

name: 130 sqm with a view on Mauer Park
summary: An apartment of 130 sqm right in the heart of East Berlin, located next to the beloved park of Prenzlauer Berg, Mauer Park.
space: Consisting of two big bedrooms, a kitchen, a huge lounge, two bathrooms with bathtube and shower, the apartment can welcome 5 persons. The apartment is on the 4th floor with elevator. The lounge has a great view on Mauer Park and has all what you need: flat screen TV, DVD player, internet (Wi-Fi), Hi-Fi system. And a balcony. The first bedroom has a double bed (180x200) with a private bathroom (Toilets, bathtube and shower) and a balcony. The second bedroom has two singles beds (100x200) . And a sleeping couch. The second bathroom has a shower, a washing machine, a dryer, a iron and a hairdryer. We can supply a baby bed without extra cost. The kitchen has all what you need: dishwasher, microwave, pans, toaster, coffee machine, electric kettle, refrigerator-freezer... We supply the bedsheets and towels.

The kitchen has all what you need: dishwasher, microwave, pans, toaster, coffee machine, electric kettle, refrigerator-freezer... We supply the bedsheets and towels. Prenzlauer Berg is no doubt one of the most mythical districts
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is no doubt one of the most mythical districts of the city. It embodies Berlin’s cultural heritage from diverse historical periods, proletarian and middle-class styles of the fin-de-siècle, just as the imprint of socialism. What is more, there has always been a tradition of resistance and opposition giving birth to the spirit of creativity that incessantly surrounds you here. The architecture should hold attention because in spite of the galloping renovation since the fall of the Wall, it still retains some of scars from the Second World War.
notes: If you come with the car: the parking in the street costs 1€/hour from 9h until midnight. You can park fro free in Wedding, 5 minutes walking from the apartment.
transit: The apartment is ideally connected to the public transport system: you aren’t far away from the subway station "Schönhauser Allee" (U2 and Sbahn) as well as from the stop of the streetcar "Schönhauser Allee" (M1) to go, among others, towards Mitte, the historic centre of Berlin. From Tegel Airport: Bus TXL until Beusselstrasse (2nd stop). Then Sbahn (ring) until Schönhauserallee.  A Taxi costs 25 euro.  From Schönefeld Airport:  S9 (Train Sbahn)- Tickets ABC- until Schönhauser Allee.  A Taxi costs 45 euro. From Hauptbahnhof: Sbahn to Alexanderplatz. Then Ubahn until Schönhauserallee (U2).  A Taxi costs 12 euro.
house_rules: It is a non-smoking apartment Check-in time: from 14:00h  Check-in earlier is only available depending on apartment’s availability (if there are guests hosted the night before).  ► No parties allowed  ► No pets allowed  ► No more guests than booked allowed Downloading, uploading, streaming or viewing of illegal content through our internet connection is forbidden. According to German law, illegal downloading and streaming can result legal prosecution and a fine of 3000 € or more.
host_about:
I'm french but I have been living in Berlin since 10 years because I love this city....I am looking forward to welcome you in one of my apartments and to meet people from all over the world.

See you soon!

summary: Con terraza en precioso jardín. Central y tranquilo.
space: Charming maisonette in the building of a recently refurbished old factory, located in Berlin between the old interior patio and a garden. It is located in the Friedrichshain area, near Karl-Marx Allee and the public park Friedrichshain with games areas, tennis courts, cafés and open air cinema. The metro is only a 3 minutes walk away from the apartment, Ostbahnhof and Alexanderplatz are 10 minutes away, as well as the fashionable area of Simon-Dachstr, which has pubs, cafés, clubs and flee markets, etc.  The Apartment has been recently refurbished and has now a slightly different appearance and much more comfort: A new high quality Dux Boxspring bed, new intransparent curtains, big flatscreen TV, Hannah/Morrison chairs from Knoll etc. - FRESH PHOTOS from May 2016: They picture the apartment as it is now! The apartment is located on the ground floor, hidden on courtyard and has a splendid and bright room with a double bed (1,60m x 2,00m), old originals of iron pillars, a concrete floor

notes: IMPORTANT - unfortunately the Berlin Senate passed a law lately saying bookings will have an additional 5 % city tax. This goes to all bookings make in Berlin - hotels, hostels and vacation apartments, airbnb still doesn't have a system for this and so the payment must be in cash upon arrival. Excluded are business trips, (please tell us on time, if you are coming for a business trip) but they need to be verified.
access: Für Nichraucher
interaction: Los propietarios viven en el mismo edificio y pueden ayudar con información sobre la ciudad.
house_rules: Please notice that the apartment is not prepared for kids and is a NO SMOKE place. Thanks !!
host_about: We are a german / argentinian couple living and loving Berlin since the 90´s, We rent this beautiful apartment in Friedrichshain, Berlin to nice people who like design and Mid Century Furniture. We live in the same building, a renovated typical Friedrichshain´s factory and have a Design Gallery in the city.

name: STAYINTOWN - Apartment in Berlin
summary: separates Apartment in einem Einfamilienhaus in ruhiger Nebenstraße, zwei Zimmer, ideal für zwei, max. drei Gäste;  WLAN, Radio, TV; Parkplatz vor dem Haus, Bushaltestelle in 50 m; 20 Minuten bis zum Zentrum, ruhig und mitten im Grünen
space: The apartment is located on the ground floor of our house in the "green area " Pankow-Weissensee in a quiet side street.  The next bus stop you find 50 meters from the apartment. The Berlin public transport system is exelent. Using public transport one can get to Berlin-Alexanderplatz within thirty minutes. The perfect place to explore the city from. The property is surrounded by many small gardens and fields, great for walks and sporting activities. A golf course (Pankow) is also located closeby (1.5 km).  Bicycles can be parked on the property, ans directly in front of the house  there are ample  car parking places. The accommodation consists of a living room with kitchenette, a bedroom and a bathroom with shower. It can sleep two comfortably,  and three maximum .The floor are tiled throughout the apartment and underneath have underfloor heating.  Living room / kitchen area  - Sitting and dining area for four people  - Cooking facilities (2 electric stove, extractor hood and sink)  -

neighborhood_overview: Der Ortsteil Heinersdorf liegt im Berliner Bezirk Pankow und ist für seine Citynähe außerordentlich grün, ländlich und vergleichsweise ruhig und damit ein Kontrast zur Innenstadt. Berlin ist in seiner Ausdehnung eine sehr große Stadt. Das öffentliche Verkehrsnetz ist flächendeckend gut ausgebaut. Die Zeiten, die man mit ihnen bis in die City (Alex) braucht sind absolut in Ordnung.
transit: Sollte man mit dem eigenen Fahrzeug anreisen, kann man direkt vor dem Grundstück parken. Berlin kann man hervorragend mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel erkunden. Die nächste Bushaltestelle ist etwa 50 Meter entfernt. In  rund 20-25 Minuten schafft man es auf diese Weise ins Zentrum (Alexanderplatz).
access: Das Apartment ist Teil des Hauses. Wir teilen uns lediglich den Eingangsbereich. Dementsprechend hat jeder seinen "eigenen" Bereich.
interaction: Ich wohne mit meiner Familie im Haus, in dem sich auch das Gästeapartement befindet. Wir sind also schnell und problemlos zu erreichen und ansprechbar.
house_rules: Das Apartment ist eine Nichtraucher-Unterkunft. Wir bitten das zu akzeptieren. Vor dem Haus kann gerne geraucht werden.
host_about:
Hallo liebe Gäste,

ich bin Dirk und vermiete ein sehr schönes Apartment in Berlin.

Mein Motto ist:

Wer nicht fragt bekommt auch keine Antworten!



Wir freuen uns auf viele interessante Gäste aus aller Welt.

---------------

Hi dear guests,

I'm Dirk and rent a very nice apartment in Berlin.

My motto is:

Who does not ask also do not get answers!



We look forward to many interesting guests from all over the world.

---------------

Hola queridos invitados,

soy Dirk y alquilo un apartamento muy agradable en Berlín.

Mi lema es:

!Quién no se pregunta, por lo general no obtener respuestas!



Esperamos muchos invitados interesantes de todo el mundo.

name: Beautiful bright room super central
space: I offer a beautiful, very bright room with own bathroom in a three-room loft apartment on top level of a very nice old-building in Berlin. The room is fully furnished with a 140x200cm bed - for one person - a comfortable armchair and a table where you can work on. In addition, the room offers a large closet providing space for all your clothes.  Bed linen and towels are plentiful and free of charge. You have your private bathroom with basin & toilet. The second bathroom offers a shower and a bathtub which we will share. There is also a washing machine and a dryer, which can be used on demand.  The apartment is equipped with a spacious kitchen. There is a free wireless internet connection (high speed DSL) and a TV in your room. The apartment is in an unbeatable city location for business people because of the nearby  "Messe" ( trade-fair) as well as for shoppers, foodies and culture lovers as it is close to the popular shopping boulevard Kurfürstendamm, called "Ku`damm".  The bus M29 ru

house_rules: The rental includes no breakfast, but you may of course prepare your own breakfast and coffee/tea in the morning. It is not possible to prepare lunch or dinner in the kitchen - except for long-term reservations.  Breakfast as well as dinner are being offered in several cafés and restaurants in the street and around the corner.  Please take care of all the belongings as if they were yours. If you come home after 12.00 a.m. please be as quite as possible, because I am working during the week.
host_about: I am working as an author and meditation coach, love inspirational people, traveling, animals & nature - and of course Berlin, this open minded, crazy city I´ve been living for 8 years now...

name: Berlin-Mitte Value! Quiet courtyard/very central
summary: Great location!  30 of 75 sq meters. This wood floored/high ceiling typical Berlin "Altbau" section of an apartment consists of 1 simple large room, a small kitchen and a bathroom + shower. The apartment is in Mitte, close to Prenzlauer Berg/Mauerpark. Perfect for short visits, singles or couples. Your section is closed from the rest of the bigger flat wich is not noticeable. You will not be sharing your space.
space: A+++ location! This „Einliegerwohnung“ is an extention of a larger apartment with a separate entrance, bathroom and kitchen. The door to the rest of the apartment is soundproof, hidden, locked and barely noticable (behind mirror in pictures). Your 30 sq meters are facing a quiet courtyard. This wood floored/high ceiling typical Berlin "Altbau" apartment consists of 1 large room with a large double bed, optionally with an extra matress for a 3rd guest), a small kitchen suitable for preparing simple meals, a bathroom + shower + bathtub and of course your own entrance (all linens and towels are provided.) it is located facing a quiet courtyard, it is clean cozy and an authentic "Berlin" place to live. The place is in Mitte, close to Prenzlauer Berg one block from Kastanienallee, Zionskirchplatz, Rosenthaler Platz and Mauerpark. Generally this area is lively with galleries, museums, resturants, cafes, flea markets, bars, clubs, shops, good take away food, a park, U-Bahn, trams, supermarket

neighborhood_overview: It is located in the former East Berlin area of Kastanienallee and Zionskirchplatz (Berlins only natural elevation), very charming and original turn of the last century architecture; this area was barely been destroyed during the war. Close to galleries, resturants, museums, flea markets, cafes, bars, clubs, shops, good take away food, a park, great public transportation: U-Bahn, S-Bahn, Trams, Busses, supermarkets etc.
notes: This is my home, not a hotel. I rent out occasionally when I stay with my friend.
transit: Close to U-Bahn U8 and U2 (metro), Trams M12, M10 and M8, Busses. Rosenthaler Platz and Hackescher Markt are close by. S-Bahn. Alexander Platz is 6 minutes away on the U8 line.
access: Simple kitchen/cooking, refrigerator, microwave oven, stove, dishwasher, espresso/ coffee mashine, cable TV deskspace, shower, bath tub, little courtyard garden, 1st floor. There is a large double bed and optional additional airbeds for a 3rd or 4th person/kids. (Please note that the apartment is 30 square meters, if you stay a few nights and are more than 2 adults, it will be tight)
interaction: Always available
house_rules: No parties No events No pets No smoking, not even in the courtyard/garden Do not pull the door shut with the keys in the lock from the inside; should that happen, the guest pays for locksmith
host_about: Believe in sharing economy.

name: clean calm cosy central apartment
summary: Very nice in 2013 renovated apartment near the University Hospital Campus Charité and the University BEUTH in the former working class district Wedding which is today's Mitte. 55 square meters, two rooms plus kitchen & bathroom for 1 up to 4 guests.
space: The apartment has one living room with balcony and one bedroom, each with a bed, one fully equipped kitchen, one bathroom with shower, sink and toilet.    It is located on the fourth floor of the front-facing house built in 1905 with high ceilings and partially preserved stucco. Available sleeping options: in the bedroom, one queen-size bed (150x200) with cold foam mattress hardness 3,  in the living room, one king-size sofa bed (140x200) with latex futon hardness 2.
description: Very nice in 2013 renovated apartment near the University Hospital Campus Charité and the University BEUTH in the former working class district Wedding which is today's Mitte. 55 square meters, two rooms plus kitchen & bathroom for 1 up to 4 guests. The apartment has one living room with balcony and one bedroom, each with a bed, one fully equipped kitchen, one bathroom with shower, sink and toilet.    It is located on the fourth floor of the front-facing house built in 1905 with high ceilings and partially preserved stucco. Available sleeping options: in the bedroom, one queen-size bed (150x200) with cold foam mattress hardness 3,  in the living room, one king-size sofa bed (140x200) with latex futon hardness 2. Apartment is furnished for up to four people with tableware and cutlery.  We also provide toilet paper, detergent and bin bags in the apartment. Beds are covered with fresh bed sheets and there are two towels for each guest to use.  Prices are nightly ratings and include bed li
neighborhood_overview: It is slightly off the beaten track in a nice and calm neighbourhood. Good amenities: Here, in the immediate vicinity is a small park with a playground, several shops for day-to-day needs as well as pubs and restaurants to relax after a stressful day. Whether eating out for breakfast, lunch or dinner - appetite is easily satisfied in any of the nearby gastronomical enterprises (including Thai, Vietnamese, Italian, Turkish), in the "Deichgraf", a bar located in a renowned corner of Berlin, with an adjoining beer garden, Mediterranean touch can be found in the "Auszeit" or a more dignified atmosphere with fireplace in the "fünfundsechzig"
notes: During winter, please heat in an environmentally friendly way, turning down the heater while you are away.
transit: It is centrally located with very good access to public transport by bus, metro and suburban rail and a run_train train station nearby, the motorway A 100 and a direct connection to the airport Tegel.   Locations in the city centre, such as Zoologischer Garten and Kurfürstendamm can be reached within a matter of minutes, via the U9 underground line. The bus number 147 takes 10 minutes to reach the run_train station (Hauptbahnhof). Destinations such as Friedrichstrasse, Alexanderplatz and Hackescher Markt, can be reached by using the U9/U6 or U9/U8 Underground lines with one transfer. And for those unadverse to a little walk along the Nordufer (north banks of the Spree) the Art Museum Hamburger Bahnhof, as well as the Reichstag and the Chancellery can be reached at moderate pace within 30 minutes.
access: Apartment is furnished for up to four people with tableware and cutlery.  We also provide toilet paper, detergent and bin bags in the apartment. Beds are covered with fresh bed sheets and there are two towels for each guest to use.  Prices are nightly ratings and include bed linen, towels, internet and the cost of electricity, water and heating. Free parking lots are available, should it be required.
interaction: We will provide you with detailed maps and guides for travelling in Berlin and the surrounding areas. We are happy to assist you in planning your day and give you helpful advice, if so required.
house_rules: It's a NON-smoking apartment. Smoking on the balcony is possible. Checkin after 02:00 pm Checkout till 11:00 am Luggage dropoff might be possible. Please ask us in advance. 20 Euro additional charge for late checkins after 10:00 pm!  CityTax From January 1st, 2014 there is a mandatory 5% Cititax of the total amount of accomodation only for touristic stays in Berlin. We have to charge it in cash after checkin.
host_about:
Ich bin in Izmir geboren und aufgewachsen, habe lange in Istanbul gelebt und bin nun seit 2007 Jahren in Berlin verheiratet mit meinem Mann Tom.

Ich habe Film in Izmir studiert und zuletzt einige Semester Filmwissenschaft an der FU Berlin.

Tauchen ist meine Leidenschaft und Tauchlehrerin meine Berufung.

Thailand ist unsere "dritte" Heimat wo wir uns kennengelernt haben. 

Wir reisen gerne, was jedoch nur noch eingeschränkt möglich ist seitdem 2012 unsere Tochter Ida geboren wurde.

name: F43 - your base for Berlin
summary: Living, cooking, sleeping in a fully equipped apartment. Bars, clubs and concerts, Oberbaum-bridge, East Side Gallery or tasty and affordable food in one of the many restaurants of our neighbourhood.
space: Gather power for bars, clubs and concerts. Get in the mood for sports and entertainment in the O2-World. Prepare for business-meetings in the Osthafen. Start from here to discover Berlin with "Linie 1". Take a walk over Oberbaumbrücke from Kreuzberg into Friedrichshain. Take snap-shots in front of the East Side Gallery or ... ... eat tasty and affordable food in one of the many restaurants of our neighbourhood. Apartment F43 is centrally located, sunny, quiet and inexpensive. Our stucco-studio has 36 sqm and was renovated completely in 2010. It has got a double bed and a bed sofa that may alternatively serve as single or double bed. You can just lounge on it and watch t.v. or DVDs on our 26"-flatscreen, too. The kitchen provides a 4-plate-glass-ceramic-plate, dish-washer, washing-machine and everything else you could ask for in a holiday. If you have to prepare for an elegant dinner or a visit at your parents-in-law you will find ironing equipment and a blow-dryer. Enjoy your time at F

The kitchen provides a 4-plate-glass-ceramic-plate, dish-washer, washing-machine a
notes: We are on fourth floor plus ground floor and there is no lift. Some like that because it is quiet and sunny up there some don't because it is too much strain. The minimum stay is 60 nights.
transit: U-Bahn, S-Bahn, bus - all within walking distance! Parking in the area is for free - but at times hard to find.
interaction: We will warmly welcome you and are curious to learn about your plans for your time in Berlin. Nevertheless, we do not live in the same building.
house_rules: Feel at home - just like there you will respect your and our neighbours as if they were your best friends.  Tell us if anything is missing and we will take care.  Let us know if you have broken anything, so we can replace it before the next guests arrive. Smoking in buildings is forbidden in Germany and people are just not used to it anymore - so please smoke outside the house if you need to. We have wooden floors that don't partner with dog's claws, so, sorry, they have to stay outside. Check-In is between 5pm and midnight. Check-Out ist around 12 am. Differing Check-In and -Out times on request possible - in that case please contact us as soon as possible.
host_about:
Willkommen in Berlin-Kreuzberg! Weil wir selber viel reisen und immer dachten, dass viele Dinge in Ferienwohnungen so einfach besser zu machen wären, haben wir unsere eigene aufgemacht!

... und weil das gut geklappt hat, haben wir das Ganze auf Marias ehemalige Studentenbude im Zentrum von Warschau ausgedehnt (nach einer umfassenden Renovierung).



Welcome to Berlin-Kreuzberg! Traveling a lot we always thought things could be improved so easily in many apartments. So we set up our own!

... and since this worked well, we extended the idea to Maria's former student-flat in Warsaw's center (after renovating it completely).

name: Loft Appartment in Berlin Kreuzberg
summary: I think there is no better place in Kreuzberg Wrangelkiez then this.
space: 50 m/2 Loft and 30m/2 Roofterrasse im Wrangelkiez. Internet, Telefon, Washingmaschine - everything is ready. There is one thing I got to tell you: If you rent may flat it might be that you see Berlin in a different way - from my terrasse. Because maybe you don`t want to leave my flat;-) I live in Berlin and I like to travel everywhere in Europe an "rest of world" - especially with my girlfriend - whenever our job allows it. My flat with a big roof terrace an view over berlin is located in a perfect berlin surrounding - the wrangelkiez. It`s in the middle of Berlin and my flat is quite like a house in the country site. If you walk like 5 to 10 minutes you have parks, the spree, cafes, etaurants, clubs, cinemas, theatres and - the best of all - interesting people from all over the word. And if you want to stay at home: have a seat at the terrace during sunset. best S*

house_rules: Ruhe und Sauberkeit
host_about: I live in Berlin and I like to travel everywhere in Europe an "rest of world" - especially with my girlfriend - whenever our job allows it. My flat with a big roof terrace an view over berlin is located in a perfect berlin surrounding - the wrangelkiez. It`s in the middle of Berlin and my flat is quite like a house in the country site. If you walk like 5 to 10 minutes you have parks, the spree, cafes, etaurants, clubs, cinemas, theatres and - the best of all - interesting people from all over the word. And if you want to stay at home: have a seat at the terrace during sunset.

name: Spacious, Sunlit & Great Furniture
summary: This sunlight place with antique and modern furniture is in a small, rather quiet street in the heart of Friedrichshain, 5 minutes from the metro and the buzzing Boxhagener Platz with its many cafés, restaurants and galleries.
space: The room to rent has a size of 20sqm and a pleasant mix of antique & modern furniture and you can lock the door from the inside; Check in and out times are flexible, just let me know in advance so I can be available.  The flat has a total of 55 sqm and is on one of the higher levels, accessible by stairs - so it is without an elevator but comes with internet:) The underground station Samariterstr., tram and bus stops are all only a few minutes away - and the street itself is rather quiet.  The bathroom is small but comes with a generous bathtub and big windows; the kitchen with its warm, mediterranean colours sports a cosy sofa as well, so you may join me for a tea or coffee. The large (sleeping) sofa for you has big cushons, and of course comes with clean bedding, bedsheet and towel. By the way, I offer a bike for 10 euros per day.  Personally, I practice guitar playing, fitness and Yoga training and know a few Yoga schools around - and some good vegetarian restaurants around the corn
description: This sunlight place with antique and modern furniture is in a small, rather quiet street in the heart of Friedrichshain, 5 minutes from the metro and the buzzing Boxhagener Platz with its many cafés, restaurants and galleries. The room to rent has a size of 20sqm and a pleasant mix of antique & modern furniture and you can lock the door from the inside; Check in and out times are flexible, just let me know in advance so I can be available.  The flat has a total of 55 sqm and is on one of the higher levels, accessible by stairs - so it is without an elevator but comes with internet:) The underground station Samariterstr., tram and bus stops are all only a few minutes away - and the street itself is rather quiet.  The bathroom is small but comes with a generous bathtub and big windows; the kitchen with its warm, mediterranean colours sports a cosy sofa as well, so you may join me for a tea or coffee. The large (sleeping) sofa for you has big cushons, and of course comes with clean beddin
neighborhood_overview: well, it is nowhere easier to find so many restaurants, bars and clubs concentrated than 3 to 10 walking minutes from here
notes: please have an id card or 40 euros as a deposit available in exchange for the keys that you get back on departure day
transit: transport: just two walking minutes away are buses and trams, 5 minutes the metro station, and from there a 7min ride (or 30min walk) to the center of Alexanderplatz.
access: Guest Access: plenty of blankets, bed sheets, towel, a yoga mat in your room whose door you can lock with a bolt from inside. You are welcome to use hair dryer, shampoos as well as Berlin books and guides, maps, internet access, fridge, bath, plenty of ideas whereto go etc.
interaction: Interaction with Guests: I am glad to share a good cup of tea or coffee together - or, if we find time, have also great Indian, Sri Lankan, Russian or Vietnamese food nearby...
house_rules: When you arrive at my place, Colbestr. 32, please press the bell with the name "Gupta".  People are rather quiet and friendly here in the neighbourhood, though just a couple of streets away life is buzzing; so lets keep it like that in that flat, and please don´t smoke inside. thanks you are welcome to use the internet; by using my wifi, you agree to access only legal sites and information. You thus refrain from using illegal torrent, p2p resp. any illegal web content or use; in case of not adhering to this requirement, you agree to bear possible damage etc. claims by third parties.
host_about:
Hallo und Guten Tag, ich bin Christoph and freue mich auf dich!

I have a multicultural backround, with values like hospitality and reaching out being highly regarded; I guess people consider me relaxed and easy going; I like classical, flamenco and Indian music, practice yoga and sports for a wholesome approach to keep body and mind together & well.



I offer you accommodation in a spacious 20 sq.metre room in a shared clean flat - have a look for the pictures incl. antique furniture and nice details.

name: Weekend in Berlin Party Center - II
space: Beautiful 20 sq.m. room in a 120 sq.m. shared apartment in the center of Berlin's alternative district - Wrangelkiez in Kreuzberg. 5 min walk from Metro U1 Schlesisches Tor. Live 10secs near one of the coolest parks - Görlitzer Park- 10min walk to 2 rivers that cross through the city. Lick your lips with diverse and delicious foods: authentic german, turkish, spanish, mexican, thai, vietnamese, indian foods- all on the same street. Berlin's hippest venues and clubs are at walking distance: Berghain, Club der Visionäre, Arena, Watergate- if getting sweaty in nightclubs is your thing. Or just relax at the sunny terraces of a hundred cafés in the area. When you're ready for a nap, or some cool afternoon love, retreat to the bright and cosy room. Through the two large windows, which can be opened all the way, you have a view of one of Berlin's oldest churches which is a few meters from the sill of the window. There are a comfy bed of 1,20m with a a side tabl, a desk, a shelf and a clothes'

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is one of the coolest and hippest in all over Berlin - there are plenty of cafés, bars, restaurants, clubs and funky shops around. At one end of the street is the river Spree and the East Side Gallery, at the other there is Görlitzer Park.
transit: Metro U1 Schlesisches Tor, S-Bahn Warschauerstr., Bus No. 265 Falckensteinstr.
access: Included in the price are fresh sheets and towels, the common use of the bathroom, guest toilet, kitchen and living room as well as the internet acccess.
interaction: As I live there myself there's quite a lot of interaction with the guests - depending on what they want and how busy I am.
house_rules: Smoking is only allowed in the kitchen and living room.
host_about: I am a self-employed consultant to (mainly) foreigners buying real estate in Berlin. My castle is your castle ;) - I often work from home but I am also out a lot. I am curious to meet new people and enjoy a good dinner with friends as well as a spontaneous open air party or a weekend out of town. I love music, cooking and food, museums and exhibition openings, clubbing, gigs and festivals. I like reading, movies, arts and culture. .

name: separates Mini-Appartement mit  Bad + WC
summary: In einem ruhigen, jedoch zentral gelegenen Haus in Nachbarschaft eines Parks und vieler Geschäfte, liegt im 4. Stock ( mit Fahrstuhl ) in einer Wohnung eine Einlieger-Wohnung zur Alleinnutzung. Alles was nötig ist ist vorhanden!
space: Klein aber fein...
description: In einem ruhigen, jedoch zentral gelegenen Haus in Nachbarschaft eines Parks und vieler Geschäfte, liegt im 4. Stock ( mit Fahrstuhl ) in einer Wohnung eine Einlieger-Wohnung zur Alleinnutzung. Alles was nötig ist ist vorhanden! Klein aber fein... Ein Duschbad mit WC ist in im Appartement vorhanden, in der Pantry ist kochen nicht möglich, jedoch gibt es eine Mikrowelle. Man kann mich jederzeit auf dem Handy erreichen. Der Park um die Ecke ist zu jeder Jahreszeit schön. Besonders in den warmen Monaten gibt es dort, wie auch in der näheren Umgebung Cafés oder Restaurants in denen man auf der Terrasse gut essen kann. Die Wohnung liegt absolut verkehrsgünstig. U-Bahn, S-Bahn und Busse sind innerhalb von wenigen Minuten zu erreichen. Mit der S-Bahn erreicht man in 15 min die touristischen hot spots. Der Kiez angenehm um zu flanieren, zum Beispiel erreicht man den Ku-Damm fußläufig.

name: bedroom with your own bath
summary: The apartment not only has a private bathroom and toilet, it also has its own front door. It part of a larger apartment in a typical Prenz'lberger founder-time house. The bed is an canopy bed ... it comes straight from heaven ;-) youtube: 0cl2Xhqdt
space: Accomodation: This single-room apartment, measuring about 18m² in size, perfectly suitable for up to two occupants and featuring an independent entrance is part of an old building which has been completely renovated in mid of 2011. By 2018, the guest room was again renovated and equipped with further highlights. Thus its equipment ranges from advanced technology conveniences such as a state-of-the-art lighting, electric and alarm system, over hardwood floor and central heating to distinct-style furnishment including a 1.4*2.0m sized canopy bed (search (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or youtube 0cl2Xhqdt88), a spacious wardrobe, desk and working chair, to additional two chairs coming with a dining table as well as several shelves. Shower, lavatory and washbasin naturally are built-in. Furthermore bedlinen, towels, a water kettle, toaster, microwave a teaset and a fridge are be provided. Internet, washing machine, dryer and an electric iron as well as a microwave are open for joint-use. Upon

Shower, lavator
neighborhood_overview: Das Apartment liegt im beliebten Berliner Stadtbezirk Prenzlauer Berg. Zum S-Bahnhof Bornholmer Straße mit der berühmten Bösebrücke, dem ehemaligen Grenzübergang zwischen Ost-und Westberlin, sind es nur 3 Minuten Fußweg. Die Straßenbahn M13 und 50 hält fast direkt vor der Haustür (Haltestelle Björsonstraße und Schönfließer Straße). Ein Lidl-Supermarkt befindet sich 300 m entfernt, ebenso die älteste und beste Bäckerei Berlins (Bäckerei Siebert). In direkter Nähe findest du viele Sehenswürdigkeiten, Kinos, Clubs, Szenekneipen, Cafés, Restaurants, Drogerien, Banken, Märkte, Bioläden, Einkaufscenter (Schönhauser Allee Arcaden und Gesundbrunnen Center) und einen Fahrradverleih. Mit dem Fahrrad lässt sich Berlin sehr gut entdecken. Natürlich helfe ich dir gern bei der Planung deines Aufenthaltes in der schönsten Stadt der Welt.Das Apartment liegt im beliebten Berliner Stadtbezirk Prenzlauer Berg. name: Lounge Room –  Alex in 5 Min
space: We are registered at the Berlin city council, so you can be save to rent a legal place. Our room is located in a listed Wilhelminian style building which was built in 1878. It is bordering Berlin downtown and is a great location to explore Berlin from. The room belongs to our private apartment, bathroom, toilet, and kitchen is shared with others. • Quiet, window facing the backyard • At the end of the apartment • Furnished with high quality pieces (leather, solid wood) • Queen size bed (160x200cm)  • Memory foam matress and comfy duvet  • Wireless internet (WiFi)  • Kitchen + dining area • Shared bathroom • Lonely Planet Berlin and other guides  • Towels and linens • Slippers • The flat is shared with other guests • Check in between 6 - 10 p.m. We look forward to meeting and hosting you!  Project A.

neighborhood_overview: The 'Kollwitzkiez' is one of the hippest districts Berlin has to offer. The streets in our neighborhood have the charm of Parisian boulevards and encompass a wide range of trendy bistros, bars, cafes, restaurants, and grocery stores. There are also other mod cons - pharmacy, bank, coffee shops, ATMs, post office, boutique stores, live music, cinemas etc - - all within easy walking distance (no more than 15 mins). Anything else you desire should be with a 20 minute radius if you take public transport.
notes: 5% city tax is paid upon arrival. For more information please refer to the federal state of Berlin website.
transit: Tram M2: 1 minute walk Subway U2: 5 minutes walk Both will get you to Alexanderplatz in 5 minutes. Alexanderplatz is the closest hub and from here you have the S-Bahn, U-Bahn, Metro (tram) and Bus network to get you to where ever you wish to go.
access: • shared kitchen area • shared bathroom
interaction: We´re available for any queries prior to and during your stay.
house_rules: Since we are private hosts with regular jobs and a small kid, we have some regulations  • please provide a one hour time frame for your arrival • regular checkin between 6pm - 10pm, earlier checkin can be organized  • checkout by 10am • fees: earlier checkin 5€, checkin between 10pm and 11pm 5€, between 11pm and 12pm 10€, after 12pm 20 € (arrival after midnight is not welcome, please ask us first before booking) • Not arriving in the one hour agreed timeframe and failing to communicate it atlease one hour before the timeframe = 10€ •  5% (netto) city tax is paid on arrival. Any private host, vacation rental, hostel, hotel etc. in Berlin is expected to pay the tax on top of the price you pay on airbnb since January 2014, unfortunately we cannot get around that. For more information please refer to the federal state of Berlin website. • please be quite in the backyard and the communal hallway, since it echoes a lot in this building • smoking is strictly forbidden throughout the building,
host_about:
We are a young family of four and private hosts. We  love traveling a lot – and, of course, hosting travelers from all over the world in our home.



We are registered at the Berlin city council, so you can be save to rent a legal place.

name: Centrally located in Berlin-Mitte I
space: Quiet and bright 2-room apartment on the first floor. Due to its central location in Berlin-Mitte you can go everywhere easily. The apartment is cozy and functional. The bunk bed in the bedroom is particularly popular with children.  In the surroundings you find several restaurants and supermarkets, bakery, newsagent, bicycle rental ... Convenient location (10 minutes to Tegel Airport, 15 minutes to Central Station, 2 minutes to the highway), plus a lot of parking space (free of charge).  We are personally on site to answer questions and offer assistance. Since 2006 many satisfied guests have already stayed with us (in this or any of our other 3 apartments in the same house). If you have questions do not hesitate to ask, we look forward to your message!  We speak German and English.  The living room is furnished with a double bed, a couch and a television with satellite connection and a music system.  The bedroom has a bunk bed (2 mattresses á 90 x 200 cm), which is also suitable for a

transit: Der S-Bahnhof "Beusselstr" ist zu Fuß 5 Minuten entfernt, mit der dort fahrenden Ringbahn kommt man schnell überall hin. Ebenfalls am S-Bahnhof fahren mehrere Buslinien, u. a. zum Hauptbahnhof, zum Flughafen Tegel, zum Alexanderplatz... Die nächste U-Bahnstation "Birkenstrasse" ist zu Fuß ca. 15 Minuten entfernt, man kann aber auch mit der S-Bahn fahren und umsteigen.
interaction: Wir wohnen im gleichen Haus, das macht die Kommunikation sehr einfach.
house_rules: In der Wohnung darf nicht geraucht werden. Die Wohnung wird gereinigt und ordentlich übergeben, wir bitten darum, dass die Wohnung in einem ordnungsgemäßen Zustand verlassen wird. Anreise ab 14.00 Uhr (oder nach Vereinbarung), Abreise bis 10.00 Uhr (oder nach Vereinbarung). Anreise nach 22.00 Uhr ist möglich, es entstehen zusätzliche Kosten von EUR 15.
host_about: Mein Mann und ich vermieten seit 2005 Ferienwohnungen. Wir haben die Wohnungen liebevoll eingerichtet, so dass wir uns auch selbst wohlfühlen würden. Wir haben große Freude im Umgang mit unseren Gästen und haben in den vergangenen Jahren schon viele zufriedene Gäste beherbergt. Auch unsere beiden Töchter helfen bereits gerne mit, besonders beim Empfang unserer Gäste. Da wir selbst im gleichen Haus wohnen stehen wir als Ansprechpartner vor Ort persönlich zur Verfügung. Wir freuen uns auf Sie!

name: big, bright, sunny and a balcony
summary: Sunny room with 24sqm and a big balcony on top floor. High ceilings with plastering, wooden floor in a lovingly restored, stylishly furnitured 84sqm flat.  3 minutes to next subway, 2 subway stations to famous Mauerpark , 5 stations to Alexanderplatz
space: A big, bright and sunny room (southside) with 24sqm and a big balcony on top floor. High ceilings with plastering, wooden floor in a caring renovated and stylishly furnitured 84sqm flat, just 3 minutes footwalk to the next subway and tram station. Just one subway station to Prenzlauer Berg, two subway stations from famous Mauerpark and 5 subway stations (10 minutes) to Alexanderplatz. The bed with 140x200 cm is big enough for two persons, blankets (feather bed, no plastic) and sheets are of course included. The flat offers anything you need: a well equipped kitchen with everything for cooking. My home-office room with a big conference table for up to 6-8 persons can be used for a big diner with friends to prior agreement (usually it's my working space with my desk). And of course you have: - free WiFi - bath with bathtube - washing mashine - dishwasher - towels and sheets included - hairdryer ... and a good deal more. house_rules: Please be considerate of other people in the building at all times.    Downloading or uploading of films or music is forbidden. When you rent this apartment you agree to not download or upload any material (films, music etc.) that may breach copyright and therefore be subject to legal action. Please turn heating down or off when you go out, or go to sleep for the sake of the heating bill and the environment. If you throw rubbish in the bins please make sure you put separate your rubbish - Plastic in yellow bin, paper in blue bin, rest in black bin. High Heel shoes are banned in the apartment (please remove at entrance) as they are deadly for my wood floors! I always try to make sure that the essentials in the apartment such as salt, sugar, tea, olive oil, washing liquid for the washing machine etc. please feel free to use these, but if you empty something please replace it. For longer stays - I require a cleaner to visit the apartment once every 2 weeks at an extra cost of 25 E each ti
host_about: I am from London and have been living in Berlin for 10 years now. I am interested in travel, art, music and culture. I have been using Airbnb for about 3 years and have only had great experiences with guests and interacting with the website. I run my own Cafe together with my girlfriend just around the corner from the apartment on Kastanienallee called  "Morning Glory"

name: Bright loft in the Kastanienallee
space: This modern, luxurious self-catering apartment is spaciously designed and stylishly decorated. It is perfect for all ages who just want to relax and long-term renters. Located in the  trendy Kastanienallee, not far from the lovely Helmotzplatz and Kollwitzplatz areas, as well as from Mitte's run_train attractions,  this beautiful, spacious top floor, one-bedroom apartment is perfect for people keen to experience the magic of authentic-Berlin-meets-modern-era accommodation. The apartment is situated in Prenzlauerberg, one of the coziest places in Berlin. Chic and trendy site-specific furniture combined with wooden parquet and high ceilings  make the space a warm and welcoming refuge after a day out in the city. The room and the large livingroom have both an access to the bathroom, so they work independently. The presence of keys at the door guarantees the wished privacy for whoever enters the bathroom. The terrace can be romantically lighted up in the evening, to create a lovely dinner atmos

Located in the  trendy Kastanienallee, not far from the lovely Helmotzplatz and Kollwitzplatz areas, as well as from Mitte's run_train attractions,  this beautiful, spacious top floor, one-bedroom apartment is perfect for people keen to experience the magic of authentic-Berlin-meets-modern-era accommodation. The apartment is situated in Prenzlauerberg, one of the coziest places in Berlin. Chic and trendy site-specific furniture combined with wooden parquet and high ceilings  make the space a warm and welcoming refuge after a day out in the city. The terrace can be romantically lighted up in the evening, to create a lovely dinner atmos
neighborhood_overview: CENTRAL PRENZLAUERBERG This is Berlin's über-trendy district, a favourite with young crowds and artsy types who frequent its terrace cafés, kitsch boutiques and alternative-style bars around Kollwitzplatz, or the Kulturbrauerei, an old brewery with shops and nightlife.  About the area: Countless pubs, restaurants, cafés, galleries and little shops create a day and nightlife atmosphere unrivalled in the rest of Berlin. Along with Schöneberg and Mitte, Prenzlauer Berg is a focal point of the Berlin art scene. Along with Friedrichshain and Kreuzberg it is also a popular neighbourhood with the student population. Prenzlauer Berg is one of the most popular central districts in Berlin and one of the prettiest neighbourhoods, still central, yet quieter than Berlin Mitte. Much of Prenzlauer Berg escaped damage in the second world war and post war redevelopment. Nowadays Prenzlauer Berg offers trendy shopping with many street style fashion designers selling their wares in trendy boutiques.
notes: SINCE JAN 1st 2014 BERLIN HAS INTRODUCED A "TOURIST TAX" (5% of the Netto Price + VAT) THAT HAS TO BE PAID DIRECTLY TO THE APARTMENT OWNER. I WILL CALCULATE THE TAX AMOUNT FOR YOU AND LET YOU KNOW BEFORE YOU COME TO BERLIN.  (It's usually not a lot, between 10€ and 25€ per booking)
transit: PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION Excellent public transport connections take you into Mitte in about 10 minutes, where you can visit run_train Berlin attractions such as Alexanderplatz, Museum Island or Hackescher Markt. Nearby U-Bahn: Eberswalder Strasse (U2); Nearby S-Bahn: Schönhauser Allee (Ring Bahn and many other lines) ;Tram towards Mitte (M1 and 12) just downstairs.
house_rules: IMPORTANT WARNING: This apartment is mainly thought for families and un general quiet occupants.  After a few bad experiences with young groups of party-people, my relationship with my neighbours have become more delicate and important to me than in the past. I I tend therefore to avoid bookings of groups of friends, especially if in the early twenties. For them, my other flat in the Ahlbeckerstr. is  much more indicated. The occupants of this apartment should be ready to observe the silence whenever going in and out of the apartment, in particular after 10 pm.  USEFUL INFORMATION: Address Kastanienallee (phone number hidden) Berlin (Prenzlauerberg) (Important: there are two run_train doors corresponding to number 10. The correct one is the one on the right when facing the building, i.e. the smaller door. Not the one on the left, which serves as exit for the cars, and gives access to the court, where you can find the garbage bins you'll need the following days.   Bell If you are receiving f
host_about: I am a free-lance journalist. I work for several Italian magazines, such as VOGUE ITALIA and L'UOMO VOGUE, covering art, cinema, architecture, environment, food and travel topics.

name: Bright, quiet and spacious two-room
space: . High i will be away from january untill end of april - therefore i offer my apartment . Only for two month and more . Here is a description : Bright, quiet and spacious two-room apartment, in the popular Kreuzberg district, to sublet. The apartment consists of one bedroom with king bed and morning sun (faces east/northeast), a west-facing living room which gets afternoon and evening sunlight, dining area with small separate kitchen, and bathroom with bathtub. The apartment comes furnishednwith a washing machine, dishwasher, flatscreen TV with DVD player, and highspeed internet/wifi connection. Sheets, towels, cooking utensils and dishes are also included. The open floor plan makes the apartment ideal for one or two persons. It's located in the midst of the popular Kreuzberg district just a 5-minute walk from U-bahn (subway) Görlitzer Park. It's also just five minutes away from well known restaurants and trendy bars on the Oranienstrasse and Heinrichplatz. More nightlife, biergartens

name: spacious room in light-flooded classy apartment
space: this is a real berlin experience  /// I’m offering my guest room for short term and long term rentals. ///  My sunny apartment is 120 sqm, on the third floor, with two bedrooms, a huge kitchen with a sofa and a table for 6 — and a balcony. You´ll be sharing the apartment with me. ///  I am a yogi, vegetarian and designer. I love to cook and go for a run. I can offer a relaxed, creative and gay-friendly non-smoking-household. ///  the building is from the turn of the century and well-appointed with latest conveniences:  • all original doors and wooden floors • high ceilings and large windows • fully furnished (closet, table, bed and bedding included) • regular bed for one person and an extra mattress for the second guest • towels and sheets provided (so you do not have to bring those) • washing machine and dish washer • high speed WIFI • rent includes water, gas, power, heating, high-speed wifi /// >>> please mind: while it's of course totally fine for you to eat as you please while not

neighborhood_overview: Location ///////////// from my apartment you over-look the “gleisdreieck”-park. so what you see is a lot of green. you are in the heart if kreuzberg and still it's calm and serene at night. the “gleisdreieck” park opened four years ago: an extensive park right across the street — which is really awesome. viktoria park is literarly right around the corner. bergmannstr. only 3 minutes away (a pleasant and trendy neighbourhood to go out) there you have bike-rentals, restaurants, cafés.
notes: if you plan to stay longer just send me a note and let me know a little bit about yourself. I appreciate a mindful and eco friendly mindset. I can also let you know about my long term conditions then. I kindly ask you to please complete your profile on airbnb and upload a photo before you’re going to book. I’d appreciate it. thanks a lot!   ;-)
transit: get directions on the bvg.de website • the next busstation is 150 m away • subway (U-/S-bahn yorckstraße) in walking distance • there are a bunch of bike rentals in bergmanstraße
access: You have your own private room and we share bathroom and kitchen.
interaction: If you have any questions just let me know I'd be happy to be of help.
house_rules: while it's of course totally cool for you to eat as you please while you're out,  my kitchen is a 100% veggie kitchen. so you cannot cook meat here. general common sense and mindfullness is appreciated. it should be like visiting a friend's house: I am most welcoming & generous when I host, and I appreciate my guests being respectful and discreet.
host_about:
I am a vegetarian and I am into yoga

and love to ride my bicycle around berlin.

other than that I have my own business, love to travell and move and shake, rock ’n’ roll and: meditate.



I enjoy sharing my berlin experience with friends and guests.

name: gorgeous loft room  kreuzberg
space: I rent out my whole appartment which has two floors. the upper room has. 35 square meters and a roof terrace, which however, i often close down for guests as some of the airbnb guests have not respected the house rules. in the lower floor there is a bathroom, kitchen and my sons room. The apartment is located on Südstern in kreuzberg, and is very centrally located. 2 min to metro, for bergammkiez and graefe kiez.
description: I rent out my whole appartment which has two floors. the upper room has. 35 square meters and a roof terrace, which however, i often close down for guests as some of the airbnb guests have not respected the house rules. in the lower floor there is a bathroom, kitchen and my sons room. The apartment is located on Südstern in kreuzberg, and is very centrally located. 2 min to metro, for bergammkiez and graefe kiez.
neighborhood_overview: The flat is in the Südstern area in Kreuzberg, one of the most lively neighbourhoods in entire Berlin, close to bergammkiez und graefekiez. There are plenty of bars, clubs, theatres and shops nearby. There is also a big parc just on the other side of the street.
transit: Parking is easy in front of the house. Otherwise there is an excellent connection to both airports and to the central train station.
access: Guests have access to everything. However, the roof terrace can be closed down from time to time. In summertime there are sometimes heavy storms and in winter the roof is frozen.
interaction: I am accessible most of the time. Many friends live in the same house, so they could also help you, if necessary.
house_rules: I expect people to be clean and to respect the neighbors with whom i have a very good relationship. also, i don´t want berlin party tourists in my place.
host_about: hi, i am hendrik from berlin-kreuzberg. i am ecologist and development economist. Currently, i run an integrated research and development project in Madagascar, that´s why i am often away.

Plus: lovely organic farmers market on Saturdays and fleamarket on Sundays - right in front of your door! In Berlin the public transport has stops for: trains (S-Bahn/Ring-Bahn and/or regional trains), subway (U-Bahn), tram and bus. Everything is run by one company the BVG. You can check your connection online: (URL HIDDEN) They also have an app available that lets you buy tickets
neighborhood_overview: In the center of young, lively area with lots of nice bars and restaurants (incl. lots of veggie/vegan options). Plus: lovely organic farmers market on Saturdays and fleamarket on Sundays - right in front of your door!
transit: In Berlin the public transport has stops for: trains (S-Bahn/Ring-Bahn and/or regional trains), subway (U-Bahn), tram and bus. Everything is run by one company the BVG. You can check your connection online: (URL HIDDEN) They also have an app available that lets you buy tickets online, otherwise there are ticket machines at (almost all) stops. When you travel via bus you can buy it as you enter from the driver and on the tram the machine is inside. Here are the different stops and their distance to my flat: Ringbahn/S-Bahn: OSTKREUZ or WARSCHAUER STR or STORKOWER STR, 10-15 min walking distance  U-Bahn: U5, SAMARITER STR, 5 min, Tram: M13, WÜHLISCH STR/GÄRTNER STR, 3 min,  Bus: 240, BOXHAGENER PLATZ, 2 min   Travel from airport: (these are my recommendations, might vary with time of arrival, check details on the BVG-site or app) From Tegel:  Bus TXL to central station (HBF), then S-Bahn (5, 7, 75) to an eastern direction (should say Alexanderplatz on the display), leave S-Bahn at either

name: Cosy Studio livingspace with balcony, Maybachufer
summary: Beautiful, bright spacious living area  with leafy balcony overlooking Weichselplatz. Bei grösseren Verunreinigungen des Zimmers werde ich die Reinigung in Rechnung stellen.  Ansonsten sollten Parties o.ä. von beiden Seiten abgesprochen werden. Ich bin ein lebensfroher, toleranter und offener Mensch und lerne gerne immer wieder neue Leute kennen.

In meiner Freizeit koche ich gerne, spiele Hockey, schaue fern oder treffe mich mit meinen Freunden. 

Ich bin zur Zeit selbständig als Event -und Barmanagerin und treibe mich auch viel im Berliner Nachtleben herum ;).

host_about:
I live in a huge old flat (100% original berliner altbau) and travel a lot for work and holidays.

When I travel you have the chance to rent the all flat for yourself, when I am  here I love to host and meet new people from all over the world.



I am a photographer and a tango dancer. I am very open minded, I have been living and working in Rome, London, Paris, New York.

My girlfriend often helps me in the flat.

We are very calm and quiet and silent, and I like that atmosphere in the flat.

Please only book these rooms if you are able to enter and respect someone's else home and being able to interact with strangers.

Those who are looking only for a cheap accommodation during their crazy weekends in Berlin, please go to a youth hostel.

space: The place got a warm nice feel. I made some of furniture myself with plywood, some stuff is just older from my family, but I think the pictures are doing the job better than words.

Relax over here for your adventures in the city The place got a warm nice feel. I made some of furniture myself with plywood, some stuff is just older from my family, but I think the pictures are doing the job better than words. You have your own bedroom to yourself and access to a big living room which is shared with my friendly roommate. Kitchen and Bathroom are shared areas aswell. I'm renting out my private room , so I won't be around for that time. You will be able to pick up the keys close by and find little welcome note in the house. If there's an essential question you can reach me via mail or phone. The neighbourhood is mainly residential but offering a lot of different threads, from nice little cafes and high quality cocktail bars. There are a lot of parks close by, flea markets, little boutiques, plenty organic sup
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is mainly residential but offering a lot of different threads, from nice little cafes and high quality cocktail bars. There are a lot of parks close by, flea markets, little boutiques, plenty organic supermarkets and much more...
notes: You'll probably meet Julian my roommate, who is a Canadian, super friendly and respectful.
transit: Great aspect! 2 Tramstops (M10 to F`hain and Kreuzberg, M2 to Alexander Platz) are all in 3min walking distance, (Innercity Line and Ringbahnstops are also quit close). The parking situation is a bit complicated hence it's limited to residents only and I don't possess a car.
access: You have your own bedroom to yourself and access to a big living room which is shared with my friendly roommate. Kitchen and Bathroom are shared areas aswell.
interaction: I'm renting out my private room , so I won't be around for that time. You will be able to pick up the keys close by and find little welcome note in the house. If there's an essential question you can reach me via mail or phone.
house_rules: We love to welcome you here, feel comfortable and enjoy your stay as much as possible. We expect you to tread things over here with respect. We ask you kindly to not smoke in the bedroom and don't bring strangers to the house or party over here/make a lot of noise at not adequate hours. Since experiencing really high bills for hot water consumption after our last couple of guest, I kindly ask you to be eco friendly and carefully use the hot water when showering.  One more thing: since the copyright laws in Germany are really strict and legal fines tend to be up to 1000€ for just downloading movies, we kindly ask you to not use the WiFi for any non-legal downloads. Thanks!
host_about: Friendly & relaxed Berlin native. Who likes to share his place from time to time.

transit: Parkplatz kostenlos sofern freie Kapazitäten. Weitere öffentliche Parkplätze kostenlos direkt vor dem Haus.In Berlin besteht seit dem 01.01.2008 die Umweltzone. Durch die günstige Anbindung auch an die Stadtautobahn kann eine Anreise mit dem PKW jedoch ohne Plakette erfolgen. Ein eigener PKW-Stellplatz steht auf Anfrage zur Verfügung. Für weitere Gäste sind kostenlose öffentliche Parkplätze in ausreichender Anzahl vorhanden.  Der Bus hält vor der Tür und bringt Sie auch im Nachtverkehr innerhalb weniger Minuten zur U-Bahn und zur S-Bahn. Sie erreichen ohne weiteres Umsteigen in Kürze die City West und auch die City Ost.  Supermärkte, Restaurants und Bäcker befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe der Wohnung. Die zweitgrößte Einkaufsmeile Berlins, die Schloßstraße,  erreichen Sie in fünf Minuten

name: Lovely 2-bed room in Berlin
summary: This spacious 2 bed room can comfortably accommodate 2 persons. Besides two single beds it has a commode and a large table. The spacious bathroom is for multiple rooms.
space: Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes!
description: This spacious 2 bed room can comfortably accommodate 2 persons. Besides two single beds it has a commode and a large table. The spacious bathroom is for multiple rooms. Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes! In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room. You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel. Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, rest
neighborhood_overview: Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters and cultural institutions with many really cheap small meal occasions with specialties from around the world. In addition, there's the spectacular collection of Berlin's best clubs, which are in large part all  within walking distance. Because in 200 meters distance, among other things, there is the Berghain / Panorama Bar, which was chosen not only by the New York Times as the "best club in the world".
notes: For privately motivated stays the Senate of Berlin requires 5% City Tax, which must additionally be paid on arrival. Business travelers are exempted from this rule, and are requested to to submit relevant supporting documents upon check-in.
transit: The connection to the public transport network (metro, urban railway, bus, tram) and the central location between Prenzlauer Berg and the Spree guarantee an ideal place to find us easily and to explore Berlin and its surroundings afterwords. Urban railway / S-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (S3, S5, S7, S75): 5 min Metro / U-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (U1): 6 min Frankfurter Tor (U5): 12 min Tram: Warschauer- / Revaler Straße (M10, M13): 4 min Bus: Helsingforser Platz (347, N1): 3 min (all times are by walking)
access: In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room.
interaction: You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel.
host_about:
Hallo,

wir freuen uns sehr auf freundliche Gäste aus aller Welt und begrüßen Euch ganz herzlich!



Im Sunflower Hostel stehen euch gemischte Mehrbettzimmer und geschlechtergetrennte Gemeinschaftsbäder zur Verfügung. Des Weiteren erwarten euch freundliches Personal, die weltweit größte Outdoor-Raucher-Lounge und eine 23h-Bar. Für eure Wünsche und Fragen haben wir rund um die Uhr ein offenes Ohr und helfen euch gern weiter mit Empfehlungen, Wegbeschreibungen etc.

space: Quiet, spacious and light apartment in Berlin Kreuzberg for 2 or a small family. Located in a very green area in the most eastern part of the district.  The apartment has the following rooms, all very well maintained and in good condition: Livingroom with couch and television. Big kitchen with dining table.  Bathroom with bathtub. Bedroom with double bed. Washingmachine, internet-connection, extra sleeping couch and free parking are available.  Görlitzer park and the Landwehrkanal are 1 minute away. Various lively places like the Badeschiff, Oranienstrasse and Northern Neukölln are in walking distance. Public Transport is available almost 24/7. M

name: Queit-central-balcony-WiFi, lease - min 2 months
summary: Welcome to one of the coolest districts of Berlin Mitte - MOABIT! This area is a great mixture of everything Berlin has to offer. It's so different and really surprising everywhere you go!
space: This apartment is situated on a quiet and perfectly accessible street, just between the two metro stations of line U9 (Birkenstraße and Turmstraße).  It consists of one large and well lit bedroom with living space, cozy kitchen with sit-in area, bathroom with bath and great balcony. First floor with elevator (unfortunately not suitable for handicapped). This clean and non-smoking apartment offers its guests plenty of free parking down the street. It's surrounded by grocery shops of every kind, supermarkets, galleries, cozy cafes, great restaurants (some of them serve amazing Sunday brunches), bakeries, banks, post office, library, park for jogging, even beautiful lake with sandy beach if you come in Summer. Our apartment is perfect for anyone who appreciates clean and comfortable environment and looks for a quiet, yet central residence in Berlin Mitte. Maximum occupancy 2/3 people. There's one double bed (1.40x2.00) and one double sofa bed (1.20x2.00), as seen in pictures. The two beds

neighborhood_overview: ---Personal suggestions within the area (please refer to my guide list for more details)--- -Arminius Halle (great tiny restaurants, seasonal market from local farmers). Check some quality wine and beer assortment in this hidden pearl of Moabit. -Taverna Amphipolis - family-run, very nice greek restaurant. Great atmosphere, great prices.  -Arema Café - free WiFi, nice breakfasts served until 4:00 pm!  -Dicker Angel restaurant - german cuisine (mostly famous because of its schnitzel) -Marjan Grill - very nice Croatian restaurant
transit: -Within 15 walking minutes to Spree river and beautiful Tiergarten Park -15 walking minutes to Embassy quarter (Diplomatenviertel) and Bellevue palace -15 walking minutes to river cruise with "La Belle" -15 walking minutes to Café Buchwald - one of the top 10 Berlin Cafés (famous for its Baumkuchen dating back to the 1852)   Only 2 metro stations to  -Ku´damm boulevard (KaDeWe) -Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church (the symbol of Berlin) -new Bikini shopping center -Kino Zoo Palast cinema -famous Berliner Zoo and Aquarium -Closest metro station U-Bahn U9 Birkenstraße and U9 Turmstraße. -Closest S-Bahn Westhafen (3 stations to Prenzlauerberg) -TXL shuttle will bring you here to/from the Tegel airport in only 20 minutes.  -TXL shuttle to central rail station - less than 5 minutes -TXL shuttle to Brandenburger Gate  and Unter den Linden - 15 minutes -TXL shuttle to Alexander Platz, Television tower, Shopping centers: Alexa, Galeria Kaufhof, Primarkt - 20 minutes -From S-Bahn Belleveu it's only
access: You'll have the whole apartment for yourselves! In addition, included in price: -Hi-speed wireless internet -Bed linen -Towels -Cable TV -All the essentials
house_rules: 1. Please don't smoke in the apartment.  2. Please turn off the lights and heating when you leave the apartment.  3. This apartment is not suitable for social events and parties.  4. Please notify us asap of any damage caused to the apartment or anything inside the apartment.  5. Pets not allowed. 6. P2P, torrents and other copyright protected downloading is strictly prohibited. We take no responsibility for any illegal use of the internet.
host_about: I really love traveling and hosting people from all over the world. Exploring new cultures and mentalities, speaking different languages and being helpful makes me really happy. I'm in love with Berlin and feel home in this truly rare and unique city!

name: beautiful stylish apartment, Berlin
summary: Diese freundliche, geräumige und ruhige 2-Zi-Wohnung mit 63 m², Sonnenbalkon und Bildern Berliner Künstler, erwartet Euch!  Der Sprengelkiez ist ein kleines Viertel das sich immer mehr zu einem trendigen Kiez entwickelt. Gleich um die Ecke:  Supermarkt, Bäcker, Kneipen, Cafes, Restaurants, Osterkirche mit Konzertangebot, Spielplätze, Park, Kanal, Badesee ... U-Bahn und Bus sind nur 2 min entfernt, die Verkehrsanbindung ist hervorragend!
space: Welcome to Berlin! There is a beautifully furnished and comfortable apartment for a maximum of four people with individual, modern and homely furnishings. The spacious two-bedroom apartments (63m ²) located in a small old Berlin city district, in a side street traffic in the district of Mitte / Wedding, only 10 minutes from Central Station. Numerous sights, museums, and theaters are within easy reach of a bus or subway in 15 minutes. To relax in front of the door invite the Plötzensee with swimming pool, the beautiful park district with a playground and green trail on the shipping channel that leads you directly to the government district. The underground station, the bus, a supermarket, bakery, restaurants and cozy sidewalk cafes can be reached quickly on foot. A private parking is available on request. Even this very spacious living room in an apartment with his current widespread Triftstraße color design and the decorative paintings of Berlin artist a homelike atmosphere. In collabo

The spacious two-bedroom apartments (63m ²) located in a small old Berlin city district, in a side street traffic in the district of Mitte / Wedding, only 10 minutes from Central Station. Numerous sights, museums, and theaters are within easy reach of a bus or subway in 15 minutes. To relax in front of the door invite the Plötzensee with swimming pool, the beautiful park district with a playground and green trail on the shipping channel that leads you directly to the government district.
