Even this very spacious living room in an apartment with his current widespread Triftstraße color design and the decorative paintings of Berlin artist a homelike atmosphere. In collabo
neighborhood_overview: Für mich ist unser kleines Stadtviertel wie eine Oase. Alles ist zu Fuß erreichbar, viel Grün, der Sprengelpark als großer Spielpark, der Kanal, der nahegelegene Plötzensee mit seinem tollen großen Freibad, viele Kneipen, Cafes, Restaurants und man ist ganz schnell in der großen Stadt.
notes: Liebe Gäste, für Bettwäsche /Handtücher nehme ich eine Gebühr von 10,-Eu pro Person. Die Wäsche kann gerne auch selber mitgebracht werden. Die Kosten sind bei Anreise zu zahlen und sind im Airbnb Preis nicht enthalten. Am 1. Januar 2014 hat die Stadt  Berlin eine Citytax eingeführt. Diese 5% auf den Übernachtungspreis müssen alle Gäste bei Anreise zahlen, die nicht aus beruflichen Gründen die Stadt besuchen. In der Wohnung gibt es keinen Internetanschluß.
transit: der Bus 142 fährt nur 8 min zum Hauptbahnhof, die Haltestelle ist 100m von der Wohnung entfernt,  ebenso die U9 Station "Amrumerstraße". Von der U9+U6 Station Leopoldplatz läuft man 10 min zur Wohnung. Vom Flughafen Tegel nimmt man am besten ein Taxi (ca 13 Eu  / 15 min) Vom Flughafen Schönefeld fährt man 1 Stunde mit S- und U- Bahn
access: Die ganze Wohnung wird nur von den Gästen genutzt, es befinden sich keine privaten Sachen der Vermieterin in der Wohnung.
interaction: Leider wohne ich nun nicht mehr um die Ecke, stehe aber für Fragen gerne fast jeder Zeit zur Verfügung.
house_rules: Die Wohnung befindet sich in einem Mietshaus, deshalb bitte ich abends ab 22 Uhr und am Wochenende besonders leise zu sein. Rauchen ist nur auf dem Balkon möglich. Kinderbett, Hochstuhl(URL HIDDEN)10,00 € einmalig Bettwäsche und Handtücher auf Wunsch pro Perso(URL HIDDEN) 8,00 € einmalig PKW Stellplatz auf dem Hof(URL HIDDEN) 1,50 € pro Nacht Für touristische Berlinaufenthalte unter 21 Tagen müssen 5% Übernachtungssteuer an die Stadt Berlin gezahlt werden.
host_about:
hallo, ich bin Jane, 

ich reise selber sehr gerne, am liebsten mag ich weite, einsame Landschaften und das Meer.

Ich bin eine echte Berlinerin und wohne nun aber seit einigen Jahren hinter dem Stadtrand am Wald und genieße die Natur, liebe es zu malen und in die Sauna zu gehen.

Mir ist wichtig dass sich meine Gäste wohlfühlen und ich freue mich immer über neue Kontakte. Also: herzlich willkommen!

name: Top Central Charming Relaxed Berlin
summary: Helle, freundliche, modern ausgestattete 2 Zimmer Altbauwohnung im Hochparterre eines sehr schönen Altbaus. Gelegen in unmittelbarer Nähe des Winterfeldmarktes, dem Wochenmarkt in Berlin, mit vielen Cafes, kleinen Geschäften, Trödelläden und Galerien
space: In this comfortable and  cosy 2 room apartment that is on 45 sqm equipped with all that it´s needs  for have a good time in Berlin ou stay very a top central quarter, that is charming alive but relaxed, quiet and safe.  In your bedroom with a loft bed that invites you to dream, ther is as well a wardrobe and a writing desk.  The living room has a comfortable sofa bed with a good mattress, television and a dining area for 4 persons.  The kitchen is equipped with stove, fridge-freezer, toaster, coffee and tea maker, pantry and a breakfast table for 2 people. You can prepare your own dish comfortable at home. In the bathroom you will find a bathtub, hand washbasin, toilet and washing machine. Included in the price are bed linen and towels .  Located in the beautiful Schoeneberg. surrounded by a splendid ensemble Wilhelminian that characterize  these streets. Small businesses provide space for exploration, space to linger cafes, restaurants varied pleasure and who do not want to go to bed,

access: Non smoking apartment
house_rules: Please respect the neighbours and keep the noise to a minimum. Guests should treat the apartment as if it were their own home.
host_about:
Berlin war für mich Liebe auf den ersten Blick!



Das war vor über 25 Jahren und die Veränderungen seit dem Mauerfall haben diese Stadt noch attraktiver werden lassen. 



Seit 2005 freue ich mich, Gästen aus aller Welt,  italienische Gastfreundschaft in Berlin in einem besonders schönem und zentralem Kiez, anbieten zu können.



Gerne helfe ich und meine Familie Ihnen mit praktischen Tips um Ihnen den Aufenthalt in Berlin und Schöneberg so angenehm wie möglich zu gestalten! 



Benvenuti a Berlin



Antonella

name: Berlin Friedrichshain 1,5km to Alex
summary: I offer a room in a house with history. It is part of the Karl-Marx-Allee in Friedrichshain which is a monumental socialist boulevard. The buildings have the style of "classical socialism" - a brightly flat with interesting architecture.
space: Hi Berlin visitors,  I offer you a room very close to Alexanderplatz in one of the poplars streets of Berlin. The room is 21 sqm large and is part of a three room flat (around 80 sqm). The room has a double bed (140*200) and you will be suplied with clean linen. During New Years Eve we offer a second room with a similar size.
description: I offer a room in a house with history. It is part of the Karl-Marx-Allee in Friedrichshain which is a monumental socialist boulevard. The buildings have the style of "classical socialism" - a brightly flat with interesting architecture. Hi Berlin visitors,  I offer you a room very close to Alexanderplatz in one of the poplars streets of Berlin. The room is 21 sqm large and is part of a three room flat (around 80 sqm). The room has a double bed (140*200) and you will be suplied with clean linen. During New Years Eve we offer a second room with a similar size. The flat has a well equiped kitchen where you can use the fridge all other stuff. The lightful bathroom is shared. The flat has everything what you need:  - WLAN  - towels  - wasching machine  - hairdryer  - 3 minutes walk to the metro  - free parking lots in backside of the house  I offer a new city bike (5 Euro a day) as well. I like to chat with our guests. I live since several years in Berlin. Therefore I can give you some tip
neighborhood_overview: The Karl-Marx-Allee is very special and connected with a lot of history. You can get an impression on wikipedia. Search for: Karl-Marx-Allee On the street you can find bars, restaurants, museums and so on. The flat is very central. You can walk to Alexanderplatz or to the train station Ostbahnhof. You need 10-15 minutes. A lot of nice areas are around the flat (hot spots for tourists): Warschauer Straße, Volkspark Freidrichshain, Oranienstr., Simon-Dach Str. ...
notes: Do not hestitate to contact me by mail for any question. I wish you a nice stay in Berlin.  Sterni
transit: Public transport services: metro U5  International trains: Ostbahnhof (1km away) airport: you need from both airports around 40 minutes with public transport
access: The flat has a well equiped kitchen where you can use the fridge all other stuff. The lightful bathroom is shared. The flat has everything what you need:  - WLAN  - towels  - wasching machine  - hairdryer  - 3 minutes walk to the metro  - free parking lots in backside of the house  I offer a new city bike (5 Euro a day) as well.
interaction: I like to chat with our guests. I live since several years in Berlin. Therefore I can give you some tips to explore Berlin. I speak English, German and Polish.
house_rules: It is easy: you should leave the flat in the same condition as you were found upon arrival. You should ask if you have a pet by you. Furthermore you should not do any illegal things in the internet.
host_about:
Hi, 

My flatmate and II live since several years in Berlin.

I like to travel. My last travels were to Spain, Wales, Scotland, South Africa, Turkey and Poland. In general it is nice to share experiences from different cultures. It`s one reason why I lived abroad.

I play Volleyball, Football and sometimes I discover the city. Berlin is very big and it is possible to find something new each day.

name: calm, sunny and central apartment
space: This very calm and sunny studio is located in the beautiful and idyllic Bavarian District of Berlin-Schöneberg and has a large south-west balcony. The flat is directly under the roof, so that you have a beautiful view over Berlin. In front of the house there is sufficient free parking space. The connection to the public transportation (short- and long-distance) is optimal. The U-Bahn-lines 4 and 7 are in close proximity. The Winterfeldplatz and Viktoria-Luise-Platz with many nice cafés and restaurants are within five minutes walks. The Kurfürstendamm and the KadeWe can be reached comfortably by a 15 minutes walk. Shops and other facilities for the daily needs in sufficient number and diversity are close-by.  A very bright light-flooded living room, the very elegant, pleasant and new furnishings including a television and a tape deck radio invite you to stay and relax. The apartment disposes of a comfortable double-bed and a sofa bed , so that up to four people are able to sleep there c

name: Lovely accommodation in Berlin
summary: The flat is located in the middle of the vibrant district Berlin-Friedrichshain. If you step out of the house, you're surrounded by restaurants, bars and clubs. But the flat is quiet and peacfull, because it's in the rear house.
space: Hello, I'm renting out my flat when I'm not at home. You'll sleep in a big room with a double bed 180x200cm. Bedlinen, towels and WiFi-Internet is included. The flat is perfect for two people. It's an old style building with high ceiling, wooden floor, a big courtyard and it's very quiet in the middle of the vibrant district Berlin-Friedrichshain.  -> please ask for more details
description: The flat is located in the middle of the vibrant district Berlin-Friedrichshain. If you step out of the house, you're surrounded by restaurants, bars and clubs. But the flat is quiet and peacfull, because it's in the rear house. Hello, I'm renting out my flat when I'm not at home. You'll sleep in a big room with a double bed 180x200cm. Bedlinen, towels and WiFi-Internet is included. The flat is perfect for two people. It's an old style building with high ceiling, wooden floor, a big courtyard and it's very quiet in the middle of the vibrant district Berlin-Friedrichshain.  -> please ask for more details -> please ask for more details If you have any questions, problems you can call me or write me via airbnb. Berlin-Fiedrichshain is a friendly and vibrant district for families, couples and singles. There are lots of little shops, cafes, restaurants just around the corner. At weekends there is a market and fleemarket at Boxhagener Platz (5 min walk). You also find nice parks for sport-ac
neighborhood_overview: Berlin-Fiedrichshain is a friendly and vibrant district for families, couples and singles. There are lots of little shops, cafes, restaurants just around the corner. At weekends there is a market and fleemarket at Boxhagener Platz (5 min walk). You also find nice parks for sport-activities, some cinemas and clubs (Berghain, Suicide Circus, Watergate, Süß war gestern, Kater Blau, Wilde Renate etc.) in that area. Berlin-Mitte with its museums is the next district and just 20 min away by public transport.
notes: It can appear that I'm not in Berlin when you arrive. In this case you're getting the key from a friend or I deposit it in a shop for you.
transit: The next S-Bahn / and Metro-Station "Warschauer Strasse" is 10 minutes to walk, it has easy connection to both airports; tram-line M10 which runs 24/7 is just 5 minutes away. You can reach Kreuzberg, Mitte, Prenzlauer Berg within 20 minutes and there's also a night bus.
access: -> please ask for more details
interaction: If you have any questions, problems you can call me or write me via airbnb.
house_rules: Rauchen in der gesamten Wohnung ist nicht erlaubt. Haustiere und andere Tiere sind ebenfalls nicht erlaubt. Bitte haltet euch an die Ruhezeiten: Montag - Sonntag 22-7 Uhr und zusätzlich am Wochenende / Feiertag 13-15 Uhr. Bitte verlasst die Wohnung so, wie ihr sie vorgefunden habt.
host_about: Hi, I'm Robert. I'm from Rostock (north Germany, at the baltic sea) and live in Berlin since 2005. I studied economics and work for an energy-supply- company at the moment. I love Berlin and want to show it other people by renting out my room when I'm not in town :) I also like to travel with airbnb, especially to places where I can go kitesurfing. I already met a lot of nice people and stayed in fantastic places.

host_about:
Hi I am Mark, originally from England, but living in Berlin since 2007. I have two apartments which I rent out to people visiting Berlin. I am also a massage therapist, offering holistic massage therapy at a studio in Prenzlauerberg.

I have been travelling and living in many places in the world and had some adventures including cycling the Silk road from Pakistan into China and returning to europe via the trans-Mongolian express. More recently in April 2011 I walked the french route of the  Camino de santiago de Compostela, covering some 800 km. I love meeting new people and enjoy being a host to visitors.



Look forward to hear from you

Mark

space: Stylish accommodation with high quality furniture and interiors in central location. Situated in a newly renovated wing of an old apartment building in the Friedrichshain neighborhood, in close proximity to the overground trains (S-Bahn), DB-Bahn (run_train railway lines), the Alexanderplatz square, park or to the river Spree .. name: QUIET n SUNNY FLAT in MITTE/PBERG
summary: Central, quiet, bright and ample in a beautiful part of Berlin, 65 m2 (c.a. 700 sq. ft.), a step away from the former wall strip, thriving markets, nice cafes and restaurants.
space: Hi!  The apartment is located in the Mitte Prenzlauer Berg area.  65 m2, it is 2 steps away from beautiful Arkonaplatz, trendy Kastanienallee, and the famous MauerPark!  Public transport with U8  Bernauer strasse/Rosenthalerplatz and U2 Eberswalder strasse make for easy and quick access.  The location is very central, with a thriving cafe/club/art gallery culture.  The flat is bright, 65m2 (700 sq ft), with a 3m10 ceiling (10.17 ft), wooden floorboards, light from north, south, and east. The flat is stylishly furnished (almost no ikea), with nice leather couch chairs and some authentic Bauhaus stools in the kitchen. It has just been refurbished, so a fresh and clean look will be there to greet you. The bedroom has one quality double bed. There is an extra large wardrobe where you can fit your suitcases and all your clothes. There is an EXTRA foldable single bed for extra guests. Wireless INTERNET is also available.   The bathroom is wide and ample and features a bath and a washing mach
description: Central, quiet, bright and ample in a beautiful part of Berlin, 65 m2 (c.a. 700 sq. ft.), a step away from the former wall strip, thriving markets, nice cafes and restaurants. Hi!  The apartment is located in the Mitte Prenzlauer Berg area.  65 m2, it is 2 steps away from beautiful Arkonaplatz, trendy Kastanienallee, and the famous MauerPark!  Public transport with U8  Bernauer strasse/Rosenthalerplatz and U2 Eberswalder strasse make for easy and quick access.  The location is very central, with a thriving cafe/club/art gallery culture.  The flat is bright, 65m2 (700 sq ft), with a 3m10 ceiling (10.17 ft), wooden floorboards, light from north, south, and east. The flat is stylishly furnished (almost no ikea), with nice leather couch chairs and some authentic Bauhaus stools in the kitchen. It has just been refurbished, so a fresh and clean look will be there to greet you. The bedroom has one quality double bed. There is an extra large wardrobe where you can fit your suitcases and all yo
neighborhood_overview: Once on the fringe of East Berlin, the Prenzlauerberg area is now famous for it's thriving community of artists and writers, and for a rich array of home-grown clothing boutiques and trendy cafes, street food and organic food markets, the oldest beer garden in the area (Prater), and the now world-famous Mauerpark flea market- set on the former strip separating East from West.  Arkonaplatz fleamarket on sundays and food market on fridays offer an intimite setting to experience Berlin like a local.  Historical landmarks abound, with a memorial walk strip a step away, that guides you along the former wall line down to a section of wall adjacent the Wall Museum. On the border with Mitte (literally "middle" in German), the flat is very central, offering you the best blend of local comfort and urban swing... Public transport abound, with trams, tubes, and buses setting you only a step away from all the major Berlin city highlights.
transit: In Berlin, one can reach most places by bike and bike rentals are plenty in the area. From the flat, the M10 tram connects you to Hauptbahnhof in just over 10 Min, and the tram stop is 3min away. The U2 metro lines provides you with a East/West connection, taking you straight to the likes of Postdamer Platz. The U8 line is just down the road and serves  a North/South axis, connecting you directly to Kreuzberg, Neukoln, and Tempolhof ( the new giant former-airport park wonder!) and it's trendy cafe scene and local food market on Sundays. Otherwise a host of great venues, cafes, and local attractions are within a few seconds walk from the apartment.
interaction: Guest can reach me at all times (except arranged otherwise) by phone if needed. I work nearby so if anything is not working or if something needs tending to, I can usually address it very rapidly. I do my very best to ensure that guests feel at home and have everything they need to enjoy their stay in Berlin!
house_rules: Hi!  The flat is no smoking, and no street shoes are to be worn in the flat. The flat is also not suitable for parties or loud events, thanks! Otherwise, everything is set out for you to have a pleasant stay! NB: INTERNET: Internet access is provided. The tenant can use it at his own risk. The landlord is not liable for consequences of the internet use and he is not responsible for eventual damages due to any viruses, malware or further damages. In case of a dysfunctional internet connection,the tenant does not have any right of compensation, made exception for the case that these dysfunctions are due to a grossy negligent or to a wilful act of the landlord. Any illegal use of the internet is forbidden. It is the tenant's duty to ensure that no other persons make an illegal use of the internet connection. It is the tenant's duty to discharge the landlord from any copyright infringement and from any warning notice costs. Transferring the access code to third parties is forbidden. Peer t

HI, I'm Rob, a Designer and Visual Artist.. 

I look forward to greeting you in Berlin!

name: STORAGE APARTMENT URBAN
summary: Storage Berlin - Contemporary and innovative lodging & locationservice for film, photo & advertising in the heart of Berlin! A lot of space in this sunny studio for your production & your team or friends! Feel home as in your own one!
space: Rent one of the rooms as single traveller or accommodate a whole bunch of people! Shared commons include fully equipped kitchen, 2 large and modern bathrooms, a meet´n´greet and dining area with wooden table and a large lounge with free wlan access. Completed in 1913, the building that houses this Berlin loft apartment started life as a printing factory. Today, the stunning fourth floor loft, which retains some of the quainter industrial features such as exposed brickwork, and incorporates found and hand-crafted items, is a uniquely renovated urban environment for short stay visitors and film shoots.  A beautiful example of Berlin’s growing trend for factory and warehouse conversions, the apartment is an impressive 280 sqm and sleeps up to 10 people in five bedrooms. The manager, Sebastian, also happens to be a talented photographer, and his work adorns the walls. There’s a foosball table for anyone who’s always wanted to reenact the film Big, and a kitchen-cum-bar that’s perfect for l

Ich bin bei und in Dresden aufgewachsen, lebe nun schon 19 Jahre in Berlin. 

Meine Lieblingsbeschäftigungen sind, Dinge zu kreieren, Träume zu verwirklichen und neue Lebensräume zu erschaffen.

Ich reise selbst sehr viel oder wie es der Kalender zuläßt und bin sehr oft und gern Gast bei vielen netten Menschen rund um den Globus. Natürlich reise ich mit AirBnB :)

name: Central Kreuzberg apartment
summary: Kreuzberg is famous for the art scene, its multicultural atmosphere and the trendy cafes, restaurants and clubs. My appartment is only 3 minutes away from Oranienstraße, the center of the bustling alternative Oranienkiez. Here you can find everything: galerys, design-shops, vintage-shops, second-hand...
space: My bright 2 rooms appartment is in the 2. floor and has an elevator. The sleeping room has a kingsize bed. The bathroom has a bathtab (shower) and washingmachine. In the kitchen you find everything for cooking or preparing your breakfast. In the living room you have a big and comfortable sleeping couch for 2 persons and a big nice table. There is a nice balcony directly over a quiet street. It´s a non smoker appartment, but of course you can smoke on the balcony. I´m musician and travel a lot. Peter gives you the keys and helps you with everything around the appartment. He is also cleaning after you leave. After booking my flat I will send you Peter´s  email-adress and phonenumber so that you can arrange check-in and check-out directly with him.

neighborhood_overview: The "Oranienkiez" is one of the most trendy areas in the famous Kreuzberg area in Berlin
transit: The undergrond stations "Cottbusser Tor" and "Moritzplatz" er only 5 minutes away from the appartment and connects you with all attractions in Berlin. The bus station of 140 line that connects you to the big Berlin Ostbahnhof station is 2 minutes away.
access: You can dispose the whole flat.
interaction: Peter will help with check-inn and check-out and will be available if necessary
house_rules: No Parties or events allowed!! Use it like your own flat, but remember that other people in the house are working and have to leave early in the morning. Benutze die Wohnung so, als ob es deine eigene wäre. Fühle dich frei, zu tun, was du möchtest, aber nimm Rücksicht auf die anderen Bewohner des Hauses. Denk daran, daß auch wenn du in Ferien bist, andere früh morgens arbeiten müssen. Keine Parties!!
host_about:
Ich kann nicht ohne Musik leben, nicht ohne meine Tochter, nicht ohne Reisen, nicht ohne verschiedene Sprachen zu sprechen, nicht ohne neues Essen zu probieren, nicht ohne neue Menschen zu treffen, nicht ohne meine Freunde zu sehen, nicht ohne Pilze zu suchen, nicht ohnme Sonne.



Mein Lieblingsreiseziel: Variation

Mein Lieblingsbuch: Robert Walser

Mein Lieblingsfilm: viele!!

Meine Lieblingsmusik: Bach, Schubert

Mein Lieblingsessen: abhängig wo ich bin, so lokal wie möglich



Ich selbst übernachte am Liebsten in Wohnungen, wo ich mein Essen zubereiten kann und mich nach langen Spaziergängen oder Fahrradtouren zurückziehen kann.

name: Hauptstadt-Domizil
space: On the most famous antiquemile Suarezstrasse with over 30 antique shops in Berlin-Charlottenburg you find our holiday flat on the first floor of a traditional Berlin old building. A bright, green and very quiet atrium allows you an undisturbed sleep and a recreative time. You could go for a walk at the idyllic lake Lietzensee, to the Charlottenburger Castle or shopping on the Kurfürstendamm, Wilmersdorfer Strasse, Savignyplatz or other interesting locations in Berlin. You could easily explore the town with public transport or enjoy the manors (german: Kiez) with the numerous restaurants in the surrounding area. Our Hauptstadt-Domizil (holiday flat) is ideal for trade fair guests, because trade fair area is within walking distance. The comfortable holiday flat Hauptstadt-Domizil has two rooms with art nouveau stucco ceilings and is located in a house built in the year 1909 in the Suarezstrasse in Berlin-Charlottenburg. The tiled and modern bathroom has a heated towel rail. Parquet floor

host_about:
I´m a dreamer with one foot on the ground ;-) I am fascinated by traveling in foreign countries. I know Europe - Portugal, Spain, Madeira, Greece, Sweden, Denmark, Hungary, Poland, Cyprus, Italy, Switzerland, Austria, Great Britain, Netherlands, Gibraltar, Estonia... I was also visiting the United States (New York City, Washington, Philadelphia, California, Memphis and New Orleans), Brazil, Thailand, Cuba, Mauritius and Russia...



Berlin is always worth a visit, whether for business or pleasure. I would love to welcome you in my apartment. See you soon in the most exiting city of Germany!

name: Studio-apt Kreuzberg: central/cozy
space: This apartment is 38 square meter big and it has everything that one needs to be to comfortable. A double bed (1,40x2,00), a simple equipped kitchen, a bath with shower and a whole ton of charm. You rent the whole apartment.  The dwelling lies in the area Kreuzberg, with its innumerable cafes, bars and designer shops, all conveniently within strolling distance. Kreuzberg lies very central actually. Three subway stations (Kottbusser Tor, Goerlitzer Bahnhof, Schoenleinstrasse) in walking distance serve the lines U8 (north/south) and U1 (east/west). So reaching other interesting areas (for example Friedrichshain in 5 min., Prenzlauer Berg in 18 min.) or well-known places (for example Alexanderplatz in 6 min., Potsdamer Platz in 11 min.) from here is fast and uncomplicated. Directly at the next junction is a bacery as well as an excellent organic supermarket which has all the green products one may require. The next grocery discounter is just five minutes away.  Enjoy peaceful sundays stro

Directly at the next junction is a bacery as well as an excellent organic supermarket which has all the green products one may require. The next grocery discounter is just five minutes away.  Enjoy peaceful sundays stro
house_rules: - this is not a hotel, be neat, tidy and respectful with my place   - respect the privacy of the tenants (don't make noise, don't listen to music at full volume, keep the peace at night, no parties)   - no smoking   - no pets   - when using the Wi-Fi connection please keep in mind that it is forbidden to give the public access to or participation in copyrighted works via internet filesharing or P2P filesharing systems / you are furthermore not allowed to participate in them or to give third parties the opportunity to do so / should the guest/ organizer offend against these rules he must hold the hotel free from any claim made by third parties   - no guests (the number of persons staying over night has to be the number of persons in the booking   - do the dishes and put it cleaned and dried back into the rack   - don't dry washed/wet clothes/towels by hanging over furnitures which could be damaged through wetness or water spots - I provide a drying rack, just let me know if you need one
host_about:
I like design, architecture and furnitures and after all I'm a gatherer. And of course I like meeting people from all over the world.



Over time my own place was getting more and more crowded with flea market finds and design classics. So renting apartments seemed to be a good idea to get more space and to combine my interests...



If you are kind, respectful to my property and to the tenants privacy (no parties!) I'm more than happy to welcome you in one of my three apartments and give you individual recommendations!

name: Beautiful flat in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: A beautiful one-bedroom flat in Prenzlauer Berg, great for stays of a few days, weeks or months. Please give me a message if you wish to book or have any questions.
space: This well-equipped apartment sleeps up to four persons. Furniture from Biedermeier to present-day. DSL/WLAN internet access. 55 square metres, ground floor of a 1912 building, windows facing a quiet courtyard. There's a queen-sized (160x200 cm) double bed in bedroom. Living room has a bed-sofa opening to a 140x200 cm wide double bed, a dinner table for four and a hifi stereo system. There's also a 90x200 cm wide extra mattress. Bathroom with a tub, kitchen with necessary equipment as well as a washing machine for clothes (no dishwasher). All the necessary bedlinen, towels, etc available. No television. (For children: a toddler bed/cot and a highchair available.)

transit: Fast and frequent connections with tram lines (M10, M4) to U2-station Eberswalderstraße (the heart of Prenzl'berg), to S+U-station Warschauer Straße (in neighbouring Friedrichshain, another trendy district), and to Alexanderplatz and further.
interaction: After a booking has been made, I'll send the guest information on the flat (such as internet password, how ti use the washing machine) and its surroundings (where to find a grocery store, a bakery, an ATM, nice restaurants and cafés, etc.)

name: Nice Flat directly in Neukölln
summary: Die Wohnung liegt direkt am Böhmischen Platz an dem sich 4 Restaurants und eine Bar angesiedelt haben. Das bunte Neuköllner Leben lässt sich hier wunderbar erleben! Die Wohnug ist hell. Die Küche ist voll ausgestattet und das Schlafsofa ist für zwei Personen geeignet (1,40m*2,30m).
space: You can use one room, a big kitchen and a big bathroom. The rooms are bright, calm and clean and the flat is on the 4th floor. The area is a "village green" in the middle of the centre of Neukölln. The surrounding is historical and cultural interesting: young multicultural life, cafes and studentbars, theatre, an opera, cinemas and waterpark and the opened field of the old airport "Tempelhof" close to the flat. You are connected to the mainstation (25 minutes by bus) and to the airport Schönefeld (35 minutes by S-Bahn). The area has good transport links. The U-Bahn line U7 leads directly to Kreuzberg, the U8 to Kreuzberg and to Mitte. The S-Bahn lines S41 and S42 connect the neighborhood with Friedrichshain and Prenzlauer Berg. Unlike in the eastern districts, there is no tram network. PS: The area is also adequate for families. WLAN with fast Internet is available.
description: You can use one room, a big kitchen and a big bathroom. The rooms are bright, calm and clean and the flat is on the 4th floor. transit: Der S-Bahnhof Sonnenallee befindet sich 5 Minuten entfernt. In 5 Minuten Entfernung liegt die Bushaltestelle Mareschstrasse- die Linie M41 fährt ohne Umsteigen bis zum Hauptbahnhof.
access: Ihr habt einen schönen Wohn/Schlafraum und könnt die Küche und Bad benutzen.
interaction: Ich bin eigentlich immer per Mail oder Telefon zu erreichen.
house_rules: Bis jetzt waren noch keine speziellen Regeln nötig. Das Rauchen ist gestattet aber bitte nur beim geöffnetem Küchenfenster.
host_about: Ich bin Musiker, Komponist, 38 Jahre alt und arbeite für Film und Fernsehen. Ich bin viel unterwegs, arbeite aber auch zu Hause. Ich bin während meiner Studienzeit viel gereist und und habe es immer genossen privat bei Leuten zu wohnen und dadurch "Local Heroes" kennen zu lernen.

name: Beautiful room in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Nice and big room with a balcony, wodden floor and high seilings in a really cool flat in Prenzlauer Berg
space: I'm renting out a nice room (25qm) with original wooden floor and high ceilings in my new renovated flat in Berlin / Prenzlauer Berg.  There is also a cool balcony where you can enjoy the morning sun. The room is very bright and has sun all morning. The guests can use the bathroom and the kitchen.  It is in the 4th floor (no elevator) and not loud at all. It is located between the U-Bahn Eberswalder-Strasse and Senefelder Platz. Also the tram is just around the corner, as well as supermarkets, organic stores, fashionstores and also some nice recordshops. Its in the very lively area of Prenzlauer Berg with a lot of places for food and tasty coffee. The room is for short term visitors (max. 2 P), max 2 weeks (1 P) No discount possible Cleaning included in the daily price IMPORTANT: Before I can accept a reserveration, we need to talk about the checkin time.

neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is a very lively area in Berlin. It became a bit more sophisticated within the last years. Here you can find really good coffee (Bonanza Coffe Store), a fantastic record store (Oye Records) and also a wide range of very cool food, clothing and schnickschnack stores. On sunday, the Mauerpark with its Karaoke and Fleamarket is the place to be.
transit: Several lines of public ransport are around here to reach within 2 minutes. You just need 3 stops from here to Alexanderplatz and maybe 10 minutes to the run_train train station. There are also a lot of bike rentals and I'm always happy to help in finding your way.
access: - WiFi - Kitchen - Bathroom
interaction: I'm always interested where my guests coming from. A little chat in the kitchen while drinking tea is a very nice chance to get to know people you usually never meet. I love to give tips about concerts, food, shops etc.. Don't hesitate to ask me! Sometimes I take my guests also to my DJ gigs and sometimes friendship starts :-)
host_about: I rent out a room in my flat. Just look at all the nice review the room already got. They should speak for themselves. Looking forward meeting you.

name: Kreuzberg, lively cosy Bergmannkiez
summary: Our quiet apartment is  in an old building, near many restaurants, shops and café. There are two single beds and one double bed, in two independent rooms.  The basement is convenient as a guest room or a workshop. The subway is five minutes away. The ideal location for an authentic Berlin feeling.
space: The apartment is 63m2 on the ground floor, with high ceilings typical of old Berlin buildings and a 20m2 basement. There are two bedrooms and a living room. The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, fridge, oven, toaster. The bathroom has a shower and a washing machine. A private terrace is located in the courtyard : the windows from the kitchen and the bedroom oversee it.
description: Our quiet apartment is  in an old building, near many restaurants, shops and café. There are two single beds and one double bed, in two independent rooms.  The basement is convenient as a guest room or a workshop. The subway is five minutes away. The ideal location for an authentic Berlin feeling. The apartment is 63m2 on the ground floor, with high ceilings typical of old Berlin buildings and a 20m2 basement. There are two bedrooms and a living room. The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, fridge, oven, toaster. The bathroom has a shower and a washing machine. A private terrace is located in the courtyard : the windows from the kitchen and the bedroom oversee it. All of the apartment. You're welcome to ask whatever you need during your stay and I'll help you as much as I can. Next to the apartment, the famous Bergmanstrasse goes all the way to Mehringdamm with a lot of shops and restaurants on the way. It is the neighborhood that made the reputation of Kreuzberg. Two weeks won't be
neighborhood_overview: Next to the apartment, the famous Bergmanstrasse goes all the way to Mehringdamm with a lot of shops and restaurants on the way. It is the neighborhood that made the reputation of Kreuzberg. Two weeks won't be enough to try all the frühstück (breakfast). The apartment itself is quiet and one street away from the Marheineke place. The place is surrounded by restaurants as well as a large in-door market. Every week-end a market is installed on the place.
transit: Ten minutes walk away, the Tempelhof airport offers an exceptional park. It was decommissioned in 2008 and you can walk the airplane tracks: an experience everyone should try. When there is wind it is populated with kites. A beer garden is installed in the middle. The nearest subway station (Gneisenaustraße‎ 5 minutes walk) is three stops away from Checkpoint Charlie and five stops away from Unter den Linden. A bike shop in Bergmanstrasse (fahrradstation) rents bikes during the summer : they are the preferred transportation in Berlin. A taxi station can be found near the subway.
access: All of the apartment.
interaction: You're welcome to ask whatever you need during your stay and I'll help you as much as I can.
house_rules: Turn off the heating when you leave. Be as quiet as you can when entering the building late at night : there are children living in the building. Make sure you close all the lights when leaving.
host_about: Hallo, ich bin Brigid und würde mich freuen viele aufgeschlossene und nette Gäste bei mir unterbringen zu können!

name: Berlin Flair
space: I rent in my beautiful Berlin apartment a large room to your sole use. In it you will find a nice double bed, a desk, a large bright window and a clothes rail with shelves. You can of course also use the bathroom with a bathtub and a washing machine, just like my cozy living room with a huge sofa and a dining table. You can also alternatively eat at the small dining area in the kitchen, which is actually equipped with everything you need. Like a stove with oven, toaster and a pizza oven and a refrigerator, of course, is not missing. The apartment is in a very green and lively area of Berlin. In just a few minutes you are at the subway "Eberswalder Strasse" but in the immediate vicinity you will also find plenty of restaurants, nice cafes, bars and sports facilities such as a yoga studio. Nearby is the "Mauerpark" and the "Volkspark Friedrichshain". I look forward to many booking inquiries and if you have further questions I'm always happy to help!

name: Cute In-Law Suite with Garden Access
summary: Offered is an in-law suite in a single family house in the northern suburb of Berlin.  The space is newly renovated and features a convenient kitchenette and a modern private bathroom.  It offered fully furnished including linens and towels.  TV and fast internet, water and electricity is included.
space: In-Law Suite located in a single family residence in a quiet side street in the leafy neighborhood of Reinickendorf in northern Berlin.  Access to the park & public transport  is within a five minute walk. As well as various restaurants, shops, doctors and pharmacies. The apartment consists of hallway, bedroom and bathroom. The very bright room with separate kitchen has access to the terrace, which leads into the garden, which can be shared. The full bath has a window. The space is fully furnished with dishes and towels, linens. Fast WiFi is included, as well as flat screen TV, radio and DVD. Washer and dryer are shared in the basement.  Parking is no problem on our street The whole street is lined with neat houses. The particular advantage is the peace that we are far away from city noise. This relaxation is called for, and yet we are in only 30 minutes from downtown.  This is an absolutely non smoking home!

neighborhood_overview: An meiner Umgebung liebe ich die Gemütlichkeit der entspannten erholsamen Atmosphäre mit dem Park und den vielen Spaziermöglichkeiten durch Wald & Flur sowie den nahen Tegeler See. Wir haben guten Kontakt zu unseren netten Nachbarn.   Restaurants,& Kneipen sind zu Fuß zu erreichen.
notes: Gut erzogene Hunde dürfen mitwohnen.
transit: Wir haben eine fünf Minuten Fußweg Anbindung an die Busse, X(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) sowie an die U- 8 & S-Bahn 1 &75. Parkmöglichkeiten sind auf unserer  Straße kein Problem.  Die Anfahrt vom Flughafen mit dem TXL Bus zum Kurt Schuhmacher Platz und dort weiter mit dem Bus  X21 bis Wittenau.  Vom Hauptbahnhof ca 30 Minuten  mit dem Bus 120 bis Wittenau.
access: Space has a private entry door and can be locked.
interaction: Ich freue mich sehr, meine Gäste kennenzulernen und stehe mit Rat und Tat zur Verfügung. Meistens begrüße ich meine Gäste mit Kaffe und Kuchen. Bei einem ersten gemeinsamen  Spaziergang danach, zeige ich unsere Umgebung und liebe ein  geselliges Miteinander, da ich so viel wie möglich anwesend bin.
house_rules: You are staying in the in-law suite of our single family residence in the leafy neighborhood of Reinickendorf in northern Berlin.  We are friendly and casual people and expect our guests to be similar.  Other than common decency and respect, we only ask that you will not smoke inside the house.
host_about:
Ich freue mich immer neue Gäste kennenzulernen.

Bin sehr gerne in der Natur, aufgeschlossen für  Kinder, mag

fast alle Tierarten bes. Hunde, Pferde, Katzen, Delphine & Manatees. 

nicht ohne meine :

Familie, Freunde & meinen Gruppen: Schreib- Lese, Wander & Sportgruppen.

 Bücher, Yoga, segeln, Wanderungen und Reisen

Reisen:

 Weltweit zu Land, Wasser und Luft. Bin relativ viel unterwegs vorzugsweise in den USA.

Musik : 

Klassik, Filme: History,  Biographien & Krimis. Bücher:- bin eine Viel- & Querleserin 

 Essen : vegetarisch, ich backe gerne ohne viel Sahne!!.

Bemühe mich stets mit Rat und Tat für meine Gäste "dazusein" und ihnen ein" zu Hause" Gefühl zu vermitteln.

Mein Motto: wer teilt, gewinnt.

Meine Einstellung:

ehrlich, hilfsbereit, zuverlässig, respektvoll und offen sein für alles was da kommt.  Eine positiven Sichtweise und ganz viel Lebensfreude weiterzu- geben.

Ich schließe mit einem Wort von H. Hesse: Jede neue Begegnung birgt einen eigenen Zauber.

name: Hot Spot Berlin-Mitte apartment!
space: Charming and sunny apartment located in Berlin-Mitte, between Kastanienallee and Weinbergspark. Right in the middle but still quite quiet. Restaurants, cafés and bars are just a footprint away. The apartment has a bedroom with kingsize boxspring bed (160 x 200 cm), a living room with a fully equipped american kitchen (including fridge, espresso machine, dishes etc.) and a tiled bathroom with bathtub. The nice balcony is heading south, perfect to relax, have dinner or just to enjoy the sunset. The appartment is fully furnished (with LCD-TV, washing machine, dish washer, heating, oven...) It’s perfect for a couple, but also for a single or two friends. The size is approx. about 60 qm in size and it’s on the 3rd floor with a lift.  Tram, bus and U-bahn (tube / subway) (station: Rosenthaler Platz U8) stops are just a few minutes walk away. Wireless internet is also available. Towels and linen are provided, of course.

name: 2 Zimmer mit Balkon in Friedrichshain
space: Die Wohnung ist in top zentraler Lage, im Herzen Berlins! Die gute Lage sorgt dafür, dass du bequem zu Fuß die schönsten Gegenden erkunden kannst! Jede Menge Cafes, kleine Geschäfte, Restaurants, Theater, Clubs, Bio- und Wochenmärkte sind hier.  Auch die Verkehrsanbindung ist optimal: > Ostkreuz - Ringbahn S 41 & S 42, S 7, S 75, S 5 > Tram M10/M13 > U5 ist in fußläufiger Entfernung Samariterstr. Die Miete ist incl. W-LAN flatrate, Bettzeug, Strom, Gas, Heizung sowie Bad- und Küchenmitbenutzung. In der Küche steht ein großer Esstisch. Die Küche ist voll ausgestattet. Meine Mitbewohnerin wohnt im 3. Zimmer, somit teilt ihr euch das Bad und die Küche mit ihr. Sie ist ein Sonnenschein, also keine Sorge :) Eure beiden Zimmer sorgen für genug Privatsphäre. Achso, das Bett hat eine Größe von 1.40x2.00 Meter, es ist also sehr cozy zusammen im Bett :) Ansonsten gibt es ja auch noch eine Couch, ist zwar keine Schlafcouch, aber okay :) Room in a very central location (Friedrichshain) in the hear

name: Il Nido - Berlin's downtown for 2/3
space: Cosy flat in Berlin's Mitte (downtown) at only 300 m from the run_train station. This location is optimal, quiet and with a sunny balcony looking towards the green courtyard. Recently the flat has been renovated and equipped with a precious parquet flooring and a highspeed WIFI connection. The apartment offers about 35 qm space divided into a living/sleeping area with panorama windows and tv, a kitchen equipped with hot plates, coffee machine, fridge, microwave oven, water boiler, toaster, washing machine. And a bathroom with shower and bathtub, hairdryer. From august 2013 the flat offers also wifi connection. The photos and many other little details remind of the origin of the owners - the Cinque Terre in Italy. The flat is located in a both quiet and central area: all important places of interest in town can be reach within a few minutes by foot or with public transports (a bus which connects berlin run_train station with berlin zoo station stops right in front of the door, the Bellevue castle

neighborhood_overview: In der Naehe (direkt gegenueber) gibt es einen Supermarkt fuer den taeglichen Bedarf, im Umkreis finden sich viele gute Restaurants. Der Tiergarten (Berlins groesster Park zum joggen, erholen, entspannen und Bummeln) liegt ca. 10 min. Fussweg entfernt. Auch die Kanaele der  Spree sind schnell zu Fuss zu erreichen, um Berlin auf einer Bootstour kennenzulernen.
transit: Direkt vor dem Haus haelt der Bus 275 der direkt (in 3 Fahrminuten) zum Hauptbahnhof faehrt oder (in die andere Richtung) zum Bahnhof Zoo. Fusslaeufig kann die S-Bahn-Station Bellevue erreicht werden.

name: SUNNY & COSY FAMILY HOME (MAUERPARK) WiFi
summary: This charming family apartment is perfect for your travel with kids. It's quiet and full of light over the day, situated in the most beautiful street of Prenzlauer Berg.
space: Hey there, I rent my lovely apartment while I'm on travels. The flat has two big rooms. Its very bright & sunny over the day and quiet by night. It's on the 4th floor (no elevator) and has a sunny & quiet balcony (south) to the backyard. The whole apartment has wooden floors. The sleeping room has a huge comfortable bed with a brand new mattress (180x200) and also a children bunk bed (90x180) with two floors, for two kids until 12 years and many toys & books to play with. If you have kids it's a great choice to stay here. There are enough pillows and blankets up to four people. In the living room you'll find a big couch to sleep on it (120x200)   The kitchen is well equipped, so you can do some nice cooking sessions and in summer you can use fresh herbs from the balcony. Fast Wifi (DSL) in all rooms. Everything is around the corner. Just a few steps to nice cafes, restaurants, bars, supermarkets and the famous "Mauerpark Flea Market". (Sundays) I'm happy to send you some of my haunts.
description: Hey there, I rent my lovely apartment while I'm on travels. The flat has two big rooms. Its very bright & sunny over the day and quiet by night. Fast Wifi (DSL) in all rooms. Everything is around the corner. Just a few steps to nice cafes, restaurants, bars, supermarkets and the famous "Mauerpark Flea Market". (Sundays) I'm happy to send you some of my haunts.
neighborhood_overview: Right in the middle of Berlin’s trendy and colorful district Prenzlauer Berg, I offer a beautiful & cozy apartment right on Oderberger Straße. From this central location you can conveniently experience Berlin and are only minutes away from Berlin Mitte, Hackescher Markt, Torstrasse and Alexanderplatz as well as a foot stroll to the sunday famous Mauerpark. Prenzlauer Berg is a really nice neighbourhood, full of nice restaurants, coffee shops, bars and shops (just out the door). It is quiet and alive at the same time.
notes: This is a private home -  not a party flat - in a vibrant and close knit community, with great neighbours.
transit: U2 and train M10 which are just a 3 min walk away.
access: Full apartment.
interaction: You can reach me during your stay.
house_rules: No animals and smoking only at the balcony.
host_about:
Gerne stelle ich internationalen Gästen meine gemütliche, sonnige Wohnung in Berlin zur Verfügung. Ich freue mich auf eure Anfragen. 



Wenn ihr Fragen zu Berlin Must Do's habt, ich helfe euch gerne.

Egal ob das beste Restaurant, den schönsten Badesee oder die aufregendste Ausstellung. 



Ich selbst bin Fotografin und Mutter.

name: RealCozyAltbau in outgoingKreuzberg
summary: If you are looking for a stay, from where you can reach all the sights of the city easily and you wanna have access to all the Kreuzberg nightlife, you will enjoy my flat:-)
space: The apartment is newly refurbished and very large and bright. The kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, big fridge and all other necessary things. The bathroom is big and with a bathing tube, washing machine and hair dryer. Die Wohnung ist sehr groß und hell mit schönen Holzdielen. Die Küche ist mit Herd, großem Kühlschrank und Spülmaschine und allem was man so braucht voll ausgestattet. Das Bad ist groß und ist mit Badewannne mit rainshower, Waschmaschine, Handtüchern und Fön ausgestattet. Ein schönes großes Wohnzimmer mit riesiger gemütlicher Couch bietet viel Platz und Sitzmöglichkeiten. Regarding the bed-situation:  There is one 2x2m double bed in the bed room. There is one "sleeping possibility" on the blue/grey sofa. its 85 cm broad and over 2 m long and very comfortable. And there is one "sleeping possibility" on the new single mattress. It's real mattress, size 85x200cm, like you use it for a single bed.  (Website hidden by Airbnb) You cant see it because i leave it behind

The "Schlesische Straße"  and "Görlitzer Bahnhof" underground stations and the "Görlitzer Park", a colorful recreation park can be reached within 3 minutes. My flat is in a nice and outgoing area, surrounded by Bars, Clubs, restaurants and cafes, but still in a sweet and quiet street with 2 supermarkets and three night shops just 20 meters away. Across the street is a beautiful market hall, where every Thursday evening a street food market is happening. Ich vermiete eine schöne große Altbau Wohnung in Berlin-Kreuzberg. Die Wohnung liegt im Herzen Kreuzbergs und hat eine super Anbindung an den öffentlichen Nahverkehr. Die U-Bahn Stationen Schlesisches Tor und Görlitzer Bahnhof sind zu Fuß gut zu erreichen. transit: The "Schlesische Straße"  and "Görlitzer Bahnhof" underground stations are just 5 Minutes away Die U-Bahn Stationen Schlesisches Tor und Görlitzer Bahnhof sind zu Fuß gut zu erreichen.
access: You have access to the whole flat. Most times, when I post my flat on airbnb, I'm traveling. This means, I wont be around. So I will leave your keys at a nearby late shop or my sister will come around. But you can reach my via whattsapp or my sister, she lives 1 street across. Ihr habt die komplette Wohnung für euch alleine.
interaction: If you have any questions during your stay you can call or email me. If I'm abroad you can email or text me. Wenn ich in Deutschland bin, könnt ihr mich gerne per email oder mobil erreichen, wenn ich im Ausland bin, dann per email.
house_rules: Please don't smoke in the flat. Bitte nicht Rauchen in der Wohnung.
host_about: My name is Jochen, i'm 37 years old, and living in berlin since 15 years. I have my own streetfood stand directly in the market hall opposite of my flat. I think airbnb is a fantastic idea -it would be great if you may be my guest. hope to see you soon, best Jochen

name: Beautiful & large in central Berlin
summary: Located in Prenzlauer Berg, surrounded by great dining and original shopping, this magnificent turn-of-the-century flat is the perfect place to discover Berlin from on foot, by bike or public transportation or to simply spend an day on the balcony.
space: Located in the district of Prenzlauer Berg, our large home is a beautiful turn-of-the-century building with a gorgous view of the Kulturbrauerei complex across the street, a historic brewery building that hosts cinemas, clubs, theatres and a grocery store. The interior is a mix of old and modern. We have a large kitchen that you are free to use including lots of equipment, a large living area and a balcony where you can enjoy your meals with a few of the bustling city life below.
description: Located in Prenzlauer Berg, surrounded by great dining and original shopping, this magnificent turn-of-the-century flat is the perfect place to discover Berlin from on foot, by bike or public transportation or to simply spend an day on the balcony.  Located in the district of Prenzlauer Berg, our large home is a beautiful turn-of-the-century building with a gorgous view of the Kulturbrauerei complex across the street, a historic brewery building that hosts cinemas, clubs, theatres and a grocery store. The interior is a mix of old and modern. We have a large kitchen that you are free to use including lots of equipment, a large living area and a balcony where you can enjoy your meals with a few of the bustling city life below. This is our own apartment which we rent out while on vacations, so we are sure you will feel right at home and enjoy the amenities, books, music that come with a fully equipped place. Have breakfast on the balcony, enjoy your coffee on the window board overlooking
neighborhood_overview: Located in the Eastern part of the city, our  neighborhood has been among Berlin's most popular over the past 15 years. The streets are bustling with with people, there are plenty of bars, restaurants and little shops. Mauerpark with its flee market, open air karaoke, and street artists is just a 10-minutes walk away and Berlins most popular Sunday destination. There are bakeries and plenty of inexpensive little restaurants across the street as well as supermarkets and specialty stores.
notes: There are two beds: One large double bed in the master bedroom and a single bed that can be pulled out to hold two mattresses in the guest bedroom. While check-in time is generally flexible, check-in does need some advance co-ordination as we need for someone to be there for you when you get here if we're travelling ourselves (which is usually the case when we rent out our flat). If we have guests before or after you, we will need time for cleaning which means you might have to leave in the morning around 10/11 or might not be able to arrive before the afternoon around 4.
transit: It's a great and easy place to discover Berlin from with many downtown places within walking distance and the subway station a mere block away. The U2 subway will take you to all the major downtown destinations such as Alexanderplatz, Mitte district with Brandenburg Gate, Potsdamer Platz and Zoologischer Garten. The popular Alexanderplatz and Hackescher Markt areas are within 20 minutes walking distance or easy to reach by streetcar. Several places around offer bike rental. The airports can be reached by public transportation within 35 minutes (Tegel) and an hour (Schönefeld) at a cost of around 3€. You must change busses / trains once in order to get here. Parking is possible at 7€ per day in a garage around the corner.
access: This is our own apartment which we rent out while on vacations, so we are sure you will feel right at home and enjoy the amenities, books, music that come with a fully equipped place. Have breakfast on the balcony, enjoy your coffee on the window board overlooking the street or feel free to cook dinner.
interaction: We are happy to provide you with information about the place and the area in advance. While you are here, you will have our apartment all by yourselves, but our next door neighbors are available for your needs and questions.
house_rules: We are leaving a little booklet with rules & recommendations on the kitchen desk for you. These are the most basic rules: - We will be asking of a copy / photo of your passport after confirmation. This is our home, please understand that we wish to know who is going to live in it. - Smoking is allowed on the balcony. - No parties or guests, please, especially none that you have just met. - Always lock both locks on the apartment door when you're leaving, even if you are just going downstairs or when you are inside. - Feel free to use our Wifi, but refrain from illegal downloads (film, music...). Please, tell your children, too.
host_about: My partner and I moved to Berlin in 1999. We both studied Political Sciences at the University of Potsdam and now work in downtown Berlin for a state government and a local cinema operator. We bought our apartment in 2009 when it was beautifully renovated. We love music (singer-songwriter, bluegrass, electronic), dinner with friends in our georgous kitchen or in one of the many little restaurant around, and travelling. Since we are gone frequently, we are renting out our place to anyone interested in discovering Berlin from the perspective of a private visitor while we travel to our favorite cities like Stockholm, New York, Madrid or take roadtrips through the US or other countries.

name: 1 room in an apartment in Berlin
summary: Wir vermieten ein Zimmer in unserem 3-Zimmer-Wohnung. In dem Zimmer steht ein grosser Schlafcouch für 2 Personen und ein Podest mit 1 Matraze für 1 Kind, Schreibtisch und Kleiderschrank.  Bad, Küche, Balkon zur Verfügung.
space: very sunny room near metro Breitenbachplatz in Berlin Steglitz with Internet and phone
description: very sunny room near metro Breitenbachplatz in Berlin Steglitz with Internet and phone
neighborhood_overview: Die Nachbarn sind eher ältere Leute daher ganz ruhig und nett.
notes: Im Wohnzimmer steht ein Klavier, wer spielen kann, darf spielen, aber bitte nicht nach 19 Uhr und nicht in der Mittagsruhe Zeit von 13 bis 15 Uhr. Bitte auch nach 22 Uhr keine laute Musik mehr hören und im Treppenhaus ruhig sein.
transit: U-Bahn, S-Bahn und Bushaltestelle finden Sie um die Ecke am Heidelberger Platz
access: Sie haben ein Zimmer für sich und können gern Küche, Bad und Balkon benutzen. Ich wohne in der Zeit in dem 2. Schlafzimmer und benutzt ebenfalls Küche, Bad und Wohnzimmer. Ich werde Sie empfangen und alles in der Wohnung erkären (WLAN Code, Waschmaschine etc...). Sie erhalten dann einen Schlüssel und gestalten Ihren Aufenthalt wie Sie möchten. U-Bahn, S-Bahn und Bushaltestelle finden Sie um die Ecke am Heidelberger Platz, ebenfalls ein grosser ALDI zum einkaufen. Der Volkspark ist direkt vor der Tür sowie ein grosser Innenhofgarten.
interaction: Ich stehe gerne zur Verfügung, um Ihnen Tips und Infos über die Stadt zu geben.
house_rules: siehe oben.
host_about: Hello I am a French woman, living in Berlin Germany.   I am a natural medicine therapist and I have 3 children (15, 23 and 25 years old). The two older are students and left home. The younger one is still staying with me. We travel very often to France. This is a picture of me and my daughter Celine.

name: Ample parkside apartment Kreuzberg
summary: Spacious, bright, artistically furnished apartment in the middle of the lively, colorful Kreuzberg, in a relaxed street with restaurants and sidewalk cafes. Right on the park, within walking distance to the banks of Spree and Landwehrkanal. Ideal for a relaxed and inspiring city holiday.
space: 85 sqm: 2 large, sunny, south-facing rooms, large kitchen with dining area, sunny balcony with ample view over the Görlitzer park. Artisticly and lovingly furnished, dishes, linens, towels, washing machine, dishwasher, microwave and Thermo mixer, Wifi, piano and guitar, as well as bathtub,  high-quality toys and board games for children and adults  available. Bicycles  can be additionally rented by arrangement.  Perfect for 2-4 persons (2 king size beds, 1king-size bed-sofa and one single-sized bunk bed in our "dollhouse".
description: Spacious, bright, artistically furnished apartment in the middle of the lively, colorful Kreuzberg, in a relaxed street with restaurants and sidewalk cafes. Right on the park, within walking distance to the banks of Spree and Landwehrkanal. Ideal for a relaxed and inspiring city holiday. 85 sqm: 2 large, sunny, south-facing rooms, large kitchen with dining area, sunny balcony with ample view over the Görlitzer park. Artisticly and lovingly furnished, dishes, linens, towels, washing machine, dishwasher, microwave and Thermo mixer, Wifi, piano and guitar, as well as bathtub,  high-quality toys and board games for children and adults  available. Bicycles  can be additionally rented by arrangement.  Perfect for 2-4 persons (2 king size beds, 1king-size bed-sofa and one single-sized bunk bed in our "dollhouse". Whole apartment We will be away, but you can call or text us if you have questions or need help. The apartment, located at the Görlitzer Park, is quiet and yet in the midst of a live
neighborhood_overview: The apartment, located at the Görlitzer Park, is quiet and yet in the midst of a lively and diverse neighborhood in Kreuzberg. In the house next door is a newsagent and bakery, 5 minutes walk through the park is a swimming pool with wave pool, 5 minutes walk to a children's animal farm, several playgrounds in the immediate area, 10 minutes walk to the charming bank of the Landwehr Canal, 15 minutes to the banks of the Spree, and many cafés, restaurants with affordable and delicious lunch and bars right in the street as well as in the surrounding neighborhood. There are small shops and supermarkets as well as two vegetable markets nearby, one specialized on organic food.
notes: We have two cats. They will be with friends during that time, but you should know that the flat is not suitable if you are allergic to cat hair.
transit: By subway (line U1, underground station "Schlesisches Tor" or "Görlitzer Bahnhof") you reach Alexanderplatz in 15 minutes. We can provide you with maps, guides and Berlin-books as well as insider tips for sights, events, excursions, special places and evenings out.
access: Whole apartment
interaction: We will be away, but you can call or text us if you have questions or need help.
house_rules: Welcome… …at our apartment. We wish you a wonderful time in this place and hope you will have an unforgettable stay here in Berlin. Here are a few instructions how to get along with everything in this flat and the surrounding and live comfortably. *GENERAL* Feel well & take care. Make yourself a home and at the same time be respectful with the neighbours, the resources as water and energy and the objects you find here. Feel free to use the things you find in this apartment but make sure everything keeps working and being in order. This is especially important with the toys and games, as they are of our children, and with the red sofa, which means a lot to us; it has only recently been refurbished, and it is hell expensive to do that. Of course it can happen that something gets broken or lost, please, if that is the case, tell us at the check-out. Please be respectful with our neighbours: Some of them feel uncomfortable with many unknown faces in the house. So help them to like you: be

name: ZAZA - APARTMENT PRENZLAUER BERG
summary: Gut ausgestattetes Apartment, in einer sehr guten Lage und einem Einblick ins alte Berlin...
space: A total 82m2, you will find everything you need for a comfortable visit to Berlin. Ideal for groups / families of 2 to 6 people who appreciate a high-level apartments equipped to appreciate and are interested to explore Berlin by one of the richest and most urbane still contrasting districts of. This spacious, bright and airy three bedroom apartment in the lively district of Prenzlauer Berg. It has two bedrooms and a living room with beautiful, warm laminate flooring. The light-filled living room with its dining table for six people is located on the quiet courtyard side down. The cozy sofa in this room can be transformed into a bed. The modern, fully equipped kitchen is accessible from the living room. The spacious bathroom has a shower room, shower and toilet. The two bedrooms have a double or single beds (a double bed sofa) overlooking a leafy courtyard and very quiet. This apartment has everything you need in order to feel comfortable around.

summary: Your holiday place at the water in Berlin Schmöckwitz
space: Das Ferienhaus befindet sich am Wasser in einer Sackgasse, auf einer Halbinsel am Seddin See / Langen See an der Dahme - sehr ruhig gelegen und für Familien ideal !  Das Ferienhaus besitzt 1 x Schlafzimmer, 2 x Wohnzimmer mit jeweils einer Schlafcouch für 2 Personen, 1 x Esszimmer, 1 x Küche , 1 x Badezimmer, 1 x Gäste WC, langer Flur und Eingangsbereich. Insgesamt ca.150 qm !!! Das Wohnzimmer ist ca. 20 qm groß, schön eingerichtet und mit einer Leder Doppel-Schlafsofa für 2 Personen ausgestattet. Vom Wohnzimmer im Erdgeschoss haben Sie direkten Zugang und Blick auf den Seddinsee. Das Wohnzimmer im ersten Stock ist mit einem Computer , einem Fernseher und einer Schlafcouch ( Ferderkern ) ebenfalls für 2 Personen ausgestattet. WLAN ist im gesamten Gebäude gegen eine Tagespauschale vorhanden Das Schlafzimmer befindet sich im Nordosten hat einen schönen Blick auf den See und die Boote. name: Schickes Apartment in Berlin-City
space: 1- Zimmer Apartment in bester Charlottenburger Citylage, 100m vom Schloß Charlottenburg entfernt, viele Museen, Kneipen und Restaurants i.d. Nähe Modern und geschmackvoll eingerichtetes Apartment im 4.OG, Aufzug vorhanden, ruhig zum begrünten Innenhof gelegen, gefliestes Duschbad, französisches Fenster, Doppelbett (1,60m breit), Kabel- TV, komplett eingerichtete Küchenpantry mit Kühlschrank, Kaffeemaschine, Eierkocher, Toaster, ausreichende Anzahl an Schränken und Ablagen, nur an Nichtraucher, natürlich werden Bettwäsche und Handtücher gestellt. Das Apartment liegt in unmittelbarer Nähe zum Schloß Charlottenburg und einigen Museen. Die Schloßstraße mit seiner breiten doppelreihigen Kastanienallee und der zentralen Flaniermeile ist sicherlich eine der schönsten Straßen Berlins. Eine Vielzahl von gemütlichen Kneipen, Cafes und Restaurants laden zum Verweilen ein. Das nahe Schloß mit dem weitläufigen Schloßgarten ist ein Muß für jeden Berlinbesuch. space: We are pleased to offer a great bedroom in a friendly family-apartment, right in the heart of the trendy municipality of "Graefekiez" in Berlin. The bustling district boasts plenty of trendy shops, bars, cafés and restaurants. The room features a bunk-bed, practical furniture and free internet. The apartment is situated right in the centre of Berlin, in close proximity to all major sights and tourist attractions. We speak English and Spanish and are always happy to help our guests with tried-and-true tips on the area or any advice they might like on travelling in Berlin.

name: Apartment in Berlin for 1-3 persons
summary: Die Unterkünfte liegen im Bezirk Neukölln mitten im 1737 gegründeten historischen Arbeiterviertel Böhmisch-Rixdorf. In unmittelbarer Umgebung: Cafés, Bars, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Neuköllner Oper, Kinos, zahlreiche Galerien, Volkspark Hasenheide und Tempelhofer Feld. Auf Wunsch Stadtführungen mit sachkundigen Stadtführern. Hierzu beraten wir Sie gern. Für Gruppen bis  8 Personen bieten wir Führungen für 20 Euro an, jede weitere Person 2 Euro. Die Nutzung des Berliner Nahverkehrs kostet extra.
space: Holiday home in Berlin The holiday apartment is suitable for up to 3 persons and is situated on the 2nd floor. It has 1 room with TV, bathroom, kitchen and a washing machine.   The accommodation is located in the district of Neukölln, in the middle of the old Bohemian Rixdorf, a historical working class quarter that was once founded in 1737. Berlin-Neukölln offers many cafés, bars and shopping opportunities, international cultural offerings such as the Neukölln opera, movies, numerous galleries as well as the Volkspark Hasenheide are within walking distance. We offer single, double, 3 beds rooms and a holiday home. There are 2 shared bathrooms and a small kitchen available for the rooms. They are also suitable for small groups of up to 10 persons.  Berlin offers many opportunities to experience both historical & modern culture and space to relax. The growing together of East and West can be intensely experienced in Berlin, in particular. description: Holiday home in Berlin The holiday apartment is suitable for up to 3 persons and is situated on the 2nd floor. It has 1 room with TV, bathroom, kitchen and a washing machine.   The accommodation is located in the district of Neukölln, in the middle of the old Bohemian Rixdorf, a historical working class quarter that was once founded in 1737. Berlin-Neukölln offers many cafés, bars and shopping opportunities, international cultural offerings such as the Neukölln opera, movies, numerous galleries as well as the Volkspark Hasenheide are within walking distance. We offer single, double, 3 beds rooms and a holiday home. There are 2 shared bathrooms and a small kitchen available for the rooms. They are also suitable for small groups of up to 10 persons.  Berlin offers many opportunities to experience both historical & modern culture and space to relax. The growing together of East and West can be intensely experienced in Berlin, in particular. Among the most attracting sights you find the hi
neighborhood_overview: Die Unterkünfte liegen im Bezirk Neukölln mitten im 1737 gegründeten historischen Arbeiterviertel Böhmisch-Rixdorf. In unmittelbarer Umgebung: Cafés, Bars, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Neuköllner Oper, Kinos, zahlreiche Galerien, Volkspark Hasenheide und Tempelhofer Feld.  In Berlin bieten sich zahlreiche Möglichkeiten, historische und moderne Kultur besuchen, sich zu erholen, das Zusammenwachsen von Ost und West intensiv und lebendig erleben. Besondere Anziehungspunkten sind der historische Stadtkern mit dem Brandenburger Tor und der Straße unter den Linden sowie dem angrenzenden Regierungsviertel, einzigartige Museen, eine traditionsreiche Industriekultur, moderne Architektur oder die städtischen Naherholungsgebiete. Auf Wunsch gestalten wir Stadtführungen mit sachkundigen Stadtführern. Hierzu beraten wir Sie gern. Für Gruppen bis  8 Personen bieten wir Führungen für 20 Euro an, jede weitere Person 2 Euro. Die Nutzung des Berliner Nahverkehrs kostet extra.
transit: Zwei U-Bahnhöfe in der Nähe, dabei direkte Verbindung zum Alexanderplatz. Kostenlose Parkmöglichkeiten in unmittelbarer Umgebung.
house_rules: Handtücher und Bettwäsche können für 6 € pro Person gemietet werden, sonst bitte mitbringen.

name: Great apt. directly on the canal!
summary: Bright, clean apartment perfectly situated in Kreuzberg / Neukölln. I'm renting my large, beautiful "Altbau" apartment directly on Maybachufer in famous "Kreuzkölln". ALL ROOMS FACE THE CANAL INCLUDING THE BALCONY ! Market twice a week right outside.
space: This 72 square meter „Altbau“ apartment is perfectly situated in Neukölln, with lots of bars and restaurants around. The metro station („Schönleinstraße“) is a 3 minutes walk away and the train (U8) takes you within 8 minutes to the city center / Alexanderplatz. Twice a week (Tuesdays and Fridays) there is a mainly turkish fabric & food market right in front of the door, starting at eleven in the morning and ending around six in the evening. People from the area love it, not only for the cheap prices but the lively atmosphere! You can get organic foods, delicious cooked stuff or just enjoy some live music.  Saturdays there’s a design and crafts market with a very relaxed ambiance, worth a stroll for souvenirs or a cup of coffee. The apartment itself is very bright and has huge windows with a great open view, high ceilings, restored wooden floors and a small balcony. The living room offers a comfy foldable sofa bed, a flat screen TV, DVD player, studio speakers + amp with a stereo jack

name: Apartment 1 in Berlin
space: The lovingly restored apartment is situated in a historic, 200-year old building in the heart of Berlin within walking distance to all of the major points of interest in Berlin-Mitte. The Reichstag, the Brandenburg Gate and Oranienburger Straße are only minutes away by foot.  The bright living area with an open well equipped kitchen and a dining area.  The bedroom has a nice double bed, a chest and a TV. The bright bathroom has a bathtub with shower. Numerous shops, restaurants, cafes and bars are located in the immediate vicinity. The apartment is located only 15 minutes form Tegel Airport by car and can be reached comfortably on foot from the run_train train station, Berlin Hauptbahnhof. All Berlin's places of interest such as for example the Kurfürstendamm, the Friedrichstrasse, Potsdamer Platz, the Reichstag, the Brandenburg Gate, Alexanderplatz, and more can be reach by public trains or buses. Very good public transport, you arrive the centre in few minutes: Subway stations are near by

name: Bungalow mit Garten in Berlin Zehlendorf
summary: A beautiful quiet town house surrounded by a large garden, next to a beautiful Fin de Siecle Villa,    ten minutes by train to downtown, Berlinale Potsdamer Platz and close to the Free University. Large Bathroom, large kitchen, large living room.
space: Freistehendes,möbliertes Haus in nicht einsehbarer Gartenanlage in Südwest-Berlin mit eigenem Eingang zwischen alten Bäumen,neben denkmalgeschützter Gründervilla. Frisch renovierte ca 65 qm, ein grosser Raum mit eingebauter Küche. Bad mit grosser Badewanne und Waschmaschine. Grillplatz, Garten. Super Verkehrsanbindung. Per Schnellbahn ist man in 10 Min am Potsdamer Platz, zwei weitere Busse halten direkt vor dem Haus.Wir freuen uns Euch hier zu Gast zu haben. Irina und Jochen

name: Apartment Berlin-Charlottenburg
space: 1-Zimmer Apartment in bester Charlottenburger Citylage, 100 m vom Schloß Charlottenburg entfernt, viele Museen, Kneipen und Restaurants i.d. Nähe.Modern und geschmackvoll eingerichtetes Apartment im 4. OG, Aufzug vorhanden, mit direkter Blickrichtung zur Schlossstraße, gefliestes Duschbad, franz. Fenster, Doppelbett (1,60m breit), Kabel-TV, komplett eingerichtete Küchenpantry mit Kühlschrank, Geschirrspüler und Cerankochfeld, Kaffeemaschine, Wasserkocher, Eierkocher, Toaster, ausreichende Anzahl an Schränken und Ablagen, nur an Nichtraucher, natürlich werden Bettwäsche und Handtücher gestellt.Das Apartment liegt in unmittelbarer Nähe zum Schloß Charlottenburg und einigen Museen. Die Schloßstraße mit seiner breiten doppelreihigen Kastanienallee und der zentralen Flaniermeile ist sicherlich eine der schönsten Straßen Berlins. Eine Vielzahl von gemütlichen Kneipen, Cafes und Restaurants laden zum Verweilen ein. Das nahe Schloß mit dem weitläufigen Schloßgarten ist ein Muß für jeden Berlin

space: The City West (Kudamm) is right next to the apartment. Only 5 minutes to walk. The Metro Station is only 200meter´s next to the apartment. name: Holiday Apartment with Garden
space: We rent a bright modern two-room apartment in the basement of a high-two-family house in a quiet location in the south-west of Berlin (near the train station Marienfelde). Only 20 minutes away by direct transport links to the Brandenburg Gate and Reichstag, but in the countryside. Good shopping and several restaurants are within walking distance in 5 minutes. The apartment is located in the basement of a high-detached two-family house in Berlin Tempelhof. The house and the apartment has been renovated in 2008/2009. The apartment is newly decorated and offers a large extent with a maximum size of 50 sqm. 4 people to sleep. To the garden she has a separate entrance. It has living room, bathroom, bedroom for 2 people and a new fully equipped kitchen. The garden can sunbathe, relax and grill can be used. General: Size about 50 qum. - Two rooms, kitchen, bathroom - Central heating - separate entrance from the garden. Living room: Fireplace Hark, dining area for four, sofa bed for two people

name: dnb-berlin - private room
summary: The spacious, light-filled room is newly renovated and features a king-size bed (180cm) and an en suit bathroom, offering you the comfort of a home away from home. Enjoy Berlin in the centre of the City.
space: Looking for a place to stay? Wanna stay in the heart of the city? Stay here! A beautiful, large room in private, warm atmosphere are the perfect spot to start exploring Berlin. Take in the history and culture of the city. Many sightseeing and tourist attractions are nearby. The Brandenburg Gate, the War Memorial Church, Zoo, Potsdamer Platz, New National Art Gallery and the Berliner Philharmonie are all within walking distance. The excellent public transport system nearby brings you to the Exhibition Center, the Alexander Platz and other spots of interest in very short time. The spacious, light-filled room features a kingsize bed (180cm) and an own bathroom, offering you the comfort of a home away from home. The room is equipped with cabel TV and looks out over tree-lined streets. Breakfast is not included, but you have the option of having your favorite breakfast prepared for you and brought to your room on request. name: ruhiges Zimmer in Pankow/ Prenzlauer Berg
space: Dear guests, I offer you a room on the first floor with two single beds, desk and cupboard. On the same floor, you find a nice bath room with shower and bathingtub. Downstairs, there is the large living room combined with the kitchen, which we use togehter. You also find a small sauna in the house, outside is a garden, nearby the Schlosspark if you like jogging or biking. The next bus station is about 100 m away, the S-Bahn Pankow-Heinersdorf is 1500 m from the house and brings you quickly to Prenzlauer Berg (3 km distance). You can borrow a bike from me or park your car outside.  "Together but individual in relaxing surrounding" is the motto of my offer. As true "Berliner" I am happy to share with you tips and trends of my city.  See you soon, Peter

Danke :-)) Wenn nicht persönlich,  dann immer üb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) oder (Hidden by Airbnb) .  :-) Es ist eher eine ruhige Ge
neighborhood_overview: Es ist eher eine ruhige Gegend.  Spaziergänger mit Hunden und ältere Leute. Das Haus hat eine Südausrichtung und ist deshalb recht hell. Bis zum Prenzlauer Berg sind es ca. 4 km und mit dem Fahrrad in max. 20-30 Minuten zu erreichen.  Es ist eine absolut sichere Gegend. Auch den Park kann man jederzeit angstfrei besuchen. :-)
notes: Parkplätze in der Nähe des Hauses sind immer vorhanden. Der nächste Supermarkt ist ca. 300 Meter entfernt  (Montag-Sonnabend 8-22 Uhr). Angeschlossen ist eine Bäckerei die ab 7 Uhr geöffnet  und auch einen Imbiss hat.
transit: Anreise vom Flughafen Schönefeld: Laufen bis zum Bahnhof, dann mit der Bah (Website hidden by Airbnb) Stationen bis ADLERSHOF, umsteigen in die S 8 und bis zum S+U Bahnhof PANKOW  (etwa 45 Minuten ) . Dann in den 250iger Bus umsteigen und 10 Stationen (10 Minuten) bis ROLANDSTRASSE fahren. 90 m laufen ... und angekommen!!  Vom Flughafen Tegel: Den Flughafen-Bus bis Station BEUSSELSTRASSE (etwa 8 Minuten) umsteigen in die S-Bahn S41  Richtung GESUNDBRUNNEN  (2 Stationen ca. 6 Minuten) dort umsteigen in die Bahn S 2 und bis Pankow fahren (2 Stationen etwa 4 Minuten) und dann wie oben beschrieben weiter .... :-)

host_about:
Dear guests, 



my name is Peter and I live in a house with a small garden, close to S-Bahn Pankow-Heinersdorf. My 15 year old daughter and my girl friend stay from time to time as well, but most of the time, the house is quite empty. So we are happy to share our home with you for up to 4 weeks.

If you want to stay in a nice green surrounding, close to river "Panke" and the "Schlosspark", we are happy to welcoming you. 

If you have additional questions, please let me know, 



Peter



PS: natürlich freuen wir uns auch auf alle deutschsprachigen Gäste
