name: Nice Apartment in Berlin, Kreuzberg
summary: This two rooms apartment is very good located. In between 2 metro lines as well as bus stops. Lively hood, full of cafes all around. And just two blocks away from the river.
space: The description of the apartment: I am renting out my beautiful apartment in Berlin. The apartment is located in the very hip Kreuzberg district. It is a very nice apartment, that measures around 54 sqm. It has two rooms, one of them I use as living room, but as it has a futon, you can use it for further guests. Also there is a small and cozy balcony with a view to the backyard, so you can relax and enjoy the sun. The apartment is very bright and comfy.  It´s location is best; the apartment is exactly in between two train stations and bus connection is very good as well. Internet, a washing machine are included. If you still have any questions or if you still need information of any kind, please don't hesitate to contact me. I am looking forward to your visit.

name: Holiday apartment Trinimat Berlin
space: This beautiful individually decorated 2-room apartment has a living room, a bedroom and a spacious kitchen. It is suitable for 1-2 persons. The living room has a nice sitting area with a sofa and flat screen as well a desk area where you can work fine. The bedroom at the quiet courtyard side, has a 140 cm bed and plenty of closet space. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, toaster, coffee maker, kettle, microwave, dishwasher and other household utensils. The kitchen offers a spacious seating area. The spacious bathroom has a sink, toilet and bath / shower as well as a washing machine. The holiday apartment is located in a historic "Gründerzeit" building from 1900 on the 4th floor. Unfortunately there is no elevator. The other house residents appreciate their peace and quiet which means that this holiday apartment is not suitable for parties or noisy behaviour. In the courtyard is a bicycle storage available. A high-speed Internet connection (WLAN) is continuously available.   The holi

Der Gastaufnahmevertrag (Reservierungsbestätigung) kann schriftlich, mündlich, fernmündlich oder durch schlüssiges Verhalten zustande kommen. Bei Übernachtungen ist der Gastaufnahmevertrag abgeschlossen, sobald das Zimmer bestellt und zugesagt oder, falls aus Zeitgründen eine Zusage nicht möglich war, bereitgestellt worden ist. name: CasaKaiser, 2 room apartment
summary: You will be staying in a sunny, modern and comfortably furnished 2 room apartment in the heart of Berlin, near Winterfeldtplatz. Its central location (close to 5 subway lines) makes it very convenient to explore all parts of Berlin.  Note:Due to legislation in Berlin, short term rental of flats to tourists is no longer permitted. Thus this apartment is only available for mid term rental.  It is a requirement that you register with the city authorities as a resident while living in the apartment.
space: The apartment is located in a quiet street on the 4th Floor (with elevator) and consists of a living room with balcony, bedroom, kitchen and bathroom, all with windows.  In the living room there is a dining table for 4 persons, a comfortable sofa bed (150x200), armchair, TV, radio-CD and ample storage. From the living room you can step outside on a west-facing balcony equipped with a table and chairs - ideal for eating outside. The bedroom is furnished with a double bed (160x200) and a large closet. Thick curtains in both rooms guarantee an undisturbed sleep - even in summer. The kitchen is fitted with a ceramic hob, oven with grill, dishwasher, refrigerator with freezer, washing machine, coffee maker, toaster, iron, electric kettle, and dishes and kitchen utensils. A small table invites to have breakfast in the kitchen. The bathroom has a tub and plenty of hooks for all towels. A hair dryer is also available. In the corridor there is a small information corner and a wardrobe. At the e

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the best part of Schöneberg on a quiet street, near the Winterfeldtplatz. In the immediate vicinity there are numerous shops, supermarkets (including ecological), pharmacies, cafes, restaurants and shops where you can enjoy your time.
notes: Due to legislation in Berlin, short term rental of flats to tourists is no longer permitted. Thus this apartment is only available for mid term rental.  It is a requirement that you register with the city authorities as a resident while living in the apartment.
transit: Excellent transport connections: In a few minutes you reach 5 subway lines (Subway stations: Eisenacher Street, Viktoria-Luise Platz and Nollendorfplatz) and several bus lines. From there you are in 7 minutes at Potsdamer Platz, in 16 minutes at the Olympic stadium, in 20 minutes at the Messe / ICC, in 22 minutes at Hauptbahnhof (central railway station), in 30 minutes at Tegel Airport and in 45 minutes at Schönefeld Airport ... in case you'd ever want to leave.  The City-West around the "KaDeWe" department store is conveniently located within 15 minutes walking distance. If you choose to explore the city by bike a bike rental is located close by.
access: Linen and towels are provided free of charge. Also a wireless internet connection is at your disposition.
interaction: We will greet you in the apartment and have information about the neighborhood available for you.
house_rules: 1) Nichtraucher Wohnung // non-smoking apartment 2) Bitte beachten Sie die Ruhezeiten // No loud noise, noise protection laws need to be followed closely.  3) Wegen des Zweckentfremdungsgesetzes, müssen Sie Ihren Wohnsitz (zumindest Zweitwohnsitz) während Ihres Aufenthalts in der Wohnung anmelden. Ich lasse Ihnen dazu die Wohnungsgeberbestätigung zukommen. Außerdem müssen wir einen Mietvertrag machen, den ich Ihnen nach erfolgter Buchung durch AIRBNB zusenden.(Leider kann ich ihn nicht hier hochladen) // Due to legal regulations this apartment is only rented for actually living there, which means that you need to register your residency in the apartment for the time you rent it. I will provide you with the appropriate documents. We will also need to sign a rental contract, that I will provide after the AIRBNB booking is completed (sorry, can't upload it on Airbnb)

Restaurants und Kneipen in der Nähe, geignet für Zwei. Parken auf der Straße,  von  18 Uhr bis 9 Uhr und Sontags frei, Parkticket wird auf Wunsch vorab beantragen, 3 Tage 10,20€.

house_rules: Wir können gerne individuell einen Termin vereinbaren, falls Sie später anreisen möchten. Aus gegebem Anlass bitte ich die Regeln zubeachten. Die Erfahrung hat leider gezeigt,wie unachtsam die Wohnung benutzt wird.  Deshalb beachten Sie bitte  folgende Regeln: Sie erhalten Schlüssel für das Eingangstor und die Haustür, sowie die Apartmenttür. Das Haus ist mit einer Gegensprechanlage und einer zentralen Schließanlage versehen, deshalb wird der Verlust der Schlüssel sehr teuer.        Noch verzichte ich auf eine Kaution.   Ihre Haftpflichtversicherung  würde die Kosten übernehmen .  Behandeln Sie das Apartment pfleglich : Keine Abfälle ,Feuchttücher , Hygieneartikel ins WC!!! Bitte nicht rauchen !!! Kerze aus,    Gas abdrehen,     Fenster zu,    Licht aus,    Schlüssel einstecken.... Sie wollen sich wohlfühlen und auch Ihr Nachfolger.  Bitte verlassen Sie das Apartment  in einem ordentlichen Zustand, wenn Sie viel Müll verursachen wäre eine Mülltrennung ratsam.  Mülltonnen finden Sie auf
host_about:
Ich heisse Jutta,   bin Berlinerin  und  vor 13 Jahren  aus der Hauptstadt an die Ostsee gezogen.  Die Objekte vermeite ich bereits seit längerer Zeit.  Ich war beruflich viel unterwegs als Pharmareferentin.

    5 Dinge, die ich nicht mehr missen möchte?

Stille und Möwengeschrei, die Weite der pommerschen Küste,  die üppige Natur und die Rapsfelder im Frühsommer,   die Nähe zum Wasser und natürlich Zeit ...Literatur, klassische Musik, Kunst .

Meine Liebe zu all dem  habe ich in dem Haus in Wolgast eingefangen und auch im Apartment in Berlin .  Alles was man so braucht zum Wohlfühlen ist vorhanden.

Das Apartment in Berlin ist frei für Euch,wenn ich an der Küste bin.

Es gibt viel zu entdecken.   Ihr werdet Euch wohlfühlen  und seid  herzlich eingeladen! 

 Nach  Berlin und an die Ostsee.!!

name: Pension am Traveplatz Zimmer 3
summary: Schönes kleines Zweibettzimmer mit zwei Einzelbetten im Erdgeschoss Vorderhaus eines teilsanierten Altbaus in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße mitten in Friedrichshain, nur 4 Gehminuten vom S - und U- Bahnhofs Frankfurter Allee entfernt.
space: Die Wohnung wurde mit aufwändiger Sanierung im September 2005 speziell zur Beherbergung von Gästen umgebaut. Ihr Gästezimmer verfügt über eine eigene Miniküche mit Spüle und Warmwasser, 2 Kochplatten, Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Kaffeemaschine, Toaster und Wasserkocher, sowie HD Flachbild-Fernseher. Dazu weiterhin: 2 Einzelbetten, Kleiderschrank, Regal und Tisch mit 2 Stühlen max. 2 Personen. Die Mietpreise variieren je nach Personenzahl und Aufenthaltsdauer.
description: Schönes kleines Zweibettzimmer mit zwei Einzelbetten im Erdgeschoss Vorderhaus eines teilsanierten Altbaus in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße mitten in Friedrichshain, nur 4 Gehminuten vom S - und U- Bahnhofs Frankfurter Allee entfernt. Die Wohnung wurde mit aufwändiger Sanierung im September 2005 speziell zur Beherbergung von Gästen umgebaut. Ihr Gästezimmer verfügt über eine eigene Miniküche mit Spüle und Warmwasser, 2 Kochplatten, Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Kaffeemaschine, Toaster und Wasserkocher, sowie HD Flachbild-Fernseher. Dazu weiterhin: 2 Einzelbetten, Kleiderschrank, Regal und Tisch mit 2 Stühlen max. 2 Personen. Die Mietpreise variieren je nach Personenzahl und Aufenthaltsdauer. Die Pension besteht aus den drei einzeln vermieteten und abschließbaren Gästezimmern 1, 2 und 3 und auf dem Flur zwei Duschbädern, die von allen Gästen genutzt werden. Ich wohne ganz in der Nähe und bin schnell da wenn Sie mich brauchen. Ein Anruf oder eine Nachricht reicht aus In der nahen Umgebung befind
neighborhood_overview: In der nahen Umgebung befinden sich die für Friedrichshain typischen Szene-Kneipen, kleine Läden mit Getränken und Lebensmitteln. Beim Bäcker um die Ecke kann man ab 6 Uhr frühstücken, Samstags ab 7 Uhr und Sonntags ab 8 Uhr. Das Ring-Center in der nahen Frankfurter Allee und viele weitere Geschäfte laden zum Einkaufsbummel ein. Wem das nicht reicht, fährt mit der U-Bahn Linie 5 nur 6 Stationen zum Alexanderplatz mit seinen vielen Einkaufscentern oder von dort mit der S-Bahn weiter zum Bahnhof Zoo, wo man auf dem Kurfürstendamm mit dem Kaufhaus des Westens und vielen anderen Einkaufspalästen dem Kaufrausch verfallen kann.
transit: Die Anfahrt zur Pension erfolgt entweder mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln bis zur U- und S-Bahn-Station „Frankfurter Allee“ und von dort gegenüber dem Ring-Center an der Apotheke vorbei nur vier Minuten Fußweg durch die Jessnerstr. rechts zur Scharnweberstr. und dann zur Müggelstr. Bitte rufen Sie mich an, wenn Sie angekommen sind, ich komme dann gleich zur Tür und lasse Sie hinein zwecks Schlüsselübergabe. Die Unterkunft befindet sich in der Parkzone 50, wo außer an Sonntagen Parkgebühren anfallen. Man kann beim Bezirksamt eine Gästevignette beantragen oder außerhalb des S-Bahn-Ringes (5 min zu Fuß) kostenlos parken. Im Parkhaus des Ring-Center kostet ein tag nur 3 €, allerdings kann man nicht zwischen 22 und 8 Uhr hinein.
access: Die Pension besteht aus den drei einzeln vermieteten und abschließbaren Gästezimmern 1, 2 und 3 und auf dem Flur zwei Duschbädern, die von allen Gästen genutzt werden.

Ich freue mich auf Gäste aus aller Welt und hoffe, dass sie sich bei mir wohlfühlen.



Nachdem ich mit dem Beginn meines Rentenalters meinen größeren Vermietungsservice verkaufte, habe ich nur eine schöne Wohnung ganz nahe meiner eigenen Wohnung zum Vermieten behalten.

Hier kann ich mich persönlich um alles in der Gästewohnung kümmern und die ankommenden Gäste direkt vor der Haustür begrüßen.



Leider spreche ich nicht besonders gut Englisch, aber bisher hat eine Verständigung doch immer noch funktioniert, am besten ist es per Email möglich, da habe ich Zeit zum übersetzen.^^

name: Your fantasy home between two parks
summary: The apartment is ideal for a single or for a couple for temporary living in Berlin. The apartment has everything you need to settle down from a few moths to over a year. The location is great, Schillerkiez is one of the most wanted living areas in the city. I will be available for advice in different types of concerns due to settling into the city and for any concerns due to the apartment.
space: The apartment is situated in the ground floor of a Jugend building. Its windows are facing the inner yard. The flat has 37qm space that is divided into a spacious kitchen, bedroom/livingroom, bathroom with a bathtub and a mezzanine for extra guests. The kitchen is equipped with regular cooking devices and  a washing machine.  The space is decorated with a mural painting, old stylish furniture and Berlin flair. A wifi connection covers the apartment. Northern Neukölln is a very interesting and alternative area in Berlin. Its a genuine and authentic multi cultural neighborhood with a laid back athmosphere and a lot to discover. It is also not very far from the center and the metro station is very close, in 20 min you will have reached Alexanderplatz. The Tempelhof park is just around the corner. It's a unique mixture of urban and natural landscape, an airport that is left as it is and opened for people. A few hundred meters other way you find the beautiful Hasenheide park with grass fiel
description: The apartment is ideal for a single or for a couple for temporary living in Berlin. The apartment has everything you need to settle down from a few moths to over a year. The location is great, Schillerkiez is one of the most wanted living areas in the city. I will be available for advice in different types of concerns due to settling into the city and for any concerns due to the apartment. The apartment is situated in the ground floor of a Jugend building. Its windows are facing the inner yard. The flat has 37qm space that is divided into a spacious kitchen, bedroom/livingroom, bathroom with a bathtub and a mezzanine for extra guests. The kitchen is equipped with regular cooking devices and  a washing machine.  The space is decorated with a mural painting, old stylish furniture and Berlin flair. neighborhood_overview: Schillerkiez is one of the most loved living areas of Berlin Neukölln because of the beautiful buildings, laid-back athmosphere, nice mix of residents, shops and cafes as well as the immeadiate approximity of the Tempelhofer Feld outdoor park.
notes: Please note that I charge a 10e fee for coming to let you in after 21.00. You can avoid this fee by collecting the key from my house. I live 1,5 km away.
transit: The apartment is close to the U-Bahn station Boddinstrasse, and well connected to the public transport network. Ideal for bikers due to Tempelhofer Feld huge asphalt lanes, bike roads through Hasenheide park and the quick Hermanstrasse connection to Kreuzberg and Britz. The parking in the street is free of charge.
access: free parking, free wi-fi
interaction: I'm available for any concerns, so feel free to contact me.
house_rules: Please respect the neighbors, you are living in a normal house. -Please don't leave trash, papers or bottles in the apartment. The trash bins are situated in the inner yard where you can enter without a key.  Please do not store anything in the hallway, but keep you belongings in the apartment. If you have bikes, they can can be left in the inner yard. To prevent heat loss, please do not leave the windows open in the winter time when you leave the apartment! Downloading from the internet is not allowed! Any download can lead to a huge fine (1800e) this happens all the time in Germany. So don't do it.
host_about: I am a finnish artist and freelance writer living in Berlin. Looking forward to host you!

space: You're on vacation? You have to come to Berlin center for work but do not want to go to expensive hotel?  You want to spend a few days and explore Berlin?  Do you still need a suitable accommodation?  Well, well! Here it is.  Modern furnished, cozy and quiet,  in the center of the city and up to date.  very cozy and high quality.  Bedroom, living room, dining room (table for up to 6 people) at the open kitchen adjacent. Small bathroom.  Very centrally located. several U-bahn and buses. 5 min from the KaDeWe and ZOO   in the middle of the city, yet in a quiet side road. the optimal location for Berlin. several shops and cheap and good restaurants in the area.  Near all major museums and exhibitions, theater and philharmonic orchestra.  The apartment is perfect for two people.  The kitchen is equipped with everything your heart desires. Similarly, a high-quality coffee maker.  landscaped courtyard garden  Friendly staircases  High quality of life for a perfect holiday in the capital  Dow

Nice People from all over the World are welcome.

name: Awesome Location Mitte / P'berg
space: You have your own private room plus a charmingly quirky guest WC in the apartment in an exciting location right in the center of Berlin at the border of Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg.   Everything is close.  Shops, Bars, Night Life, Museums, Galleries, Theater, Cinema, Clubs.  Metro Rosa Luxemburg Platz is just 1 min to walk.  Hackescher Markt, Museum Island, Kulturbrauerei are all within easy walking distance. If you want to experience Berlin's urban attractions in a comfortable setting, you found your place.  Quiet room towards the court yard in a turn of the century building, 12 ft ceilings, wooden floors, french doors etc. Modern fixtures, indoor shower bath, central heating, super fast wifi, dishwasher, washing machine and a microwave.  There is  an Italian deli and a bakery as you fall out the door. Please be aware that this is strictly a non smoking, as well as a no pets environment.  And yes, there is no TV.

There is  an Italian deli and a bakery as you fall out the door. Please be aware that this is strictly a non smoking, as well as a no pets environment.  And yes, there is no TV.
house_rules: If I am present, we will get along and share kitchen and bath (there is a toilet for your own use).   If I am not, you'll do just fine without me.  Please be respectful of the neighbors.  No smoking, pets and shoes in the apartment. Due to Germany's high cost of energy including hot water, please limit your showers to under 10 min.  Use squeegee and sponge to remove excess water from the floor after taking a shower. Germany has strong and strange intellectual property laws.  If you use the internet, absolutely no downloading and sharing (torrents) of non legal media is allowed. Unfortunately, due to a prior incident that resulted in a 1000€ fine demand by a law firm, you will have to sign an internet user agreement. Sorry and thanks for your understanding.
host_about: I am born and raised in Berlin, at the same time I have traveled extensively.  When I am home, I'll be happy to share some of my favorite places in the city with you.  Berlin is a great city especially in the summer it may be one of the most exciting, versatile and fun places to explore.

name: bright apartment in Berlin Kreuzberg
summary: In the heart of Berlin Kreuzberg: between Viktoriapark und Tempelhofer-field. Enjoy the multi cultural Bergmannstraßen-Kiez. My bright and comfortable apartment offers the perfect starting point to discover Berlin.
space: This great 3 room apartment is located near the populous Bergmannstr.,Tempelhof Airport Park, Victoria Park, and it is within close walking distance to the U6 and U7. 20 minutes walking distance to Potsdamer Platz. Experience the real Berlin in the famous area of Bergmann-Kiez, lots of culture, artists, shops and restaurants. It is the most creative and ethnically diverse neighborhood in Berlin.  The flat offers a fantastic view and sunlight all day long. The apartment includes a dishwasher, balcony, fresh towels, and clean bedsheets.  We rent out one spacious room with double bed (140 cm). It is a non smoking room. We prefer a maximum of 2 people per stay.

name: Cottage in the city with garden
summary: Nice modern cottage for 1- 5 people with garden, BBQ, fireplace, animals dom. for 10€ per day. We have bicycles for renting.  Near the house is a beautiful forest and fresh air. You can go jogging or strolling with your dog. Parking is free. In sommer time we have a swimming pool. By arrival please pay city tax , facilities for gas, water and electricity (about 3€ pro person ans day).
space: Our house and the cottage are in Berlin-Karlshorst. It is very calm. Within 5-10 min by bicycle from the house you can rich the train station (S-Bahn S3 /RE to the city centre (Alexanderplatz or Friedrichstraße) within ~15 min, and the Hauptbahnhof (run_train station) within ~25 min. The way to S-Bahn is 15-20 min and to the Tram 10 min. To the tram you go by foot 10 minutes, to urbane line 15-20 minutes All around the residential area in Karlshorst, in fact just behind the house, is a forest wherein one can walk the dog, go for jogs, etc. There are cafés, pups, restaurants and shops all within 5-10 min from the house by bicycle /foot. Nearby, there are sport halls, e.g. Tennis, swimming, etc. About 10 min by car/train from the cottage is the Spree River, Pier Treptow, and Friedrichsfelde Castle. there is also the lake Müggelsee within 15 min by the S-Bahn, where, depending upon the time of the year, one can sail, go for bike ride, and when frozen, ice-skate on the lake.  We recommend you m

You are the Feeling like on the village, but you are in few minutes by car or train in the metropolitan life. You can see in Berlin-Karlshorst a lot of historical places, Horse races, museum of kapitulation...
notes: You can bring your animals, your cat, your dog etc. the price is 5€ per day. For Energy (Gas, water, electricity) pay separate in the end. In Silvester I rent this house for 5 days.
transit: Welcome, you are in Berlin. Here is an excellent public transport with S-Bahn, Metro, Regio. busses and Trams. And the are a lot of markets for foods
access: A functional Kittchen with all what you need, eating room to take your food, a bathroom with swoher and bathtube, a beautiful garden with furniture, BBQ, fireplace with private atmosphere, bicycles, table-tennis, a nice forrest with attractions
interaction: I`m happy to have a small talk with my guests. I can tell you something about historical and present times of Berlin. I´m ein Berliner
house_rules: fresh air after the shower and after sleeping in the rooms for few minutes don`t smooking in the house. You can do it in the garden / fireplace
host_about:
Ich freue mich auf Gäste aus der ganzen Welt und spreche etwas Englisch, Russisch und ein wenig Polnisch. Demnächst wird auch noch Französisch dazukommen. Diese schöne Sprache lerne ich gerade. Ich spiele Klavier und habe auch 2 Geigen, die auf Spieler warten.

Als Lehrerin für Deutsch kann ich euch helfen, diese Sprache zu verbessern.  

Meine Fächer sind außerdem Chemie und Biologie. 

Ich helfe Abiturienten oder auch jüngeren Schülern mit Nachhilfeunterricht in Deutsch und Nawi.

In unserem großen Garten können wir Tisch-Tennis spielen oder am offenen Kamin träumen.

Das hängt natürlich ab von der Jahreszeit ab. Allerdings haben wir es schon geschafft, eine Sibirische Gartenparty zu feiern.

Mein Leitspruch ist: Tun und Ruh'n in rechtem Grade.

Und denkt daran: Der frühe Vogel fängt den Wurm!

name: Our Asia Room For You
space: If you are looking for a central place to stay and to explore the city, with a feel-home atmosphere (not hotel-like) and personal contact to a Berlin family, then you are right here!  Our spacious guest room (25 m2) will take you on a little trip to Asia, giving you the possibility to relax after an exciting day in Berlin.  The room has a double bed (new!) and a spare guest mattress as well as an own access to the balcony.  Kitchen, small bathroom, living room and balcony are shared. Therefore, we prefer women as guests. Thanks for your understanding. Sheets and towels are included. Just a few minutes to walk you can spend your day around the Kollwitzplatz / Kastanienallee area. There are lots of nice cafes, restaurants and bars. On Saturdays, you could check out the Kollwitz Market for food, flowers and craftwork from Berlin. On Sundays, you might want to walk to the flea markets at Mauerpark or Arkonaplatz. Main tourist attractions such as Brandenburger Gate, Reichstag and the museum

transit: Tram M2 station Knaackstraße, metro station Senefelder Platz
house_rules: Please take off your shoes in the flat. If you want to smoke, please do so on the balcony. Please log the apartment properly (both locks) when you leave it. Don't bring other people without our prior approval. Please respect our privacy and do not access the private room. THANK YOU!
host_about: We are a young family with 2 children, interested in arts, photography and films, philosophy and meditation. We love traveling and exploring the world, but also enjoy meeting people from all over the world in our home as we love the inspirations and new impulses we get. Women preferred.

name: Charming Apptm - 20min to F'strasse
space: Redeveloped, bright 2 room apartment in charming house built in 1907. Polished old boards with modern furniture. You have 2 1/2 room @ 74 qm, designer kitchen and Roland E-Piano. Building is located in popular high middle-class residential area, very green, park and Teltow canal in 10 min walking distance. S-Bahn S25 in 4min walking distance, you can reach Potsdamer platz in 15min and Friedrichstrasse in 20 min. Buses in all directions in 2 min walking distance. The apartment will be perfect for a couple (sleeping room) plus maximum 2 Persons sleeping in living room at the couch. It will be a perfect match for a family, because of its middle class family area and playground behind the building. Perfect for shopping, Kaufland (open till midnight) Aldi, penny, McDonalds and Pizzeria 2min walking distance.

name: Lovely Apartment in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Lovely one bedroom apartment in a beautifully renovated house from the early 19th century in Prenzlauer Berg, one of the most popular and lively areas of Berlin, just a few blocks away from public transport and inmidst great restaurants and bars.
space: Lovely one bedroom apartment in a beautifully renovated house from the early 19th century in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg, one of the most popular and lively areas of Berlin.  The apartment has one bedroom with a double bed (1,40x2,00m), so it's perfect for two people, a fully equipped spacious kitchen, a comfortable bathroom (with a bathtub and a sperate shower) and a balcony. It is on the 4th floor, there is an elevator (just a few more steps to walk up). The neighborhood is very safe at day and night, the metro and train station Schönhauser Allee is just a 5 mins. walk away, the famous "Mauerpark" (where the wall used to be) with its exciting fleamarket is just around the corner and there are countless bars, restaurants and shopping opportunities near by. There's a TV and DVD Player and also free WiFi (but sometimes a bit slow) that you can use for your mobile phones. Respectful guests only, please. This is a quiet house with nice people. No pets allowed, sorry. Smoking is only allowed on
description: Lovely one bedroom apartment in a beautifully renovated house from the early 19th century in Prenzlauer Berg, one of the most popular and lively areas of Berlin, just a few blocks away from public transport and inmidst great restaurants and bars. Lovely one bedroom apartment in a beautifully renovated house from the early 19th century in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg, one of the most popular and lively areas of Berlin.  The apartment has one bedroom with a double bed (1,40x2,00m), so it's perfect for two people, a fully equipped spacious kitchen, a comfortable bathroom (with a bathtub and a sperate shower) and a balcony. It is on the 4th floor, there is an elevator (just a few more steps to walk up). The neighborhood is very safe at day and night, the metro and train station Schönhauser Allee is just a 5 mins. walk away, the famous "Mauerpark" (where the wall used to be) with its exciting fleamarket is just around the corner and there are countless bars, restaurants and shopping opportunities
neighborhood_overview: Our holiday apartment is located in a lively area of great variety – not only in a culinary sense: you can find Vietnamese, Korean, Indian, Mexican, Spanish, American and German restaurants in walking distance. There is also a multiplex movie theatre directly on Gleimstraße and the famous Max-Schmeling-Halle with its wide choice of entertainment programmes (concerts, sport events and others) is just around the corner. You can go running on the nearby track or watch football games in Friedrich-Ludwig-Jahn stadion. During hot summer days you can have a picnic in the little park at Falkplatz, and in Mauerpark you may even have a barbeque or visit parts of the infamous Berlin wall or the famous fleamarket on Sundays.
transit: It is very easy to get to Gleimstraße as it is close to the metro and train station Schönhauser Allee. You can reach Alexanderplatz and Hackescher Markt with its many shops and boutiques in only a few stations. The famous Kastanienallee and the beautiful Oderberger Straße with its many designer shops, second hand boutiques, bars and restaurants is in walking distance. On Sundays you can also have a different kind of shopping experience at one of Berlin's biggest fleamarkets in Mauerpark. How to get here: You can easily reach us from both airports Schoenefeld (one day meant to be BBI) and Tegel TXL airport. If you fly to Schönefeld airport, just take the suburban railway S9 and arrive at Schönhauser Allee without even changing trains. From Tegel airport the bus TXL takes you to the train station Beusselstraße where you can transfer to the ring train. If you arrive at Berlin central station just take one of the many trains to Alexanderplatz and then change to the metro U2 to Schönhauser
interaction: We live in  the same house, therefore we are happy to help any time you need directions, restaurant tipps, additional kitchen supplies, more towels etc. If you have small children, we can also offer a baby cot, lots of toys and other stuff for kids.
house_rules: Quiet and respectful guests, please, this is a quiet house with many families. Smoking only permitted on the balcony! No pets, sorry. Thank you!
host_about:
Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bei uns in Berlin willkommen zu heißen. Für alle Ihre Fragen stehen wir Ihnen gerne zur Verfügung. Herzliche Grüße!



We would be happy to welcome you to Berlin. Please don't hesitate to ask us, if you have any questions. Best wishes!



Imme & Thorsten von "Apartment in Berlin"

Berdroom Nr 1 is equipped with a double bed, a lounge chair and a desk, Room Nr 2 is the living room it is equipped with a bar, a sofa and 2 chairs and with a handcrafted bed for 3 people. The bed
neighborhood_overview: We live in a very green area of Berlin right next to 2 parcs. Our neighbourhood is mainly shaped by families. It is the district with the most kids/inhabitant Therefore we have lots of offers for ou "llittle" guests. We have many playgrounds, a childrens farm...
notes: We just put in an new kitchen with dishwasher stove and oven.
transit: Ther are lots of busses, trains and subways that bring anywehre you like really fast.
access: Our guests have full access to the whole apartment.
interaction: Since I live right underneath the apartment I can help with tips and will be there for you any time a problem occurs.
house_rules: No parties without asking. No smoking in the apartment, only on the terrace. Bring your own garbage to the garbageplace in the cout yard. Treat the neighbours with respect and behave respectful in the public spaces like the staircase or court yard.
host_about:
I am an artist and a mother of 4 kids. We live underneath the apartement. If there is anything our guests need, we can organize it anytime. My husband is a carpenter and he is an artists as well. We have built and designed our apartement. We will use it when the kids are old enough to stay by themselelves. Right now we don´t need it, so we rent it out, or have friends there. We like to have guests. 

We are interested in art, theater, films, we like to travel and have company.

name: TWO ROOM APARTMENT ALEXANDERPLATZ
summary: The apartment, located in the centre of Berlin, is bright and comfortable, equipped with everything you need. What I particulary like is the nice urban view from the 9th floor. See you soon.
space: LOCATION BERLIN MITTE DISTRICT  The holiday flat is located right in the heart of the city, in the Eastern part between Alexanderplatz, Jannowitzbrücke and Strausberger Platz. All the most popular sights, places of cultural interest, legendary clubs, restaurants, bars, cafes, the river Spree, parks… are nearby.  And, within a stone's throw of the lively districts Prenzlauer Berg, Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain.  In short, the perfect starting point for you to discover the city.  THE HOLIDAY FLAT - OVER THE ROOFTOPS  In an original Plattenbau (high rise) from the 60s – lovingly reconstructed and decorated, following the charm of this era.  2 rooms and 60 square metres on the 9th floor – which gives you a great urban view from the balcony. And don't worry about the stairs – luckily there's a lift. It's very bright and sunlit. Wake up to the morning sun in kitchen and bedroom. Enjoy a cosy evening with the setting sun in living room and on the balcony. There is everything you need:  Quiet b

host_about:
Hi, I am Angela. 



Choosing this place I attached great importance on lots of light, very central and quiet location with balcony and lift. I equipped this place with all the amenities that I like to find when I am travelling myself. 



At the same time I am not overly pretentious, but I feel most comfortable whenever the place is clean and clear. 

I am also delighted about every little amenity which makes my stay comfortable and which gives me a quick orientation. 



For my guests I followed this idea: mineral water, coffee, tea to start with, cooling and cooking opportunities, ingredients such as salt, pepper, oil, vinegar … and a dish washer – all this you can take for granted. As well as convenient city maps, umbrella (just in case), recommendations for almost everything: cafés, bars, clubs, museums, all kind of transport facilities and handy hints – even off the beaten tourist track.    



My guests can expect: washing machine, flat iron, ironing board, and for activities inside the apartment after a long day trip or a hard working day a few delivery services for lovely meals and drinks. 



During busy times of course I am always accessible via mobile phone. I am open minded regarding special requests. Do not hesitate to ask. 



My personal interests: photography, friends, swimming, theatre.



See you soon. 

Angela

host_about:
Sehr geehrte Gäste,

Einen schönen Guten Tag !  Wir sind Bernd und Tamara.

Unsere Sprachen sind Deutsch , Englisch, Russisch

und wir freuen uns darauf, Sie bei uns in Berlin begrüssen zu dürfen. 

Bei uns werden Sie sich wohlfühlen!



Dear Guests,

Greetings to you from Berlin !  We are Bernd and Tamara.

Our languages are German and English,

and we are looking forward to having you as our guests here in Berlin !

We are certain that you will enjoy your stay with us !





Profil of Bernd: 

Born 1940 in Königsberg/East Prussia, - Territory now belonging to Russia. - 

At age 4, family escaped to the former East Germany.    

After Public School: Professional Letter as Factory Mechanic.

Refusal of East German Government  to my entering College, 

because of Membership at Protestant Church-Youth Organization,

where I sang in a Church-Choir and played the Trompet at 

Church-Functions.

Age 16 !!: Coal Miner in a Brown-Coal Pit !!!

"Move" !!! (officially denounced and documented as illegal) to the former 

West Germany. - In Wiesbaden: Professional Letter as Machine Draftsman, and Work as Machine Designer in the Field of Chemical-Process-Machines.

1968 in New York City: Machine Designer and Student at New York City College: Bachelor of Arts in 1972. Major Direction of Study: Psychology, 

Minor: German Literature.

At the Caribbean Island-State of St. Kitts-Nevis/West Indies (Leeward Islands): 

Lecturer of Technical Drawing at the Technical College in St. Kitts/West Indies, 

and Math-Teacher at Gingerland High-School in Nevis/West Indies, having taught in the British O-Level System. - In St. Kitts: the Founding of a Chess-Club, meeting once a week ! (It still was functioning 10 years later) (Website hidden by Airbnb) The Date of Independance from Britain is the 19th of September,

which also is my Birthday !

In 1976, back to the U.S., to Chicago: Real Estate Salesman & Manager. 

Work with Procter & Gamble. Purchase and Sale of vacant, - old and 

broken-down Buildings. Restauration of  those Buildings. 

Rental of their Apartments after Re-Hab. (To be continued).

name: CITY STUDIO WEST@ Kurfürstendamm(monthly discount)
summary: Right in the heart of the City Center West - but quiet ! Only a few steps from the famous Boulevard KURFÜRSTENDAMM with its Designer Stores and International Restaurants. Subway, City Train and 24/7 buses are right around the corner.
space: This very cozy STUDIO APARTMENT (30 sqm.) is very bright and quiet, on the 6th. floor (2 elevators). The Windows with southern exposure have sun-blinds plus black-out blinds installed. ( in case  you want to sleep during the day) There is 1 single bed and 1 Leather Couch, a coffee table, side-table and a dining table/ desk with seating for up to 3 people. * Cable-TV (32" flat screen) with English language   news channels (BBC and CNN)  * Home Theater System with FM-Radio, CD and DVD, WiFi ADSL internet connection. (free of charge) * Bed Linen and Towels are provided.(free of charge) * The bathroom has a walk-in Shower, WC and Wash Basin. Respectful of all races/religions/genders and sexuel orientations. If you have any question please don't hesitate to ask us.

If you have any question please don't hesitate to ask us. * ENTIRE APARTMENT for yourself. * The KITCHENETTE  is fully equipped with a complete set of Kitchenware, Electric Cooker w. 2 hot plates, Microwave, Refrigerator w. freezer, Hot water kettle and a Coffee-Maker. * The LAUNDRY ROO
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the City Center West (where the district of Charlottenburg borders with Wilmersdorf)  - just a few steps off the famous "Kurfürstendamm" boulevard, where you will find a wealth of international restaurants and designer stores, as well as bakeries and supermarkets (some of them are open 'til midnight and some are open 24/7)  To visit the world-renowned SCHAUBÜHNE theater - you simply cross the street. This safe neighborhood in the City Center West is so sought after that even the former mayor of Berlin has chosen to live here !
notes: The elevator stops between the 6th. and 7th. floor.  To the 6th. floor it's only a very few steps.
transit: Very close to all public transportation:  * Bus Stop (24/7) - LEHNINER PLATZ/KURFÜRSTENDAMM (50 meters)- 1 min. walk * Subway Station - ADENAUERPLATZ (300 meters)- 6 min. walk (Here you can also catch the airport-bus 109 to be at Tegel-airport after a 20 min.ride) * S-Bahn Station (city train).- CHARLOTTENBURG (400 meters)- 8 min. walk Here you can catch your  train and be at the International Fairgrounds (Messe) after just 2 stops or at the Olympic Stadium after 5 stops. In the other direction (from tracks 5/6) you will be after 5 stops at HAUPTBAHNHOF (Main Train Station).
access: * ENTIRE APARTMENT for yourself. * The KITCHENETTE  is fully equipped with a complete set of Kitchenware, Electric Cooker w. 2 hot plates, Microwave, Refrigerator w. freezer, Hot water kettle and a Coffee-Maker. * The LAUNDRY ROOM (in the basement) can be accessed with the apartment keys. It has two professional coin operated washing machines (€ 2.50),  a spin dryer (free) ,and a hot air dryer (€ 1.00)
interaction: I live only half an hour away from the apartment and I can be reached via airbnb or by phone, SMS, e-mail and (Hidden by Airbnb) .
house_rules: NO SMOKING inside the apartment PLEASE  !  You may smoke on the outside walkway in front of the apartment door using an ashtray. PLEASE,  NO LUGGAGE ON THE BEDS. (because of  those little crawling free riders that can jump onto your luggage on a crowded plane)
host_about:
After having worked in New York City for decades,we retired and moved to the vibrant city of Berlin. The cozy studio apartment we are offering used to be our own vacation home while we were living in NYC.

In our free time we love to take advantage of Berlin's extensive offerings of cultural life - museums, theaters, concerts etc. We also love to ride our bikes to explore the city and its surrounding forests and many lakes.  If you like, we can give you a tour through the very dynamic city of Berlin - on foot, on bike or using its excellent public transportation system.

We would also be interested in exchanging/switching apartments with other airbnb hosts in our favorite travel spots NYC and Barcelona-Sitges or Gran Canaria.

Please, feel free to contact us if you would like to know more about us and the apartment.

name: Cosy and huge family place, 1184sf
summary: Eine große, gemütliche Wohnung, perfekt für Familien geeignet.
space: Great place for families. Located in Berlin Mitte/Prenzlauer Berg. .  We have two bedrooms, one is a childrens room and a small room with a baby bed. - Bed 180x200cm (Parents) - Mattress 140x200cm (can be put anywhere you like) - A bunk bed, two beds each 90x200cm - We can also provide a Baby Travel Bed (Crip) - Also the sofa is very comfortable to sleep on We have a fully equipped kitchen, two separate bathrooms, a washing and a dish washing machine.  - bathroom with bathtub - bathroom with shower and toilet - separate toilet We provide towels and linens for 4 persons and a Baby/ Infant (up to the age of 2 years). For every other person we charge 20 Euro per day.  You are welcome to use the "basic" cooking stuff like oil, salt, sugar and all kinds of spices. We also have soap for the washing machine. We offer all the kids equipment you need, for example, a high chair, plenty of toys, a pram/stroller and a Baby Bed if you need one. There are also toys and books for children. In the nei

We offer all the kids equipment you need, for example, a high chair, plenty of toys, a pram/stroller and a Baby Bed if you need one. There are also toys and books for children. In the nei
transit: In a short walking distance you will get to the underground line U2 (Senefelder Platz). Also very close located is the underground line U8 (Rosenthaler Platz). There are two Tram lines M1 and 12 which will take for for example to Hackescher Markt and Friedrichstraße and they also stop at Rosenthaler Platz.
interaction: Unfortunately most of the time we won't be able to meet our guests. We have two sets of keys. The key will be either at our neighbors house or at Café Haliflor which is located right across the street.
house_rules: Please don't smoke inside of the appartment. You can smoke sitting on the window bench with the window open, that's fine. Our app is perfect for families and children. Please don't bring any pets, if you have one please ask before booking. There are no specific rules just: this is our home, we live here so please be respectful towards our belongings and neighbors. Thank you! Please do not abuse our WLAN. It is forbidden to use torrents to upload or download movies or videos! Have a great time!
host_about: I´m Julia from Berlin. Together with my boyfriend Aron and our kids we like to travel and meet other people. Love and kindness!

name: Adorable apartment in the City Center of Berlin
summary: Das Einzimmer-Studio-Appartement Kalckreuthstraße 7 ist eine kleine, helle Wohnung mit eigenen Bad und Küche im 3.OG mit Aufzug. Vom Appartement aus schaut man auf die kleine ruhige Anliegerstraße mit einigen Antiquitätengeschäften und Galerien.
space: Komfortabel eingerichtetes Einzimmerappartement, ausgestattet für bis zu 3 Personen mit Doppelbett, einer Schlafcouch (80&195cm), Esstisch, Schrank und SAT-TV. Es ist eine kleine, helle Wohnung in der Kalckreuthstr. 7 im 3.OG mit Aufzug.  Das Bad des Appartements ist gefliest und mit einer Dusche und einer Waschmaschine versehen. Es fließt wahlweise Kalt-/ Warm- oder Heißwasser. Die kleine Küche mit einem Kühlschrank, Kaffeemaschine, Wasserkocher, Toaster und einem Elektroherd (4 Herdplatten) mit Backofen lädt zur Selbstverpflegung ein.  Internetverbindung vía WLAN/Wifi.

neighborhood_overview: Vom Appartement aus schaut man auf die kleine ruhige Anliegerstraße mit einigen Antiquitätengeschäften. Sie liegt zwischen den U-Bahn-Stationen Wittenberg- und Nollendorfplatz.  Es sind nur 80 Meter bis zum nächsten Bäcker und Supermarkt. Direkt um die Straßenecke sind einige bekannte Restaurants, Imbisse, kleine Geschäfte und verschiedene Einkaufsmärkte. Man wohnt zwischen dem Kurfürstendamm und dem Potsdamer Platz, der Mitte West und der Mitte Ost in der Nähe des Tiergartens mit seinen Erholungsmöglichkeiten und dem Botschaftsviertel. Mittwochs und Samstags ist auf dem nahe gelegenem Winterfeldtplatz ein über die Grenzen Berlins hinaus bekannter Markt.
notes: Bettwäsche und Handtücher sind im Preis inbegriffen. Es gibt ein Bügeleisen und einen Föhn. Kostenlose Internetverbindung vía Wifi/WLAN. Bitte beachten Sie, dass das Land Berlin seit 2014 für die ersten nicht berufsbedingten (also privaten) 21 Übernachtungen eine Übernachtungsteuer von 5% vom Mietbetrag erhebt, zusätzlich zahlbar bei Anreise. Bei Mietaufenthalten von mehr als 2 Monaten besteht die Verpflichtung sich bei der Meldebehörde anzumelden.
transit: Durch die nahe gelegene U-Bahn-Station Nollendorfplatz ist das Appartement exzellent an das Berliner Nahverkehrssystem (BVG) angebunden. An diesem zentralen Verkehrsknotenpunkt kreuzen sich die U-Bahnlinien U1, U2, U3 und U4. Außerdem lässt sich von hier aus die Berliner City binnen weniger Minuten über die Busverbindungen M19, 106 und 187 erschließen. Auch die Nachtbusverbindungen N1, N2 und N26 treffen sich genau hier. Die Parksituation ist für Berliner Innenstadtverhältnisse recht entspannt. Die Zone mit den zu bezahlenden Parkplätzen endet etwa 100 Meter weiter vorher, so dass sich in der unmittelbaren Nähe immer leicht ein Parkplatz finden sollte.
access: Sie mieten die gesamte Wohnung. Niemand anderes hat Zugang.
interaction: Wir sind immer gut telefonisch erreichbar. Der Check-In erfolgt persönlich, so dass alle relevanten Fragen direkt an den Vermieter gestellt, beantwortet und geklärt werden können.
house_rules: English: Check-In – Guest can deposit their luggage from 11:00 am. The apartment will be ready for use latest at 16:00h. The latest time for Check-In is 23:00h. Check-Out - At 11:00 am the latest. Just drop the keys on the table and close the door behind you. Please note that since 2014 the state of Berlin has levied an accommodation tax of 5% on the rental amount for the first non-occupational (ie private) 21 nights, payable additionally on arrival.  For rental stays of more than 2 months, there is the obligation to register with the registration office. Smoking is not allowed.  The apartment is not suitable for parties. Silence time after 22 o'clock. The tenants receive a free Wi-Fi connection. You agree not to use it for illegal activities. This also applies to all visitors to whom the password is passed. We confirm that we have been advised that the provisions of the Copyright Act and other relevant regulations must be strictly observed. It is prohibited by law to download copyrigh

name: ChimaysaberlinB&B Single Bedroom
summary: A good place to stay in the city, clean, well-versed English, German, French, Filipino speaking host is a well-travelled person.
space: I have a furnished room with a single bed in Charlottenburg in my private apartment. The room is small and can only accommodate 1 person only. Bathroom is shared.  It is situated within walking distance to Schloss Charlottenburg, 10 mins. to Zoologischer Garten with Bus M45 or Tegel Airport with Bus 109, and 10 mins. to ICC or International Congress Centrum. There are many restaurants along the run_train road, Otto-Suhr-Allee, Kaiser Friedrichstrasse. A Sushi bar, an Italian cafe and restaurant, Thai, and many other restaurants, bakeries, supermarkets are also found.  Museum Bergruen, Schloss Charlottenburg, Heimat Museuum are within walking distance. The other sights are easily reached by underground transportations, busses, trams.  My flat is a few mins. walk to Schloss Charlottenburg, 10 mins. with U-7 Richard Wagner Platz to ICC, Technical University, Zoologischer Garten or with Bus M45.  Airport Tegel Bus 109 (takes 10 mins.) are all within my vicinity.   This is a non-smoking flat, an

neighborhood_overview: Charlottenburg is tree-lined, with electirc and gas-lighted streets, and restaurants are everywhere, there are several supermarkets along Otto Suhr Allee, there is even an internet cafe downstairs.
notes: Guests booked for 7 days and more will be charged 35€ for cleaning fee. Check in is between 16:00 h to 22:00 h, Check out is at 9:00 h. Be friendly and everyone will be friendly to you, be sad and you cry alone.  Please respect my property as you would respect yourself. I live on the 3rd. floor. You must climb 9 staircases before reaching the elevator. Be careful if you have heavy luggage. Wifi is unstable depending on the gadgets used and time of the day. Kitchen is private, please avoid using it. Coffee and tea machines are available. Please empty wastes in 4 rubbish bins, one each for bottles, papers, plastics, organic wastes, they are emptied daily. Do not leave half-opened foodstuffs in the bedrooms, ants thrive.
transit: Bus stop for M45  is downstairs, Luisenplatz, next to the market. Bus M45 goes to Zoologischer Garten, Technical Univ. or to S-Bahn Westend, 1 station to ICC. Bus 109 travels to Tegel Airport, or to S-Bahn Charlottenburg, then to Zoologischer Garten. U-Bahn Richard Wagner Platz travels to all sights. It is easy to reach my place, take U/B Richard Wagner Platz, about 3 mins. walk.
access: Bedroom: your personal space. Bathroom: shared with other guests. Kitchen is private,  please avoid using the kitchen. Internet access is limited and unstable. There is an internet cafe downstairs for your work. Stadtbibliothek Charlottenburg offers free wifi access from 11am to 7pm.
interaction: Well travelled persons love to interact with one another.
house_rules: Weekly and monthly stayers will be charged 35€ cleaning fee. The bedrooms and bathrooms are cleaned everyday, but if the guests clutter their things on the floor, it looks untidy. Let us help each other by keeping our place tidy. Breakfast is not included, but I do invite guests to join for a coffee or tea. A market is situated downstairs, you can get almost anything. Non-smoking rooms and building. Check-in is 3 pm to 10 pm or by appointment. Check-out is 9:00 am or by appointment. Key deposit will be charged 100 Eur.  My flooring is newly renovated since May, 2018. Damages to flooring, walls, doors will be charged with renovations, materials, labour fees amounting to 500€. Please do not leave left-over foodstuffs, opened cans, water bottles in the bedrooms, there are 4 rubbish bins in the kitchen to separate, plastic, paper, organic foods and they will be emptied daily.
host_about:
I do love to travel when I get the chance to get away for a few days or weeks visiting different continents with my backpack and roller (luggage). My best stays have been spent at bed and breakfast at different countries. I always learn something new by staying with guest families and hosts, they are my best teachers to immerse oneself into the local culture.

My best cooking recipes have been taught by the locals and the best sightseeing trips organized by the host families.

I am looking forward to meet you and wish you a great stay in Berlin!

name: Beautiful flat 95m² in Berlin Mitte
summary: Comfortable, spacious, cozy and well equipped apartment. And most important: best location.
space: Large (95 sqm), stylish and perfectly located apartment. There are many galleries, cafés, bars and nightclubs around. A park (Weinbergspark) to chill is only 3 minutes away.  The house was built around 1850, has been completely renovated in 2011 and was equipped with a lift. You may enjoy breakfast on the balkony with a beautiful view at the close TV-Tower, or just stay in the large livingromm/kitchen at the long table (2,20m). Public Transportation is very close: Rosenthaler Platz (U8) and Rosa-Luxemburg-Platz (U2) are each in a less than 5 minutes walking distance.  Tourist attractions like Dom, Museumsinsel, Alexanderplatz, Kollwitzplatz or Hackescher Markt are also in walking distance (10 min). The apartment is perfect for 1 to 4 persons, but a fifth one may sleep on a mattress, if required. It´s quiet and not on a big street. There´s a children´s playground literally next door, so perfect for families as well. From Airport Flughafen Tegel: Bus 128 to Tubestation Osloer Straße, Tak

transit: U8 und Tram (Rosenthaler Platz) und U2 (Rosa-Luxemburg-Platz) in 5 Min Entfernung. Anreise: Vom Flughafen Tegel nehmen Sie den Bus 128 bis zum U-Bhf. Osloer Straße und steigen dort in die U8 (Richtung Hermannstraße) und fahren bis zum U-Bhf. Rosenthaler Platz (insg. 35-40 Min.). Von dort sind es ca. noch 200 m zu Fuß. Vom Flughafen Schönefeld fahren Sie mit der S9 (oder einer anderen entsprechenden Linie) zur Station Jannowitzbrücke, wechseln dort in die U8 Richtung Wittenau und fahren bis zur Station Rosenthalerplatz. Von dort sind es 200 m zu Fuß. Vom Hauptbahnhof nehmen Sie die Tram bis Rosenthaler Platz. (ca. 12 Minuten Fahrzeit). Taxi: Flughafen Tegel, 12 km (19 Min.), ca. 24 Euro, Flughafen Schönefeld, 24 km (28 Min), ca. 35 Euro, Hauptbahnhof, 3 km (10 Min.), ca. 9 Euro
interaction: I’m easily available via phone for calling and texting, also via mail and the airbnb app.
host_about: I´m a musician who loves to travel, meet new people, have a coffee once in a while and explore life.

name: A lovely luminous room...
space: Nicely furnished appartment in Berlin Schöneberg, Ebersstrasse 16. 20 sqm/m2 bedroom in a 117 sqm/m² appartment with a bed for guests (high bed, see pictures. If there is not enough room over the bed you can turn the couch into a bed) and a amazing view on the gazometer and the Television tower from the living room. The living room and the kitchen will be shared with my two lovely french roommates David (my brother) and Marine. Musicians, DJ and artists, we are already happy to advice you about the best places in Berlin. My roommates (including the cat ;) ) are really quiet and if you're interested in, David is a really good music producer! They speak french, english, german and spanish! name: QUIET GARDEN APT(child friendly)
space: New designer garden apartment at Helmholtzplatz in Prenzlauer berg, one of the absolute best and most beautiful locations in Berlin!   Fantastic, Bright garden apartment in trendy Prenzlauer berg next to the popular Helmholtzplatz square where you can find many popular bars and cafes. (and kids playgrounds!) You can visit artistic boutiques and shops on the Kastanienalle or stroll through the nearby Mauerpark with the famous Sunday flea market and Monster Ronson's Sunday afternoon karaoke. There is a wonderful organic farmer's' market nearby at Kollwitzplatz  every Thurs and Saturday. There you can find everything from fresh, locally grown, organic fruit and veg to homemade pasta, cheeses straight from the dairy, herbs and spices, fresh fish and even organic meats. The area is a foodie heaven with some of Berlin's best restaurants, bars and cafes right outside the door. Walk 5 minutes to the Kulturbrauerei, a former brewery turned into a culture park with theaters and nightclubs like "
description: New designer garden apartment at Helmholtzplatz in Prenzlauer berg, one of the absolute best and most beautiful locations in Berlin!   Fantastic, Bright garden apartment in trendy Prenzlauer berg next to the popular Helmholtzplatz square where you can find many popular bars and cafes. (and kids playgrounds!) You can visit artistic boutiques and shops on the Kastanienalle or stroll through the nearby Mauerpark with the famous Sunday flea market and Monster Ronson's Sunday afternoon karaoke. There is a wonderful organic farmer's' market nearby at Kollwitzplatz  every Thurs and Saturday. There you can find everything from fresh, locally grown, organic fruit and veg to homemade pasta, cheeses straight from the dairy, herbs and spices, fresh fish and even organic meats. The area is a foodie heaven with some of Berlin's best restaurants, bars and cafes right outside the door. Walk 5 minutes to the Kulturbrauerei, a former brewery turned into a culture park with theaters and nightclubs like "

name: Chic Loft By Kastanienallee
summary: Splendid newly renovated and refurbished 44 square meter (474 square feet) loft apartment in an historical original pre-war Berlin building!
space: Located in the beautiful & historical Prenzlauer Berg on Schwedter Strasse, this apartment is available to people staying for two months or more to work or study - walking distance from tech hub 'The Factory' & GLS Language School. This splendid newly renovated and refurbished 44 square meter loft apartment in an historical original pre-war Berlin building which at the time was built and used as a chocolate factory is situated just off Kastanienallee and a stone's throw to Mauerpark (where the Wall once divided the city), home of Berlin's legendary Sunday flea market.  Schwedter Strasse is right in the centre of Prenzlauer Berg, next to Oderberger Strasse and Zionskirchplatz, amidst historical buildings and beautiful old architecture. The Wall used to run at the end of Schwedter Strasse and Bernauer Strasse, where one of the last remaining parts of the Wall still stands and can be visited. Today, cute coffee shops, vibrant bars, restaurants from all corners of the world, art galleries,
description: Splendid newly renovated and refurbished 44 square meter (474 square feet) loft apartment in an historical original pre-war Berlin building! Located in the beautiful & historical Prenzlauer Berg on Schwedter Strasse, this apartment is available to people staying for two months or more to work or study - walking distance from tech hub 'The Factory' & GLS Language School. This splendid newly renovated and refurbished 44 square meter loft apartment in an historical original pre-war Berlin building which at the time was built and used as a chocolate factory is situated just off Kastanienallee and a stone's throw to Mauerpark (where the Wall once divided the city), home of Berlin's legendary Sunday flea market.  Schwedter Strasse is right in the centre of Prenzlauer Berg, next to Oderberger Strasse and Zionskirchplatz, amidst historical buildings and beautiful old architecture. The Wall used to run at the end of Schwedter Strasse and Bernauer Strasse, where one of the last remaining parts o
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is by far my favourite area to live in Berlin, it's culturally vibrant and full of successful creative types, with internationally successful film directors, artists, musicians and magazine editors all breathing in its chic yet bohemian air. It is very central, yet greener than much of Berlin (and just a few minutes walk to Mitte), and is full of restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art cinemas, independent fashion, vintage, record shops, and English language bookstores. Mauerpark (and its epic Sunday fleamarket) where the Berlin wall formally ran is just at the end of the street. The area also feels very safe at all hours of night and day, partly thanks to its thriving restaurant, coffeehouse, and bar scene. Architecturally the area is also very beautiful, with a large number of it's old buildings surviving the war. Prenzlauer Berg avoids the concrete jungle vibe much of Berlin possesses.
transit: Transport wise, you could hardly be better located, with two tram lines, and two U-Bahn stations just at the end of the street and a few minutes walk away. In only a few stops you can reach central Mitte, Museum Island/the River Spree, Alexanderplatz etc. These destinations are also a scenic walking distance from the apartment.
access: You will have full and sole access to this apartment.
interaction: I work for various international arts, fashion and culture magazines and need to keep my finger on the pulse of Berlin's cultural scene, so I should be able to help you with suggestions of places, museums, galleries, parties to visit during your stay.
house_rules: This is a non-smoking apartment(URL HIDDEN)Arrival at early or late hours is possible if pre-arranged.     This is a peaceful place to stay so in return please respect our neighbours - no loud or unnecessary noise, especially after 10pm. We treat our guests in a respectful, polite and friendly manner and expect the same in return. No illegal downloads and no use of torrent on the apartment's internet connection.
host_about:
Hello there!



I enjoy welcoming people from all over the world to this exciting, vibrant, historical and charming area of Berlin. I work in the creative media industry so am particulary excited to witness the ever evolving landscape of this city first hand and am happy to share my knowledge of places worth visiting in the surrounding area to my guests.

name: Holiday Apartment in Berlin Wannsee with balcony
summary: The balcony-apartment is located in the first floor of the multi-family house. It features a small balcony with a really lovely view over the villas of the neighbourhood. The flat is furnished to be very comfortable. One can use the facilities for locking up the bicycle on the property. Unfortunately, the garden cannot be used, as it is reserved for tenants of the house. Free parking spaces can often be used in front of the house. The apartment is ideally suited for 2 adults and 2 children.
space: Dear holiday-guests, the multi-family flat has an historic background of formerly being a barn-house for carriage drivers in 1906. It is located in the gorgeous and very safe siting of Berlin Wannsee. The area of Wannsee, in which the two apartments lie, offers a beautiful variety of landscape, spreading from forest, to lakes and to culture. This however does not limit the quick access into the city, be it by car or by public transportation. The S-Bahn station Wannsee can easily be approached by foot. From there the S-Bahn will transport you every 10 minutes to areas like the Ku’damm (20 minutes) or the Potsdamer Platz (30 minutes). Potsdam is practically around the corner. The apartments (one in ground floor and one in first floor) each feature a little separate bedroom and a combined living-room and dining-room with an additional sofa-bed. They can be booked for up to two adults and two children. These living facilities are very well equipped and furnished with a love for detail (Wi-

summary: Berlin room 18 sqm. Sunny with floorboards and stucco. Double bed 140x200 meters. Wi-Fi and a work desk. Large eat-in kitchen. 6 min> U7 Gneisenaustr. 15 min> Tempelhof Field and Victoria Park. Market Hall, organic supermarket cafes nearby.
space: Bed linen and towels are freshly washed available. The room has two large well designed windows. Every morning the sun shines into the room. If I am not there, it might be that friends or guests inhabit the other room. The old wood planks is a bright dream, combined with a beautiful Persian carpet. The bed is a very comfortable. There is a wooden desk and chair. A hanging rail, shelves and an antique dresser give the room the vitality. My kitchen is the central place in the apartment and is dominated by an old pine table. There is plenty of room to relax and cook in the kitchen. We are practically in the center of Berlin, and around the corner is a police station, which makes the place very safe. Two subway lines U6 "Platz der Luftbrücke"   and U7 "Gneisenaustrasse" are easy to reach in about 5 minutes walk. name: You are looking for peace and relax
summary: Berlin ist wunderschön.Das bestätigen unsere Gäste im hauseigenen Gästebuch. Viele Sehenswürdigkeiten und Aktivitäten und permanente Veränderung. Man muss es erleben um wiederkommen zu wollen. Dann kommt in meine Ferienwohnung und die Nacht wird erholsam für den neuen Tag. Habt Ihr bestimmte Wünsche für die Sehenswürdigkeit dieser Stadt ? Wir helfen Euch gerne.
space: Rest and relaxation in Berlin? This is, like I describe to you how. An oasis of retreat and still very fast in the big city. Modern transport links make it possible.  Get in touch with us and we will tell you everything you want to know. There is a train connection and a mainline connection and bus links. Skating rink and trails in natural surroundings. Numerous restaurants (German cuisine, Greek, Italian and specialty restaurants such as eg "The fabulous Ribhouse" with ribs specialties as you have never experienced before. If necessary, we have a shuttle service to the train station. Our lakes in the area are easily accessible by public transport . finally, Berlin offers with its sights and numerous.

Weite Felder auf der einen Seite mit Skaterbahn und Fischteich, sehr naturnah erhalten.Auf der anderen Seite der Nahverkehr als Buszubringer direkt in die Stadt oder zur S-Bahn, in die Stadt oder in das Umland. Wir bitten um Rücksichtnahme gegenüber den Nachbarn. Danke
notes: Bitte beachten Sie: Rauchen nur in der Veranda oder im Garten. Bitte nicht in der Wohnung.
transit: Busse, S-Bahn, Fernbahn auch ins Umland.  Parkplätze vor dem Haus sind kostenfrei ausreichend vorhanden
access: Unseren schönen Garten dürfen Sie gemeinsam mit uns nutzen. Sie können vom Obst naschen oder grillen mit unserem Propangasgrill.
interaction: Ich bin jederzeit für Sie ansprechbar. Die Wohnung ist komplett für Sie bereit und wird auch nur von Ihnen genutzt.
house_rules: Wir erwarten angenehme  Gäste . Keine Partyfans. Kinder sind herzlich Willkommen.  Sportler durch den nahe gelegenen Golfplatz sind ebenfalls sehr willkommen. Da wir ein  Randgebiet mit ländlichem Charakter sind gehören gegenseitige Rücksichtnahme zu unserem Grundbedürfnis. Musiklautstärken gehören in ein Open Air Konzert obwohl wir selber gerne Musik hören. Keine Gäste außer den gebuchten!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Ich freue mich darauf Euch in meiner Wohnung zu begrüßen. Bei Fragen könnt Ihr Euch immer gerne an mich wenden. Ich spreche nur Deutsch. Andere Kommunikation über Translator



If you want to have a great stay in Berlin you are right with me. Enjoy your stay!

name: Room Prenzlauer Berg Kollwitzplatz area
summary: Your room is in a loft-sytle flat in a old apartment building from around 1890. There is an open space for kitchen and living room on two slightly different floor levels, which makes the whole apartment special. A nice little green balcony is facing to the backyard of the house. The flat is on the first floor towards the nicest street in town: Rykestrasse - with lot´s of restaurants, cafes & bars. Visit this place with its very special atmosphere here within the city. Public transport 3 mins.
space: Own quiet room with balcony view to the garden green in chic old historic house in the trendy Kollwitz neighborhood. Large open living room and kitchen. The Apartment is a mix between stucco and loft style. Bathroom with toilet, urinal, shower and bathtub. Balcony goes to the backyard. Bed size is 1,60 m. Bed linen, towels incl.. Live in the nicest street in town! Very nice neighbourhood with numerous cafés, restaurants, pubs, bars and shops. Kollwitzplatz, Helmolzplatz and Kastanienallee arround the corner. Tram station towards Alexanderplatz or Nordbahnhof only two minutes away. Subway stations U2 Eberswalder Strasse or  U2 Senefelder Platz only about 10 minutes away. S-Bahn station Prenzlauer Allee only 15 miunutes away.

name: Top floor apartment in Berlin
space: The apartment: ---------- This loft apartment is definitely something special. It is very modern and minimalist. Certain charm to make up the visible support beams. The color accent furniture from simple white walls and set, the green carpet and the red couch. There are five single beds and a double sofa bed available. In the kitchen you will find a refrigerator, a stove, a coffee machine and everything else you need. In the large open living room kitchen bedroom area adjoins the separate bathroom, this is big and bright, The Location: -------- In the immediate vicinity are found easy parking. Just minutes away are many cute cafes, breakfast and lunch. Even in a house. There is a great access to public transport (for example, the Prince Street subway station). Exactly opposite is the Sommerbad Kreuzberg. By the way: you can rent bicycles in the house for 5 EUR a day - ask me!

neighborhood_overview: In der nahen Umgebung befinden sich die für Friedrichshain typischen Szene-Kneipen, kleine Läden mit Getränken und Lebensmitteln, Trödelwaren, Läden für Gothic und Punk. Beim Bäcker um die Ecke kann man ab 6 Uhr frühstücken, Samstags ab 7 Uhr und Sonntags ab 8 Uhr. Das Ring-Center in der nahen Frankfurter Allee und viel weitere Geschäfte laden zum Einkaufsbummel ein. Wem das nicht reicht, fährt mit der U-Bahn Linie 5 nur 6 Stationen zum Alexanderplatz mit seinen vielen Einkaufscentern oder von dort mit der S-Bahn weiter zum Bahnhof Zoo, wo man auf dem Kurfürstendamm mit dem Kaufhaus des Westens und vielen anderen Einkaufspalästen dem Kaufrausch verfallen kann.
notes: Seit dem 01.06.2014 gehört die Müggelstr. zur Parkzone 50, das heißt es muss eine Parkgebühr gezahlt werden, wenn man nicht vorher sich eine Gästevignette beim Bezirksamt Friedrichshain/Kreuzberg besorgt hat (per Email an (EMAIL HIDDEN) Zum schriftlichen formlosen Antrag bitte eine Kopie des Fahrzeugscheines und des Personalausweises des Gastes beifügen. Wenn Sie mir mindestens eine Woche vor Anreise die Kopie des Scheines schicken, würde ich auch die Vignette für Sie einholen und die Gebühr verauslagen. Bearbeitungskosten: bis 3 Tage 10,20 € bis eine Woche 13,00 € bis 2 Woche 15,00 €
transit: Die am nächsten gelegene Station von U- und S-Bahn ist Frankfurter Allee, nur etwa 4 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt. Kostenfrei parken kann man etwa 500 m entfernt außerhalb des S-Bahn Ringes oder gegen ein Entgelt von 3 € pro Tag im Parkhaus im Ring-Center, das allerdings zwischen 22 und 8 Uhr geschlossen ist.
access: Die Gästewohnung hat insgesamt drei Zimmer (Zimmer 1, Zimmer 2 und Zimmer 3), die an verschiedene Gäste vermietet werden. Die beiden Duschbäder auf dem Flur werden von allen Gästen genutzt.
interaction: Nach der Schlüsselübergabe, die ich fast immer persönlich erledigen möchte,  bin ich telefonisch oder per Nachricht leicht zu erreichen und komme bei Bedarf sofort zu Ihnen, da ich nur knapp 100 m entfernt wohne
host_about:
Ich freue mich auf Gäste aus aller Welt und hoffe, dass sie sich bei mir wohlfühlen.



Nachdem ich mit dem Beginn meines Rentenalters meinen größeren Vermietungsservice verkaufte, habe ich nur eine schöne Wohnung ganz nahe meiner eigenen Wohnung zum Vermieten behalten.

Hier kann ich mich persönlich um alles in der Gästewohnung kümmern und die ankommenden Gäste direkt vor der Haustür begrüßen.



Leider spreche ich nicht besonders gut Englisch, aber bisher hat eine Verständigung doch immer noch funktioniert, am besten ist es per Email möglich, da habe ich Zeit zum übersetzen.^^

name: Private Wing of Penthouse - Terrace
summary: A stunning way to visit Berlin. A private wing of our sunny Penthouse, big bedroom, terrace, large bathroom, separate entrance all to yourself.  Then open the door and share an open livingroom, kitchen, two balconies, cathedral ceilings & a skylight.
space: A stunning way to visit Berlin. A private wing of our sunny Penthouse, featuring a big bedroom, sunny terrace, a large bathroom, and a separate entrance all to yourself.  Then if you like you can open the door and enter into the run_train space and share a stunning open livingroom, kitchen, two balconies, cathedral ceilings and a skylight. This spacious bright bedroom (25 sqm), with a large terrace and a sliding glass wall of windows, has a double-bed, a wooden desk and an antique wooden closet.  For extra privacy the room has a separate entrance, a hallway with skylight, and a private granite tiled bathroom. At the end of the hall is a door that opens out into the shared open living area with two additional balconies, 3m high ceilings, a skylight and a stainless steel kitchen. This space is also suitable for small events (6-50 people.  Please discuss this with us beforehand to make arrangements for cleanup) All is newly renovated and furnished, with elevator, laundry machine, high-speed DS

neighborhood_overview: This is the most socio-politically diverse neighborhood I have ever seen.  A place where you can literally sit down and talk with a sandalmaker, a surgeon, and an anarchist from three different countries over a burrito.  It has restaurants, cafes, punk bars, undefined performance spaces, graffiti, squats, lounges, boutiques, skate shops, green parks, clubs, stalinist architecture, live music, and bookstores.
transit: U5 - to Alexanderplatz (3m walk and 12 minute ride.) S41/S42 Ringbahn Storkower Str to any corner of Berlin  (10m walk and max 30minute ride.) M10 - Street car to Prenzlauerberg or Kreuzberg (10m walk and 5-25m ride) Bicycling - Most interesting areas in Berlin are within a 30 minute ride.

interaction: Our family is in and out of the house during the week, on weekends we tend to go camping a lot, but you are welcome to ask my husband Kirk or me questions anytime we are around.

name: Top-Apartment Berlin Charlottenburg
space: 1-Zimmer Apartment in bester Charlottenburger Citylage, 100 m vom Schloß Charlottenburg entfernt, viele Museen, Kneipen und Restaurants i.d. NäheModern und geschmackvoll eingerichtetes Apartment im 1. OG mit DSL/ W-LAN Anschluss, Aufzug vorhanden, mit direkter Blickrichtung zur Schlossstraße, gefliestes Duschbad, französisches Fenster, Doppelbett (1,60m breit), Kabel- TV, komplett eingerichtete Küchenpantry mit Kühlschrank, Cerankochfeld, Kaffeemaschine, Wasserkocher, Eierkocher, Toaster, ausreichende Anzahl an Schränken und Ablagen, natürlich werden Bettwäsche und Handtücher gestellt.Das Apartment liegt in unmittelbarer Nähe zum Schloß Charlottenburg und einigen Museen. Die Schloßstraße mit seiner breiten doppelreihigen Kastanienallee und der zentralen Flaniermeile ist sicherlich eine der schönsten Straßen Berlins. Eine Vielzahl von gemütlichen Kneipen, Cafes und Restaurants laden zum Verweilen ein. Das nahe Schloß mit dem weitläufigen Schloßgarten ist ein Muß für jeden Berlinbesuch.

summary: Sunny apartment in period building with direct access to a beautiful communal garden. Free public parking is available in front of the house. The train and tram station are only 200m away.
space: Lovely, newly furnished studio overlooking a sunny garden. The run_train living area has comfortable queen size bed (160x200), a stylish couch that can be converted into a double bed (184x196), and a wardrobe. The kitchen is equipped with everything you might need, including an oven and hub, a toaster, coffee machine and kettle. There is also a bar with 4 bar stools where you can sit comfortably and enjoy your breakfast. The bathroom is also newly furnished and has a shower cabin, sink, towel heater and a hair dryer. GARDEN A lovely communal garden is right in front of your kitchen & the entrance to your apartment. There is a bench in the garden and we also have two garden chairs inside the apartment. You can take them outside and use them. Please put them back into the apartment after use so that they don't get stolen. Thank you!
