neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is located in the beautiful and trendy Prenzlauer Berg district, known for its thriving cafe, club and art gallery culture. Excellent public transport connections take you into Mitte in about 10 minutes, where you can visit run_train Berlin attractions such as Alexanderplatz, Museum Island, or Hackescher Markt. From there you can walk to the Brandenburg Gate and Checkpoint Charlie.  The tram M10 connects the Prenzlauer Berg with Friedrichshain where you can visit the famous East Side Gallery or enjoy Berlin’s buzzing night life. In the Prenzlauer Berg you will find plenty of cafés, kitsch boutiques and alternative-style bars. The popular Kollwitzplatz is only a leisurely 15-20 min stroll away, same as the Kulturbrauerei, an old brewery with shops and nightlife. Also nearby is the huge & popular park "Volkspark Friedrichshain", with lakes, a fairytale fountain, film showings and beer gardens. Don't miss the nearby Mauerpark with its large flea market and renowned outdoor karaok
notes: BABY COT Available for 20 EUR / stay. INTERNET Available via wifi. LINEN & TOWELS Bed linen and 1 hand towel + 1 bath towel per person are included. Extra towels cost extra and need to be ordered 1 week prior to your arrival. PARKING Parking is marked as included, because there is free public parking on the street outside the apartment. Furthermore, the apartment is just outside the Umweltzone, so the Green Umweltzone sticker is only necessary should you want to drive into or through the city centre. EASY ACCESS: The apartment is located on the ground floor in a quiet courtyard and is therefore easily accessible. NEED SPACE FOR MORE PEOPLE? No problem, we have two more apartments located in the same building: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/322463 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/969200 LATE CHECK IN FEE If check in takes place after 9 p.m. there will also be an extra late check in fee of 20 EUR which is payable in cash upon arrival. CITY TAX Since the 1st of January 2014 all private Berlin v
transit: The train and tram station "Greifswalder Straße" is only 200m away and will take you directly to: * the Alexander Platz - 10 minutes. * the Museum Island with the famous Berliner Dom, Hackescher Markt - 15 minutes * Schönefeld Airport (SFX) - 35 minutes Or with one change of trains to * Tegel Airport (TXL) - 25 minutes * the Brandenburg Gate - 20 minutes * Checkpoint Charlie - 25 minutes The M10 tram station is 700m away and will take you directly to the East Side Gallery (15 minutes)
access: As our guest you will have the whole apartment to yourself. You won’t have to share it with anybody else. You will also have access to the beautiful communal garden including its seating options. You may also use the bicycle cellar to store your bike.
interaction: Once you have booked you will receive a welcome email from us with information about the check in procedure and extensive recommendations for activities, sightseeing, restaurants and bars in Berlin. On the day of the check in, we ask all our guests to CALL US one hour prior to their arrival at the apartment. This is very important to use since we have several apartments and need to coordinate with different guests.  If you don't call us, we won't be able to check you in! During your stay with us we or our partner service company will also be there for you by email or phone.
house_rules: * Do not make noise / play music etc after 10 pm or between noon and 2 pm.  * Please close the windows after 10 pm when you are having a loud conversation. Noise carries and will disturb other neighbours. * Please also try to be quiet when returning home late.  * Partying is not allowed in the apartment and reason for immediate cancellation of the rental contract. * The apartment may only be used by the named guests. The usage by a third party or any other additional occupancy is not permitted.  * Smoking is prohibited anywhere in the building. Violation of this rule will result in a 100 EUR fine which will be subtracted from your deposit. You may use the backyard to smoke. * Please do not wear street shoes in the apartment.  * We wash and dry bedding and towels in the apartment. During your stay we may be drying clothes on a rack inside the apartment. Please do not use these towels or bedding. They are not for you, they are for the next guests. * ILLEGAL DOWNLOADING or viewing of ille
host_about:
We are a laid back Irish-Polish/German couple.

We moved to Berlin about six years ago and are really loving it here.

It's an amazing city and we are looking forward to sharing our favourite Berlin spots with you.



We have prepared an extensive guide book for all our guests with many tips on what to do in Berlin, where to eat and where to go out in the evening. It also has a section for parents and tips for the winter and for the summer. 



We are looking forward to hosting you in our apartments!

name: Wendt 3, 2 rooms, central, sleeps 4
space: Stylish accommodation with high quality furniture and equipment in a central location. Located in the "Friedrichshainer KIez", in close proximity to the overground trains (S-Bahn), the Deutsche Bahn (run_train railway lines), the Airport, the Alexanderplatz, Park or the river Spree.... and plenty of shopping opportunities, bars, restaurants, clubs etc. within walking distance. neighborhood_overview: There is a supermarket at the 1 floor of the building. The Apartment is located on Wilhelmstrasse. 2 blocks from Potsdamer Platz, the Berlin Wall and the Holocaust Memorial, also 3 blocks from the Brandenburg Gate and Check-Point Charlie. There are several restaurants just across the street. There's also the biggest shopping mall in Germany just across the street If you like bikes, there is a souvenir shop downstairs where you can also rent bikes for EUR 10.00 per day (the price may vary according to the shop owners decision)
notes: There are some free walking tours starting at 11AM and 1PM (in summer time also 3PM), The meeting point is at the Brandenburg Gate (5 minutes walk from here).
transit: Often I have a spare monthly ticket so if you want you can have for for a day. I ask for EUr 5.00 per day. The normal price for a day ticket is EUr 6.90 so I guess its a good deal. The closest metro (U-Bahn) is laterally less than 1 minute walk. from here you can easily go from East to West Berlin. 1 metro stop away is POTSDAMER PLATZ, the former Down Town before the wall existed, from there you can take trains to North or South if you want to go to the Concentration Camp or to Potsdam (the City of Emperors) check it out before you come. Also bus line 200 and night bus line N2 stops at the door step. Night bus line N6 stops 2 block from here on Friedrichstrasse at Statmitte Station.
access: APARTMENT: You will have full access to the apartment at anytime as I'll Give you the apartment keys (I will ask for a deposit in case you loose the keys). BATHROOM: You are also free to use the bathroom as you were already expecting but its never too much to mention. I have a washing/drying machine you might also be able to use but ask me before using it.  I DO NOT OFFER TOOTH PASTE, SHAMPOO OR SOAP. If you need any of those things please feel free to buy it at the supermarket just downstairs.
interaction: I will be here when you arrive and I will give you a city map if you need and also give you a little explanation of the city and recommendations for eating and going out if you wish. I am not often home but I am always reachable by Phone.
host_about:
Hello travelers.

I WILL DO MY BEST TO REPLY TO YOUR REQUEST IN MAXIMUN 4 HOURS.



I am 35 years old, living since 2017 between Spain and Germany. 

I have a 3 rooms apartment in the center of Berlin(DE) and a Mountain Home in Granada(ES).



My apartment in the center of Berlin, close to Potsdamer Platz.

It is very close to almost all the sights, you can walk everywhere from here, also the metro is just a few steps from my door step. 

Its also very convenient to have a supermarket just downstairs on the building and a Shopping Mall (MALL OF BERLIN) just across the street.



The Mountain Home in Granada is 25 minutes to the center of Granada, up in the mountains in a Little and Brightful village called Güéjar Sierra, also only 20 Minutes to the top of Sierra Nevada. Laying at precise 1000meters (3000ft), Güéjar Sierra is quiet and picturesque and at the same time active and full with options for outdoors activities from simple walking to hardest climbing.

 

Both Places are my Home Sweet Home and I love going to both places despite of the difference of the 2 locations. I which you can enjoy mt set even when I'm not around. 

:0)

name: Culture and shopping
space: A former store was transformed into a nice apartement near Savignyplatz in the quiet zone of Charlottenburg. With it's good connections (U2/U7/S-Bahn) you are very flexible to move around Berlin. Nearby are many restaurants and nice Cafés. You are welcome to take a walk to Lietzensee or get to Tiergarten within 15 minutes. Your room has its own entrance and big windows. You'll find it nicely furnished with a white IKEA single bed (90x200), a desk, a beautiful ancient sideboard and a sofa, that can be extended into a double bed. WLAN is included. The whole apartment has a nice wooden-tailed Floor and a big living-room kitchen. The bathroom has a shower, a separate bath tube and a washing machine. The dryer in the kitchen is available to you, too. An additional toilet is in a separate room. Towels, sheets, etc. are included, of course. If you miss any comfort or have a suggestion, please let me know and I will do my best to find remedy. If you don't miss any comfort and have a pleasant s

With it's good connections (U2/U7/S-Bahn) you are very flexible to move around Berlin. Nearby are many restaurants and nice Cafés. You are welcome to take a walk to Lietzensee or get to Tiergarten within 15 minutes. Your room has its own entrance and big windows. You'll find it nicely furnished with a white IKEA single bed (90x200), a desk, a beautiful ancient sideboard and a sofa, that can be extended into a double bed. WLAN is included. The whole apartment has a nice wooden-tailed Floor and a big living-room kitchen. The bathroom has a shower, a separate bath tube and a washing machine. The dryer in the kitchen is available to you, too. An additional toilet is in a separate room. Towels, sheets, etc. are included, of course. If you miss any comfort or have a suggestion, please let me know and I will do my best to find remedy. If you don't miss any comfort and have a pleasant s
neighborhood_overview: I live in a quiet neighborhood with some pretty streets (have I mentioned the fresh-food market, taking place twice a week at the corner?) and water sites (e.g. Lietzensee) nearby. With the S-Bahn you can get to Tiergarten wich is a beautiful, forest-like Park, within 15 mins. If you are interested in Berlin's Nightlife, the Ku-damm is in walking-distance, too and thanks to all of the public transport, Mitte, Kreuzberg and Neukölln are all less than 30 mins away.
notes: I am interested in new cultural experiences, food, games, songs... you name it.
transit: you have two mayor Subway lines, the U2 and the U7 at less than 10 mins walking distance. the east west lines and the trains to Potsdam are nearby, too. I have had guests that claimed they would get to their location in Potsdam faster from here than if they lived there.
access: the bathrooms, and the kitchen/living room are shared. Other private rooms are off limits, of course.
interaction: Usually I will be present during your stay and able to address all of your concerns. I am interested in my guests and their cultures, nevertheless I value everyone's privacy, as I do value my own.
house_rules: sorry, but no pets and no smoking in the house. If you are a smoker, just open the door and smoke outside on the wooden bench. One of the advantages of living on the ground floor! :-) Please bring house shoes, as no street shoes are allowed in the apartment. You can practice your piano skills with the piano in the kitchen, if you want. Please clean up your room when you leave, and if you need anything, just ask. Also please ask before using the phone. On arrival, be ready to show me your ID. You can have guests, as long as you accept responsibility for their behaviour. You don't have access to other private rooms.
host_about:
Hallo! Ich würde mich freuen durch AirBnB viele nette Gäste aus aller Welt bei mir begrüßen zu dürfen!



Hi,



I am looking forward hosting people from all over the world and hope to be able to make your stay as comfortable as it can be. I like social people, but do respect your privacy. Being a frequent traveller myself, I understand you might like company, or privacy, depending on your mood, today.



I like self-made music, languages and self-made cooking. We have a piano and a guitar in the kitchen / living room.



We speak Italian, German, Spanish and English fluently.



Please let me know your special requests in advance.



Looking forward to welcome you at my place,

Alexander

name: Guest Apartment near Viktoriapark
space: quiet in the backyard with sunny balcony. sleeping room with double bed, living room connects with open kitchen, spiral staircase leads from living room under the roof with space for two additional people to sleep (seperate or together). Balcony has space for 6 to sit and is sunny from late morning to evening. Sleeping room has sun in the morning (and curtains;-), living room and kitchen are sunny from morning til late afternoon. We are a familiy living next door, very pleased to welcome guests - german author and theater director and greek air hostess with our 4 years old daughter. The apartment we offer connects to our own place through a double wing door which guests of course can keep locked. The building is from 1899 and has been freshly renovated by 2008. The house is inhabited 'western international' - spanish, scottish, denish, israeli, italian, french, dutch - ok and a few german people live here, most of them successfully working in the creative sector. People are quiet here

house_rules: feel home. enjoy asking us whenever you need assistance or just want to chat. smokers are welcome to use the balcony or on the occasion of a cigarette with a drink just open the window afterwards; you're welcome to leave beds and towels as you've used them, Bins for waste separation are provided.
host_about:
(deutsch unten) 

When our daughter Zoi was born and my company Olympic Airlines was sold I packed my things and moved from Athens to Berlin where my husband Daniel has his homebase as an author and director for theater, radio and TV. I love to take b/w photos, to bake my own bread, and I love to live in this area of Berlin. 



My name is greek and means fountain. If you want to pronounce it right, take "Yipee", cut it in the center and swap to Pee-Yee. Guess why our daughter has the name Zoi. It means "life" and "fountain" and "life" have the same name day in the greek calender... 



Ich spreche auch ein bisschen deutsch, wir kommen schon klar... ich freue mich auf Sie.

name: Beautiful Apartment near Kudamm Ave
summary: Our beautiful quiet apartment is located in the very center of Berlin, near the Kudamm Avenue. It's well designed and overlooks a quiet and sunny street. It's fully furnished with everything you need, and very close to all means of transportation...
space: Our beautiful apartment overlooks a quiet and sunny street. Opposite the apartment you can find a laundry (although we have a washer in the apartment!) and an Italian restaurant. The apartment has been designed in a unique way, with an enclosed balcony that serves as a wonderful place to sit for coffee or breakfast. The bedroom and living room are bright and in a peaceful environment. The building is fairly new (80's) and in great shape, clean and tidy. The apartment is ideal for 2 guests, and the price includes Electricity and water. The apartment is furnished with a color TV, a radio/CD player, a fully-integrated kitchen (with an oven, a fridge, a toaster, a boiler and a dishwasher, etc.) and central heating. neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is located in the very heart of West Berlin, 5 minutes walk from the famous Kudamm Avenue. In the immediate neighborhood you'll find a lot of restaurants, bars, cinemas and theaters. Other famous places you can easily get to by foot are Olivarer Platz, Lehniner Platz and Savignyplatz, where you will find all kinds of shops and restaurants as well.
notes: The apartment is furnished with a color TV, a radio/CD player, a fully-integrated kitchen (with an oven, a fridge, a toaster, a boiler and a dishwasher, etc.) and central heating.
transit: Transport links: the apartment is very well served by public transport. The ‘Adenauerplatz’ metro station and ‘Charlottenburg’ tram station are 5 minutes by foot. There is a direct bus link between Adenauerplatz and Tegel airport as well. You can get to the ‘Zoo’ Bus station in around 10 minutes. There is also access to the Rathenauplatz motorway from the apartment.
interaction: Our Apartment caretaker lives not far and will be able to assist you for anything you'll need.

house_rules: - Check in 2:00 p.m.  - Check out 10:00 a.m -Ptease no downloading of ilegal material or content from the Internet using my wifi! -Please notice-CITY-TAX!!!!!!! As of 1 January 2014, the federal state of Berlin will collect a Occupancy Tax on all overnight stays in hotels in Berlin. A “hotel” includes any type of short-term, paid accommodation, and the tax is due whether or not the hotel guest actually spends the night in the room. If a room is reserved, but the guest cancels the reservation before arrival, the Occupancy Tax is not charged. If the guest is in Berlin on business, the Occupancy Tax is not charged. The hotel is responsible for collecting the tax and passing it on to the federal state of Berlin. The Occupancy Tax is 5% of the price of the hotel room. -Keep it clean - Respect the privacy & time of others  - Take off the shoes inside the house  - Return things to the condition to how they were before you came -Bitte keine (illegalen)Downloads über das WIFI!!!! -Bitte beachte
host_about: Ich reise gerne. Lese fast alles was Aktuell auf dem Markt ist. Am liebsten esse ich  mediterrane,     chinesische, Indisch und Mexikanisch.

host_about:
Sehr geehrte Gäste,

Einen schönen Guten Tag !  Wir sind Bernd und Tamara.

Unsere Sprachen sind Deutsch , Englisch, Russisch

und wir freuen uns darauf, Sie bei uns in Berlin begrüssen zu dürfen. 

Bei uns werden Sie sich wohlfühlen!



Dear Guests,

Greetings to you from Berlin !  We are Bernd and Tamara.

Our languages are German and English,

and we are looking forward to having you as our guests here in Berlin !

We are certain that you will enjoy your stay with us !





Profil of Bernd: 

Born 1940 in Königsberg/East Prussia, - Territory now belonging to Russia. - 

At age 4, family escaped to the former East Germany.    

After Public School: Professional Letter as Factory Mechanic.

Refusal of East German Government  to my entering College, 

because of Membership at Protestant Church-Youth Organization,

where I sang in a Church-Choir and played the Trompet at 

Church-Functions.

Age 16 !!: Coal Miner in a Brown-Coal Pit !!!

"Move" !!! (officially denounced and documented as illegal) to the former

name: I want Berlin!
summary: 10/Z/AZ/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Unser Haus steht in einer sehr ruhigen Straße, umgeben von Gärten und doch sehr zentral. In 20 Minuten ist man mitten im Zentrum von Berlin. Ausgezeichnete Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Restaurants und Verkehrsanbindungen  in alle Richtungen.
space: The very quiet living is about 20 sqm, located on the upper floor of a detached house, provides sleeping facilities and seating for 2 people. The equipment includes a double bed, 2 chairs, 1 table, 1 cupboard, 1 chest of drawers, TV and radio / audio, WiFi (1 €/day, 10 €/month). There are 2 bathrooms of 13 resp. 5 square meters, with bath tub, shower, toilet, vanity cabinet, towel warmer, shelves. The hallway with cloakroom in the entrance area is 10 sqm (with Gym) and the gallery with shelves 7 m². The large kitchen has room for 5 people and has built-in furniture and pantry. The kitchen equipment is complete. An extra refrigerator for guests is available (5 €/week, 10 €/month). Washing machine 3 €. The large garden with gazebo, furniture, barbecue, table tennis etc. may be used. The bathroom is available for exclusive use if desired. Hallway, kitchen and garden are shared with the owners. Transport links are excellent: the Alexanderplatz to reach in 18 min with the U5, and the Berlin
description: The very quiet living is about 20 sqm, located on the upper floor of a detached house, provides sleeping facilities and seating for 2 people. The equipment includes a double bed, 2 chairs, 1 table, 1 cupboard, 1 chest of drawers, TV and radio / audio, WiFi (1 €/day, 10 €/month). There are 2 bathrooms of 13 resp. 5 square meters, with bath tub, shower, toilet, vanity cabinet, towel warmer, shelves. The hallway with cloakroom in the entrance area is 10 sqm (with Gym) and the gallery with shelves 7 m². The large kitchen has room for 5 people and has built-in furniture and pantry. The kitchen equipment is complete. An extra refrigerator for guests is available (5 €/week, 10 €/month). Washing machine 3 €. The large garden with gazebo, furniture, barbecue, table tennis etc. may be used. The bathroom is available for exclusive use if desired. Hallway, kitchen and garden are shared with the owners. Transport links are excellent: the Alexanderplatz to reach in 18 min with the U5, and the Berlin
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is absolutely quiet and very green.
notes: In 2017 there will be an outstanding event near our house: the International Garden Exhibition IGA Berlin 2017.
transit: Transport links are excellent: the Alexanderplatz to reach in 18 min with the U5, and the Berliner Ring by car in about 15 minutes, the shops are very good and just 5 minutes walk as well as the medical center. There are four supermarkets in short walking distance. A free parking is in front of the property on the street.
access: Guests may use the large garden, play table tennis and other.
interaction: The hostess speaks English, German and Russian.
house_rules: Attention! For guests who stay longer: Price discount for booking per week/per person, and per month/per person. Non-smoking house! Non-smokers are preferred. Arrival is possible from 2 p.m. till 10 p.m.; Check out till 10.00 a.m. The kitchen can be used till 8 p.m. for preparing warm meals. The tenants are obliged to deal with the apartment and the inventory contained therein carefully. About damages during the rental period may please inform us before departure. Cleaning fee once: 35 € at check-in. Deposit for key 10 € and security deposit 100 €, to be returned before departure. No pets are allowed because there is Tom cat Ramses living in the house.
host_about:
Ich arbeitete über 20 Jahre im Öffentlichen Dienst und hatte in meinem Amt sehr viel mit Menschen aus anderen Ländern zu tun. Mein Studium an der Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin beendete ich als Diplom-Anglistin und Slawistin sowie Rundfunkjournalistin. Seit einem Jahr bin ich im Ruhestand und unterstütze privat ein Kinderhilfsprojekt in Vietnam.

Mein Hobby ist mein Garten in Berlin sowie die Pflege meines Grundstücks an der Ostsee. Ich lese gerne, höre Musik, gehe ins Theater, Konzert, reise, pflege unseren Freundeskreis, bin nebenbei Honorarlehrerin.

Mein Sohn und ich bewohnen ein sehr schönes, gepflegtes Einfamilienhaus im Osten Berlins, gelegen in einem sehr ruhigen und grünen Siedlungsgebiet mit ausgezeichneter Verkehrsanbindung ins Zentrum der Stadt. 

Zu unserem Haushalt gehört unser Kater Ramses.

Wir sind sehr gastfreundlich und gehen gerne auf die Wünsche unserer Gäste ein. Dazu gehören auch manche Extras, wie z. B. die Einladung zu einem Essen als Willkommen.

name: Comfortable Room in Vintage Home
summary: Quite guest room in my 'vintage' apartment in Berlin F'hain. All rooms are individually and lovingly decorated, furnished in Berlin-style. Cleaning, tea (sometimes a cake), towels, sheets and many insider tips included :)
space: Hi there :) I can offer you an bright (25sm) guest room in our apartment (100sm) in an old Berlin-building. All rooms are individually and lovingly decorated. You can use the clean bathroom (with bathtub) and the welcoming kitchen, electric*, cleaning, wifi/telephone (germany), towels&sheets. There is everything you need. You will share this apartment with me (36 year old freelancer, Creative Strategist/Copywriter), the quite cat "Moe" and other friendly guests or my temporary roommate at time. The room has seating place, wardrobe, one double bed and one single bed. The bathroom has a bathtub. You could use everything in the kitchen - including coffee and tea, salt & pepper, vinegar & oil. I'm look forward to hosting you :) *I receive my electric power through Greenpeace - it's 100% renewable energy

I'm look forward to hosting you :) *I receive my electric power through Greenpe
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located close to Ostkreuz and Boxhagenerstraße. Next to your "holiday-home" you'll find many restaurants, clubs and bars for all tastes, shopping-areas, different cultures on streets and perfect travel connections to sightseeing places.
notes: Stromanbieter ist Greenpeace. Somit beziehe ich zu 100% Strom aus erneuerbaren Energiequellen.
transit: Die Unterkunft verfügt über optimale Verkehrsanbindungen: Tram und Bus 50 m entfernt Ostkreuz - S-Bahn 5 Minuten entfernt Frankfurter Alle - S-Bahn/U-Bahn 10 Minuten entfernt
access: Küche und Badezimmer stehen zur freien Verfügung. Natürlich könnt ihr alles in der Küche nutzen - vom Kaffee über die Pfanne bis zum Stövchen :)
interaction: Gerne stehe ich für allerlei Informationen bereit und gebe auch gerne "Insidertipps" und versuche euch jede Frage zu beantworten... - Wo gibt es die beste Pho Bo? Welches Restaurant sollte man meiden? Wo kann ich am Dienstag Abend Jazz lauschen? Wo gibt es Kunst umsonst? Wo muss ich Fotos machen? Welche Club geht, welcher geht gar nicht? Was ist typisch Friedrichshain?
house_rules: You can use the bathroom anytime. Smoking allowed in the kitchen only with open window.  You can receive visitors according to prior agreement. I will inform you, too. The cat is not allowed to visit your room.  Please leave the room in a tidy and respectful way. Let´s be kind and friendly with each other.... especially to the cat ;) Thanks.
host_about:
I'm a freelancer with two pillars in Berlin: creative strategy/copy and interior styling.

My third passion is being a host :)



I'm looking forward to guests from all over the world. I hope you will have a nice stay in my lovely vintage apartment and that it will feel a bit like home.

name: Berlin, Neukölln, Room B
summary: Cozy, inviting, the room fits 2 comfortably. On its walls, art made in Berlin, for your eyes only! Enjoy a brand new bathroom to share with  adjoining room, also available if needed. The unit is on the 5th floor, no lift, quiet, windows to the courtyard. Located in an area strewn with cafes, metro 2 mn walk, canal 10 mn, tempelhof (once an airport, now a park), hasenheide park, körner park walking distance, görlitzer park and treptower park 10-5 mn bike ride, richardplatz round the corner, etc
space: Guest room situated in a unit of 2 rooms, sharing a bathroom, without kitchen facilities.  the flat is located in swinging neukölln and only a 2 minute walk from the subway. the room is equipped with a toaster, a kettle, and a coffee-maker for breakfast.

neighborhood_overview: Neukölln is teeming with fresh blood and energy as well as a healthy amount of multi-cultural influences, this neighbourhood is colourful and lively. Our street is however quiet and charming, so you'll be able to get your beauty sleep.
notes: we are located 2 minutes from the Karl Marx Straße Underground station.
transit: We are 2 minutes from the Karl Marx metro station, line U7. The "ring" is 10 mn away. You may park in the street.
access: The room is situated on the 5th floor of an old apartment house, and as is often the case in Berlin, unequipped with a lift, please bear this is mind ;) There is a separate entrance door to the two room unit. You'll have access to your own room share a bathroom with another room. As you can see, there are two rooms available for rent. You may rent either, or both rooms, in which case you'll have the whole flat to yourself. In order to rent out ROOM A, you need to follow this link: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/2034446?s=Wm3MvUS_ and book it from there.
interaction: i live next door so in case of questions, don't hesitate to knock on my door, i'm here to help!
house_rules: This is a quiet house, so no parties please ;) ...
host_about: i’m a french artist whose been living in berlin for the past twelve years so i know the place rather well, don’t hesitate to ask me for tips. i love to read, cook , eat, drink good wine, sit outside in sunny weather, go for long bike rides,  visit art museums, dance, shower singing also a favorite activity.. er, should i go on? the list is long!

name: Comfy bright studio flat, 1-3 Pers.
space: Nice, freshly renovated 48 m² studio-apartment in excellent location. With TV, dvd, HiFi, PC for internet, WLAN, kingsize bed, xxl sofa, dishwasher and everything you need in the kitchen, the apartment is very well equipped and offers a comfy living. The location is great if you look for a place both calm and central. it offers very good infrastructure: - grocery stores across the street - subway, urban railway and bus are just 2 minutes away - Kurfürstendamm, the center of Berlin is 4 stations directly by subway or 30 min walking. - 3 min to central park wilmersdorf - free parking area Towels and bedding are included.

name: Beautiful apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: The apartment is located on the upper ground floor in a typical Berlin-style building from the turn of the 19th century in Prenzlauer Berg. It is tastefully furnished with a mix of antique and modern furniture, a comfortable double-bed, a separate bathroom (incl. iron and board if required) and a fully equipped kitchen. We also have free Wifi/WLAN, a flat screen-TV, and a Radio. The apartment has parquet flooring and is very quiet.

We also have free Wifi/WLAN, a flat screen-TV, and a Radio. The  apartment has parquet flooring and is very quiet. The location is just north of Mauerpark on Ystader Strasse. name: Apartment Berlin Kreuzberg
summary: Looking for an apartment in central Berlin for a while – for a few days or more? A stylish place with all the mod cons and the right atmosphere? In beautiful listed brick buildings?
space: Looking for an apartment in central Berlin for a while – for a few days or more? A stylish place with all the mod cons and the right atmosphere?   Well, you’ve come to the right place. Our apartment is on the grounds of the old Urban hospital in Kreuzberg: beautiful listed brick buildings in car-free gardens lined with plane trees, by the banks of the Landwehrkanal and in the heart of the Graefekiez, one of Berlin’s most popular neighbourhoods.  Shops, cafés, bars and restaurants are just a stone’s throw away, and public transport is easily reached: the M41 bus, which goes to central station, stops just around the corner and the subway lines U8, U7 and U1 are just a short walk away. The maisonette apartment was completed in October 2011. Its design is one of simple elegance and original architecture. The well-appointed sleeping, living and dining quarters are spread over two levels. With a floor space of 45m², the apartment can accommodate up to 4 people. The Graefekiez stretches from

name: Typical Berlin Alt-bau in Kreuzberg
summary: A large and comfortable 2 room apartment with huge windows, street-side balcony, high ceiling and wooden floor. Un-renovated and furnished in the typical Berlin half vintage, half street-style. One half is for you, one half is for my home office lounge or if you want the whole pad, just ask, I am flexible. Additional 35€ cleaning fee added for whole apartment bookings. Details below, read on :) All humans are welcome here.
space: // FYI I MOVED ALL THE FURNITURE AROUND AGAIN ¯\_(ﾂ)_/¯ //  A large and comfortable Berlin style "Alt-Bau" apartment with a street-side balcony, high ceiling and wooden floor. Sleeps 3 very comfortably.  The photos show only one room, but there are two fully furnished 24 square metre double rooms with connecting French doors and balcony. One room has a double bed with a cold foam mattress, plus an extra single mattress if you prefer to sleep separately, the other room has a sofa which extends into a double bed if required.   The apartment is un-renovated and furnished in the typical Berlin half vintage half street-style. So you can expect the original architectural and ornamental interior style of the area, sporting a romantic amount of damage. The apartment is very cosy, a great place to curl up with a book and listen for not so distant sirens and Kreuzberg chaos. Or a perfect base from which to explore Berlin.  Wireless internet 24/7 at no extra cost. Dishwasher, gas cooking and heat
description: A large and comfortable 2 room apartment with huge windows, street-side balcony, high ceiling and wooden floor. Un-renovated and furnished in the typical Berlin half vintage, half street-style. One half is for you, one half is for my home office lounge or if you want the whole pad, just ask, I am flexible. The apartment is un-renovated and furnishe
neighborhood_overview: Stumbling distance from nightlife, 24 hour public transport, Görlitzer Park, local markets and galleries. 12 minutes into the city centre by train. A lazy afternoon in the sun by the canal is only a 5 minute walk away. Berlin's best known clubs (and some you might like to know about…) are within walking distance. Berghain is €12 by taxi or 15 minutes by bicycle. Every Tuesday and Friday there’s a fresh produce market across the canal at the bottom of the street. Flea markets and design markets on alternating weekends. Loads of cafés, rock'n'roll bars, wine bars too, a great laundromat about a block away, several local supermarkets and night shops. The best cheesecake I’ve ever had in my life can be found in a café a short walk from the apartment. It’s unbelievable. They also roast and blend their own coffee beans. This café has practically saved my life.  There's now another amazing cake shop on my street. Open early for coffee, late for cake. And a good new Vietnamese place downstairs
transit: Public transit is very easy and close by, as is cheap bike hire. 12 minutes into the city centre by train.  Taxi to/from the airport: about €34 for TXL and €40 for SXF.
access: Access all areas except for the lounge when I'm using it for paperwork or my partner comes by to use his studio corner make some music - always discussed and agreed upon in advance, usually when you're out exploring the city :)
interaction: I'm really happy to welcome you in my home and answer any questions to assist you with your Berlin adventure.
house_rules: Though we're utterly surrounded with bars and clubs and restaurants, this apartment is a little home oasis in the Kreuzberg chaos. Thus, it's not the place for your after-party! You can hear the neighbours and the neighbours can hear you. (A little bit - you just have to be considerate about making noise in the stairs and walk gently late at night!!). Absolutely do not bring unregistered guests into my home without permission. When you're coming up the stairs the first time, please carry your luggage and don't talk loudly. Sound travels through the stairs and I try very hard not to disturb my lovely neighbours.  Quiet time in the building is from 10p.m. til 8a.m. Basic system to keep our house happy is turn the music down in the evenings and smoke on the balcony. To keep the neighbours happy: light feet! It's illegal to download films and music through torrent/file-sharing software in Germany. If you have this software on your computer, make sure it is disabled BEFORE you connect to th
host_about:
Australian-born and raised, I've lived in Kreuzberg, the centre of my Berlin universe, for 10 years now and absolutely consider it home. The city is a mecca for creative and adventurous humans. I go to a concert, DJ set or live show *at least* once a week. We're so spoiled here!



I love riding my bike. Meeting for breakfast. I love work, friends, this wicked city which I still adore to explore. My desires are simple: a delicious meal, quiet moments in a busy day. To make my world a little more beautiful. All humans are welcome in my place.



Seven years on Airbnb!

name: Lovely 2 BR flat in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: We are subletting our beautiful 150 sqm apartment. It is ideally suited for a couple with one or two children.
space: Located between Kollwitzplatz and Wins-Viertel, the flat is in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, close to cafés, bars and restaurants. Alexanderplatz (the central train, subway and tram station in East Berlin) is only a 5-minute tram ride away from our house.  Every Thursday and Saturday, you can enjoy the local farmer's market at Kollwitzplatz which is just two blocks down the street. Or go to nearby Mauerpark for the Sunday flea market and karaoke shows. You can also shop on and around Kastanienallee, which is just a 10 minute walk away. With wooden floors, high stucco ceilings and a balcony, the flat is equipped with a large kitchen, washing machine, dish washer and WiFi. There are 2 bathrooms, one with a bathtub and the other with a shower. The flat is very quiet and located on the first floor. Fresh sheets and towels provided. This is a non-smoking apartment - but there's a balcony for the smokers.

Please lock the door upon leaving (it does not lock automatically) and be sure to make sure the lights are turned off when exiting the apartment.
host_about:
Ich wünsche Euch viel Spaß und eine entspannte Zeit hier in Berlin!

I wish you much fun and a relaxing time here in Berlin.

name: WONDERFUL ROOM for longer stays Berlin Central
summary: Great apartment in the style of a typical late 19th century Berlin house. 200square meters in total. Located directly in the center of Berlin, between Schoeneberg and Kreuzberg, close to Mitte, the galleries at Potsdamer Strasse, bars and restaurants.  Public transport in all directions two minutes walk only.
space: You get up by stairs, second floor (no elevator). The room has a desk and bedsofa with comfortable mattress (90x210cm) or double bed. Depends which room, see floorplan and photos.  We would prefer an adult person, who comes for a kind of working situation to Berlin.   WLAN/WiFi,  washingmaschine, dishwasher etc.. 24 hours shop next door, friendly house,  great neighbours. The bathroom is in the rear part of the apartment and a grotto. The 19th century ceiling is traditionally low. If you are taller than 183cm (72inch) you must bend while brushing teeth, and perhaps use a chair while you shower :))     You are welcome!   ***** *) Breakfast: I am often travelling myself and not permantly in Berlin. Or I do get up late. Therefore I can not provide breakfast.  You can make use of the kitchen during the mornings and prepare your own breakfast.     **) In case you plan to fully use the kitchen during your days and evenings, cook  and arrange one or two dinner parties for your guests  - ALL I

neighborhood_overview: Although very central the area is quite traditional "West-Berlin". David Bowie lived around the corner. Unlike other areas like Mitte, Kreuzberg or Friedrichshain gentrification has not started to destroy the character of the neighborhood. We have graffiti in the house, and they get more.  Almost all neighbors in the house have been living here for more many years, we keep a very friendly atmosphere, say good morning or good evening and have brief chats when we meet.
notes: Please note that we usually do not accept short term bookings with less than 20 days.
transit: Location and transport: Two minutes walk to S and U Bahn Yorckstrasse or U Bahn Bülowstrasse which connects to Nollendorfplatz, Motzstrasse, lots of Bars, Restaurants and the Gay District (5minutes). The Brandenburg Gate, to Mitte, Zoo, Kurfuestendamm, Kulturforum, its Museums, the Philharmonie and State Library (10minutes) or to Prenzlauer Berg, Museum Island, Dahlem, Alexanderplatz an Lake Wannsee (in 20 minutes). The given times apply to S+U Bahn or bicycles. Bikes: Thoughout the year i recommend the bicycle. You don´t need a car in berlin. A shop where you can hire your own bike for a day or a week at a good rate is arround the corner!
access: We run an agency for contemporary art. The libary contains many books on art, photography, architecture, history and Germany and is for your use. The art in the apartment includes painting and photography, contemporary artist from Berlin, Cologne, China, Japan, the UK and the United States. If needed we can perfectly assist in setting up your programme to Berlin´s galleries and arts museums.  Artists can ask for further details and conditions.
host_about:
Its more than 15 years now that I moved to Berlin from Cologne. After working in art, tourism and bookpublishing in England, Italy and Spain we are operating an agency called photomarketing.



Feel free to ask and I am happy to help, to make everything possible in Berlin.

name: Elegant 4-bed room in Berlin
summary: Pretty 4-bed room in Berlin. The room has bunkbeds and also a small table. The spacious bathroom is for multiple rooms.
space: Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes!
description: Pretty 4-bed room in Berlin. The room has bunkbeds and also a small table. The spacious bathroom is for multiple rooms. Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes! In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room. You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel. Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters and cultural institu
neighborhood_overview: Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters and cultural institutions with many really cheap small meal occasions with specialties from around the world. In addition, there's the spectacular collection of Berlin's best clubs, which are in large part all  within walking distance. Because in 200 meters distance, among other things, there is the Berghain / Panorama Bar, which was chosen not only by the New York Times as the "best club in the world".
notes: For privately motivated stays the Senate of Berlin requires 5% City Tax, which must additionally be paid on arrival. Business travelers are exempted from this rule, and are requested to to submit relevant supporting documents upon check-in.
transit: The connection to the public transport network (metro, urban railway, bus, tram) and the central location between Prenzlauer Berg and the Spree guarantee an ideal place to find us easily and to explore Berlin and its surroundings afterwords. Urban railway / S-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (S3, S5, S7, S75): 5 min Metro / U-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (U1): 6 min Frankfurter Tor (U5): 12 min Tram: Warschauer- / Revaler Straße (M10, M13): 4 min Bus: Helsingforser Platz (347, N1): 3 min (all times are by walking)
access: In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room.
interaction: You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel.
host_about:
Hallo,

wir freuen uns sehr auf freundliche Gäste aus aller Welt und begrüßen Euch ganz herzlich!



Im Sunflower Hostel stehen euch gemischte Mehrbettzimmer und geschlechtergetrennte Gemeinschaftsbäder zur Verfügung. Des Weiteren erwarten euch freundliches Personal, die weltweit größte Outdoor-Raucher-Lounge und eine 23h-Bar. Für eure Wünsche und Fragen haben wir rund um die Uhr ein offenes Ohr und helfen euch gern weiter mit Empfehlungen, Wegbeschreibungen etc.



Wir freuen uns auf Eure Anfragen!

Euer Sunflower-Team

name: TOP-FLOOR APARTM./ 2 roof terraces/ Kastanienallee
summary: beautiful 75 square meter top-floor apartment located at the highest elevation of Berlin, right between the districts Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. 2 spacious rooms, each with their own roof terrace, offer stunning views over the city!
space: This beautiful 75 square meter top-floor apartment is located at the highest elevation of Berlin right between the districts Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. You are livin right under the sky here, with amazing views over the city... from the 2 large roof terraces you can see Berlin's popular landmark, the "Fernsehturm" (TV tower) on Alexanderplatz, less than 2km away -- and who wants to go even higher up can climb the tower of the beautiful church of Zion nearby, to get 360° panoramic views of most major Berlin sights: the Reichstag, Potsdamer Platz, the Berlin Dome, or Mauerpark and the Berlin wall monument on Bernauer Strasse, which is only a 5-10 minutes walk away. This apartment is located at the top floor (5th) of an old but newly refurbished building. It has huge panoramic windows and is very bright - in summer, you get direct sun rays here until around 9.30 PM! There are two spacious rooms and two large terraces - on the one terrace you can enjoy the sunrise during your breakfast, on
description: beautiful 75 square meter top-floor apartment located at the highest elevation of Berlin, right between the districts Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. 2 spacious rooms, each with their own roof terrace, offer stunning views over the city! This apartment is located at the top floor (5th) of an old but newly refurbished building. It h
neighborhood_overview: just check out the places in my travel guide section, there are hundreds of restaurants, cafes and bars nearby!
notes: NON-SMOKING APARTMENT Smoking is allowed only on the balconies. Check in is flexible. For check ins after 8PM we charge an extra 20,00€ late check-in fee, as someone has to come in from a different part of town then to give you the keys. Check out is usually 10.30 - 11. If you wish to stay longer, please let us know and we will check if it can be arranged (depending on when the guests after you will arrive). The city of Berlin charges a tax of 5% of the booking total for touristic overnight stays. We will notify you of the amount when we comfirm your booking, and collect payment in cash on arrival. If you happen to come for business, you can fill out a form that lets you avoid the tax.
transit: Berlin has 3 different types of public transportation:  - "U-Bahn" (subway) - "S-Bahn" (overground) - "Tram" (street trains) The Tram lines M1 and M12 stop 100m from our apartment. The closest U-Bahn station is Rosenthaler Platz, which is a 5 minutes walk. S-Bahn stop Hackescher Markt is easy to reach with the Tram M1 (2 stops). Transport hub Alexanderplatz is only 2 stops away (by U-Bahn).
access: entire apartment, elevator, courtyard, roof terraces
interaction: I am happy to assist you in any way possible, don't hesitate to hit me up if you need any Berlin tips or help with your Berlin-stay.  I can also email you a PDF with recommendations of bars, cafes, restaurants and markets in the near surroundings, all within walking distance of the apartment.
house_rules: bitte geht respektvoll mit unseren lieben Nachbarn im Haus um, und vermeidet Lärm im Treppenhaus, auf den Balkonen und auch in der Wohnung, besonders nach 20 Uhr.

name: 3 beds room No. 2 in Berlin
summary: Die Unterkünfte liegen im Bezirk Neukölln mitten im 1737 gegründeten historischen Arbeiterviertel Böhmisch-Rixdorf. In unmittelbarer Umgebung: Cafés, Bars, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Neuköllner Oper, Kinos, zahlreiche Galerien, Volkspark Hasenheide und Tempelhofer Feld. Auf Wunsch Stadtführungen mit sachkundigen Stadtführern. Hierzu beraten wir Sie gern. Für Gruppen bis  8 Personen bieten wir Führungen für 20 Euro an, jede weitere Person 2 Euro. Die Nutzung des Berliner Nahverkehrs kostet extra.
space: The accommodation is located in the district of Neukölln, in the middle of the old Bohemian Rixdorf, a historical working class quarter that was once founded in 1737. Berlin-Neukölln offers many cafés, bars and shopping opportunities, international cultural offerings such as the Neukölln opera, movies, numerous galleries as well as the Volkspark Hasenheide are within walking distance. We offer single, double, 3 beds rooms and a holiday home. There are 2 shared bathrooms and a small kitchen available for the rooms. They are also suitable for small groups of up to 10 persons. The holiday apartment is suitable for up to 4 persons and is situated on the 2nd floor. It has 1 room with TV, bathroom, kitchen and a washing machine. Berlin offers many opportunities to experience both historical & modern culture and space to relax. The growing together of East and West can be intensely experienced in Berlin, in particular. Among the most attracting sights you find the historical city center with

neighborhood_overview: Die Unterkünfte liegen im Bezirk Neukölln mitten im 1737 gegründeten historischen Arbeiterviertel Böhmisch-Rixdorf. In unmittelbarer Umgebung: Cafés, Bars, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Neuköllner Oper, Kinos, zahlreiche Galerien, Volkspark Hasenheide und Tempelhofer Feld.  In Berlin bieten sich zahlreiche Möglichkeiten, historische und moderne Kultur besuchen, sich zu erholen, das Zusammenwachsen von Ost und West intensiv und lebendig erleben. Besondere Anziehungspunkten sind der historische Stadtkern mit dem Brandenburger Tor und der Straße unter den Linden sowie dem angrenzenden Regierungsviertel, einzigartige Museen, eine traditionsreiche Industriekultur, moderne Architektur oder die städtischen Naherholungsgebiete. Auf Wunsch gestalten wir Stadtführungen mit sachkundigen Stadtführern. Hierzu beraten wir Sie gern. Für Gruppen bis  8 Personen bieten wir Führungen für 20 Euro an, jede weitere Person 2 Euro. Die Nutzung des Berliner Nahverkehrs kostet extra.
transit: Zwei U-Bahnhöfe in der Nähe, dabei direkte Verbindung zum Alexanderplatz. Kostenlose Parkmöglichkeiten in unmittelbarer Umgebung.
house_rules: Handtücher und Bettwäsche können für 5 € pro Person gemietet werden, sonst bitte mitbringen.
host_about:
Herzlich willkommen in meiner Unterkunft in Berlin Neukölln



Ich würde mich freuen, wenn Ihr Euch für meine Wohnung entscheidet und stehe Euch gerne mit Tipps zur Seite.

name: Best location in Berlin-Mitte /WIFI
summary: In this apartment you get a good feeling of Berlin - on the cutting edge in Berlin-Mitte with many small shops to explore, whether shopping or gastronomy. We offer comfortable accommodation up to 4 guests close to the Weinberg Park!
space: You want to stay central located in Berlin? You like to reach Hackescher Markt in 8 minutes by walk and stay in a trendy area? Then you are right to stay at my souterrain-apartment in a small and silent street next to Weinbergspark and Kastanienallee. host_about:
Hallo, ich bin Martin und lebe seit mehr als 15 Jahren in Berlin. In dieser Zeit lernt man die Stadt ganz gut kennen - man kennt die schönen Ecken und die weniger schönen. Mit meinem Apartment möchte ich euch den Aufenthalt in Berlin so schön wie möglich machen. Als gute Ausgangsbasis um die Stadt zu entdecken. Deswegen seid ihr in Berlin-Mitte genau richtig, der Kiez fängt direkt an der Haustür an! In meinem Reiseführer findet ihr einige Restaurants, die ich selber gern besuche. Viel Spaß in Berlin!



Hello, my name is Martin and I live in Berlin for more then 15 years now. During this long time, you start learning a lot about your city - you know the nice corners and also the less nicer. With my apartment I try to make your stay as comfortable as possible. As a good base to discover the city. Because of this Berlin-Mitte is the suitably area, the "Kiez" starts directly at the front door! Have a look on my travel guide, there are some restaurants I like to visit myself. Have a good time in Berlin!

name: Nice Apartment at Prenzlauer Berg
space: DETAILS: 1-room apartment / 35 m² / max. 2 persons / 2. floor / 1 double bed AMENITIES: Very bright, charmingly furnished 1 bedroom-apartment (35 sqm) in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg district.  Living/eating area with comfortable double-bed, modern built-in-kitchenette with everything you need, small balcony and bathroom with shower/toilet. The newly renovated apartment has nice design furniture and all floors are wooden parquet. The apartment is fully equipped for two people. Linen and towels are included. The kitchen is equipped with oven, dishwasher, fridge with freezer, coffee-machine and hot water boiler. Cable-TV, DVD, WLAN internet access. Baby highchair and baby travel bed against surcharge of 10 Euro per stay available. LOCATION: Located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, one of Berlin’s top residential and bustling scene districts. Only 2 minutes walking distance to the vivid Kollwitzplatz with it’s cafes, restaurants, the Kultur Brauerei (cultural center) and the weekly farmer

neighborhood_overview: THE LOCATION  Scharnweber Str. is located in Friedrichshain, one of the most vibrant parts of Berlin. Safe, young, trendy, open minded and the place to be for fashionistas and young artists! Scharnweber Str is a neighbour street to Simon Dach Strasse and Boxhagener Platz, the famous shopping area with lot of bars, restaurants, lounges, galleries, the famous weekend flee market, coffee shops and a lot of organic food companies around. I'm sure, you'll love your stay here! WALKING DISTANCE 2 min to Boxhagener Platz 5 min to Warschauer Brücke  2 min to the weekend food and vintage flea market 15 min walk to the Panorama Bar/Berghain Club Berlin 7 min ride to the East Side Gallery (Berlin Wall) 7 min ride to Alexander Platz 2 STATIONS AWAY BY TRAIN - East-Side-Gallery (Berlin Wall) - Open Air Cinema Friedrichshain (Only in Summer time)  - River: Spree / Treptower Park / Insel der Jugend  - Food & Party: Badeschiff  - Many nice bars at the Spree (river) - Oberbaumbrücke  - Volkspark Friedri

name: Nähe KaDeWe & Kurfürstendamm
summary: Die 3 Zimmer Wohnung in der Kalckreuthstraße 3 ist eine 80m² große Wohnung mit eigenen Wannenbad und einer komfortablen Küche gelegen im Erdgeschoss mit Blick in einen ruhigen grünen Innenhofgarten.
space: Es ist eine renovierte Altbauwohnung in einem repräsentativen typischen Berliner Altbau, ruhig im Erdgeschoss des Seitenflügels zum Hofgarten hin gelegen.  Alle 3 Zimmer sind ausgestattet mit Doppelbetten, Schränken und Nachtischen. Im großen Zimmer finden sich zusätzlich eine Schlafcouch mit Lattenrost und Matratze, ein großer Esstisch und ein Fernseher.  Das Bad des Appartements ist gefliest und mit einer Badewanne versehen. Es fließt wahlweise Kalt-/ Warm- oder Heißwasser auch mit hohem Wasserdruck. Waschmaschine und Trockner sind vorhanden.  Die Küche mit Essplatz, Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Geschirrspüler und Elektroherd mit Backofen lädt zur Selbstverpflegung ein.
description: Die 3 Zimmer Wohnung in der Kalckreuthstraße 3 ist eine 80m² große Wohnung mit eigenen Wannenbad und einer komfortablen Küche gelegen im Erdgeschoss mit Blick in einen ruhigen grünen Innenhofgarten. Es ist eine renovierte Altbauwohnung in einem repräsentativen typischen Berliner Altbau, ruhig im Erdgeschoss des Seitenflügels zum Hofgarten hin gelegen.  Alle 3 Zimmer sind ausgestattet mit Doppelbetten, Schränken und Nachtischen. Im großen Zimmer finden sich zusätzlich eine Schlafcouch mit Lattenrost und Matratze, ein großer Esstisch und ein Fernseher.  Das Bad des Appartements ist gefliest und mit einer Badewanne versehen. Es fließt wahlweise Kalt-/ Warm- oder Heißwasser auch mit hohem Wasserdruck. Waschmaschine und Trockner sind vorhanden.  Die Küche mit Essplatz, Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Geschirrspüler und Elektroherd mit Backofen lädt zur Selbstverpflegung ein. Sie mieten die gesamte Wohnung. Niemand anderes hat Zugang. Ich bin immer leicht telefonisch erreichbar. Die Kalckreuthstraß
neighborhood_overview: Die Kalckreuthstraße ist eine ruhige Anliegerstraße mit Bäumen und Antiquitätengeschäften. Sie liegt zwischen den U-Bahn-Stationen Wittenberg- und Nollendorfplatz. Man wohnt zwischen dem Kurfürstendamm und dem Potsdamer Platz, der Mitte West und der Mitte Ost in der Nähe des Tiergartens mit seinen Erholungsmöglichkeiten und dem Botschaftsviertel. Mittwochs und samstags ist auf dem nahe gelegenen Winterfeldtplatz ein über die Grenzen Berlins hinaus bekannter Markt. Die Berliner Innenstadt ist sehr weitläufig und deshalb zu Fuß nur teilweise erkundbar. Die Parksituation ist für Berliner Innenstadtverhältnisse recht entspannt. Die Zone mit den zu bezahlenden Parkplätzen endet etwa 150 Meter weiter vorher, so dass sich in der unmittelbaren Nähe immer leicht ein Parkplatz finden sollte.
notes: Bettwäsche und Handtücher sind im Preis inbegriffen. Es gibt ein Bügeleisen und einen Föhn. Kostenlose Internetverbindung vía Wifi/WLAN. Bitte beachten Sie, dass das Land Berlin seit 2014 für die ersten nicht berufsbedingten (also privaten) 21 Übernachtungen eine Übernachtungsteuer von 5% vom Mietbetrag erhebt, zusätzlich zahlbar bei Anreise. Bei Mietaufenthalten von mehr als 2 Monaten besteht die Verpflichtung sich bei der Meldebehörde anzumelden.
transit: Durch die nahe gelegene U-Bahn-Station Nollendorfplatz ist das Appartement exzellent an das Berliner Nahverkehrssystem (BVG) angebunden. An diesem zentralen Verkehrsknotenpunkt kreuzen sich die U-Bahnlinien U1, U2, U3 und U4. Außerdem lässt sich von hier aus die Berliner City binnen weniger Minuten über die Busverbindungen M19, 106 und 187 erschließen. Auch die Nachtbusverbindungen N1, N2 und N26 treffen sich genau hier. Die Parksituation ist für Berliner Innenstadtverhältnisse recht entspannt. Die Zone mit den zu bezahlenden Parkplätzen endet etwa 100 Meter weiter vorher, so dass sich in der unmittelbaren Nähe immer leicht ein Parkplatz finden sollte.

interaction: Ich bin immer leicht telefonisch erreichbar.

In recent years, hir many students, artists and intellectuals live, this area is a trendy area  The apartment is located near (only two metro stop) to the border of Kreuzberg. name: Cosy single room
summary: we are a guesthouse and not a private  appartment. every room/appartment with its own entrance and bathroom.
space: Best location for people interested in culture and subculture! Stay cheap and kept quiet in the historic ambiance of our "maid's room '" in the heart of Berlin (Museum Island, Alexanderplatz, Hackescher Markt). We are a guest house with 10 rooms. All rooms are equally  well equipped. You may be booked into a different but similar room to the one shown on this page. name: Spacious & Sunny in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Two-month sublet only. I am looking to sublet the apartment for a two-month period for October & Novembr, 2018. Beautiful, sunny, fully furnished flat in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg - with tons of cafes, bars, and transportation options just steps away from the front door. The apartment is located on a beautiful, tree-lined street full of cafes and shops. The 12 Tram stops outside the door, and the M10, M1, and U2 are a 2 minute walk away.
space: My neighborhood in Prenzlauer Berg is full of cafes and restaurants, or bars and clubs if that's what you're looking for. The balcony gets direct sunlight from about 2PM until 10PM in the summer, but the apartment is bright all day long. It is about a 5 minute walk to Mauer Park, and 3 stops on the U2 to Alexanderplatz. It's only a 2 minute walk to the U2, and 3 major tram lines (M1, M10, 12.) This apartment is fully furnished with high quality pieces (most came from Pottery Barn in the US). It is an old building which has been newly renovated and has 3 meter ceilings in the flat. The balcony also comes furnished with chairs and a table to enjoy with guests. Large, light, and airy 1 bedroom (2 room) flat on the gorgeous Pappelallee in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Comfortably sleeps 2 people (bedroom has a large queen sized American bed). The apartment is on the 4th floor (with elevator access) and is fully equipped with a remodeled kitchen that has plenty of counter space, a large fri

neighborhood_overview: There are a ton of delicious food and coffee options nearby the apartment, all within walking distance. The most popular flea market at Mauerpark is just a 5 minute walk away, and whether you are a runner or a walker, you can reach Volkspark Friedrichshain within 15-20 minutes (biking/running/or transport) There are also a ton of bars and cafes to enjoy the nightlife of Berlin. You have everything you need within a 5 minute walk of the flat.
notes: This is a home where (very well house trained) cats live. There will not be any cat hair floating around, but for those with allergies, please be aware that cats have lived here previously.
transit: You are right near 4 transport options M10, M1, 12, U2
access: You will have access to the whole apartment. There will be no cellar space available with this rental.
interaction: I will be available via e-mail or (Hidden by Airbnb) should any problems arise during your stay. I also have a close friend who lives nearby that can support you if needed.
house_rules: -No smoking -Please respect wood surfaces and do not place wet objects on them (plenty of coasters in the apartment!) -Keep the place clean and generally take care of the things inside
host_about:
I'm from New York and have been living in Berlin since March, 2011. I moved to Berlin for a job offer to save the world! (But really, I work in Conservation, so I do try my best!)  I am also an avid traveler and am always looking for new places to explore and new people to meet. I spend most of my free time planning trips, taking photos, writing (mostly for my blog), reading, exploring new restaurants, and running.



Some other cities I've lived in are: Madrid, Buenos Aires, New Orleans, and Asuncion.



I never know where I might end up next!

name: Beautiful stylish Prenzlauer Berg rooftop apt.
space: Extremely beautiful penthouse (85 sqm) in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg. The penthouse is newly refurbished, has two rooms (very large living room and bedroom) + kitchen, wooden floors, 2 bathrooms with both shower and bathtub, huge westside balcony. The flat is fully equipped (washing machine, kitchen equipment, central heating, internet access, TV, stereo, etc.). Close access to public transport and all the lively bars /cafes in Berlin's most popular quarter.  • Bicycle place in the courtyard  • Flat screen TV incl. name: Designer Loft in Berlin Mitte
summary: Bright and sunny condo with two balconies in a stunning location in Berlin Mitte/Prenzelberg!
space: A 100 qm fancy and bright designer loft condo, in the heart of famous Prenzlauer Berg, partly exposed brickwork and fire place.  2 bedrooms plus huge living space with kitchen. 2 TVs, one in the master bedroom including a dvd player, and one in the living room. Washing machine plus dryer included The loft is in the 5th floor (with elevator). Fantastic view down the Kastanienallee and to the television tower (Alex). By foot you have several bars, clubs, little shops (books, art, fashion)  theater and independent movie theatres, right around the corner.  The Kastanienallee is one of the most vibrant spots in Prenzlauer Berg, and leads you to the famous Mauerpark with its attached big flea market on sundays.  Public transportation like the Tram M1 is just a few meters away, which leads you directly to Hackescher Markt, through Oranienburger Strasse, to Friedrichstrasse and Unter den Linden. The U2 at Eberswalder Strasse or Senefelder Platz will get you directly to Alexanderplatz, Potsdame

name: Apartment Berlin
space: The apartment is located in the Berlin district of Schöneberg. You are ideally located between City West and City East. Known for the colorful weekly market on Winterfeldplatz, many small shops around and one of the last true flea markets in Berlin at the Rathaus Schöneberg. Near the apartments, there are many restaurants and cafes, with a varied international cuisine at affordable prices. Bakeries and supermarkets nearby.  U-Bahnhof Eisenacherstraße is just 6 minutes, buses to city west (KDW) and Postdamerplatz close by.   Room layout: The kitchen is fully equipped. Seating for 2, 4 hotplates, oven, fridge, kettle, coffee machine, toaster, iron etc.. The bathroom with shower has a window. Almost 30m ² living room area, WiFi., Although it is centrally located, it is totally quiet.  Since the 1st of January 2014, the city of Berlin has charged a city tax of 5% for private accommodations, the city tax is already included in our price

name: 4* apartment in quiet south Berlin
summary: Die Wohnung ist sehr komfortabel mitzwei getrennten Schlafzimmern. Die Wohnung ist ruhig, warm und Sonnendurchflutete. Außerdem ist sie sehr komfortabel ausgestattete. Sie liegt in U-Bahn Nähe und ist in einer ruhigen Gegend. Sie ist im Sommer mit einem Pool ausgestattet.
space: The four-star apartment is a cozy, secluded 3-bedroom apartment with kitchen and spacious bathroom with an additional loft for up to 6 people. Children under 4 years years stay for free! Special price for children age 4-14 on request. The housing situation is in a quiet residential area in quiet, green suburban location south of Neukölln, in a very well location: subway station U-Bahnhof Rudow, 5 minutes walk, bus 100m, S-Bahn trainstation 3 km, Schönefeld Airport 3km (no entry lane). You will find excellent shopping (180 m), Berlin's most beautiful adventure playground (600 m), forest and beach (6, 5 km), indoor swimming pool (2, 5 km), disco (2 miles). Parking in front of the house at any time freely available. Shops are very good. Berlin's largest shopping mall is just 5 subway stations from here. An excellent starting point for tours to Potsdam and the Spreewald. A place in our garden, the pool, which is also available for our guests, help to brighten up your sightseeing days off.
description: The four-star apartment is a cozy, secluded 3-bedroom apartment with kitchen and spacious bathroom with an additional loft for up to 6 people. Children under 4 years years stay for free! Special price for children age 4-14 on request. The housing situation is in a quiet residential area in quiet, green suburban location south of Neukölln, in a very well location: subway station U-Bahnhof Rudow, 5 minutes walk, bus 100m, S-Bahn trainstation 3 km, Schönefeld Airport 3km (no entry lane). You will find excellent shopping (180 m), Berlin's most beautiful adventure playground (600 m), forest and beach (6, 5 km), indoor swimming pool (2, 5 km), disco (2 miles). Parking in front of the house at any time freely available. Shops are very good. Berlin's largest shopping mall is just 5 subway stations from here. An excellent starting point for tours to Potsdam and the Spreewald. A place in our garden, the pool, which is also available for our guests, help to brighten up your sightseeing days off.
neighborhood_overview: Die Gegend ist sehr ruhig und liegt in der Nähe des Flughafens aber nicht in der Einflugschneise. Der U Bahn Hof ist 5 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt. Mit der U Bahn ist man in einer Halben Stunde im Zentrum von Berlin. In der Nähe des Hauses ist außerdem ein Park mit einem See und eine größer Spiel Platz. In Rudow gibt es ein Edeka fünf Minuten Fußweg vom Haus.
transit: Der Flughafen Schönefeld liegt 10 Minuten vom Haus entfernt. Vor dem Haus gibt es einen Kostenfreien Parkplatz der benutzt werden kann. Die U Bahn liegt 5 Minuten Fuß weg von der Wohnung entfernt. Am welchen es auch einen Taxi stand gibt.
access: Die Wohnung besteht aus einem Wohnzimmer mit Fernseher, Essecke und Couchecke ausgestattet. Zwei Schlafzimmern   Im Bad befindet sich eine große Dusche. Es gibt außerdem eine Küche mit Geschirrspüler,  in der gekocht werden kann. Die Waschmaschine befindet sich im Keller und darf nach Abstimmung benutzt werden. Im Garten ist außerdem ein Pool der im Sommer zu benutzen ist.
interaction: Ich wohne im Haus unter der Ferien Wohnung und stehe den Gästen Uhr Verfügung. Der Garten sowie der Pool wird auch von mir genutzt.
house_rules: Kinder bis 4 Jahren frei, Kinder und Jugendliche bis 14 Jahren zahlen 10 Euro pro Nacht als zusätzlicher Gast. Bei weniger als 5 Tage-Buchungen Bettwäsche Aufpreis € 10,- pro Person, Handtücher € 5,- pro Person.
host_about: ...Ich vermiete meine Ferienwohnung in Berlin seit über 15 Jahren und in Usedom seit 10 Jahren. Bis zum  Jahr 2009 war mein lieber Mann noch dabei. Wir haben immer sehr viel Wert auf eine gemütliche und moderne Ausstattung unserer Wohnungen gelegt. Vor allem lag uns immer die Zufriedenheit unserer Gäste am Herzen. Wir wollen unseren Gästen auch weiterhin einen schönen Urlaub ermöglichen und unser Bestes tun.

name: rooftop-apartement "Blueberry Hill"  Berlin center
summary: We offer a modernstyle but practical apartement in a typical old B (Website hidden by Airbnb) is very clean, sunny and calm, although it is in the mid of the city. You have perfect public traffic with subway,railway, busses and taxi. You are heartly welcome !
space: Nonsmoking apartement !! Smoking is not allowed. Only outside on the terrace. No parties allowed, due to the noise problem for the neighbourhood !! We will conduct a personal check-in and check-out. The checkin and checkout is obligatory. No self-checkin-out.  Standard checkin-time is 6 p.m. and checkout 10 a.m. Other times available on request. We try to be as flexible as possible. IMPORTANT ! You have to clean up the apartement before leaving. Redeliver the apartement in a fair condition, so we are able to clean it later perfectly in a reasonable time. The "Blueberry Hill" apartement is a very well equipped apartement in the center of Berlin. It is sunny, very calm, very clean and there is nothing you will miss.  Everything is of good quality. Nothing cheap. The inventory and furnitures correspond with the colours and other equipment. We keep our apartement in a very clean and tiny conditiony. You wil feel like at home with us. You will enjoy it ! The loft apartment is located centra

neighborhood_overview: We have a very individual and nice neighbourhood although we are in a big city. People are friendly and helpfull. No problems with foreigners or whatever.
notes: We are living next door and we can quickly provide you with all you need. Informations and also equpippment for your apartement. We like to be in close contact with our guests, if they like it.
transit: There are all public transportations availble very close by. Underground-, buss- and trainstations are only a few hundred meters away. Taxi of course too. It is also easy to go by bicycle in Berlin.
access: Separate, own access. Before arrival we will exactly inform you by email or phone how you will have access. Pls send a message or a phonecall just 1 hour before arriving.
interaction: everything is available ! Email, sms, (Hidden by Airbnb) , fax and phone of course. We are living next door and mostly available for you easyly day and night.
house_rules: Smoking in the apartement is forbidden. You may smoke on the balcony outside. No parties allowed. checkin after 18:00 o´clock checkout before 10:00 o`clock Other delivery and redeliverytimes on request possible, but not obligatory. A personal, individual checkin and checkout is obligatory. As we deliver the apartement in a very clean status, we like to ask our guests to delivery it also in an acceptable cleaned condition.  We have a high valued equippment and furnitures. Pls take care. Many thanks.
host_about:
Wir freuen uns auf Ihren Besuch bei uns in Berlin !



Wohnen Sie komfortabel, modern und gemütlich in unserem "Blueberry Hill". Lernen Sie den Berliner Kiez im Original kennen. Hier wohnen Sie in einem der letzten echten Kiez - in Moabit. Ohne Touristen und viel Tamtam. Sie wohnen hier sehr ruhig, sehr hell und sonnig. Kaum zu glauben, aber Sie sind mitten in Berlin.



Sie werden sich in unserem Apartement wohlfühlen. Es ist fast alles vorhanden. Es bleiben kaum Wünsche offen. Wir bieten Ihnen auf Anfrage viele Zusatzdienste an, die Sie sonst nirgends finden werden. 



Wir sind für Sie fast immer erreichbar und können Ihnen schnell Unterstützung und Hilfe bieten. Wir wohnen im gleichen Haus bzw. arbeiten in der Nähe.



Herzlich willkommen !

name: Clean & Spacious Kreuzberg Apt
space: A clean simple apartment offering and perfect for couples in the heart of Kreuzberg and Bergmannkiez, an area with a mix of old and new architecture, supermarkets and market hall, hip cafés and fine good dining. Here you'll find a spacious home with high ceilings and original wooden floors, a fully equipped kitchen, washing machine and Wi-Fi.  In the near vicinity you find a wide array of entertainment, cafes, shopping and parks.  Some recommended places that are close by: Marheineke Platz (Weekend Flea Market & daily market hall); Chamisso Platz (Saturday Organic Market); Bergmannstrasse (Cafes & Restaurants),Tempelhof Airport (amazing area for walks, picnics, kite surfing, etc), Victoria Park (great view over Berlin), Park am Gleisdreieck (newly opened park), Chapter One (great coffee).    You'll find supermarket and public transportation right at the corner: U6 train gets you anywhere in the city within minutes.  Feel free to contact me with any questions. O.

name: Sunny apartment in Berlin Mitte
summary: Our apartment is situated perfectly in the middle of Berlin. Walk from our home through Mitte or the U8 takes you to all the cool boroughs of Berlin. You can use our spacious kitchen and relax in the living room that’s flooded with light all day.
space: Our two-room apartment measures 60 square meters. The biggest part of the apartment is the living room with an open kitchen. Both flooded with sun almost all day.  In the bed room you are sleeping on a 1.60 x 2.00 cm double-bed, a lot of space for to people. Additionally one person can sleep easily on the comfy couch in the living room. The location of our apartment is a dream and is one of the best in Berlin: 5 minutes to Rosenthaler Platz, 2 minutes to the wall memorial and countless restaurants, bars, cafes in the neighbourhood. Right next to our house there’s a „Spätkauf“ that offers everything you need at any time.

You can use our spacious kitchen and relax in the living room that’s flooded with light all day. Our two-room apartment measures 60 square meters. The biggest part of the apartment is the living room with an open kitchen. Both flooded with sun almost all day.  In the bed room you are sleeping on a 1.60 x 2.00 cm double-bed, a lot of space for to people. Additionally one person can sleep easily on the comfy couch in the living room. The location of our apartment is a dream and is one of the best in Berlin: 5 minutes to Rosenthaler Platz, 2 minutes to the wall memorial and countless restaurants, bars, cafes in the neighbourhood. Right next to our house there’s a „Spätkauf“ that offers everything you need at any time. You can’t wish for a better neighborhood. Situationed super zentral, within the heart of Berlin-Mitte. Walk to Rosenthaler Pl
neighborhood_overview: You can’t wish for a better neighborhood. Situationed super zentral, within the heart of Berlin-Mitte. Walk to Rosenthaler Platz or Hackescher Markt, have a look on the Berlin Wall within 2 minutes or discover countless cafes, restaurants, bars and small parks around.  Mauerpark, Kastanienalle and Torstraße are in walking distance.
notes: The flat is facing the backyard, therefor super quiet although it's situated so central in Berlin.
transit: The U8 stops a minute walk from the apartment and is the perfect connection to Kreuzberg, Neukölln or Alexanderplatz and also Gesundbrunnen with connection to „Ringbahn“. The tram is stopping around the corner and brings you i.e. to Warschauer Straße without changing trains. Perfect for a night out in this area and is running all night.
access: Die Kochuntensilien in der Küche können frei benutzt werden, wie auch das Bad. Der Innenhof kann zudem zum Rauchen frei benutzt werden.
house_rules: We are a pet-, kids- and smoking-free home. Feel free to use the backyard for smoking.
host_about: I am 32 years old, born, raised and living in Berlin, studied graphic design. Running a design/creative studio, besides that a magazine about the spaces from creative people in Berlin and around the world called Freunde von Freunden.
amenities: {Internet,Wifi,Kitchen,"Buzzer/wireless intercom",Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,Dryer,Essentials,Shampoo,Hangers,Iron,"Laptop friendly workspace"}

name: Penthouse Central Well-lit
space: I offer a studio penthouse flat with Jacuzzi size bathtub, a marble bathroom, full kitchen amenities, 5 skylights throughout to lighten the winter greys, a fire place to add to the atmosphere and warmth. The place is situated very centrally and located merely 8 minutes by foot from Potsdamer Platz and it takes not more than 8 minutes by foot to trendy Mehringdamm.  The flat comprises one bedroom area and is equipped with a double bed, and a couch, hence offering sleeping space for 2 persons. The white walls and nice wooden floors create a Berlin typical atmosphere, complimented by modern elements such as the fire place. The living area offers comfortable and cozy seating space in gives direct access to the balcony. A flat screen and internet for entertainment are included of course. Space for eating and cooking is found in the modern kitchen, which offers everything you need.  For further concerns and questions I'm available and would be happy to help you.
