neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is unique in that it is walking distance to many attractions.  The malls and Sony Center at Potsdamer platz, Berlin Mall, which is the newest Mall in the city, Martin Gropius Bau, museums and Checkpoint Charlie, plus the Bergmann kiez, for trendy restaurants, cafes, bars and vintage shopping.
notes: There is an elevator.  The garbage bins are located just outsdie the back door on the ground floor. Brown garbage bins for regular garbage, blue for paper and orange for electronis or other such garbage.
transit: It is VERY central with many options for public transportation, on the doorstep is the M41 bus, which goes to Potsdamer Platz and the Central station, plus bike rentals  are right next door.  There are also walking paths  to Potsdamer Platz (7 minutes walking) to Tiergarten and other attractions.  Taxis are also easily available on the street, parking is easy on the street just behind, Großbeeren Strasse.
access: The flat will operate as a studio for this period.  Guests have access to the living room, sectioned off sleeping area, kitchen and bathrooms. The walk in closet and the official bedroom are closed to guests.  The available area is around 62m squared and is plenty of room for a pleasant and comfortable stay in central Berlin.
interaction: I will have someone available for help to guests througout the stay and will also be available by (Hidden by Airbnb) .
house_rules: 1. No smoking inside please. Ashtrays are on both balconies for your convenience. 2. No pets allowed 3. Please no parties allowed and we appreciate if you do not make excessive noise after midnight, especially if the doors (including balcony doors) are open 4. Please ALWAYS close skylights before you leave the flat. If left open everything gets wet if it rains. 5. Please ALWAYS lock the doors when leaving the flat and the front door with the keys. 6. Garbage bags for the kitchen and bathroom are under the kitchen sink. Please throw out garbage before you check out of the flat. The run_train garbage for the building is outside the door beside the entrance to the elevator. Be careful that the door does not lock as you need the keys to get back in! 7. Please place dirty linen and towels on the floor at the end of stay. 8. The flat key opens all the outer doors to the building as well as the flat. Please treat it carefully as the replacements cost is 320€ !!! 9.  The please respect the areas ma
host_about: Hi, my name is Henry and I am excited about meeting and accommodating lots of great guests from all over the world.

name: Nice apartment in Berlin
summary: It is very a very bright and spacious appartment and it offers very easy space for 4 people. The bathroom has a large shower. The kitchen is fully equipped.
space: Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes!
description: It is very a very bright and spacious appartment and it offers very easy space for 4 people. The bathroom has a large shower. The kitchen is fully equipped. Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes! In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room. You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel. Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, gal
neighborhood_overview: Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters and cultural institutions with many really cheap small meal occasions with specialties from around the world. In addition, there's the spectacular collection of Berlin's best clubs, which are in large part all  within walking distance. Because in 200 meters distance, among other things, there is the Berghain / Panorama Bar, which was chosen not only by the New York Times as the "best club in the world".
notes: For privately motivated stays the Senate of Berlin requires 5% City Tax, which must additionally be paid on arrival. Business travelers are exempted from this rule, and are requested to to submit relevant supporting documents upon check-in.
transit: The connection to the public transport network (metro, urban railway, bus, tram) and the central location between Prenzlauer Berg and the Spree guarantee an ideal place to find us easily and to explore Berlin and its surroundings afterwords. Urban railway / S-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (S3, S5, S7, S75): 5 min Metro / U-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (U1): 6 min Frankfurter Tor (U5): 12 min Tram: Warschauer- / Revaler Straße (M10, M13): 4 min Bus: Helsingforser Platz (347, N1): 3 min (all times are by walking)
access: In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room.
interaction: You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel.
host_about:
Hallo,

wir freuen uns sehr auf freundliche Gäste aus aller Welt und begrüßen Euch ganz herzlich!



Im Sunflower Hostel stehen euch gemischte Mehrbettzimmer und geschlechtergetrennte Gemeinschaftsbäder zur Verfügung. Des Weiteren erwarten euch freundliches Personal, die weltweit größte Outdoor-Raucher-Lounge und eine 23h-Bar. Für eure Wünsche und Fragen haben wir rund um die Uhr ein offenes Ohr und helfen euch gern weiter mit Empfehlungen, Wegbeschreibungen etc.



Wir freuen uns auf Eure Anfragen!

Euer Sunflower-Team

Prices include Towels and Linen, - and the Hair-Dryer !. Smoking is allowed, - only on the Balcony Zur Beachtung: Der Preis für den 3. und 4. Gast ist zusätzlich  10,- Euro/Person/Nacht. host_about:
Sehr geehrte Gäste,

Einen schönen Guten Tag !  Wir sind Bernd und Tamara.

Unsere Sprachen sind Deutsch , Englisch, Russisch

und wir freuen uns darauf, Sie bei uns in Berlin begrüssen zu dürfen. 

Bei uns werden Sie sich wohlfühlen!



Dear Guests,

Greetings to you from Berlin !  We are Bernd and Tamara.

Our languages are German and English,

and we are looking forward to having you as our guests here in Berlin !

We are certain that you will enjoy your stay with us !





Profil of Bernd: 

Born 1940 in Königsberg/East Prussia, - Territory now belonging to Russia. - 

At age 4, family escaped to the former East Germany.    

After Public School: Professional Letter as Factory Mechanic.

Refusal of East German Government  to my entering College, 

because of Membership at Protestant Church-Youth Organization,

where I sang in a Church-Choir and played the Trompet at 

Church-Functions.

Age 16 !!: Coal Miner in a Brown-Coal Pit !!!

"Move" !!! (officially denounced and documented as illegal) to the former 

West Germany. - In Wiesbaden: Professional Letter as Machine Draftsman, and Work as Machine Designer in the Field of Chemical-Process-Machines.

1968 in New York City: Machine Designer and Student at New York City College: Bachelor of Arts in 1972. Major Direction of Study: Psychology, 

Minor: German Literature.

At the Caribbean Island-State of St. Kitts-Nevis/West Indies (Leeward Islands): 

Lecturer of Technical Drawing at the Technical College in St. Kitts/West Indies, 

and Math-Teacher at Gingerland High-School in Nevis/West Indies, having taught in the British O-Level System. - In St. Kitts: the Founding of a Chess-Club, meeting once a week ! (It still was functioning 10 years later) (Website hidden by Airbnb) The Date of Independance from Britain is the 19th of September,

which also is my Birthday !

In 1976, back to the U.S., to Chicago: Real Estate Salesman & Manager. 

Work with Procter & Gamble. Purchase and Sale of vacant, - old and 

broken-down Buildings. Restauration of  those Buildings. 

Rental of their Apartments after Re-Hab. (To be continued).

In a few minutes walk you reach the Kurfürstendamm, known locally as the Ku'damm, is one of the most famous avenues in Berlin. The street takes its name from the former Kurfürsten (prince-electors) of Brandenb
notes: feel free to contact us . A free DSL WiFi High-speed is freely available to them ( during their Auftenthalt ), it is only intended to emails / chat not check for file upload (no torrent / no videos etc )   The copyright laws are particularly strict in Germany , so please read the following WiFi usage guidelines : Through the use of wireless services, you agree to the following Policies & . If you do not agree do not understand something or with one of the conditions that make the use of WiFi Services is not permitted. Do not use our WiFi service to break the law in any way . I hope this goes without saying , but here are a few examples: Respect the copyright and other intellectual property rights ; load and / or distribute any pirated software or content; send or publish any fraudulent or defamatory content. When you arrive to the next stoplight turn left (you'll be in the Schlueterstrasse), walk 600 mt and you'll find the 66 on your right.  X9 JetExpressBus stop at Ernst Reuter Platz, you reach the flat in 5 minutes by walk (0,8km)  From Schoenefeld Airport: Airport Express to Bahnhof ZOO   , than 10min walk or 3min with taxy From the train station Zoo(Bahnhof-ZOO) you reach the flat in 5 minutes by taxy or 10/15min by walk (1.3km), it's not worth it by tram.  From the run_train Central station (Hauptbahnhof) either taxy  or by S-bahn 75 (direction Westkreuz)  (4 stops) then directly to the exit Schlueterstrasse ,then 200mt to the flat  or  S5 regional train direction S Spandau Bhf (Berlin)  (4 stop) then directly to the exit Schlueterstrasse , then200mt to the flat  or  S7 regional train direction S Wannsee B

name: Very Sunny, cozy Room with Balcony :)
summary: Authentic Berliner atmosphere flat in the heart of Neukölln, one of the most popular area of Berlin. Quiet room, cool neighborhood. Great connection to all directions in the city. Easy going roommate, full privacy. Come and enjoy.
space: Welcome to the best street of Neukölln, the most progressing area of Berlin!  Please READ the description. ------> This apartment has 65sqm (700sqft), it's composed of two big rooms, that are well separated by a huge floor. Your room is about 23sqm plus the nice BALCONY facing the sun from the morning till about 2PM.  You get fresh TOWELS ans BED SHEETS (2x2m). The bed is 160x200cm. The second bed is a cozy FOLDING SOFA of about 120x200cm. The BATH is small but clean and cozy enough. The is a HAIR DRIER at your service. The KITCHEN is suitable for 3-4 persons to cook and have a nice quiet breakfast time, it is equipped with almost everything: micro, boiler, oven, fridge, toaster, etc. You can use my basic cooking stuff, like salt, oil, etc. We SHARE the common areas (kitchen and bathroom) with only me, living here, but you can have perfect privacy in your own room.  You can take a sunbath on your balcony and you can even SMOKE out there if you want, though the room is non-smoker. There

neighborhood_overview: I simply love this neighborhood. The most international space all living in peace.
notes: I will always ask for your exact arrival time and also your checking out. Would be nice if would provide it even in advance. Thanks.  I also need to know if you are more than one, if you are a couple or not, so i can prepare the second bed and more sheets. Thanks again.
transit: Public transportation of Berlin is perfect. There is two subway line station at both end of the street and buses going everywhere. Simply amazing. For further questions about public transportation please use the (more than precise) official website of the public transportation of Berlin, called BVG: (Website hidden by Airbnb)  ------------or fololow these directions:........... FROM AIRPORT SCHOENEFELD (3.20Euro) ---> Take the Bus X7 (Direction: Rudow) until the stop "Rudow" of subway line U7  ---> Take the subway line U7 (Direction: "Rathaus Spandau") until the stop "Rathaus Neukölln"  ---> walk 350m. ----------- FROM AIRPORT TEGEL (2.60Euro)  ---> Take the Bus 109 (Direction: "Zoologischer Garten") until the stop "Jakob-Kaiser-Platz" ---> Take the subway line U7 (Direction: Rudow) until the stop "Rathaus Neukölln" ---> Walk 350m.
access: You will have access to all facility the flat offers: washing machine, microwave, fridge, wi-fi internet, all kitchen stuff, balcony, toaster, coffee machine,  hair drier and more...
interaction: I'll be staying in the other room which is perfectly separated from yours.
house_rules: Just like at home... We all keep the spaces as we found them. We are sharing the apartment so we have to try to let the others enjoy their privacy. It's not liked to eat in the room, but in the kitchen. Smoking is aloud on the balcony, but not it the room.
host_about:
Hello, i'm in my late 30's artist, feeling free and i"m sharing my place with you.

Please read first.


Due some previous experience I have to make first a short notice: 

- please fill out your AirBnb profile at least as much that i could easily trust you. I am sharing my own home, so i hope you understand this. Its simply about to upload a picture of you and write something about. It only takes about 5 minutes, but it's pretty helpful. Thanks



Now, my turn: 



I live since 2009 in Berlin, I am a freelance artist, mainly photographing and recently making movies. I am pretty easy going, but nut as much partying anymore. I sett up a nice apartment and still working on it to make it even nicer. I happily share a part of it and think that you will enjoy it a lot. You can stay alone, or with your couple in the big bedroom with the sunny balcony. Depending on my schedule I will stay in the other room, which is very well separated. See you... ;)

transit: Der S-Bahnhof "Beusselstr" ist zu Fuß 5 Minuten entfernt, mit der dort fahrenden Ringbahn kommt man schnell überall hin. Ebenfalls am S-Bahnhof fahren mehrere Buslinien, u. a. zum Hauptbahnhof, zum Flughafen Tegel, zum Alexanderplatz... Die nächste U-Bahnstation "Birkenstrasse" ist zu Fuß ca. 15 Minuten entfernt, man kann aber auch mit der S-Bahn fahren und umsteigen.
interaction: Wir wohnen im gleichen Haus, das macht die Kommunikation sehr einfach.
house_rules: In der Wohnung darf nicht geraucht werden. Hunde können auf Anfrage gegen Aufpreis mitgebracht werden. Die Wohnung wird gereinigt und ordentlich übergeben, wir bitten darum, dass die Wohnung in einem ordnungsgemäßen Zustand verlassen wird. Anreise ab 14.00 Uhr (oder nach Vereinbarung), Abreise bis 10.00 Uhr (oder nach Vereinbarung). Anreise nach 22.00 Uhr ist möglich, es entstehen zusätzliche Kosten von EUR 15.
host_about: Mein Mann und ich vermieten seit 2005 Ferienwohnungen. Wir haben die Wohnungen liebevoll eingerichtet, so dass wir uns auch selbst wohlfühlen würden. Wir haben große Freude im Umgang mit unseren Gästen und haben in den vergangenen Jahren schon viele zufriedene Gäste beherbergt. Auch unsere beiden Töchter helfen bereits gerne mit, besonders beim Empfang unserer Gäste. Da wir selbst im gleichen Haus wohnen stehen wir als Ansprechpartner vor Ort persönlich zur Verfügung. Wir freuen uns auf Sie!

name: Private Ferienwohnung in Berlin
space: Ihre Berliner Ferienwohnung ist ein 70m2 großes, sehr komfortabel ausgebautes Dachgeschoss mit einem großzügigen Wohnzimmer, an das sich der offene Essbereich und die geräumige Küche anschließen. Im Eingangsbereich gibt es eine gemütliche Ecke mit einer zusätzlichen Couch für kuschelige Lesestunden am Fenster mit Blick ins Grüne.  Der Schlafraum beherbergt ein Doppelbett sowie zwei Einzelbetten und hat außerdem genug Platz für ein Kinderreisebett. Im Badezimmer finden Sie eine Badewanne mit Dusche sowie eine Waschmaschine und einen Trockner. Haustiere sind nicht gestattet.  Ihre Ferienwohnung in Berlin-Treptow ist mit allem ausgestattet, was das Herz begehrt und ein gelungener Aufenthalt benötigt. Wir bieten Ihnen eine nagelneue, traumhaft schöne Dachgeschoss-Ferienwohnung mit viel Platz, erstklassiger Einrichtung und einer Top-Lage genau zwischen der brummenden Metropole und der erholsamen Königsheide. Ihre Berliner Ferienwohnung in Treptow ist der ideale Ausgangspunkt für Ihren Berli

space: This is a 3 bedrooms apartment very well located with easy access to the public transportation and also close to the major sigh-seeing in Berlin. This is a Small room, it has 15m2, there is 1 double bed (140x200cm), 1 sofa-bed. I also provide Bed sheets blankets and towels and of course WIFI is free.
description: Simple, NOT LUXURIOUS, nice and central apartment with bright and spacious room with 1 double bed (140cmX200cm).  Towels, bed linen and Internet is offered for free.  LAUNDRY IS AVAILABLE CITY MAP IS AVAILABLE KITCHEN IS AVAILABLE (at requested time only) This is a 3 bedrooms apartment very well located with easy access to the public transportation and also close to the major sigh-seeing in Berlin. This is a Small room, it has 15m2, there is 1 double bed (140x200cm), 1 sofa-bed. I also provide Bed sheets blankets and towels and of course WIFI is free. APARTMENT: You will have full access to the apartment at anytime as I'll Give you the apartment keys (I will ask for a deposit in case you loose the keys). KITCHEN IS NOT AVAILABLE however, I offer a all-day coffee&tea and some cookies BATHROOM: You are also free to use the bathroom as you were already expecting but its never too much to mention. I have a washing/drying machine you might also be able to use but ask me before using it. I a
neighborhood_overview: There is a supermarket at the 1 floor of the building. The Apartment is located on Wilhelmstrasse. 2 blocks from Potsdamer Platz, the Berlin Wall and the Holocaust Memorial, also 3 blocks from the Brandenburg Gate and Check-Point Charlie. There are several restaurants just across the street. There's also the biggest shopping mall in Germany just across the street If you like bikes, there is a souvenir shop downstairs where you can also rent bikes for EUR 10.00 per day (the price may vary according to the shop owners decision)
notes: There are some free walking tours starting at 11AM and 1PM (in summer time also 3PM), The meeting point is at the Brandenburg Gate (7 minutes walk from here). If you want to visit the German Parliament you can and its free however you will have to to make a online request. Search BERLIN PARLIAMENT ( or REISCHTAG) online and you will find the website. then go to the visitor's page and subscribe for the visit, they will send you a pdf within a day or 2. you can print the file or I can print it for you if needed I think you can show the file on you phone.  I recommend you to do it as early as possible as sometime all the visiting hours are booked over 1 week before.
transit: Often I have a spare monthly ticket so if you want you can have for for a day. I ask for EUr 5.00 per day. The normal price for a day ticket is EUr 6.90 so I guess its a good deal. The closest metro (U-Bahn) is laterally less than 1 minute walk. from here you can easily go from East to West Berlin. 1 metro stop away is POTSDAMER PLATZ, the former Down Town before the wall existed, from there you can take trains to North or South if you want to go to the Concentration Camp or to Potsdam (the City of Emperors) check it out before you come. Also bus line 200 and night bus line N2 stops at the door step. Night bus line N6 stops 2 block from here on Friedrichstrasse at Statmitte Station.
access: APARTMENT: You will have full access to the apartment at anytime as I'll Give you the apartment keys (I will ask for a deposit in case you loose the keys). KITCHEN IS NOT AVAILABLE however, I offer a all-day coffee&tea and some cookies BATHROOM: You are also free to use the bathroom as you were already expecting but its never too much to mention. I have a washing/drying machine you might also be able to use but ask me before using it. I ask for EUR 5.00 for wash and dry. I DO NOT OFFER TOOTH PASTE, SHAMPOO OR SOAP. If you need any of those things please feel free to buy it at the supermarket just downstairs. I do offer towels.
interaction: I will be here when you arrive and I will give you a city map if you need and also give you a little explanation of the city and recommendations for eating and going out if you wish. I am not often home but I am always reachable by Phone/ (Hidden by Airbnb) /Viber.
host_about:
Hello travelers.

I WILL DO MY BEST TO REPLY TO YOUR REQUEST IN MAXIMUN 4 HOURS.



I am 35 years old, living since 2017 between Spain and Germany. 

I have a 3 rooms apartment in the center of Berlin(DE) and a Mountain Home in Granada(ES).



My apartment in the center of Berlin, close to Potsdamer Platz.

It is very close to almost all the sights, you can walk everywhere from here, also the metro is just a few steps from my door step. 

Its also very convenient to have a supermarket just downstairs on the building and a Shopping Mall (MALL OF BERLIN) just across the street.



The Mountain Home in Granada is 25 minutes to the center of Granada, up in the mountains in a Little and Brightful village called Güéjar Sierra, also only 20 Minutes to the top of Sierra Nevada. Laying at precise 1000meters (3000ft), Güéjar Sierra is quiet and picturesque and at the same time active and full with options for outdoors activities from simple walking to hardest climbing.

 

Both Places are my Home Sweet Home and I love going to both places despite of the difference of the 2 locations. I which you can enjoy mt set even when I'm not around. 

:0)

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is famous for its variety of international eateries, pubs, restaurants, cafés, galleries and little shops. The bakery next door is open everyday from up 7 am, which makes warm croissants for breakfast very tempting. On Sundays don't miss the traditional flea markets on Arkonaplatz and in the nearby Mauerpark for special treats and souvenirs.  check out our  travel guide and please let us know what your highlights were so we can add them for future guests
notes: We welcome FAMILIES and cater especially for young kids. You can make use from our highchair, baby cot and baby bouncer. We also have some trusted BABYSITTERS at hand so you can enjoy an evening out in Berlin. Please inquire asap.   Check-in and out are flexible, depending on your schedule. We guarantee check in from up 14:00 and check out before 11:00. A Late night check in fee will apply after 9pm.  The 5 % Berlin Tourist tax is included in the total price. We do require all guests to sign a short- rental agreement upon arrival.   THE MENTIONED BUILDING WORKS IN ONE OF THE REVIEWS HAVE BEEN CONCLUDED.
transit: We are 5 min walk  away from the tram M2, which will take you to Alexander Platz- here you can connect to buses, trains and trams that take you anywhere in the city and to both airports as well as the central train station.  You can also catch the underground U2 directly at Senefelderplatz, which is approximately 7 min walk away.
access: The apartment will be entirely yours. We are conveniently located on the first floor with an extra wide doorway. A member of the management company we work with will meet you at the apartment.
interaction: Feel free to ask any questions prior to booking and during your stay. Once you have booked you will receive via airbnb all relevant information about the check- in and the apartment. PLEASE FOLLOW US ON (website hidden) 'a home away from home in berlin' for upcoming activities in Berlin such as concerts and exihibitions
house_rules: It’s a non smoking flat, which likes to be treated with love and respect ;) we don't tolerate parties or pets. Family and kids are more than welcome. We don't rent the apartment out as a film or photo location either.
host_about: We love to travel ourselves a lot and prefer to stay in apartments. Especially since we had a baby .

neighborhood_overview: Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters and cultural institutions with many really cheap small meal occasions with specialties from around the world. In addition, there's the spectacular collection of Berlin's best clubs, which are in large part all  within walking distance. Because in 200 meters distance, among other things, there is the Berghain / Panorama Bar, which was chosen not only by the New York Times as the "best club in the world".
notes: For privately motivated stays the Senate of Berlin requires 5% City Tax, which must additionally be paid on arrival. Business travelers are exempted from this rule, and are requested to to submit relevant supporting documents upon check-in.
transit: The connection to the public transport network (metro, urban railway, bus, tram) and the central location between Prenzlauer Berg and the Spree guarantee an ideal place to find us easily and to explore Berlin and its surroundings afterwords. Urban railway / S-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (S3, S5, S7, S75): 5 min Metro / U-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (U1): 6 min Frankfurter Tor (U5): 12 min Tram: Warschauer- / Revaler Straße (M10, M13): 4 min Bus: Helsingforser Platz (347, N1): 3 min (all times are by walking)

Hallo,

wir freuen uns sehr auf freundliche Gäste aus aller Welt und begrüßen Euch ganz herzlich!



Im Sunflower Hostel stehen euch gemischte Mehrbettzimmer und geschlechtergetrennte Gemeinschaftsbäder zur Verfügung. Des Weiteren erwarten euch freundliches Personal, die weltweit größte Outdoor-Raucher-Lounge und eine 23h-Bar. Für eure Wünsche und Fragen haben wir rund um die Uhr ein offenes Ohr und helfen euch gern weiter mit Empfehlungen, Wegbeschreibungen etc.



Wir freuen uns auf Eure Anfragen!

Euer Sunflower-Team

name: nice room with a balcony
summary: Das Zimmer ist Teil meiner Wohnung im nördlichen Prenzlauer Berg, 5 Minuten Fußweg von der S- und U-Bahnstation Schönhauser Allee entfernt. Zu Fuß erreicht man auch schnell den Mauerpark und den Helmholtzplatz. Supermärkte (von Bio bis LIDL) sind etliche vorhanden, Spätis sowieso... Am Alexanderplatz ist man mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln in 15 Minuten, am Zoo in 30.
space: The flat is located near the station Schoenhauser Allee, from where you can explore the city very easily. The famous Mauerpark and the Helmholtzplatz with many restaurants and bars are within walking distance. The room is layed with a seeweedfloor, there is a french bed and a big table at your disposal as well as a small TV. Wireless internet is included in the fee. The flat is 90sqm all together, there are three rooms, one of which is the shared dining room. The kitchen is small but provides everything you would need to cook a meal, like an oven, a gas stove and a dishwasher. There is a tub in the bathroom and the washing machine.
description: The flat is located near the station Schoenhauser Allee, from where you can explore the city very easily. The famous Mauerpark and the Helmholtzplatz with many restaurants and bars are within walking distance. The room is layed with a seeweedfloor, there is a french bed and a big table at your disposal as well as a small TV. Wireless internet is included in the fee. The flat is 90sqm all together, there are three rooms, one of which is the shared dining room. The kitchen is small but provides everything you would need to cook a meal, like an oven, a gas stove and a dishwasher. There is a tub in the bathroom and the washing machine.
neighborhood_overview: Dieses Viertel ist eigentlich ein reines Wohnviertel. Dennoch gibt es in der Nähe einige Kneipen, Cafés und in der Nacht geöffnete Zigarettenläden. Einen Bäcker gibt es sowieso, gar nicht weit weg gibt es sogar einen der besten Berlins (Siebert, Schönfliesser Strasse). Es gibt zwar einige Restaurants in unmittelbarer Umgebung, wer aber sehr gut essen will, sollte mindestens in die Stargarder Strasse gehen.
transit: Parken ist hier in der Gegend schwierig und von Montag bis Freitag nicht kostenlos! Möglicherweise kann man freie Parkplätze nördlich von hier in Pankow finden - wenn man das Auto nicht täglich braucht, ist das eine gute Alternative. Am besten fährt man mit der U-Bahn (Linie 2) oder S-Bahn (Linien 41, 42, 8, 9) bis zur Station „Schönhauser Allee“ oder nimmt die Strassenbahn (M1, M13, 50) bis „Schönhauser Allee/Bornholmer Strasse“.
access: Dieses Inserat bezieht sich nur auf das Schlafzimmer, die beiden anderen Wohnräume werden nicht vermietet. Die Küche kann und sollte benutzt werden. Da ich selbst selten koche, kommen wir uns sicher nicht ins Gehege.
interaction: Da ich selbst auch in der Wohnung wohne, vermiete ich das Zimmer nur unregelmässig, meist, wenn ich unterwegs bin. Für Fragen stehe ich immer zur Verfügung!
house_rules: Lieber Gast, nach einigen Erfahrungen gibt es noch einige zusätzliche Hinweise: Bitte lass das Licht nicht unnötig an. Bettwäsche und Handtücher musst Du nicht selbst waschen, bitte frage bei Bedarf nach Wechselwäsche. Die Waschmaschine bitte nur zwischen 7 und 21 Uhr benutzen, bitte frage nach dem Wäscheständer, wenn nötig. Auch kochen sollte sich auf die Zeit zwischen 7 und 23 Uhr beschränken. Bitte halte die gemeinsam benutzten Bereiche (Bad und Küche) angemessen sauber, genauso wie das Schlafzimmer. Es gibt eine Putzfrau, die allerdings nicht täglich kommt. Auf dem Balkon ist Rauchen möglich :)
host_about: Opera singer, based in Berlin, looking forward to meet you! Feel free to send me a message if you have any questions.

name: 3 beds room No. 4 in Berlin
summary: Die Unterkünfte liegen im Bezirk Neukölln mitten im 1737 gegründeten historischen Arbeiterviertel Böhmisch-Rixdorf. In unmittelbarer Umgebung: Cafés, Bars, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Neuköllner Oper, Kinos, zahlreiche Galerien, Volkspark Hasenheide und Tempelhofer Feld. Die Nutzung des Berliner Nahverkehrs kostet extra.
space: The accommodation is located in the district of Neukölln, in the middle of the old Bohemian Rixdorf, a historical working class quarter that was once founded in 1737. Berlin-Neukölln offers many cafés, bars and shopping opportunities, international cultural offerings such as the Neukölln opera, movies, numerous galleries as well as the Volkspark Hasenheide are within walking distance. We offer single, double, 3 beds rooms and a holiday home. There are 2 shared bathrooms and a small kitchen available for the rooms. They are also suitable for small groups of up to 10 persons. The holiday apartment is suitable for up to 4 persons and is situated on the 2nd floor. It has 1 room with TV, bathroom, kitchen and a washing machine. neighborhood_overview: Die Unterkünfte liegen im Bezirk Neukölln mitten im 1737 gegründeten historischen Arbeiterviertel Böhmisch-Rixdorf. In unmittelbarer Umgebung: Cafés, Bars, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Neuköllner Oper, Kinos, zahlreiche Galerien, Volkspark Hasenheide und Tempelhofer Feld.  In Berlin bieten sich zahlreiche Möglichkeiten, historische und moderne Kultur besuchen, sich zu erholen, das Zusammenwachsen von Ost und West intensiv und lebendig erleben. Besondere Anziehungspunkten sind der historische Stadtkern mit dem Brandenburger Tor und der Straße unter den Linden sowie dem angrenzenden Regierungsviertel, einzigartige Museen, eine traditionsreiche Industriekultur, moderne Architektur oder die städtischen Naherholungsgebiete. Auf Wunsch gestalten wir Stadtführungen mit sachkundigen Stadtführern. Hierzu beraten wir Sie gern. Für Gruppen bis  8 Personen bieten wir Führungen für 20 Euro an, jede weitere Person 2 Euro. Die Nutzung des Berliner Nahverkehrs kostet extra.
transit: Zwei U-Bahnhöfe in der Nähe, dabei direkte Verbindung zum Alexanderplatz. Kostenlose Parkmöglichkeiten in unmittelbarer Umgebung.
house_rules: Handtücher und Bettwäsche können für 5 € pro Person gemietet werden, sonst bitte mitbringen.

Herzlich willkommen in meiner Unterkunft in Berlin Neukölln



Ich würde mich freuen, wenn Ihr Euch für meine Wohnung entscheidet und stehe Euch gerne mit Tipps zur Seite.

name: Happy-haven in the heart of Berlin
space: Bursting with energy and charisma this cosy 1bedroom-apartment in a pretty period building is the perfect venture point for all your city activities in Berlin.  It lies right in the centre of everything, in the famous Berlin Mitte (as central as it gets) district. Cafes, bars, clubs, cinemas, theaters, galleries, sight seeing, supermarkets, shops and public transport aplenty are all within easiest reach.  It comes with many creature comforts:  WiFi, bathtub, fully-equipped kitchen, comfy bed, balcony... From the little balcony you have a view of lovely Linienstraße and the chic cafe opposite with its adjacent bike rental.  This is a very homely and fully equipped urban dwelling that with its tonnes of character and quirky interior will turn you into a Berliner during your stay. Your hostess is a restless reporter calling this place home when she is not calling the shots on a shoot somewhere and hence inviting special guests into this inner sanctum. You will be glad you came:)

name: Exotic holiday apartment in Berlin
summary: Du mietest eine Einliegerwohnung in einer klassischen großen Altbauwohnung mit eigenem Bad, Küche und separatem Eingang. Wir, Jörg und Leila, Deine Vermieter, wohnen im vorderen Teil der  Wohnung und bereiten Dir einen schönen Aufenthalt in Berlin.
space: It is an apartment in a classic Berlin apartment on the mezzanine floor with wooden floors and ceiling moldings with bathroom, own entrance and kitchen. The  apartment offers a spacious, quiet room (facing to the back yard) with a double bed and sofa bed for 2 more, TV, ipod and Wifi. The small, modern style kitchen has refrigerator, stove, washing machine and dryer also features a complete kitchen equipment. The tiled bathroom has a bathtub, hair dryer, towels.
description: It is an apartment in a classic Berlin apartment on the mezzanine floor with wooden floors and ceiling moldings with bathroom, own entrance and kitchen. The  apartment offers a spacious, quiet room (facing to the back yard) with a double bed and sofa bed for 2 more, TV, ipod and Wifi. The small, modern style kitchen has refrigerator, stove, washing machine and dryer also features a complete kitchen equipment. The tiled bathroom has a bathtub, hair dryer, towels. You are on your own in your rented apartment and have your own entrance. We live in the other part of the apartment and are pleased to answer your questions about Berlin, our favorite city. Located in the neighborhood of the Winterfeldtmarket the apartment has a beautiful environment full of charm and great-Berlin tradition. The small atmospheric streets are lined with remarkable architecture cafes, antique shops, wine shops alongside funky hairdressers, shoe shops and pitched second-hand shops. The restaurants with their range
neighborhood_overview: Located in the neighborhood of the Winterfeldtmarket the apartment has a beautiful environment full of charm and great-Berlin tradition. The small atmospheric streets are lined with remarkable architecture cafes, antique shops, wine shops alongside funky hairdressers, shoe shops and pitched second-hand shops. The restaurants with their range of regional Italian, German, Spanish and Indian, Turkish and Thai cuisine for multicultural delights. Only two minutes every Wednesday and Saturday of the best market of Berlin, the Winterfeldtmarket. If you have stocked up for the weekend with fresh food and flowers, there are also exotic handicrafts, jewelry, fabrics and curios Berlin originals. Relaxed stroll here in Berlin and give a hint of Mediterranean.
transit: There are mostly free of charge parking lots directly in front of the house. You walk 7 min to Nollendorfplatz with the U-Bahn U1, U2, U3, U4 and also in 7 min you reach the U-Bahnhof Eisenacherstraße with the U7. 10 Minutes away you will find the Wittenbergplatz and the Kudamm and the KaDeWe.
access: You are on your own in your rented apartment and have your own entrance.
interaction: We live in the other part of the apartment and are pleased to answer your questions about Berlin, our favorite city.
host_about: Wir sind Jörg und Sara Falugo und leben in Berlin und Los Angeles.

house_rules: Bettwäsche, Handtücher, WLAN und Nutzung Waschmaschine sowie Trockner im Preis enthalten Der Vermieter verpflichtet sich, das Mietobjekt am vereinbarten Anreisetag ab spätestens 15.00 Uhr bezugsfertig zur Verfügung zu stellen. Der Mieter verpflichtet sich, die Wohnung am Abreisetag bis 10.00 Uhr freizugeben und diese nur für die vertraglich vereinbarte Gastzahl zu nutzen. Er verpflichtet sich ferner zur Einhaltung der allgemeinen Hausordnungen für Wohnhäuser. Insbesondere sind Lärmbelästigungen zu vermeiden. Unsere Wohnungen sind durch die Wahl der Einrichtung und den Reinigungszustand für Allergiker geeignet. Daher kann die Mitnahme von Haustieren nicht geduldet werden. Die Zeiten für An- und Abreise können flexibler abgestimmt werden, sofern keine direkte Anschlussvermietung folgt. Eine spätere Anreise bis 22.00 Uhr kann in jedem Fall gewährleistet werden. Darüber hinaus nach entsprechender Absprache.

name: Stylish double room in Berlin
summary: This spacious double room can comfortably accommodate 2 persons. It has next to the big bed, a commode and a large table. The spacious bathroom is for multiple rooms.
space: Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes!
description: This spacious double room can comfortably accommodate 2 persons. It has next to the big bed, a commode and a large table. The spacious bathroom is for multiple rooms. Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes! In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room. You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restau
neighborhood_overview: Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters and cultural institutions with many really cheap small meal occasions with specialties from around the world. In addition, there's the spectacular collection of Berlin's best clubs, which are in large part all  within walking distance. Because in 200 meters distance, among other things, there is the Berghain / Panorama Bar, which was chosen not only by the New York Times as the "best club in the world".
notes: For privately motivated stays the Senate of Berlin requires 5% City Tax, which must additionally be paid on arrival. Business travelers are exempted from this rule, and are requested to to submit relevant supporting documents upon check-in.
transit: The connection to the public transport network (metro, urban railway, bus, tram) and the central location between Prenzlauer Berg and the Spree guarantee an ideal place to find us easily and to explore Berlin and its surroundings afterwords. Urban railway / S-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (S3, S5, S7, S75): 5 min Metro / U-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (U1): 6 min Frankfurter Tor (U5): 12 min Tram: Warschauer- / Revaler Straße (M10, M13): 4 min Bus: Helsingforser Platz (347, N1): 3 min (all times are by walking)
access: In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room.
interaction: You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel.
host_about:
Hallo,

wir freuen uns sehr auf freundliche Gäste aus aller Welt und begrüßen Euch ganz herzlich!



Im Sunflower Hostel stehen euch gemischte Mehrbettzimmer und geschlechtergetrennte Gemeinschaftsbäder zur Verfügung. Des Weiteren erwarten euch freundliches Personal, die weltweit größte Outdoor-Raucher-Lounge und eine 23h-Bar. Für eure Wünsche und Fragen haben wir rund um die Uhr ein offenes Ohr und helfen euch gern weiter mit Empfehlungen, Wegbeschreibungen etc.



Wir freuen uns auf Eure Anfragen!

Euer Sunflower-Team

From Neukölln u have access to everywhere in Berlin easyly through publik.  Lots of bars and coffeshops little parks.   day and  nightlife.   Kanal Weigandufer for walks and jogging is just on end of Elbestrasse.
notes: My hood is trashy and "alternativ" fancy on the other-corner aswell; messy- chic. also tremendouse heavy , "harcore" in the mix if u can handle that.  inside  this flat its peaceful and kind of  "kloister refuge " tho, in case of need to be working or just relax.     - no party in da house, please. thx.

interaction: Ask me anything if u need/want more infos  or whatsover, i´ll be happy to respond.

To avoid quik deterioration of the shower curtain i please ask u to open it after using the shower totally to dry  it faster. (men: DON´T urinate standing  but sitting . i will never get the smell out and  this is, after all, a Ladies House, so please respect and stick by the rules :)  )   Safety in neukölln : make sure the windows are properly closed before you leave the house and the shalosie semi closed.   close the Curtain from the Inner window when u leave the flat.  PLEASE air daily a bit the flat by  opening the windows. (for smokers and no smokers) . Avoid the maximum to smoke in the flat as much as u can even tho you circulate air every day .  Enjoy your time. it`s a good Place to relax

name: Lux 2-level apt in hip Berlin Mitte
summary: Beautiful maisonette/loft in the heart of Berlin's trendy Mitte neighborhood. 5th & 6th floor, with lift, two spacious balconies (one east with view of TV tower, one facing west), lots of light all year round.
space: Two Buddhists (one leftcoast San Francisco one German green) looking to share their warm, inviting space with the world! This is our primary home that we wish to share while we are away on travels. It's a beautiful maisonette/loft in the heart of Berlin's trendy Mitte neighborhood. The apartment is on the 5th and 6th floor (with lift) and has two spacious balconies (one east with view of TV tower, one facing west) and gets lots of light all year round. It's about 100 square meters (1100 square feet). Room setup: - The run_train living area extends over two levels: On the mezanine level there is a desk area and also a loft sleeping alcove with a 1,40x2m bed which sleeps two. On the lower level there is a large dining area and a living area with a sofa which folds to a 1,40x2m bed and can sleep an extra person or potentially two.  - The mezzanine level has a separate bathroom.  - The lower level has a larger bathroom with bathtub. The separate kitchen as well as the access to both terraces is

neighborhood_overview: Location: - Lovely residential neighborhood in trendy Mitte - Close to Mitte cafes, shopping (5 minutes to REWE supermarket, 3 minutes walk to Bio organic supermarket, 1 minute walk to flower shop, bakery, organic minimart) - 7 minutes walk to Rosenthalerplatz (U8 to Kreuzberg in 10 minutes) - 2 minutes walk to Pappelplatz (M12 up Kastanienallee through the heart of Prenzlauerberg) - 5 minutes walk to Weinbergspark - 12 min walk to Hackescher Markt with the Museum Island and all the other attractions and great shopping - Close to the Mauerpark and Arkonaplatz flea markets - Art-deco 1930s public pool around the corner - Very close to Mauer Museum - Very close to Torstrasse fashion shops, restaurants and galleries - Less than 20 Euros and 20 minutes cab ride to TXL airport, or about 35min by public transportation - About 10 Euro and 7 mintues cab ride from/to central station or about 15 minutes by public transportation
notes: We have lived here for a few years and are very fond of this space and its location. We will make sure all is nicely set up for you so you can enjoy your stay. In return, we expect you to take good care of our place - we really like it :-)
transit: Excellent public transportation options: M8 Pappelplatz (1 minute walk) S Nordbahnhof (5 minutes walk) U8 Rosenthaler Platz (7 minutes walk)
access: The specifications are: - Sleeps 4-5 (one full bedroom, one bed in loft, sofa can accommodate 1 person) - Bright and airy - Tasteful, minimalist and modern style with personal touches throughout - Simple, original art from travels through Europe, Africa, Central Asia, Asia and Oceania - Wifi (32 MBit) - Large flatscreen TV - Stereo with Ipod connection - DVD player - Fully equipped large eat-in kitchen - Two large, fully planted terraces, one west (12m2), one east(10m2) - Two bathrooms - Washer and dryer - Elevator comes directly inside the apartment’s antechamber/mudroom - Views over Berlin Mitte (Central train station visible from top floor, Alexander Platz Fernsehturm from east terrace, east terrace also overlooks an old and beautiful Art-Deco building) - All electricity in the house comes from certified sustainable energy sources (wind, solar, biomass)
interaction: The apartment is only available when we are travelling so you will have it to yourselves.  A friend/neighbor will meet you, hand you the keys and be your contact person for anything you may need. He may also check in on occasion to feed the fish.
house_rules: Terms or House rules: - Weekly cleaner may come once for a few hours during the stay, depending on booking - No shoes in the house, please  - There is a 2 year old reef aquarium in the house that will be maintained during the visit every three days by caretaker - We please ask that the place be left in the condition it is presented
host_about: Friendly couple from Berlin, working in the public policy / public health epidemology respectively.

name: Central located quiet place in the City
summary: Hello and welcome in Berlin! I offer a quiet, cozy room located just off the beautiful Viktoria-Luise-Platz. With its full amenities you can enjoy your stay and explore Berlin.
space: The room is quiet and looks south out into a green back yard where many rabbits bustle. It is equipped for up to two people and has everything you need for a visit in Berlin. The modern kitchen and clean bathroom are available at all times. The apartment (a third floor walk-up) is centrally located just off the most beautiful place in Schöneberg: the "Viktoria-Luise -Platz" . In the summer you can watch the buzz around the big fountain with an ice cream in hand or visit one of the many cafes or restaurants. Because the roads are partially closed to cars, it is very quiet and welcoming. Only 300m away is the Winterfeldt Square with its numerous restaurants and its famous food market, which is always worth a visit. The "Bar jeder Vernunft" invites you to enjoy good food and often outsolded theater performances. The Motz- and Fugger streets are home to many gay clubs and cafes and the Kurfürstendamm (Kuhdamm) with its hundreds of shops is within walking distance. Bakers and supermarkets a

The room is quiet and looks south out into a green back yard where many rabbits bustle. It is equipped for up to two people and has everything you need for a visit in Berlin. The modern kitchen and clean bathroom are available at all times. Only 300m away is the Winterfeldt Square with its numerous restaurants and its famous food market, which is always worth a visit. The "Bar jeder Vernunft" invites you to enjoy good food and often outsolded theater performances. Th
neighborhood_overview: Schöneberg stretches in the north to the Kurfürstendamm, where one can go shopping and visit the zoo. In the east it is joined to a new long-drawn-out park that connects it with Kreuzberg, not far from the former Tempelhof airport, whose free runways are now used for many sports. To the west it borders the residential district of Wilmersdorf. At its heart is the large Schöneberger Rathaus where Kennedy gave his famous speech.
notes: Airport:  From Airport Tegel it takes about 14 min.by taxi to get to the apartment and costs about € 26. By public transportation it takes about 25 minutes. Take the Bus "X9" to the train station "Zoologischer Garten / Zoo" and then the bus "M46" (direction "Südkreuz") until bus-station "Motzstr." From there it`s perhaps 200m. You need a Ticket for the Zone A+B. From Airport Schönefeld is about 40-45 min by public transport. Please take the Bus until underground-station "Rudow". The "U7" until "Bayrischer Platz" and then one station with the unterground "U4" to "Viktoria-Luise-Platz".  You can also take the "S-Bahn / railway" until "Innsbrucker-Platz" and from there the "U4". But sometimes the S-Bahn is not driving. So I recommend to take the underground.  You need for both options from the airport one ticket for the Zone A+B+C!  For the touristic places you will need later only A+B perhaps. A taxi is of course faster but much more expensive. I guess €39. Notice Board: In the room many
transit: The U4 station "Viktoria-Luise-Platz" is 100m away and connects various subway lines and to the S-Bahn ring around the city center of Berlin. Nollendorfplatz is only one station (or 7-minute walk) away. The largest Berlin U-Bahn station, which connects four lines brings you eg the U2 to Potsdamer Platz, the Brandenburg Gate and the Museum Island. Or is it the U1 directly to Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain with their lively night life? For shopping enthusiasts, the KaDeWe and the Kurfürstendamm at Wittenberg Platz are also only 10 minutes far. Or you just take the Metrobus M46, which runs every 10 min. driving off from the side street (Martin-Luther-Str.) to the Zoologischer Garten (Zoo) and the Southern Cross (Südkreuz). Since many guests wish to explore Berlin by bicycle (Berlin has a very good network of cycle paths) There is a bike rental shop in a side street nearby.
access: In addition to fast Wi-Fi, the room has a television and a radio (+ extra radio with adapter for i-phones). Fresh linen and as many towels as are needed are of course available. The apartment has central heating. In the clean bathroom a hairdryer is available, and, if a guest wants to bathe, there are also various bath products that you are welcome to use.  The kitchen is fully equipped, with tea making facilities, a microwave, a toaster, an electric cooker with ceramic hob, a refrigerator, a dishwasher, a coffee maker, cooking utensils, and much more. Feel free to use whatever you need. Basic condiments and spices for cooking are of course also available. Everything necessary for baking is also there since I like to bake. A washing machine is also available; please ask me for assistance if you wish to use it. There is also a launderette in a neighboring street close by.
interaction: Many guests I see either rarely or not at all during their stay, since I myself often travel or the guests have a different time rhythm from my own. Otherwise, I am of course glad to provide tips on the best places in Berlin whenever wanted, depending on what the guest is interested in. Sometimes I can also offer a small city tour, but only when desired. It is important to me that the guest is left alone and only given information when it is wanted.
house_rules: A house rules there though and this is hanging out by the landlord in the stairwell, but in all previous guests this really was not necessary. My neighbors in the house are all very nice and that is why there has never been any problems so far also. I find it very pleasant to set up any rules, but to trust the guest. He should feel free and at home!
host_about:
Hello,

i´m Simon 35 and you are welcome to stay here while you are in Berlin. When you want to know places for shopping, museums or just relaxing  -->Just let me know!

name: PEACEFUL FLAT WITH VINTAGE TOUCH IN PRENZLAUERBERG
summary: Right in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, probably the nicest neighbourhood in town, this apartment has a special character, with its mix of design objects, vintage furnitures and beautiful old green doors. Subway/supermarkets 100m away! Parking for free just 10 min away from the flat or at 5€/day in the Parkhaus at Schönhauserallee Arkaden.
space: Situated in the heart of popular Prenzlauer Berg, this attractive Berlin apartment makes shopping and sightseeing a convenient pleasure during your short stay. The beauty of the interior lies in the good taste of the furnitures and, in general, in all the many details of an apartment situated in an historical building (decorations on the ceilings, old doors). Opal white walls combine with wooden floors and design- and  retro furnishings (no Ikea!) to create a universal charm.   The walls of all rooms are decorated with beautiful, vintage polish posters designed for operas and circus shows, which, together with the colourful lamps, gives the apartment an artsy touch. The apartment is fully equipped: Cable TV with over 200 channels, including many in english and other foreign languages, TWO laundry machines and TWO dryers of the prestigious brand MIELE, dish-washer, microwave, kettle etc... With some superb nightspots, restaurants and shops on your doorstep, (two supermarkets organic and

notes: "Zweckentfremdungsgesetz" Since May 1st,  a new law ("Zweckentfremdungsgesetzt") prohibits short term rentals such as with Airbnb in many Berlin apartments. This apartment, which has the special status of "commercial space" ("Gewerberaum"), is  among those that will be able to continue their activity even after May the 1st. By booking this apartment, you can be therefore 100% sure that you booking is perfectly legal and that it won't be cancelled at the last minute. ************************* Smoking This is a no-smoking apartment. This said, the apartment is at the groundfloor, therefore smoking outside is pretty easy. Please use an ashtray. City Tax (Uebernachtungssteuer) SINCE JAN 1st 2014 BERLIN HAS INTRODUCED A "TOURIST TAX" (5% of the Netto Price + VAT). THIS TAX IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE PRICE CALCULATED BY THE SITE AND HAS TO BE PAID DIRECTLY TO THE APARTMENT OWNER. I WILL CALCULATE THE TAX AMOUNT FOR YOU AND LET YOU KNOW BEFORE YOU COME TO BERLIN.  ***************** Parking Since
access: In the apartment you have two large rooms of the same size, in addition to a corridor, a kitchen and a bathroom. The two rooms are completely independent one from the other: from each if it the occupants can reach the kitchen the bathroom or even go outside without disturbing those who sleep in the other room. In each room there are two double beds or sofa-beds, for a total of 4 sleeping places in each room. One of the sofa-beds can be turned, at will, into two single beds. One of the two rooms can be used as a living-room during the day (there are two sofas). We just installed a new TV with some english channels, too! Parking: Since 2010 it's no longer for free in the neighbourhood. Still, areas where parking is for free are not far (10 min walk). Another good option is the nearby parking garage in the Schönhauserallee Arkaden, which costs only 5€/day).
interaction: Always available for questions about how to explore berlin!
house_rules: How to enter the apartment Use the key to open the small door facing the street (so there is no need to go  through the run_train door). Other door You need it to access the court (for throwing the garbage). On the handle of the door you will find an extra set of keys that open that door. Please take them with you when you exit from that door. When you are inside, please put them back in the original position, and never let them inserted. Never leave the keys inserted in the doors from the inside when going out! If you shut the door, then you cannot enter!  Internet For WiFi connection, name of the network and password are written below the RED router, in the living room.  Most of the problems with the Wifi can be solved by rebooting the router, switching it off and then on again. Contact me if you experience persistent problems. For any urgent matter, the bar Beakers in Dunker str. 69 offers day and night a free Wifi service. (network Beakers,  password viereuro) Important: German law is v
host_about: I am a free-lance journalist. I work for several Italian magazines, such as VOGUE ITALIA and L'UOMO VOGUE, covering art, cinema, architecture, environment, food and travel topics.

name: Pension am Traveplatz Zimmer 1
summary: Schönes großes Zweibettzimmer im Erdgeschoss mit 2 Einzelliegen und einer Doppelbettcouch als Aufbettung für zwei weitere Gäste
space: The pension is located in a ground floor apartment in front of a partly restored tenement house in a quiet side street. The apartment was lavish renovation in September 2005, specially converted to accommodate guests. Our guest room has its own mini kitchen with sink and hot water, 2 hotplates, refrigerator, coffee maker, toaster and kettle, and DBVT TV. To continue: 2 beds, sofa with sleeping function as an extra bed for 2 persons, coffee table, wardrobe, shelving and dining area for max. 4 people. The rental rates vary according to length of stay. In the vicinity there are the typical scene of Friedrichshain-bars, small shops selling food and beverages, secondhand goods, stores for gothic and punk. At the bakery around the corner, you can have breakfast from 6 clock, Saturdays and Sundays from 7 clock from 8 clock. The ring-center load in the near Frankfurter Allee and many other shops for a shopping spree. If that's not enough to drive the U-Bahn line 5 only 6 stations to Alexanderp
description: The pension is located in a ground floor apartment in front of a partly restored tenement house in a quiet side street. The apartment was lavish renovation in September 2005, specially converted to accommodate guests. Our guest room has its own mini kitchen with sink and hot water, 2 hotplates, refrigerator, coffee maker, toaster and kettle, and DBVT TV. To continue: 2 beds, sofa with sleeping function as an extra bed for 2 persons, coffee table, wardrobe, shelving and dining area for max. 4 people. The rental rates vary according to length of stay. In the vicinity there are the typical scene of Friedrichshain-bars, small shops selling food and beverages, secondhand goods, stores for gothic and punk. At the bakery around the corner, you can have breakfast from 6 clock, Saturdays and Sundays from 7 clock from 8 clock. The ring-center load in the near Frankfurter Allee and many other shops for a shopping spree. If that's not enough to drive the U-Bahn line 5 only 6 stations to Alexanderp
neighborhood_overview: In der nahen Umgebung befinden sich die für Friedrichshain typischen Szene-Kneipen, kleine Läden mit Getränken und Lebensmitteln, Trödelwaren, Läden. Beim Bäcker um die Ecke kann man ab 6 Uhr frühstücken, Samstags ab 7 Uhr und Sonntags ab 8 Uhr.Das Ring-Center in der nahen Frankfurter Allee und viel weitere Geschäfte laden zum Einkaufsbummel ein. Wem das nicht reicht, fährt mit der U-Bahn Linie 5 nur 6 Stationen zum Alexanderplatz mit seinen vielen Einkaufscentern oder von dort mit der S-Bahn weiter zum Bahnhof Zoo, wo man auf dem Kurfürstendamm mit dem Kaufhaus des Westens und vielen anderen Einkaufspalästen dem Kaufrausch verfallen kann.
notes: Das Gästezimmer hat kein eigenes Bad, für die drei Gästezimmer der Wohnung befinden sich auf dem Flur zwei Duschbäder/WC.
transit: Die nächste Station von U- und S-Bahn ist Frankfurter Allee, nur 4 min zu Fuß entfernt. Dier Straßenbahn Linie M13 hält fast vor der Haustür in der Scharnweberstr. bzw. Weichselstr. Wer mit dem Auto kommen möchte, sollte wissen dass wir uns in der Parkzone 50 befinden, für die beim Buergeramt Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg eine Gästevignette bestellt werden kann. Wenn Sie mir rechtzeig (etwa 1 Woche vorher) die Kopie des Fahrzeugscheins schicken, besorge ich die zum Parken in dieser Gegend erforderliche Gästevignette und verauslage die dafür entstehenden Gebühren.
access: Die Pension befindet sich in einer Wohnung im Erdgeschoss im Vorderhaus eines teilsanierten Mietshauses in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße. Die Wohnung wurde mit aufwändiger Sanierung im September 2005 speziell zur Beherbergung von Gästen umgebaut. Es gibt insgesamt drei Gästezimmer und auf dem Flur zwei Duschbäder, die von allen Gästen genutzt werden. In allen Räumen ist kostenlos WLAN verfügbar
interaction: Ich selbst wohne nur 100 m entfernt und komme innerhalb einer Minute zur Pension, wenn ich per Telefon oder (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) informiert werde, dass Sie da sind, um die Schlüssel zu übergeben.
house_rules: Die Pension ist nicht geeignet für Gäste, die mal nach Berlin kommen wollen um hier alles das zu tun, was man zuhause nicht macht. Bitte nicht in den Zimmern rauchen.
host_about:
Ich freue mich auf Gäste aus aller Welt und hoffe, dass sie sich bei mir wohlfühlen.



Nachdem ich mit dem Beginn meines Rentenalters meinen größeren Vermietungsservice verkaufte, habe ich nur eine schöne Wohnung ganz nahe meiner eigenen Wohnung zum Vermieten behalten.

Hier kann ich mich persönlich um alles in der Gästewohnung kümmern und die ankommenden Gäste direkt vor der Haustür begrüßen.



Leider spreche ich nicht besonders gut Englisch, aber bisher hat eine Verständigung doch immer noch funktioniert, am besten ist es per Email möglich, da habe ich Zeit zum übersetzen.^^

name: Modernes Apartment in Berlin P´berg
summary: Hier könnt Ihr Euch wie zu Hause fühlen. Unser Apartment befindet sich im attraktiven Bezirk Prenzlauer Berg im Ostteil der Stadt am Helmholtzplatz, welcher durch die schönen Cafes, Restaurants und individuellen Shops ein beliebter Treffpunkt für Studenten, Künstler und junge Familien ist. Die helle und grosse 2-Zimmer-Altbauwohnung mit modernem Duschbad und voll ausgestatteter Küche ist stilvoll eingerichtet mit viel Liebe zum Detail.
space: Hier könnt Ihr Euch wie zu Hause fühlen.Unser Apartment befindet sich im attraktiven Bezirk Prenzlauer Berg im Ostteil der Stadt am Helmholtzplatz, welcher durch die schönen Cafes, Restaurants und individuellen Shops ein beliebter Treffpunkt für Studenten, Künstler und junge Familien ist. Die helle und grosse 2-Zimmer-Altbauwohnung mit modernem Duschbad und voll ausgestatteter Küche ist stilvoll eingerichtet mit viel Liebe zum Detail. Die zentrale Lage ermöglicht entspanntes Shoppen und Sightseeing zu Fuss. Das Apartment befindet sich im 3.OG Vorderhaus. Für die Benutzung des Aufzuges bekommt Ihr von uns einen Schlüssel. Der Verkehrsknotenpunkt Alexanderplatz ist mit Fahrrad, Auto oder öffentlichem Nahverkehr schnell zu erreichen. Die hohen Stuckdecken und gepflegten Holzfußböden in den Wohn- und Schlafräumen sorgen für eine freundliche Atmosphäre und sind mit einer weiten Flügeltür verbunden. Neben dem komfortablen Doppelbett im Schlafzimmer steht Euch ein bequemes Schlafsofa für zwei
description: Hier könnt Ihr Euch wie zu Hause fühlen. Unser Apartment befindet sich im attraktiven Bezirk Prenzlauer Berg im Ostteil der Stadt am Helmholtzplatz, welcher durch die schönen Cafes, Restaurants und individuellen Shops ein beliebter Treffpunkt für Studenten, Künstler und junge Familien ist. Die helle und grosse 2-Zimmer-Altbauwohnung mit modernem Duschbad und voll ausgestatteter Küche ist stilvoll eingerichtet mit viel Liebe zum Detail. Hier könnt Ihr Euch wie zu Hause fühlen.Unser Apartment befindet sich im attraktiven Bezirk Prenzlauer Berg im Ostteil der Stadt am Helmholtzplatz, welcher durch die schönen Cafes, Restaurants und individuellen Shops ein beliebter Treffpunkt für Studenten, Künstler und junge Familien ist. Die helle und grosse 2-Zimmer-Altbauwohnung mit modernem Duschbad und voll ausgestatteter Küche ist stilvoll eingerichtet mit viel Liebe zum Detail. Die zentrale Lage ermöglicht entspanntes Shoppen und Sightseeing zu Fuss. Das Apartment befindet sich im 3.OG Vorderhaus.
neighborhood_overview: Der Kiez ist toll. Alles was man benötigt, ist in unmittelbarer Umgebung.
notes: In Berlin muß eine Übernachtungssteuer in Höhe von 5% des Gesamtpreises gezahlt werden, die bei Anreise in Bar zu zahlen ist! Weitere Informationen dazu können Sie vor Ort einsehen. Der Gastgeber bietet auch Massagen an...gleich in der Wohnung nebenan. In Berlin you have to pay a Accommodation-Tax! It will be 5% from the Total Price. Please pay in Cash when you arrive in the Apartment.  The Owner offers Wellness-Massages next to the Apartment.
transit: Tram M2 und M10, U-Bahn U2, S-Bahn S41/S42 Prenzlauer Allee, Bus, Fahrrad

interaction: Telefon, Internet, Fax
house_rules: Alle Preise verstehen sich inklusive Bettwäsche und Handtücher. Ebenso ist der Monatspreis der Komplettpreis, inklusive Strom, Gas, Wasser, Heizung, Wifi. Der Gastgeber bietet wohltuenede Massagen zu günstigen Preisen an. Ebenso kann auf Wunsch ein Reinigungsservice dazugebucht werden. All prices include bed linen and towels. The monthly rent is the total price and includes Electricity, Gas, Water, Heating, Wifi. The owner offers nice wellbeing-massages for a good price. And it´s possible to book a cleaningservice if you like.
host_about:
Hallo zusammen,



ich freue mich darauf viele nette Gäste willkommen zu heißen.

Ich bin Masseur von Beruf und habe mein eigenes Massagestudio nebenan. Gäste sind herzlich willkommen sich bei einer Massage zu entspannen.

name: Blue Jewel in Green Borough
space: We welcoming you to our quiet apartment in Berlin-Johannisthal. In December 2010 we have renovated the 52 square meter apartment,  so our guests will feel at home. The living room is equipped with TV, stereo, safe, oak floors and 2 sofa beds offer a sleeping option for 2 people. These sofa beds provide excellent sleeping comfort. The bedroom has a180 cm wide double bed (two mattresses) and is equipped with high-quality wool carpeting. The bathroom with tub and shower and separate guest toilet  allows 4 people "conflict free" bathing and showering. The mini kitchen is combined with a spacious dining hall and its granite surface cools in summer and  keeps the feet warm in wintertime. Suitcases will find a place in a small storeroom. You always find  parking space right in front of the house. Places of interest nearby: You will enjoy jogging and walking in the  forest Königsheide. Cinema, library, restaurants, shops, post in 5 minutes walking distance. Adlershof Science City 1.5 km Transp

Zu meinen Hobbies zählen Pferde, Wanderreiten, Hunde, Bücher und Politik.



Viele Grüße!

name: Lovely city apartment in former East Berlin
space: I am renting my beloved and carefully designed original Eat Berlin "Plattenbau" apartment in the heart of Berlin Mitte whenever I am away. The apartment is not a luxury apartment but designed and decorated with love and with art and objects I got from very close artist friends or artist cooperations I did in the past. It is my personal opasis, my little white castle to charge my batteries. And this is how you should treat it as well. It is not a place to make parties or events. It should be your oasis after a long discovery tour through Berlin. It is a typical East Berlin apartment like they have build them in big scale in the 80s. When I moved in it looked horrable. Ugly wallpaper, old furnitures, the bathroom was a catastrophy and the floor was a plastic one but with wooden optic. Now it is kind of surprising when you enter the apartment after going up 2 floors the staircase which has still this old ugly vibe. There is a open livingroom /kichen, a bedroom, a bathroom. The kithcen has
description: I am renting my beloved and carefully designed original Eat Berlin "Plattenbau" apartment in the heart of Berlin Mitte whenever I am away. The apartment is not a luxury apartment but designed and decorated with love and with art and objects I got from very close artist friends or artist cooperations I did in the past. It is my personal opasis, my little white castle to charge my batteries. And this is how you should treat it as well. It is not a place to make parties or events. It should be your oasis after a long discovery tour through Berlin. It is a typical East Berlin apartment like they have build them in big scale in the 80s. When I moved in it looked horrable. Ugly wallpaper, old furnitures, the bathroom was a catastrophy and the floor was a plastic one but with wooden optic. Now it is kind of surprising when you enter the apartment after going up 2 floors the staircase which has still this old ugly vibe. There is a open livingroom /kichen, a bedroom, a bathroom. The kithcen has
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is really placed in the center of East Berlin. Favourite shopping area with small boutiques, concept stores, cafes, galleries. Great to discover the whole area around hear just by walking is perfect. Although it is right in the center, the apartment is somehow peaceful and quiet. Neighbors are funny mix of former East Berlin pretty old tenants and young people or foreigners.
notes: In the former East Berlin "Plattenbau" apartments you can hear everything through the wall. So if you hear the neighbors be aware that they hear you too. Just be a bit careful with loud music, walking around with your shoes or making noise during the night.
transit: The subway station "Weinmeisterstrasse" / U8 is right in front the house. The subway and S-Bahn station "Alexanderplatz" is 5 minutes away and S-Bahn station "Hackescher Markt" also 5 minutes. The quick bus from or to airport Tegel, the "TXL Bus" is also only 4 minutes away in front of Alexanderplatz.
access: You have access to the complete apartment.
interaction: I am only renting my apartment when I am not in Berlin. So it depends on our timing if you get the keys from me of from one of my lovely collegues in my store just around the corner. But if you have any questions you can always contact me by phone or email or go o my store. They will also help you.
host_about:
I am the art director and owner of my own fashion brand which I launched almost 15 years ago. I have a shop with studio just 2 minutes away from my beloved little East Berlin Plattenbau, which I call my "White Castle". It is my personal oasis where I charge my batteries. Often I am not in Berlin and therefor decided to share my oasis with people who have the same affection for art, design and aesthetics.

I can not and do not cook, but I love good healthy food. I can not remember names, but I love to look at faces. I rarely know any band names or music titles, but I love to dance and sing. I rather read a book before going to sleep than watching a movie. I do have a lot of energy. This comes from sleeping a lot.



I am only renting my apartment when I am away. So it depends on our timing if we meet or if you get the keys from one of my lovely people in my store.



Whatever you (Website hidden by Airbnb) it with love!

name: Gästeapartment Berlin- Schöneberg
summary: Gästeapartment  2 Zimmer, Küche Bad  sehr zentral gelegen. Bitte unbedingt Hausordnung und Beschreibung der Mietsache beachten ! Aus gegebenen Anlässen ist es  absolut verboten, weiteren Besuch, die nicht zur Buchung gehören, in der Wohnung zu empfangen. Please pay attention to the house rules and description of the rented property! It is absolutely forbidden to receive further visits, which are not part of the booking, in the apartment.
space: BERLIN FIND ICH GUT Gästeapartment, 2 Zi., Nähe Kurfürstendamm und Kadewe in Berlin-Schöneberg für 1-2 Personen, mit Balkon,separatem Schlafzimmer, Wlan, Küche voll ausgestattet, Geschirrspüler, Waschmaschine und Badezimmer mit Wannenbad. Die Wohnung ist hochwertig mit komfortabeler Ausstattung. Sie ist trotz der zentralen Lage sehr ruhig Die Ferienwohnung liegt mitten im Zentrum Berlin-Schöneberg in ruhiger Wohnlage, 5 Min. vom Kadewe und Kurfürstendamm entfernt, mit guter Verkehrsanbindung. Die komfortable Ausstattung auf ca.45 qm bietet bis 3 Personen optimale Wohnqualität. Ein großes Wohnzimmer mit bequemer Ledercoch und separatem Essbereich mit Platz für 4 Personen lädt zum Verweilen ein. Natürlich ist auch Sat-TV und Internet vorhanden. Die komplett ausgestattete Küche u.a. mit 4 Kochplatten, Kaffeemaschine und Geschirrspüler, Waschmaschine, lässt keine Wünsche offen. 1 separates Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett. Das geräumige Badezimmer mit Dusch-Wannenbad, Waschbecken und WC rundet

transit: Der nahegelegene Wittenbergplatz mit Kadewe- Nähe ist  der Knotenpunkt der Stadt Berlin. Von hier aus erreichen Sie  alle Bereiche und Sehenswürdigkeiten der Großstadt mit der U-Bahn oder den Metrobussen.
access: Meinen Gästen stehen sämtliche Gebrauchsgegenstände, diverse Verköstigungen, Vorrätige Lebensmittel zum Eigenverbrauch  und Zimmer zur freien Verfügung. Der abschliessbarer Schrank im Eingangsbereich ist für Gäste unzugänglich. Aus verschiedenen Gründen ist es verboten, fremde Leute mit in die Wohnung zu nehmen, die nicht zu Buchung gehören.  Es stellt ein absoluten Regelverstoss dar. Ich behalte mir vor, sofort das Mietverhältnis  zu  beenden. ---  Internet !  Gäste stimmen  mit der Nutzung meines Netzwerkes zu , es nur für legale Zwecke zu nutzen und nicht für illegales Hochladen oder Herunterladen von Inhalten oder für andere illegale Aktivitäten. If you receive a letter claiming to impose a fine on you, it's generally wise to check if the letter is genuine and not a scam. Die Waschmaschine darf nur bei voller Beladung mit Wäschestücken und nach vorheriger Einweisung  benutzt  werden. Waschpulver steht zur Verfügung. In english! My clients are all commodities, various tastings, food
interaction: Für meine Gäste ist das Apartment ihr eigener Privatbereich. Ich stehe allerdings  vor Ort und immer telefonisch zur Verfügung.
house_rules: Ich erwarte von meinen Gästen einen respektvollen Umgang mit mir und natürlich auch mit meiner Wohnung.  Rauchen in der Wohnung, ausser auf dem Balkon ist nicht gestattet.  Ich ziehe sehr gerne meine Schuhe in der Wohnung aus, einmal aus hygienischen Gründen, und ich finde es ärgerlich, wenn der original Eichenfussboden durch Schuhabsätze oder verunreinigtes Schuhwerk verkratzt wird. Strassenschuhe von daher, vor betreten des Wohnbereiches, bitte ausziehen . Diesen respektvollen Umgang erwarte ich einfach. Die Einhaltung der Hausordnung ist glaub ich selbstverständlich. Die Nachtruhe beginnt um 22:00 Uhr und der Lärmpegel sollte ab 22:00 Uhr in der Wohnung bleiben, da es ein ruhiges Haus ist. In meiner Wohnung finden keine Partys statt . Meinen Gästen ist es untersagt, weiteren Besuch zu empfangen oder über Nacht zu beherbergen. Und Ihr lieben Leute! Es kann mal was kaputt gehen! Für jeglichen Schaden an Sachgegenständen, verursacht durch die Gäste erwarte ich eine sofortige Informatio
host_about: Hallo! Ich würde mich freuen durch Airbnb viele nette Gäste aus aller Welt bei mir begrüßen zu dürfen!

name: World stroller's club 1
space: The 45-square meter apartments are self contained. In each apartment, we can accommodate 1 to 4 persons, additional persons on request. By the staircase to get into the second Floor in the converted attic with four dormers and a good outlook. Both homes have blinds to darken. A garden use including seating is available, the sauna is still NEW. Towels & bed linen are included in the price. Electricity, water and CityTax according to your own consumption. The apartments are located in the characteristic one, or two-family house area in the district Konradshöhe Reinickendorf. From here you can enjoy long walks through the Tegeler forest and run the water in nearby Lake Tegel. Bicycles are available. With more experience we will be happy to help and support. With just a few steps away from grocery stores, a bakery, a florist, doctors, a pharmacy and a gas station. In about 10 minutes you are at Tegel. There you have the versatility of the shopping, entertainment and gastronomy.

name: A lovely room in the Mitte - Berlin
space: Welcome to a feel good stay and a quality experience in Berlin. We're offering mature hospitality, good quality in our interior with good beds, you´ll love sleeping in. This is the place to stay, if you want to experience a relaxed however stylish alternative to a hotel we're the place. You're now reading about a semi-professional host's offer to guests visiting Berlin. It means I have more rooms for rent out in the same big and spacey  apartment - a 'guest house'. So be course I'm not a newbie in this business is a greater chance for at good stay in Berlin, then if you take a host with no experience and on the hunt for some extra pocket money. I charge a bit more then the other hosts, I don't offer discounts and in return the only thing I'm working for is to provide a good stay and a good nights sleep for my guests. Great apartment, great room, big kitchen and two baths/toilets!  The room is big and spacious and decorated to give you a space to relax. The apartment is in a very quiet
