This is the place to stay, if you want to experience a relaxed however stylish alternative to a hotel we're the place. You're now reading about a semi-professional host's offer to guests visiting Berlin. It means I have more rooms for rent out in the same big and spacey  apartment - a 'guest house'. So be course I'm not a newbie in this business is a greater chance for at good stay in Berlin, then if you take a host with no experience and on the hunt for some extra pocket money. I charge a bit more then the other hosts, I don't offer discounts and in return the only thing I'm working for is to provide a good stay and a good nights sleep for my guests. Great apartment, great room, big kitchen and two baths/toilets!  The room is big and spacious and decorated to give you a space to relax. The apartment is in a very quiet
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is on the second floor and there is a lift/ elevator. It´s a normal apartment building with very sweet and normal neighbours.  Neighbourhood: Directly at the other side of the street there is a supermarket with products from the whole world. In the range of 300 m there are deli's, sushi, Indian, Italian, take-away places, you can also walk to Potsdamer Plats, there you will find the better restaurants and nightlife, including a casino and 5* Ritz Hotel. The whole area is very alive however very quiet at the same time, it´s the perfect combination. The apartment is located VERY centrally, only 150 meters from the U-bahn station Mohrenstrasse Ubh. / Red line. 500 meters from the famous BRANDENBURGER  GATE. 400 meters from Potsdamer Plats. 800 meters from Checkpoint Charlie
house_rules: Before booking please accept the 'all must fell good' house rules: * Arrival to the Apartment should be between 13 and 21. * Please note that the apartment is always shared with the landlord and other guests. * No smoking indoor, or out of any windows. * You can come and go as you feel like. * Please take of your shoes when entering the corridor. * Inside the apartment it must be quiet at night from 22-07. * Please lock your door when your not in the apartment. * Leave the kitchen and bathroom in a clean condition after use. * And most important, it's a friendly place to stay :) * Sometimes the booked room is not available. Then we will assign you to a room with the same room specifications. Have a nice stay in Berlin.
host_about:
Were always looking forward to welcome open-minded and friendly people!



Were all well educated, easygoing, helpful, friendly, talkative and know how to find the answer to a lot of questions.



Best regards Peter and Jens

name: Lovely_room_Berlin_Neukölln

name: 3bedrooms in Kreuzberg, Anmeldung possible
summary: Simple apartment with 3 bedrooms and kitchen located between the Bergmannkiez and the Potsdamer Platz in Kreuzberg.  It's not the Ritz Carlton, but if you're looking for a cheap place in pretty much the coolest area of Berlin, you found it! 4th floor, no elevator. You have the entire place to yourself. Each room has one double bed. You can and should do an Anmeldung for the address when you're staying here.
space: The U-Bahn station Mockernbrücke (U1 & U7) is only 3 minute away by foot. Increase your fitness while in Berlin, the apartment is on the 4th floor without an elevator (yep that's how they built this building in 1860) !NO ELEVATOR!  The 3 room apartment includes the following: -Laundry machine -Fridge -Oven and stovetop -3 double beds -Closets -Hair dryer -Coffee machine -Toaster -WiFi (20Mbit/s) -42" flat screen TV with Chromecast -Fresh towels & bed-linen
description: Simple apartment with 3 bedrooms and kitchen located between the Bergmannkiez and the Potsdamer Platz in Kreuzberg.  It's not the Ritz Carlton, but if you're looking for a cheap place in pretty much the coolest area of Berlin, you found it! 4th floor, no elevator. You have the entire place to yourself. Each room has one double bed. You can and should do an Anmeldung for the address when you're staying here. The U-Bahn station Mockernbrücke (U1 & U7) is only 3 minute away by foot. Increase your fitness while in Berlin, the apartment is on the 4th floor without an elevator (yep that's how they built this building in 1860) !NO ELEVATOR!  The 3 room apartment includes the following: -Laundry machine -Fridge -Oven and stovetop -3 double beds -Closets -Hair dryer -Coffee machine -Toaster -WiFi (20Mbit/s) -42" flat screen TV with Chromecast -Fresh towels & bed-linen I live in the same building. I leave the level of interaction to you. Im always happy to answer questions, give recommendations
neighborhood_overview: Clubs, cheap restaurants, cool bars and two beautiful parks are next to the apartment. You will love this very Kreuzberg area of Berlin.
notes: Parking on the street is FREE, all the time. In the evenings it gets harder to find parking (never had to walk further than 5 minutes though). During the day there's plenty of parking.
transit: Many different S & U Bahn lines within few minutes of walking. Major tourist spots (Potsdamer Platz, Brandenburger Tor, Holocaust Memorial, Checkpoint Charlie, Bundestag,...) are only 5 minutes by bus or 15 minutes by walking.
interaction: I live in the same building. I leave the level of interaction to you. Im always happy to answer questions, give recommendations and solve problems.
house_rules: No parties!!! Non-smoking only!!! There's a few benches outside the building and a cafe, where you can smoke.
host_about: Born in Berlin. Lived for many years abroad. Digital Marketing enthusiast. Loving B2B tech. Treat others how you want to be treated.

name: Central Artist Appartement Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Cozy room in two room Artist apt in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Very close to Mitte, 30 min to Kreuzberg/Friedrichshain, lots of Restaurants and Bars around! Great for couples who loves music and art!
space: Cozy and calm room in two room artist appartement close to Schönhauser Allee and Kastanienallee/Mauerpark in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, 10 min to Mitte, 30 min to Kreuzberg - U2 & S-Train (Ring) 7 min away, Tram 12 around the corner - Supermarket around the corner and lots of restaurants, late night kiosk' and bars in the street - Kittchen with gas stove & washing machine - Bathroom with tube - Livingroom with queensize Sleeping Sofa and DJ-Equipment + a lot of records, dvds and books  - Free WIFI - Towels & linens/sheets included Smokers flat!

name: Cosy StudioFlat in trendy Kreuzberg
summary: Benvenuti nel mio monolocale nel cuore di Kreuzberg 36 : sicuramente la zona più trendy , viva e multiculturale di Berlino! Molti bar , caffè, ristoranti e gallerie sono tutti a pochi passi da casa. La stazione della metropolitana ( Kottbusser Tor
space: Cosy and freshly renovated studioflat in the heart of Kreuzberg 36: Possibly the most trandy, alive area of Berlin!  Many bars, cafes, restaurant, and galleries are all in walking distance from the flat, 2 metro stations at about 3 minutes walk, and 2 bus stations at about 50mt!  The atmosphere in the streets of the multicultural neighborhood Kreutzberg is very exciting, friendly and alive. You will meet artistis as well as people from many different cultures which are going to give you a real authentic Berlin  experience. A few words about my studio-flat: The flat fully furnished and can host up till 4 people in 2 comfortable double beds (1 normal double bed and 1 double bed couch). There is a fully equipped corner-kitchen (kitchen props, fridge, toaster, coffee  machine ecc), toilette with shower. We provide for fresh bed linen and towels. Wi-fi is also available for our guest!  If you are planning to visit Berlin in winter no worries about the cold, our flat has the best heating sys

house_rules: - Respect other residents of the house by keeping noise down when people are sleeping. - Recycle your waste: glass, paper, plastic and metal, general waste. The rubbish-bins are in the yard. - No illegal download of music and movies with the internet account of the flat.  - No parties in the apartment, there are enough other places to go for it ;) - when you leave the house shut down all lights, the heating, close the windows. - before checking out: make sure all electronic devices are unplugged, the heating is off, wash the dishes, dispose of the garbage, close the windows, be sure that the door is well locked. - The guests are required to pay City Tax (5% of the rental fee) during the check in cash. - for booking longer then 2 months we require a contract, prove of income and a 1 month rent fee deposit to pay in cash at the arrival, the deposit will be returned 2 weeks after the departure.
host_about:
Hi, I am a musician and video-maker and fashion-designer based in berlin.

I also run 3 holidays flats in berlin.

name: Oriental Style Room, Kudamm / Zoo
space: THE ROOM Our flat has high ceilings, wooden floors, is bright and has generous large rooms. The room for rent has a nice Oriental Style interior, with a Single Bed and additional Couch that can be turned into a sleeping sofa for 2. There is ample space in the wardrobes, a separate office-grade desk and a wonderful bright chandelier. There is a separate private Marble Bathroom. The large open-plan Kitchen (~25sqm) has a gas stove, a spaceous dining table that seats 6-8, Fridge, Freezer, and is otherwise fully equipped. The flat, in total, is around 200sqm, and very spacious, it certainly won't get too crowded in here!  In General, if you ask nicely, we pretty much have everything - hair dryer, microwave, mirrors, TV, Books, Maps, Copyer, Printer, etc. We welcome guests from all over the world, students, artists, professionals or travelers! TANGO I am a passionate Dancer and Instructor for Tango Argentino, in case you are visiting Berlin - the Tango Capital of Europe - I can also take yo

house_rules: No smoking, no excessive noise. Treat the property like you would treat your own home. Guests have to show their ID (of which we'll make a copy for reference). So long as we can coordinate and communicate, we should be able to accommodate anyone and anything reasonable. We are very internationally and open minded.

I love traveling, films, all kinds of music and Tango Argentino.

name: Facing the canal, Paul Lincke Ufer
space: A bright Altbau apartment 85m² facing the canal, on Paul Lincke Ufer. It is absolutely newly and beautifully renovated. The apt is in the back courtyard, very quiet, in front of one of the most beautiful corners of Berlin.  And one of the liveliest scenes in Europe too.  The living room is bright furnished with modern classic Danish pieces. Sleeps two couples very comfortably: there is a run_train bedroom with a king size bed and a another sepparate bedroom with a standard double bed. Two mattresses are also available for extra guests.  And a baby Cotç The separate kitchen is well equipped. Wlan available and washing machine. Bath with shower and WC. Many shops, restaurants, clubs and cafes are around the flat, the Turkish Street Market is just opposite, on the other bank of the Landwehr Canal, running on Tuesdays, Fridays and Saturdays. All Berlin's places of interest can be reached fast by public trains or buses. You arrive the centre in few minutes: Subway stations that are near by:  U-B

name: 5 separate+ruhige Ferienwohnungen
summary: Wir bieten Ihnen  5 ruhige separate Maisonnette und Ferienwohnungen im Grünen BErlin`s an. Platz  für 15 Personen,  mit 8 Schlafzimmer, 5 Küchen und 5 Badezimmer mit Fenster, ein super Ausgangspunkt die Stadt Berlin und Umgebung zu erkunden. Bitte nur Anfragen bei mindestens 6  Nächten stellen.
space: Unsere beiden Ferienhäuser mit 5 separaten Ferienwohnungen, liegen verkehrsgünstig im Süden Berlins, in sehr ruhiger Lage trotz Flughafennähe, idealer Ausgangspunkt, um in die City Berlins und in die Kulturstadt Potsdam zu gelangen. Spreewald und Ostsee (Tagesausflug mit Auto) sind schnell und gut erreichbar. Auch der nahe gelegene Grünauer Forst (im Winter sollte Schnee liegen, gute Langlaufmöglichkeiten mit Ski, Großer + Kleiner Müggelsee sind schnell zu erreichen. Durch die ruhige Lage bieten wir einen erholsamen Ausgleich zur quirligen Hauptstadtmetropole. "Der Hauptmann von Köpenick" und das barocke Wasserschloss, der Köpenicker Sommer in der historischen Altstadt, das Hafen-fest an der Spree, Kneipenmusiknacht im Sommer, Whisky-Herbst oder internationales Jazz-Festival im Rathaus Hof von Köpenick sowie Weltkulturerbe Bruno Taut Siedlung (ca. 1 km zu Fuss), Kulturzentrum "Die Insel", Freizeitzentrum Wuhlheide, "Neu Venedig" in Rahnsdorf, mit Fahrrad und Boot gut zu erreichen, Flug

house_rules: Das Mitbringen von Haustieren (max. 1 Hund) ist nur in der Ferienwohnung  Nr. 4 möglich, da die anderen Ferienwohnungen für Tierhaltung nicht geeignet sind. Preis/Nacht/pro 1 Hund 10,- bis 15,- € .

Wir freuen uns darauf,  Euch in Berlin-Altglienicke begrüßen zu können. Bei  eventuellen Fragen zum Quartier, oder zur Umgebung, usw.  könnt ihr Euch gern an uns  wenden,

denn hier in Berlin Treptow-Köpenick werdet Ihr von singenden Vögelchen geweckt und nicht von lärmenden Autoverkehr .

name: quiet spacious sunny  2 room apt  w view 4.floor l
summary: Helle und geräumige 2-Zimmerwohnung im HH Seitenflügel eines Altbaus (52 m2) mit freiem Blick ins Grüne und in den schön bepflanzten Garten. zwei getrennte und ca. gleichgroße Zimmern mit insgesamt 4 Betten, die sich auch zur WG-Nutzung anbieten.  Die Möblierug kann nach Wunsch angepasst werden.  Interssante Wohnung wegen ihrer Nachbarschaft, Gemütlichkeit, komfortablen Betten, Küche, Sitzecken v Garten. Die Unterkunft ist gut für Paare, , Geschäftsreisende u.Familien (mit Kindern).
space: Very attractive, bright 2-room apartment on the 4th Floor wing of a renovated traditional building behind the mainbuilding. The apartment has an east / west orientation with a clear view of the countryside and the beautifully landscaped garden. It consists of two separate and approximately equal-sized rooms that lend themselves well to shared use. The beautiful bathroom has a large window and modern facilities. The apartment is furnished . In the kitchen there is a fitted kitchen with stove, oven and dishwasher. The washing machine is housed in the spacious bathroom. The floors are, except in the kitchen, covered with planks. The Katharinen Street is a quiet side street just of the Kurfürstendamm. Public transportation is accessible within 5 minutes - S-Bahn ring railway and bus and the subway line 7 . There are plenty  shopping opportunities nearby. Go to the theater? The Schaubühne theater is also within walking distance, as are fitness centers. We rent this flat  from a period of on

Gehen Sie gerne ins Theater? Die Schaubühne ist ebenfalls zu Fuß in wenigen Minuten zu erreichen. Einkaufs- und Shoppingmöglichkeiten liegen in unmittelbarer Nähe.

house_rules: Sie möchten unsere Wohnung mieten? Dann bitten wir um Vorlage eines Einkommensbescheides und Ihres Personalausweises. Danke.

Freundlicher Vermieter, unkompliziert, aufgeschlossen, zuvorkommend.

name: Cosy room in Mitte/Rosenthaler pl.
summary: Cosy and sexy flat in Mitte
space: The room is about 16sq meters, very bright and has a double bed.Also a big desk and a couch/double bed.The Apartment is situated on the 3rd floor with a great view over the park, with balcony. The flat has 2 bedrooms, one big kitchen, one bathroom with bathtub. The kitchen has everything you need (including a coffee machine). You have free WiFi internet and can also use the washing machine. NOTE:I have a small dog so if you allergic this is NOT  your flat:) SMOKING FLAT! The apartment is right around the corner of Rosenthaler Platz, close to Weinbergspark .Step outside the door and will find plenty of cool bars and restaurants right at your hand. To the subway and Tram station you walk 3 minutes from the flat. Your flatmate is male, 43 years old from Greece, filmmaker, very clean and easy going. I am really looking forward to meet you. If you have any questions regarding your stay or need some information on Berlin I will be happy to answer. See you soon George

name: Berlin City Center, Great Vista
space: An ideal starting point for tourists in Berlin!  You can rent a complete 3-room-appartment in the 17th floor with terrific view over Berlin. The appartment is suited for 4+2 persons: two bedrooms with double bed; open kitchen with eating table for four persons; living room with studio couch for 2 persons, TV and stereo equipment.  The location at the corner Holzmarktstrasse/Alexanderstrasse has very easy access to public transport: next to the house is the subway and the S-Bahn station Jannowitzbrücke, bus and boat transport is near the house. Shopping opportunities are also very close. The Alexanderplatz is within 5 minutes walking distance, shopping centers (e.g. Alexa, Kaufhof), restaurants, cinema, the Island of Museums and the town hall are close-by. From the nearby located regional train station Alexanderplatz Potsdam can be reached within 30 minutes. A free parking space for automobile is included. Towels, Linen and Internet access (DSL/WiFi) are also included.
description: An ideal starting point for tourists in Berlin!  You can rent a complete 3-room-appartment in the 17th floor with terrific view over Berlin. The appartment is suited for 4+2 persons: two bedrooms with double bed; open kitchen with eating table for four persons; living room with studio couch for 2 persons, TV and stereo equipment.  The location at the corner Holzmarktstrasse/Alexanderstrasse has very easy access to public transport: next to the house is the subway and the S-Bahn station Jannowitzbrücke, bus and boat transport is near the house. Shopping opportunities are also very close. The Alexanderplatz is within 5 minutes walking distance, shopping centers (e.g. Alexa, Kaufhof), restaurants, cinema, the Island of Museums and the town hall are close-by. From the nearby located regional train station Alexanderplatz Potsdam can be reached within 30 minutes. A free parking space for automobile is included. Towels, Linen and Internet access (DSL/WiFi) are also included.
host_about: Guten Tag, mein Name ist Georg und ich würde mich freuen nette und aufgeschlossene Gäste aus aller Welt begrüßen zu dürfen.

space: Quiet bright 2-room apartment on the second floor. Due to its central location in Berlin-Mitte you can go everywhere easily. The apartment is cozy and functional. In the surroundings you find several restaurants and supermarkets, bakery, newsagent, bicycle rental ...  Convenient location (10 minutes to Tegel Airport, 15 minutes to Central Station, 2 minutes to the highway), plus a lot of parking space (free of charge). transit: Der S-Bahnhof "Beusselstr" ist zu Fuß 5 Minuten entfernt, mit der dort fahrenden Ringbahn kommt man schnell überall hin. Ebenfalls am S-Bahnhof fahren mehrere Buslinien, u. a. zum Hauptbahnhof, zum Flughafen Tegel, zum Alexanderplatz... Die nächste U-Bahnstation "Birkenstrasse" ist zu Fuß ca. 15 Minuten entfernt, man kann aber auch mit der S-Bahn fahren und umsteigen.
interaction: Wir wohnen im gleichen Haus, das macht die Kommunikation sehr einfach.
house_rules: In der Wohnung darf nicht geraucht werden. Die Wohnung ist für Allergiker geeignet, Tiere dürfen nicht mitgebracht werden. Die Wohnung wird gereinigt und ordentlich übergeben, wir bitten darum, dass die Wohnung in einem ordnungsgemäßen Zustand verlassen wird. Anreise ab 14.00 Uhr (oder nach Vereinbarung), Abreise bis 10.00 Uhr (oder nach Vereinbarung). Anreise nach 22.00 Uhr ist möglich, es entstehen zusätzliche Kosten von EUR 15.
host_about: Mein Mann und ich vermieten seit 2005 Ferienwohnungen. Wir haben die Wohnungen liebevoll eingerichtet, so dass wir uns auch selbst wohlfühlen würden. Wir haben große Freude im Umgang mit unseren Gästen und haben in den vergangenen Jahren schon viele zufriedene Gäste beherbergt. Auch unsere beiden Töchter helfen bereits gerne mit, besonders beim Empfang unserer Gäste. Da wir selbst im gleichen Haus wohnen stehen wir als Ansprechpartner vor Ort persönlich zur Verfügung. Wir freuen uns auf Sie!

name: APARTMENT TO RENT
space: Hello future guests! We want to rent our cute and truly unique apartment in the heart of Berlin Friedrichshain during the times we're on holidays ourselves.  The flat is approximately 55 square meters big, there are two rooms with real double beds each, one small bathroom with a bathtub and a fully equipped kitchen. The kitchen has a nice dining table with enough space to spend a nice dinner evening with some friends around. The flat has a small balcony as well, overlooking the lively street we're living in. There are many bars, cafés and restaurants down there as well. We live in a very beautiful area!  We've also put a lot of effort into decorating the place in a creative way, and this is why we call it the "castle". :) And we hope to find some cool person to take care of it while we're not in Berlin!  Looking forward to hear from you. Please do not hesitate to contact us in case you have any questions! Best, Melanie & Daniel

name: Cottage Berlin-Friedrichshagen
space: Experience Berlin and its green environment… You can have both in our lovely cottage in Berlin-Friedrichshagen.Friedrichshagen is a part of Berlin (district Treptow-Koepenick) surrounded by a lot of woods and lakes.The lake ‘Mueggelsee’, parks, a shipping pier, beach, the ‘Spreetunnel’, various restaurants and shopping possibilities ‘Boelschestrasse’ are nearby. You can reach the centre of capital Berlin by tram and city train ‘S-Bahn’ in about 20-30 minutes. The cottage Our valuable equipped cottage (52qm) is situated on private grounds near the lake ‘Mueggelsee’ and offers all you need for a relaxed stay. The living room is furnished with a sofa bed, wardrobe, a table with two stools, LCD-TV with DVD-player and radio/CD. W-Lan is offered. The bedroom is furnished with a double bed.The bathroom is equipped with a wellness shower. name: furnished Room in an apartment in Friedrichshain
summary: The house of my apartment is an typical old building how you find it all around Berlin. It has wooden floors and heigh ceilings. Although the street is near to a big one, where you can find the Underground Station, you don't hear the rumour of the cars.  All around there a lot of shops to buy food, restaurants and bars. The typical mixture of Friedrichshain. Not far away there are nice parks.  In the ground floor of the house is a good antiquarian bookshop.
space: I offer a nice shiny room, 22 qm large in my apartment in the middle of the trendy Friedrichshain. It is very closed to the U5 Samariterstraße. The tenant has his own telefon and Internet. In the bathroom is a washing machine, you can use. The bathroom has also a bathtube. Friedrichshain is a very nice place for young people to have fun. There the tube station of the U5 very near by.

name: private, calm but very central
space: fully furnished flat for rent in berlin friedrichshain in the middle of the action (Clubs, pubs, restaurants, etc,etc). Infrastructure is excellent with easy acces to U bahn (5 minute walk) and S bahn 3 minute walk. Naturally you can also use the fully fitted kitchen and the bathroom which comes with both shower and bath. Free Wifi (fastest package) is available, 52 inch lcd tv, dvd, fax, scanner, printer, bed linen, towels,pop corn maker, nintendo wii, etc etc. u just have to bring your clothes.  Tram 21 stops within 50 meters of the apartment, U5 is within 400 meters, the S bahn ring is within 500 meters. there are 8 super markets in a radius of 800 meters including berlin's only  frische paradis which is the preferred supermarket for high end restaurants.  One of the run_train features is the panoramic view and the fact that the apartment is super private.

name: Too good to be true - in Friedrichshain Berlin
summary: Make yourself comfortable in the apartment, cook something delicious or simply relax after your adventures in Friedrichshain around Boxhagener Platz or after a busy day/or night elsewhere.    Enjoy your pleasantly quiet apartment!
space: - New furnished apartment in recently high standard renovated old building from 1905. - Theoretically you could arrive just with only your tooth brush. - The apartment is on the ground floor, situated to the green and quiet courtyard, where a cosy terrace with bench and table invites you to smoke a cigarette or simply enjoy the singing of the birds in the trees, you're looking at.. - It has a very high ceiling of 3,50m, a wooden floor in the run_train room and lovely green and white cement tiles in kitchen, shower and toilet. In the kitchen there is  - a cooking stove with oven, - a refrigerator, - a microwave,  - dish/tea towels, - a water boiler,  - espresso can, - toaster,  - a coffee machine for filter coffee,  -  different teas,  - filter coffee,  - oil, vinegar, salt and pepper,  - condensed milk, milk powder and sugar, - and plates, glasses, cooking pots, pans,  - knifes and forks and all the other cutlery, bottle opener, tin opener, etc.  -  and a washing machine and washing powder.

neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain is a very interesting neighborhood, where you find numerous bars and cafés, a food market on saturdays and the gorgeous flea market on sundays at the Boxhagener Platz! Right around the corner you will find the famous Frankfurter Allee - the former Stalinallee - a historic housing project of the GDR (former East Germany), now also a good place to see lovely sunsets.
notes: Ja - der Bäcker ist nur 3 Häuser weiter in der Hausnummer 2 - in Haus gegenüber ist eine sehr gute Eisdiele (Sommer) bzw. Schmuckgeschäft (Winter) - links an der Ecke und dann 8 Häuser weiter ist ein Supermarkt NETTO,   eine Straße weiter ist nicht ein BRUTTO, sondern ein BIO-ÖKO-SUPERMARKT.    Und jede Menge Späääääätkauf-Geschäft (Website hidden by Airbnb) eine Spezialität von Friedrichshain - ausserdem können Sie überall süße oder pikante Häppchen kaufen.
transit: Subway no. 5 brings you in 5 minutes from 'Samariter Str.' or 'Frankfurter Allee' to 'Alexanderplatz' or you take the tram to get to Kreuzberg or Prenzlauer Berg, which is both about 15 min. away from 'Frankfurter Allee'.
access: The studio is a quiet place in the courtyard and is a privat apartment, where the guests can make themselves comfortable. There is no possibility for having parties, because the neighbours need rest too!
interaction: - If it is needed, I will be there, if not, not. - But do not hesitate to ask for help or information!
house_rules: please switch off the lights and turn down the heating to level 2 when you are leaving the house. please don't party too loud - my neighbors hear everything!  ...And sorry ... smoking is not allowed inside the apartment ...
host_about: Hello, I'm Apostolos. I like to welcome you in my beautiful apartment in Berlin-Friedrichshain and I wish you a great stay. Yes, I know - you will like the place and the area.

notes: All information about the new accommodation tax:  Not for longstay guests.  The tourist tax is for bookings made on or after 1 January 2014 due and is collected by the city of Berlin in the amount of 5 % on the room accommodation rate (excl. VAT , excl. Airbnb charges, and without charges for other services such as mini bar , etc.  but including the endcleaning fee). Longstay travellers are excluded from the fee.  Since it is in the accommodation tax to "indirect tax" is , they will be added to the guest at the invoice and paid by the accommodation facility to the city. Business travelers are exempted from the accommodation tax , but must demonstrate the professional travel purpose . If a professional purpose of the night is not made by the guest credible , the accommodation tax is initially dissipate by the accommodation facility to the tax office . However, the guest has the opportunity to request within four months of the reimbursement of accommodation tax informally with the tax of

name: Modern Room in a nice Environment
summary: Lagebeschreibung Das Haus liegt im schönen Spandau am westlichen Rande Berlins, nahe der Messe, dem Olympiastadion und dem Flughafen Tegel, befinden sich die Havel, Seen und Felder und die historische Altstadt. Die Verkehrsanbindung ist sehr günstig, ob mit dem Auto, der Bahn oder den "Öffentlichen". In unmittelbarer Nähe befindet sich ausserdem ein Schwimmbad und die Havellandhalle. Dort können sie Tennis spielen, squashen, oder im Wellnessbereich entspannen.
space: Location Description: The house is beautifully located in Spandau on the western outskirts of Berlin, near the fairgrounds, the Olympic Stadium and the airport Tegel. Here are the Havel River, lakes and fields, as well as the historical Old Town. Transport links are very convenient, whether by car, train or public transport. Nearby there is also a swimming pool hall and the Havellandhalle. There you can play tennis or squash, or relax at the spa. Equipment: The modern room comes with a double bed and shower. In light wood color (see pictures). The kitchen and the washing machine in the house can also be used. Outdoor: The house has a beautiful garden with a large terrace and barbecue grills. Parking is available directly in front of the house. Special: There is an Ipod station with mini speakers and a radio alarm. WiFi and Cable-TV is also available. You can rent Nordic walking poles, or book a certified trainer courses.

transit: Nahe beim Haus gibt es zwei Buslinien, die Sie bequem in die City,zur Messe und zur Altstadt Spandau bringen, wo es eine Anbindung an U-Bahn, S-Bahn, Regionalbahn und Zugfernverkehr gibt. Parken vor dem Haus ist kein Problem
access: Gerne kann die Küche genutzt werden, natürlich auch das vorhandene Inventar, wie z.B. Kaffemaschine, Geschirr u.a.
house_rules: Kinder bis 12 Jahre 5€/Nacht Frühstück für 5€/Person zusätzlich möglich Leider hat der Senat Berlin das Übernachtungsteuergesetz (GVBL.vom (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) verabschiedet. Die Steuer beträgt 5 % des  Übernachtungsentgelts Ich bitte um Bezahlung dieser Gebühr in bar bei der Schlüsselübergabe.
host_about:
Ich hoffe, dass Sie eine großartige Zeit in Berlin verbringen und freue mich auf Ihren Besuch! Gerne helfe ich Ihnen, sich in Berlin zurechtzufinden.

Auf Wunsch bereite ich Ihnen Frühstück, ansonsten stelle ich auch gerne meine Küche zur Verfügung.

name: Central & Homelike Apartment
summary: Great place in one of the best neighborhoods in Berlin. Very central with Kastanienallee, Alexanderplatz, Hackescher Markt and Friedrichstraße very close by. Perfect to discover Berlin or to just enjoy one of the most exciting areas of the city.
space: The apartment is on the first floor right in front of the beautiful Arkonaplatz, a quiet park with a famous flea market on sundays. There is one living/sleeping room with a big bed (150x200), a couch, desk and W-Lan. The window faces the quiet & green Arkonaplatz. There is a full equipped kitchen with a table for up to 3 persons and a washing machine, as well as a bathroom with a big shower. The apartment is very central, it's located right next to the Mauerpark (a big park with the best flea market in Berlin on sundays) and the Kastanienallee (a very famous & trendy area with a lot of cafès, bars & boutiques). Brunnenstraße is very close as well with a lot of gallerys of young artists. You can reach Alexanderplatz with the U-Bahn in 5 minutes, the next supermarkt is 100 metres. Please respect that it's a non-smoker apartment. The apartment has available: Full equipped kitchen (without coffee machine!) Fast wireless internet connection

summary: The garden apartment is located in the ideal siting of Berlin Wannsee. It is situated in ground floor of the multi-family house. The flat is furnished in a comfortable manner and offers a lovely view into nature’s back-garden. During summer-time you can use the little seating arrangements just near your apartment door. We also offer facilities to lock up your bicycle. Parking spots for your car are often available on the street near your house. The flat is designed to accommodate 2 adults and a
space: Dear holiday-guests, the multi-family flat has an historic background of formerly being a barn-house for carriage drivers in 1906. It is located in the gorgeous and very safe siting of Berlin Wannsee. The area of Wannsee, in which the two apartments lie, offers a beautiful variety of landscape, spreading from forest, to lakes and to culture. This however does not limit the quick access into the city, be it by car or by public transportation. The S-Bahn station Wannsee can easily be approached by foot. From there the S-Bahn will transport you every 10 minutes to areas like the Ku’damm (20 minutes) or the Potsdamer Platz (30 minutes). Potsdam is practically around the corner. The apartments (one in ground floor and one in first floor) each feature a little separate bedroom and a combined living-room and dining-room with an additional sofa-bed. They can be booked for up to two adults and two children. These living facilities are very well equipped and furnished with a love for detail (Wi-

name: Luxurious 2BR in prime location
summary: check in and check out after agreement.
space: This Apartment is on the 2nd floor of a pre-war building on a tree lined street in the lovely Halensee neighborhood with plenty of restaurants, cafes, bakeries and shops in walking distance and easy access to public transportation. It has been completely remodeled this year and offers a luxurious and cozy home away from home to discover the exciting city of Berlin. The neighborhood is located in the former American Sector of Berlin, nestled between the Grunewald area with its elegant mansions and expansive woodlands and the bustling West Berlin city center with the Ku’damm as its run_train shopping boulevard. It offers easy access to the museums and major tourist attractions of the West and East Berlin city centers as well as the ICC convention center and the Tegel airport, and is ideal for families and couples as well as single tourists and business travelers. Experience all the history and entertainment Berlin has to offer and return to a comfortable home to enjoy a relaxing evening on th

name: Studio in the Heart of Kreuzberg
summary: Light and sunny 1-Room-turn of the century-flat in a typical Berliner front house in the best part of Kreuzberg.
space: The apartment has two very comfortable high end sleeper sofas (Ligne Roset and Pol74), a completely equipped kitchen, a bathroom with a bath tub, a TV and a dining table as well as an armchair. There is a small stereo which connects through usb to your MP3 player as well as phone and a WIFi Internet connection. All furniture is in very good condition. The bathtub  also works as shower and the kitchen is completely equipped with pots, dishes and cooking utensils, stove, small refrigerator, toaster and a coffee machine. The apartment has a beautiful wood floor and is keep in very clean condition so it is suitable to people with allergies. We use non-toxic and non-smelling cleaning materials. Bedding and towels are made available. 40,00 € will be charged for the final cleaning. Check in after 8.00 pm 20,00 €. Children til 14 years free. A cot can be provided upon request for one-time € 30.00 to do so.

name: Cozy Apartment with sun terrace
summary: Eine kleine, freundliche und helle Wohnung mit besonders großem Bad und großer Terrasse mit schöner Aussicht!
space: In a historical house in a nice local area you find a bright, small and individual Appartment. The nicely furnished living- and bedroom has a large double bed (orthopedic mattress), a small lounging area to sit down, a wardrobe and a TV set with DVD and VCR. The spacious bathroom comes with shower and hairdryer. The kitchen with small dining table has everything to prepare a meal (including microwave, toaster, coffee machine and water boiler). Coffee and tea is provided for you to make. An warm days you can have breakfast on the large terrace or enjoy the sun on the deckchair. Free WiFi internet. In the same building and in the direct neighborhood you find numerous stores for your daily needs and some restaurants. The S-Bahn station is just a minute away (direct connection to Mitte). Parking on the street is free of charge. We offer airport pick up on request. We are looking forward to welcome you. I will be available for any question you have during your stay.
description: In a historical house in a nice local area you find a bright, small and individual Appartment. The nicely furnished living- and bedroom has a large double bed (orthopedic mattress), a small lounging area to sit down, a wardrobe and a TV set with DVD and VCR. The spacious bathroom comes with shower and hairdryer. The kitchen with small dining table has everything to prepare a meal (including microwave, toaster, coffee machine and water boiler). Coffee and tea is provided for you to make. An warm days you can have breakfast on the large terrace or enjoy the sun on the deckchair. Free WiFi internet. In the same building and in the direct neighborhood you find numerous stores for your daily needs and some restaurants. The S-Bahn station is just a minute away (direct connection to Mitte). Parking on the street is free of charge. We offer airport pick up on request. We are looking forward to welcome you. I will be available for any question you have during your stay.
neighborhood_overview: Besonders gefällt mir hier eine fast dörfliche Athmosphäre und dennoch ist man mitten in der Großstadt!! Alle Läden und Lokale des täglichen Bedarfs sind im Haus oder der unmittelbaren Umgebung.
notes: Da das Apartment ein Teil unserer Wohnung ist haben wir bereits eine sogenannte Negativbescheinigung vom zuständigen Bezirksamt bekommen und können offiziell so wie bisher weitervermieten! Vom Flur des Apartments gibt es eine Tür in unseren Wohnungsteil, die normalerweise abgeschlossen ist. Wir haben auch einen anderen Eingang. Sehenswert sind hier die eher unbekannten Lilienthalvillen, Einfamilienburgen mit Zugbrücke vor der Haustür! Nach zeitlicher Verfügbarkeit zeige ich sie Euch gerne! Mit der S Bahn Linie 1 erreichen Sie z.B. ohne Umsteigen in 18 min. den Potsdamer Platz......hier gibt es nicht nur Restaurants, Theater, die Philharmonie und das Filmmuseum und das Spionagemuseum, sondern er ist auch der Hauptort für die Berliner Filmfestspiele und den Kartenvorverkauf dafür.
transit: Die S Bahn Linie 1 ist direkt gegenüber ( Oranienburg- Frohnau- Friedrichstrasse- Brandenburger Tor- Steglitz- Zehlendorf- Wannsee- Potsdam und zurück!), ausserdem Busse und ein Taxistand. Vom Flughafen Tegel nehmen Sie den TXL Bus bis Brandenburger Tor und von dort die S1 Richtung Wannsee bis Lichterfelde West. Von Schönefeld aus fahren Sie mit der S Bahn bis Schöneberg und dann wieder S1 bis Lichterfelde West. Vom Hauptbahnhof fahren Sie S Bahn Richtung Osten bis Friedrichstrasse und dann wieder die S1 bis Lichterfelde West.
access: Es gibt W Lan Internet für Ihren Laptop, Bücher, Karten und Filme zu Berlin und Umgebung.....
interaction: Da wir gleich nebenan wohnen können wir Ihnen bei allen Fragen behilflich sein und Tipps zu Berlin und Umgebung geben! Wir bitten Sie herzlich Ihre Ankunfts- und Abreisezeiten rechtzeitig mit uns zu besprechen und unsere Hinweise zur Anreise zu beachten!
house_rules: Bitte keine Haustiere! Wir bitten ausserdem um Ruhe im Hausflur und Rücksichtnahme auf die Mitbewohner im Haus. Freundlich wäre es auch, wenn Sie den hellen Teppichboden im Zimmer nicht mit nassen Schuhen von der Strasse oder von der Terrasse aus betreten würden.
host_about:
Ich freue mich darauf Sie in meiner Ferienwohnung willkommen zu heißen. Bei Fragen stehen ich Ihnen gerne zur Verfügung.

Wir können Ihnen In unserer näheren Umgebung Orte zeigen, die sie in keinem Reiseführer finden, z.B. die Familienburgen der Brüder Lilienthal mit Zugbrücke vor der Haustür oder Orte in denen sich die Widerstandsbewegung gegen Hitler getroffen hat.

Wir reisen selber gerne und versuchen immer auch die Orte/Dinge/Menschen zu entdecken, die nicht in Reiseführern zu finden sind.

name: Lux Berlin 1: boutique & design
summary: "Lux Berlin 1" is a stylish boutique apartment on the ever-popular Oderberger Strasse in the trendy district of Prenzlauer Berg, bordering on Mitte. The apartment is fully equipped for long stays; please contact me for special monthly rates.
space: LUX BERLIN 1 is on the 4th floor of a restored turn-of-the-century building and has a balcony with a superb view over the entire Oderberger Strasse. You can watch the people stroll up and down the Kastanienallee while having coffee in the morning or the sun set over the Mauerpark while sipping a glass of wine in the evening. The apartment has been completely remodelled and renovated while maintaining original features like arched windows and beautiful hardwood floors and is decorated with an eclectic mix of contemporary design furniture and vintage pieces from the 60's & 70's. "Lux Berlin 1" combines old-Berlin charm with modern-day comfort and offers an exclusive living environment in one of the prettiest, most vibrant neighbourhoods of Berlin. neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the trendy, vibrant district of Prenzlauer Berg, bordering on artistic, cosmopolitan Mitte. The Oderberger Strasse is a very lively yet very relaxed street that offers the distinctively bohemian vibe Prenzlauer Berg has been made famous for. Artsy cafés, quaint boutiques and laid back restaurants make it a favourite destination of locals and visitors alike.  Neighbourhood highlights include the Kastanienallee with its dozens of bars, restaurants and coffee shops -among which the renowned Prater, Berlin’s oldest beer garden- and the Mauerpark with its very popular Sunday flea market. The entertainment complex of the Kulturbrauerei is just around the corner, as well as the Kollwitzplatz with its fine wining and dining (and, of course, shopping). The not-to-be-missed Berlin Wall Memorial is in the vicinity of the apartments whereas Berlin landmarks such as the TV Tower or the Museum Island are a leisurely stroll.  This is an ideal base for exploring Berlin: rig

name: Design-Room in Mitte/PrenzlauerBerg
space: Attention - there is a construction site nearby. Maybe there will be some noise from 7 am - 4 pm A comfortable room in the heart of Berlin, between Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. Just a few steps away from Kollwitzplatz and Kastanienallee with a variety of cafes, restaurants and art galleries. The subway stations Senefelder Platz (U2) and Rosenthaler Platz (U8) are just around the corner. Alexanderplatz, the Pergamon Museum and the Berlin Wall Documentation Centre are convenient walking distances, as is Hackescher Markt with its artsy boutiques and unique shopping experience. The famous Sunday fleamarket is also nearby at Mauerpark. There are many places to rent bikes and to start exploring the city by bus or by foot. The neighborhood is a focal point of Berlin’s unique nightlife. The room is part of a modern, newly designed penthouse, on the fourth floor of a beautiful, historical landmark from the 19th century. name: TOP apartment in art nouveau villa
summary: The apartment is part of a lovely villa yet has its own entrance. It consists of two large , very comfortably furnished, connected rooms, a bathroom with walk-in shower and a fully equipped modern kitchen. The functional living/bedroom internet connection are available on request. The adjacent Àrt winter garden situation is another seating area where you can have further beds on demand. Summary: sleeps maximum of 4 people.
space: The modern and luxurious comfort apartment in art nouveau villa has a separate entrance. The floors are covered with wood, the bathroom has a heated floor, double bed 180x200cm, single bed. The guests have a pleasant shady garden patio. It is possible to use the sauna. A washing machine is available in the kitchen. The apartment is furnished with great attention to detail. The quiet location of the residential district of Berlin offers both the possibility of relaxing forest and see walks and all leisure facilities, on the other hand. The city can be reached within 20 minutes with public transportation. If requested the landlord offer a professional city sightseeing tour. The owner speaks English and French. Pets are allowed on request.

neighborhood_overview: Description Comfortable holiday apartment-exclusive Studio in wonderful Jugendstil villa, in most sought-after part of Berlin, easy to get to; own entrance, 60 sq.m., DSL, garden sauna, etc., near to forest & lake, but central. No smoking; all local activities Area activities This comfortable 60 sq.m. holiday apartment with separate entrance consists of two connected rooms in a newly built, well-maintained Jugendstil villa in the most sought-after part of Berlin. Zehlendorf suburb has well-spaced villas with lots of greenery. Visitors to Berlin can reach us easily without any problems by motorway (Avus) or by S-Bahn or U-Bahn nearby. You can park in front of the house. The holiday apartment in south west Berlin (formerly american sektor), is outside the environmenntal zone, so you don´t need an environmenta sticker. It is very scenic and surrounded by lakes (Grunewald, Wannsee beach pool, Schlachtensee and other lakes) far away from city centre hustle but still in the centre. That´s th
notes: Das Wohnumfeld hier ist einzigartig.  Wald, Seen, gesunde Luft, hervorragende Infrastruktur, alle Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, tolle Restaurants. Trotzdem - z.B. mit dem Rad durch den Grunewald - superschnell auf dem Kurfürstendamm oder in Potsdam (natürlich auch mit dem Wagen oder durch optimale öffentliche Verkehrsanbindung). Der ideale Ausgangsort also Berlin und Potsdam kennen zu lernen!
transit: Beste Anbindung an die öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel. S-Bahn, U-Bahn und Busse ca. 500 Meter fußläufig erreichbar. Den eigenen Wagen parken Sie kostenfrei und sicher direkt vor dem Haus.
access: Eigene, abgeschlossene Wohnung mit eigenem Hauseingang.
interaction: Gerne stehen wir unseren Gästen für Fragen, Anregungen und Tipps zur Verfügung, damit Sie optimal sich diese große Stadt erschließen können. Auf Wunsch führen wir themenbezogen auch Stadt- und Umgebungsrundfahrten durch, informieren über aktuelle Sehenswürdigkeitenzeigen und aktuelle Höhepunkte, besorgen Eintrittskarten usw. Sprechen Sie uns einfach an; wir wollen, dass Sie sich bei uns sehr wohl fühlen, dass auch Sie dann als Stammgäste wiederkommen.
house_rules: Der Mieter verpflichtet sich die Wohnung und alles damit Zusammengehörende pfleglich zu behandeln, sauber zu halten und in unbeschädigtem, aufgeräumtem, sauberem  und in besenreinem Zustand zurückzugeben.  Sollten Mängel an der Wohnung oder den Einrichtungsgegenständen vorhanden sein, sind diese jeweils sofort anzuzeigen. Die Kosten für die Beseitigung selbst verursachter Schäden/ Mängel müssen vom  Mieter ersetzt werden.  Die Wohnung darf nur von den angegebenen Personen - gem. Buchungsbestätigung/ Meldeschein -  genutzt werden (keine Einladungen weiterer/ anderer Personen!). Das Mitbringen von Haustieren steht unter dem ausdrücklichen Zustimmungsvorbehalt des Vermieters.  Das Rauchen in der Wohnung ist nicht gestattet.  Falls die Ferienwohnung aus Gründen, die außerhalb des Einflussbereiches des Vermieters liegen, nicht zur   Nutzung überlassen werden kann, erhält der Mieter die an den Vermieter geleisteten Zahlungen für nicht in Anspruch genommene Leistungen zurück. name: Panorama Apartment Berlin Centre
summary: Luxury one room apartment in top location in a high-rise building in Berlin's historic centre, with a spectacular birdseye view of Berlin city. Ideal for couples, discerning Berlin visitors and business travellers. 30 m², 1 room, 19th floor, parking.
space: Short details: 30 m², 1 room, 19th floor. Max. 2 persons, 1 double bed, bathroom with bathtub, free Internet, LCD TV, lift, child friendly, car parking. Non smoking & no pets Further details: apartmentberlincentre wordpress com Berlin, Berlin, we are going to Berlin! On the most central location of Berlin, directly at Hackescher Markt, there is the skyscraper in the Rochstraße. With its proud 100 meters, called "The Windmill" because of its ground plan, it is the tallest high-rise apartment building in Berlin. Four elevators bring you up to the 24th floor. In this building, which was a home of the privileged and dignitaries of the GDR, a well-lit holiday apartment is waiting in the 19th floor for you. Modern, quiet, and newly renovated, this vacation home offers you a fantastic view over Berlin's historic centre, and enough space for a pleasant stay in Berlin. The holiday apartment was completely renovated and restored in 2008 by an interior designer. One wall in the hall was deliberat

neighborhood_overview: Panorama Apartment Berlin City Centre is located in the very city centre and the historic heart of Berlin, directly at Hackescher Markt. More central is only possible if you sleep directly on the Television Tower. But it is revolving… Numerous sightseeing, cultural institutions, restaurants and bars, characterize the area around the Hackescher Markt. SIGHTSEEING within walking distance from the apartment There are at your feet: • Hackescher Markt with the laboriously restored Hackescher Höfe (Hackescher Courtyards). The complex of eight yards is Germany largest residential and commercial courtyard. • St. Mary's Church – the oldest preserved parish church of the medieval Berlin • Berlin Cathedral – built as a court and memorial church of the Hohenzollern • Berlin Town Hall (Rotes Rathaus) • Nikolai Quarter – 773 years old • St. Nicholas Church – Berlin’s oldest maintained building • Alexanderplatz with the World Clock. In just 5 minutes by foot you reach: • the TV Tower – with a total h
transit: PUBLIC TRANSPORT CONNECTIONS Optimum public transport connection Hackescher Markt being a traffic junction. • S-Bahn & Tram station Hackescher Markt • U-Bahn, S-Bahn & train station Alexanderplatz • Metro station Weinmeisterstraße • Bus stop Spandauer Straße/Marienkirche. The sightseeing buses of the lines 100 and 200, the Airport Express bus TXL, as well as the M48 and 248 buses are starting from the doorstep. • Direct connection to the airports Tegel and Schönefeld • Direct S-Bahn connection to the Trade Fair Centre ICC and the Olympic Stadium.

name: Berlin-Mitte: Modern design, breakfast & balcony!
summary: “Are you a breakfast person? Do you want to enjoy a sophisticated modern ambience while staying in the very centre of Berlin? Ready for some insider tips?”
space: Easily accessible from both local airports, this premium accommodation is a little oasis amidst the bustling city: ultra-quiet, non-smoking and pet-free! Located in a renovated historic building with an elevator, your guest room is situated over the quiet inner courtyard. It has a queen-size bed (160 x 200 cm), private balcony, free Wi-Fi, a desk, lounge chair, flat-screen TV, DAB+ radio. The room is cleaned daily.

neighborhood_overview: If you’re looking for a central spot without being in the middle of the hustle and bustle, then this is the perfect place!  You can easily walk to sights such as Brandenburg Gate, Checkpoint Charlie, Friedrichstrasse, Gendarmenmarkt, Hamburger Bahnhof, Hackesche Höfe, Potsdamer Platz, Reichstag, Siegessäule, Tiergarten, Topography of Terror, Unter den Linden or Alexanderplatz. Grocery stores, post office, cash machines, pharmacies, car or bicycle rental and a public olympic size indoor swimming pool are available nearby. Next-door neighbors: - Supermarket: Rewe, Chausseestraße (till 23:00h) - Chemist's: dm-drogerie, Invalidenstraße (till 20:30h) - Restaurant: Neumond, Borsigstraße 28 (07:00h – 00:00h) - Snackbar: Yarok, Torstraße (till 00:00h) - Winebar: petrarca, Novalisstraße 8 (11:00h – 22:00h) - Café: Oslo Kaffebar, Eichendorffstraße 13 (08:00h – 19:00h) - Bar: Melody Nelson, Novalisstraße 2 (19:00h – 02:00h) - Café: Bondi, Eichendorffstraße 6 (08:00h – 18:00h) - Bakery: Alpenstück
notes: Parking is available in front of the house at the cost of EUR 1.00 per hour (9 AM to 9 PM). Parking free of charge is available at a location nearby.

house_rules: You can check in any time after 2 PM (14:00h). The guest room should be vacated by 11 AM  (11:00h) on the day of departure. You are welcome to leave your luggage in the flat to collect later. All prices include 1 set of keys for the flat, wireless internet, TV, radio, towels, sheets, bathrobes and a daily self-service breakfast.  You will receive a key to the flat, as well as one which locks your guest room should you so wish. Please take care not to lose these – otherwise there is a charge for replacing the key. The same applies to amenities in the room that are damaged and need replacement. If you end your stay earlier than your booking, the overnight price will not be refunded, neither in part nor as a whole. A bill can be issued upon request. It does not include VAT. space: Description of the apartment: Welcome to a large and  comfortable private room in my beautiful apartment in Berlin. The apartment is located in the Westend, very close to ICC, trade shows and exibition, Kudamm  and the Castle Charlottenburg. The apartment is bright and cozy in a quiet neighborhood. It is fully equipped and has a comfy living room, two bedrooms, a dining room, a kitchen and a bathroom. The diningroom has a big 6 people table where the breakfast is served. The living room has a very comfy sofa, some coffee tables, a futon, a big flatscreen TV and cable TV access. The bedroom contains a big bed. The bathroom is even equipped with a bath tub (jakuzzi). In the kitchen you will  find everything you need. Even a dishwasher. Also you get reliable wi- fi  Internet access, a guide for sightseeing and cycling tours.  In the area there are a lot of nice restaurants and you have a good conection by public transport: U2, S-Bahn, Buses, parking. If you still have any questions or nee

name: 2-bedroom apartment Gendarmenmarkt
space: Approx. 48sqm, suitable for up to 4 people, 3 Floor, elevator, bedroom: double bed 200x180, living room: sofa bed 190x142, TV, dining area with kitchenette with 4-zone ceramic hob and fridge with freezer, bathroom with tub and shower, bed linen and towels, balcony with garden furniture. The apartment is very central and yet quiet. Both rooms and the balcony facing west, overlooking a green area. Many attractions, restaurants, shops and cultural facilities are within walking distance, such as Brandenburger Tor, Potsdamer Platz, Alexanderplatz, Check-point Charly, Unter den Linden, Alte Nationalgalerie a.s.o. Metro station (Spittelmarkt) and bus stops nearby. 5 minutes walk to Gendarmenmarkt. During New Year's Eve the minimum stay is 5 nights. The check-in has to be before 20:00 h. After 20:00 h a check-in is not possible.

name: WHOLE APARTMENT: SWEET & COZY HOME AWAY FROM HOME
summary: Usually only a room to rent, but since I ll be travelling all August, the whole apartment is yours! This place will be your sanctuary - with a big living room, double loft bed, comfortable couch, many plants, fully equipted kitchen with lots of organic herbs, spices and tea, huge bathroom & a very unique and quiet atmosphere where you can relax from your buzy days in town. Located in one of the greenest and coolest areas in town, near Landwehrkanal, Club der Visionäre, Arena, Watergate...
space: here is your chance to spend your time in berlin cozy and comfortable in a lovely and charming apartment - some of my guests call it "the sanctuary". i usually live there by myself - and love this place and i m sure u will love it, too. since i will be away from berlin for a couple of weeks, i d like to give it to some friendly guests. so, if you don´t feel bothered by my private things, like books, fotos and clothes, just book it and be prepared for a real Berlin experience. But please be aware - i m sharing my home with you, so its not a hotel and i would really appreciate you being respectful with that.  the apartment is located in a very quiet street, named kiefholzstr., its between 2 parks (5min. walk to görlitzer park and 10 min. walk to treptower park), kreuzberg and neukölln with all the bars, clubs and shopping are 10-15 min walk, u can even reach the famous watergate, arena club and club der visionäre by walking. there is an organic supermarket 5 min. walk and some normal con

But please be aware - i m
neighborhood_overview: Es ist ruhig und grün, und gleich um die Ecke von allem, was man bei einem Berlinbesuch braucht. Kreuzberg mit den vielen Restaurants und Clubs ist um die Ecke, Neukölln auch. Nach Mitte kommt man super mit der Sbahn - es ist eigentlich nichts weit weg und doch ist man ein einer grünen Oase, mit vielen Bäumen, zwei Parks, Kanal und einem großen Bioladen.
transit: Bus um die Ecke, Sbahn 12 min zu Fuß
access: Küche, Bad, Flur, Garten.
house_rules: take off your shoes. relax. feel like at home and treat my home like your own but respect other peoples property. oh! and no smoking in the flat please!
host_about: Hi, I am Tati, 33 years old visioner, traveller and yogi. Thats why my little private temple in berlin is free from time to time :) a chance for you to spend your time in berlin cozy and comfortable in a lovely and charming apartment - some people call it sanctuary :)

neighborhood_overview: Your neigborhood: Spree-River, park, boat rentals, restaurants, good public transportation. Enjoy the tranquility and comfort. The club Sisyphus and Aboutblank (Techno, House etc.) are within walking distance. The Aboutblank is one of the hippest clubs in Germany.  The legendary Berghain as a top club in Europe is in 5 minutes by train to reach (weekend night traffic until the next morning every 15 minutes). Supermarket Rewe is always open night and day, except Sundays. Just 3 minutes by suburban train (S Warschauer Str.).
notes: - No noise and no loud music - No parties - No escort - Entry/visits only for booked guests Berlin's Citytax is an additional tax of 5%. The Citytax totaling 5% on the room price to be paid upon arrival on site. There is a deposit of 100 € payable at arrival. After departure it will be transfered back on your bank-account. Cleaning fee includes: - final cleaning fee - Wifi - linen + sheets - towels - kitchentowels - cleaning tabs for dishwasher - soap - toothpaste - one bottle of cool mineral waster - coffee/tea for first day
transit: S-Bahn: Every 3 minutes to untill 1:00 am, Friday and Saturday night (from  1:00 am to 4 am: Every 15 minutes) Bus: Every 10 minutes Tram: Every 20 minutes Night traffic bus (1:00 to 4 pm) daily, depending on the direction: Every 15 minutes Ship: Excursion directly to Friedrichstr.
access: - Free Parking - Free high-speed wireless - Novels, travel guides and information material - Table tennis and parking outside the house - Boat launch nearby
interaction: - Joint tour of the residential area possible. The residential area has been awarded the German Association of Cities price because of the outstanding architecture and quality of living.
house_rules: Keine Partylocation, keine Filmaufnahmen (außer privat), kein Escort, gewisses Maß an Sauberkeit wird gewünscht. Das Zimmer steht für 1 oder 2 Gäste zur Verfügung.
host_about:
49 Jahre, interessiert an Architektur, Garten und Kultur.



Ich liebe meine Wahlheimat Berlin mit vielen Events und tollen Locations.



Ich reise gerne innerhalb Europas. Lieblingsurlaubsländer sind die USA und Südafrika.

summary: Exclusive Studio A  35qm, quiet & central, SW-balcony free parking and WiFi-Internet overlooking the river Spree at Tiergarten, close to U /S Bahn & Bus.
space: The Studio apartment A,  -  35qm, S.W.-balcony overlooking the river Spree,  quiet and very central. name: Outstanding penthouse in Prenz Berg
space: Great location: situated in the most hip area in Berlin surrounded by nice Restaurants and cafes. CENTRAL PRENZLAUERBERG  This is Berlin’s über-trendy district, a favourite with young crowds and artsy types who frequent its terrace cafés, kitsch boutiques and alternative-style bars around Kollwitzplatz, or the Kulturbrauerei, an old brewery with shops and nightlife. Excellent public transport connections take you into Mitte in about 10 minutes, where you can visit run_train Berlin attractions such as Alexanderplatz, Museum Island or Hackescher Markt. Prenzlauer Berg was the first neighborhood in former East Berlin in which the wall came down, so there is a memorial park & a Museum to the Berlin Wall nearby. It is also the closest residential neighborhood to Mitte, the center of the city where you find many Monuments, Museums, and Tourist sites. 5 min walking distance from S-Bahn/U-Bahn Shonhauser Allee (S(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)) and U-Bahn Eberswalder Platz (U2)It will take you only 10-15 min

notes: Please be aware that sometimes (not always) for long term lease you can negotiate for a better price.  Under some circumstances you can get a better offer 1-2 weeks prior to your visit if there are sudden cancelations or unsold dates.
house_rules: Always close all doors and windows when you leave the apartment!!!! Smoking allowed only on the balcony or on the roof. Please, NO SMOKING INSIDE! PENALTY = 250 EURO FROM YOUR DEPOSIT! PLEASE, NO PARTIES!!! There are lot's of clubs and bars in Berlin for this purpose... Be respectful to the neighbors, always give them a smile and say Hallo! Try not to make much noise with your suitcases. This is not a hotel. Please adjust the music volume after 10 pm, Germans wake up early and work hard. That's why German's economy is the strongest in Europe... Take precautions with candles! Please switch off lights when you don't need them!  Special notice for hot summer time visitors. Berliners do not like and very rarely install air conditioners. The same case with our apartment. There are no air conditioners. So when it's very hot we survive openings windows and using electric fans. We have a few of them. Berlin air is very fresh. Enjoy breathing it! In most cases check in and check out time are fl

Hi, I am Dimitry, I am looking forward meeting you soon!

name: Nice double room
summary: we are a guesthouse and not a private  appartment. every room/appartment with its own entrance and bathroom.
space: Best location for people interested in culture and subculture! Stay cheap and kept quiet in the historic ambiance of our "maid's room '" in the heart of Berlin (Museum Island, Alexanderplatz, Hackescher Markt). A late-classical building from (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) with some original paintings. We are a guest house with 10 rooms. All rooms are equally  well equipped. You may be booked into a different but similar room to the one shown on this page. Each room has a separate entrance, shower, toilet and wireless Internet access. The backyard offers absolute tranquility on the quiet night. Morning wake up call by pleasant (Hidden by Airbnb) ing of birds, so the day can start smoothly! Furthermore there is a lovely garden with a 80-year-old linden that invites you to relax or read a book. Ideal point to discover & explore the city! The surrounding area has many famous sights (Kollwitzplatz, "Dicker Herrmann," Unter den Linden, etc.). Around the Clock there are numerous catering fac

space: I am looking to sublet my 2 rooms : 1 bedroom and 1 living room/studio I have 2 rooms in a lovely 4-room apartment. - a bedroom  - a large studio/workspace  it's large and sunny and has a big desk and a smaller one, a couch & armchair, and lots of books (which i'll leave there, that's why i need a reliable subletter & a deposit) The apartment is on Sonnenallee, close to the corner to Pannierstr in Neukölln, at the very heart of beautiful Neukölln(close to Weserstr, Hermannplatz, Maybachufer, etc). host_about:
I'm a curator, writer, artist and academic; I love music, literature, cinema art and cats (in no specific order) :)

I'm usually based in Berlin but travel often for research and art projects. I'm always happy to explore new places, revisit places, and meet new people, and to be a host: for most of my adult life I have often had friends and friends of friends staying on my couch whenever I lived, and would take them around discover the city as much as I could. 



In the past half year I was away for long research trips in East Asia and the US, but am back in Berlin now in my beloved apartment in the heart of beautiful Neukölln, hands down my favourite place in Germany. I really love my neighbourhood! 

My flatmate moved away recently and so now half of my apartment (two rooms: one bedroom and one studio / living room) has opened up to host guests, just in time for when the weather gets really lovely in Berlin and my neighbourhood is even more flourishing than usual :)

summary: Die Wohnung ist komplett eingerichtet (Waschmaschine , Geschirrspüler, komplett ausgestattete Küche mit Herd, Mikrowelle, Toaster, Kaffeemaschin, etc.), großes Doppelbett (180x200cm), riesige Ledersofagarnitur, LCD-TV, DCD-Player. space: Dear Guests - Welcome to Berlin! very nice and modern Designer Apartment located in the Heart of Prenzlauer Berg - the most popular and interesting district in Berlin. Countless pubs, restaurants, cafés, galleries and little shops create a day and nightlife atmosphere unrivalled in the rest of Berlin. Good public transportation within walking distance. Just a few meters away from the apartment there is the Subway (Circle-Line) and Underground Station (U2) Schönhauser Allee, and different Bus and Tram Stations. The Apartment is 75 squaremeters big and has 1 bedroom , 1 livingroom, a kitchen, a bathroom with bathtube and shower and a small balcony. Its 4th floor, without elevator. For 1 or maximum 2 Persons its completly furnished- modern Designstyle. Washing machine, Dryer, Dishwasher. DSL-Wireless-Internet 46" LCD TV KingsizeBed 180x200cm There is a refundable security deposit to pay at arrival, which will paid back at departure. I am looking forward to welcome you!

host_about: Mein Lebensmotto lebe, lache und arbeite lieber heute, denn morgen kann es schon zu spät sein. Ein Gast wird von mir jederzeit Hilfe erhalten, falls er sie benötigt. Eine ausgewogene Ernährung, mit wenig Fleisch bestimmt meine Ernährung im Alltag. Gespräche und Kommunikation sind mir wichtig, denn die machen das Leben erst lebenswert. Natürlich kommt die Musik und der Film nicht zu kurz, aber meist erst nach Feierabend, falls es den überhaupt gibt. Sei hiermit herzlich Willkommen.

name: Design Jewel in the midst of MITTE!
space: Hackescher Markt: The "place to be" in Berlin!  Very nice, full furnished designer apartment in the heart of Berlin MITTE, between Alexanderplatz and the well-known Hackesche Höfe, in the "WEINMEISTERSTRAßE".  MORE MITTE IS IMPOSSIBLE! ;-) The Hackeschen Höfe, the Alexanderplatz, the Museum Island and Unter den Linden within walking distance!! The flat is 35 sqm and is part of a 150 sqm private loft. It has been entirely renovated in May 2011. It is a so called "Altbau", that means an old Berlin house (see picture of the building front), with a garden for joint use (see picture). It has been renovated and decorated in a very modern urban look.  DESCRIPTION A modern design small bathroom with design mosaic flags and a wide shower with massage shower, floor heating. A nice bedroom with a bed for two persons and a garderobe. A modern kitchen access with everything you need, as well as dishwasher and washing machine (built-in appliances) with a bar table and chairs, LED-SMART-TV (with dire

transit: From TEGEL airport: Bus TXL driving you directly to Alexanderplatz in around 25 minutes, from there you walk 5 minutes to the Weinmeisterstraße! From SCHÖNEFELD airport: Regional train (RE) driving you directly to Alexanderplatz in around 30 minutes, from there you walk 5 minutes to the Weinmeisterstraße! From HAUPTBAHNHOF Berlin (Central train station): S-Bahn direction Ahrensfelde until HACKESCHER MARKT station (from the central stations that means 2 stations only, about 3 minutes) from there you walk around 3 minutes to the Weinmeisterstraße!
host_about:
Hello! I'm french, 38 years old and live in Berlin with my German husband, my little daughter, who is 7 years old, my son, 5 years old and my Baby, 1 year old! I would be glad to welcome you soon in the midst of Berlin Mitte, one of the most wanted area of the German capital!

Cheers!

Stéphanie

name: 2-room apartment. Mauerpark TOP!
space: Come stay in the coolest part of Berlin, in my 2-room apartment, right next to Mauerpark, and near the Berlin wall! The sofa bed sleeps up to 2 people.  In the living room you will find a TV with a huge DVD collection and stereo, dining area and access to the balcony where you can smoke. The kitchen is fully equipped. The bathroom also has a bathtub, in case you need a nice relaxing bath after a long day of sightseeing! You will also have use of the washing machine.  If you need internet access, my computer is available. S-and U-Bahn Gesundbrunnen is just a few minutes on foot or by the bus, which stops right outside the front door (with a connection to Nordbahnhof). Directly at the station Gesundbrunnen you will also find a large shopping center. Mauerpark, with its famous flea market and open-air karaoke on Sunday (in Summer) is just around the corner. In 5 minutes you walk to Prenzlauer Berg with its many shops, restaurants, bars and clubs.

name: Room in great green city location
space: Double bedroom available in spacious raised ground floor flat located in leafy green location with excellent public transport links to city center (25 min).   Located in the SW of the city close to university (FU Berlin), botanical gardens, Grunewald (city forest with lakes), and walking distance to shopping on Schloss strasse, which is the local people's Kurfuerstendamm. Very good transport links with bus, U-bahn and S-bahn close by and direct connections to city centre and sights like the Brandenburg Gate, Museum Island, KadeWe, Kurfuerstendamm and Zoo. Bus connection directly outside building to U & S bahn Rathaus Steglitz; U-bahn Breitenbach platz, 7 min walk. Flat is 100sqm/1100sqft with large entrance hall, dining room, living room, bedroom, kitchen and small bathroom. Beautiful SE facing large (12sqm/120sqft) terrace off the living room to the back overlooking gardens. Underfloor heating in living room, dining room and bathroom. Bedroom has queen size bed. For additional guest a

house_rules: Absolutely no smoking indoors. Can use terrace to smoke outside. Sorry, no pets. Please respect the neighbours and keep down the noise. No parties.
host_about: I'm a retired air hostess still travelling the world and exploring new places. Berlin is a fabulous city and I hope that you will love it as much as I have over the last 50 years I've lived here. I am happy to open my home to you as a base for your adventures and a place to relax.

name: PRETTY + CENTRAL
space: Hi! Check out our beautiful studio apartment in Prenzlauer Berg. As it's situated in a building which is more than 100 years old, you can enjoy the typical "altbau" ceiling - which is more than 3.5 meters high. Facing the courtyard, it's very quiet.  Of course, bed linen and towels are provided for you during your stay with us. To give you an idea of the area, there are lots of coffee shops, restaurants, bars, supermarkets and Berlin Boutiques. We're happy to give you a few recommendations if you'd like some local tips! You can also check out some famous tourist attractions and sights in the immediate area: Kulturbrauerei, The Wasserturm, Prater, Mauerpark, Kollwitzplatz, Helmholzplatz and Kastanienallee. If you want to get into the heart of Mitte, a 20 minute walk will get you there where you can check out the center of old East Berlin. This area has many brand name and design stores around. Public transportation in Berlin has a great reputation, and the apartment is located 3 minutes

name: Sunny room, Kreuzberg
space: Stay within the  heart of Kreuzberg! This tidy room sleeps one or two, and is the perfect place from which to launch your explorations of the city. Set in the heart of Kreuzberg you'll find restaurants, bars, cafes, clubs and more all within a five minutes walk, or less.  If you've come to get a feel for a real Berlin neighborhood this is the place for you! Görlitzer park, swimming pools, the Spree--all within five minutes walk.  It is three minutes walk from the Slesisches Tor U-Bahn--Berghain is within walking distance.   If you want to get a feel for the city this neighborhood is a great place to start,  N.B. Please contact me before making a booking request.

name: Apartment in the heart of Berlin
summary: Beautiful and calm apartment in close vicinity of the Viktoria Park, Bergmannstrasse and the western centre of Berlin.
space: News: Minimum stay: 60 nights The apartment has been completely renovated in December 2015. Brand new flatscreen television (not the one on the pictures anymore :-) ) Short details: - Apartment size: 50 m² - 2 room(s) - maximum of 4 persons (exceptions for children up to 5 years) - apartment located on 1st floor in a beautiful silent courtyard - 1 double bed - 2 single beds Furnishing: The apartment is located on the corner of Möckernstraße/Kreuzbergstraße in Berlin's Kreuzberg district. It is in the side wing of a renovated traditional Wilhelminian Berlin tenement. The flat has 2 rooms: - One living- and one bedroom, a small kitchen and a bathroom. The bathroom has a bathtub. - The kitchen has a dining table for 2 people. The fully equipped kitchen has an electonic stove with 2 hot plates and a refrigerator, a water boiler and a italian coffee maker. :-) Bed linings, toilet paper, electricity, water etcetera is all inclusive. Welcome to the coolest area of Berlin...!   :-)

neighborhood_overview: Description: A stone's throw away you'll find the Viktoria-Park, for Berlin people known as the "Kreuzberg", with a lovely waterfall. An oasis of relaxation with a very nice and large children's playground next to a little Biergarten (Golgatha) and a high monument from where - weather permitting - you can enjoy a spectacular view over the city. The Bergmannstraße with it's many cafés, bars, restaurants, second hand shops is just a couple of walking minutes away. There are wine dealers, supermarkets, pharmacies and one of the three last remaining historical market halls in Berlin. South of Bergmannstraße in the small side streets (Chamisso Platz) you'll think you've gone back to centuries past: Cobblestone streets and Wilhelminian style tenements with stucco decorations. The closest supermarkets are Kaisers (corner Großbeerenstraße), ALDI, Lidl  and Getränke Hoffmann on the western end of Kreuzbergstraße. The Kaiser´s supermarket in Bergmannstraße is even open until midnight (mon-sat).
transit: The next metro station is Yorckstrasse. Next located public transportation: - S Trainstation Yorckstraße (approx. 400 m distance) - U Trainstation Platz der Luftbrücke (approx. 400 m distance) - U Trainstation Mehringdamm (approx. 400 m distance) - Bus M19 and Bus 140 Public parking lots are available in the area around the house.
access: Guests have access to all rooms as it is an entire apartment.
interaction: In case of any problem or questions guests can contact me at every moment at my mobile/cell phone number, which is written in the contact details.
house_rules: It is not allowed to smoke in the apartment. We don´t accept animals. Please treat our things with respect. We don´t like to host people having partys in our apartment.
host_about:
Hi,

I was born and raised in Berlin in this area. I´m pleased to welcome you in the coolest area of my home town. :-)

Cheers, Tanja

name: Sun-drenched three-room-apartment
space: The apartment is on the 4th floor is flooded with light, 70 sqm, has a separate bedroom with double bed (1,40 m width), one living with bed-coach (spring mattress of 1,40m width), a large kitchen with dish-washer and dining-table for 6 persons and a nice big bathroom with a tub and a washing-machine. It is conveniently located and very central. In the street there are cafes, restaurants, a bicycle-rent-station, laundry, etc. The Görlitzer Park 5 minutes walk away, the Paul-Linke-Ufer just around the corner. Public transport (bus, subway) are located in close proximity. The Kreuzberg street life with its special atmosphere here can thoroughly enjoy.

host_about: Wir sind zwei Berliner Schwestern (Architektin/Lehrerin) und wohnen in Mitte bzw. Prenzlauer Berg, jeweils mit Familie und Kind(ern). Wir möchten unsere Kreuzberger Wohnung gerne an Menschen vermieten, die sich dort ebenso wohlfühlen, wie wir in früheren Zeiten, als wir dort noch gewohnt haben. Unsere Interessen sind unterschiedlich und sehr vielfältig, in einem Punkt aber sind wir uns absolut einig: Kinder haben Vorzug!

name: Quiet Oasis  in "Kreuzkölln" 60 sqm
summary: Hello dear tenants, due to the legal situation in Berlin, my apartment will only be rented out in long term. RENTAL PERIODS are at least 6 MONTHS, with a lease and a certification to register.   START has to be between 25th of November and 2nd of Dezember. Maybe you guess it, when you see the photos: Here you will feel really comfortable and enjoy a beautiful atmosphere. name: 4 bedroom holiday house Berlin
space: !!!Exlusive 4 bedroom holiday house for 8 people!!! Super close to the Berlin City, in only just 19 minutes with the S-Bahn to the Potsdamer Platz! The S-Bahn station Schichauweg is located near by. The house was extensively renovated and remodeled in 2011. The materials used, such as slate, parquet, natural stone, give the house a warm an friendly atmosphere. It is therefore also particularly suitable for allergic people. On ground floor you find the comfortable living room, the kitchen with dinette ( completely equipped /w home appliances),  one guest restroom and terrace with access to the garden.  Upstairs are three bedrooms, two with double beds and 1 bunk bed, large bathroom with floor heating, tub, shower and separate toilet/bidet area. In the basement there is a further bedroom, an extra bathroom (with shower) and the laundry room with washer and tumbler.

Bei Auszug findet ggf. eine gemeinsame Begehung statt.

name: STUDIO NEAR KASTANIENALLE
summary: This high taste furnished apartment is located on Fehrbelliner strasse at the borders of Mitte with Prenzlauerberg. It is located 100 meters from Kastanienallee, 100 meters from Zionskircheplatz and Torsstrasse and a few minutes walk from Kollwitzplatz and Hackeschen Markt. The perfect location it combines business or shopping activities during daytime and a superb nightlife due to the cafes,bars,bistro's and restaurants of the area.
space: THE APARTMENT Τhis bright 3rd floor apartment is fully furnished and can accommodate up to four people. In the run_train room there is a queen size bed (1.60x2.00) and a sofa-bed that can sleep one person. There's also ADSL,TV,DVD and IPOD/RADIO dock. The second room is the dinning one with a table and 4 chairs which includes the kitchen.There is also a sofa-bed that sleeps one person. The kitchen is fully equipped.
