name: BrightRoom with sunny greenview!
summary: Cozy and large room in the beautiful district Prenzlauer Berg.
space: The BrightRoom is an approx. 20 sqm (215ft²), beautiful and quiet room with view on a sunny green backyard. The guest room is discreetly furnished and offers you to integrate your brought stuff homely. It has a queensize-bed and a single person bed in it. So, couples as well as friends can stay in the room. A clean room and a good bed are a matter of course. (+ wireless internet) There is an additional 25.- Euro for the second person/night. It is part of my private apartment in the second floor with a total of three rooms and a shared bathroom.  Beautiful location in the district Prenzlauer Berg not far from Berlin Mitte. There are numerous entertainment options in the neighborhood: lively bars, cafés, tasty restaurants in different price ranges and lots more.  Around the corner is the subway station Eberswalderstrasse, as well as a tram station and a few streets away is the suburban train station Schönhauser Allee. So well connected to the public transport system. If you come by taxi

neighborhood_overview: Great neighborhood with plenty of Cafés, Bakeries, Diners, Restaurants, Bars, Beautiful Shops and Supermarkets (conventional & organic). Also at a stone's throw away is an old (but renovated) brewery area with Clubs, Theater and Cinema. In every street is more than one "Späti" the famous late night stores for food, tobacco, drinks and more.. If you have children you will be amazed about the many playgrounds!
notes: I hope you enjoy your stay to the fullest! Please ask me if you have any questions about your stay before you book.
transit: Best access to other parts of the city via public transports (Metro, Tram and City Train) around the corner.
access: The guests have access to the bathroom, a small fridge, a kettle, coffee, tea and a few other items in their own room.
interaction: I am glad if I can give you advice or help as best as I can during your stay & within the framework of my other occupations. If there is anything urgently you can reach me on my phone or wait normally not more than one or two hours until I'm contactable again.
house_rules: Please take good care of everything during your stay!  I attach great importance to cleanliness and will pass the guestroom and some other facilities in the best condition to you. I expect that in return! A few house-rules: 1. Take off the shoes in the apartment. Use your slippers! 2. Don't host other guests without my prior approval. 3. Please turn off any light that you are not using. 4. Use water responsibly, don't waste it arbitrary. 5. Please put the heating down when you leave the apartment during the day. 6. Please ensure regular and adequate room aeration. 7. This is a non-smoking apartment. 8. Volume: Since the apartment is in a normal residential house and in the interests of good neighborly relations, I ask you to adjust the volume in the evenings/nights accordingly. Loud parties are not allowed! THANK YOU VERY MUCH!
host_about:
I'm a creative person, adventurer, and traveler and always looking forward to my next trip! I love beaches, palm trees and out of the way places. 

Morocco, Portugal and Spain have become my favorite destinations and I prefer staying with local people so I really have a chance to learn about the area I am visiting. 

I am easy going and love making new friends! I love Yoga and fitness. I enjoy mindful and easy conversation and like to stretch a point.

I speak English, a little Spanish and a little French but found that communication is never a big problem as long as you trust in speaking gestures.

As one of the most experienced Airbnb Superhosts in Berlin I know how to be a mindful guest.

When I am at home and slip into the role of a host I am looking forward to welcoming you in my guestroom here in Prenzlauer Berg.



-there are no strangers .. just friends you haven't met yet-

space: We are renting out our fantastic home over the Berlin rooftops, in the upcoming area of Neukölln/Kreuzberg.  The Flat is a real paradise for families, you will find everything you may need for you you kids, like toys and a crib. The apartment is on the 5th floor, faces south, and receives sunshine through large windows throughout the day. But first things first: The flat is huge, 130qm, has 2 bedrooms, big kitchen, really beautiful and bright living room, another working room with balcony. High sealing, wooden floor, etc…The building itself is a great example of Berlin's typical architecture. It was constructed in 1900 and went through comprehensive renovation in 2005-2006. The flat could accommodate up to 5 guests. The kitchen is very well equipped, there is everything you may need, also basic supplies, like cafe, tee, sugar, etc.. name: Sunny & Wheelchair accessible
space: The apartment has 150 sqm and is on the 4th floor in a newly renovated 19th century building. It has a lift, which stops directly in the apartment. The apartment has two bedrooms, two bathrooms (one is wheelchair accessible with disabled facilities), a guest toilette and a living room with stylish sofa´s (Rolf Benz), side table and a cd-player and a balcony with a view to the park. The kitchen is huge and 8 people can sit on the kitchen table. The living room is with floor to ceiling windows. High Speed Internet (DSL) is available. Smoking is allowed on the balcony. Further details on the apartment: • newly renovated, wooden floors, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with bathtub and washing machine/dryer • Kitchen amenities: dishwasher, tea and coffee facilities, toaster, water heater, electric oven and stove, refrigerator, crockery and cutlery, pots and pans • sheets and towels provided • high speed internet (DSL) • 2 TV´s • 2 sleeping rooms with double bed • sleeping possibilities for up to 4

name: Coach House with a little garden
summary: Die Remise ist 1875 erbaut und steht unter Denkmalschutz. Nach der Nutzung für Fuhrwerke, Pferde und Kühe war eine Marmorwerkstatt dort zuhause, dann eine Schlosserei und später ein Künstleratelier. Direkt davor schaut man in den kleinen Hofgarten.
space: A beautiful ground floor apartment (34 qm) in a 19th century timbered coach house with a quiet courtyard and a little garden. The twin room (with two: 90 x 200cm beds) has a third day bed ( 100 x 180cm) suitable for a child. The living room has its own kitchen facilities; two-plate stove, microwave, kitchenware with a coffee maker and refrigerator. The apartment has underfloor heating throughout and has a private bathroom with a shower and toilet. Towels and bed linen are provided and a hair dryer and iron are also available. This non-smoking apartment has WLAN and is situated in a quiet area, but still amidst the vibrant art-district of "Prenzlauer Berg" and in summer, you can relax in the garden if the city overwhelms you.  You have excellent transport links to Alexanderplatz, Hauptbahnhof and the run_train airports. Nearby are markets, pubs, restaurants, cinemas, theatres and the "Kultur Brauerei"...

transit: The public transport nearby are: U2, tram M10, M1, M12 as well as the S-Bahn at Schönhauser Allee. Information on how to get there: From the central station you can easily take tram no. 10 in the direction of Warschauer Straße to "Eberswalder Straße". It is a 2 minute walk from there. From Tegel Airport take the TXL bus to the destination in the city center. There are several routes, so please ask the driver if he stops at the station "Beusselstraße". There you climb around the S-Bahn. This is the so-called Ringbahn, the right direction is the S41. At the station "Schönhauser Allee" please get off. From there you walk 10-15 minutes or take the U2 (which is here a Hochbahn) direction Ruhleben one stop to the "Eberswalder Straße". From there it is still 2 minutes on foot. From the airport Schönefeld you can ride with an airport-express (the trains from the airport express)or the S9 directly to the Alexanderplatz.  At the Alexanderplatz you look for the U2 (red line) and drive towards Pan

name: Maisonette Apartment in Kreuzberg
summary: Comfortable and cosy Apartment in a very nice district of Berlin Kreuzberg in the center of Berlin.  Because of it´s central location in the city, the apartment is for all those, who want to visit Berlin for it´s touristic attractions as well as for it´s nightlife the right place to begin their journey.
space: Welcome to the center of Berlin. Since January 2012, you can explore the city from this central, convenient and nevertheless calmly located domicile. Or as a business traveler you plan your dates from our tasteful furnished apartment. Whether Bar, Theater, Club or Opera – this reconstructed and fully refurbished landmarked Gründerzeit building offers an ideal starting point to reach nearly every destination of Berlin in a short time. Even for longer stays the flat is best fitted with washing mashine, dishwasher, DVD-Player, Internet (Lan and W-Lan) etc. The holiday apartment is located at the Landwehrkanal in the beautiful Graefekiez in Berlin Kreuzberg.

Access to the whole apartment. W
neighborhood_overview: Who wants to experience Berlin is here in the right place. Berlin as a microcosm: lively, colorful and multicultural - this is the area between the Landwehr Canal and the Hasenheide called Graefe-Kiez. Here you will find about 100 attractive shops for good shopping possibilities and the gastronomic offer of cafes, bars and restaurants is extremely divers. Those who prefer to relax alone or with your partner on a longish walk can do this extensively on the banks of the Landwehr Canal, which provides on both sides long hiking trails. This route is also popular among joggers. The public park Hasenheide in turn provides an open-air cinema, a small zoo for children and large areas for relaxation. The former Tempelhof Airport, now called Tempelhofer Freiheit, is Berlin´s largest park area and within walking distance from the apartment. And because of it´s central location in the city, the apartment is for all those, who want to visit Berlin for it´s touristic attractions as well as for it´s
notes: The apartment is perfect for couples, a good place for families up to four people with children, but not to recommend for four grown ups, who will need a little bit of their privat space. The sofa bed has a maximal length of 1,80 meters.
transit: U7 (to Kurfürstendamm/City West): U-Südstern 5min walk U8 (to Alexanderplatz/City East): U-Schönleinstr. 8min walk Bus M41 (direct to and from Mainstation, Potsdamer Platz, Government District) Cab Stand right next to the area. Taxi Berlin: +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
access: Access to the whole apartment.
interaction: We live next door to the flat. So if you´ve got any questions don´t hesitate to knock on our door, write a mail or call us on the phone.

name: Cosy room in Mitte / Rosenthaler Platz
summary: Perfect location to explore the center of Berlin! The well-equipped apartment offers a living room with a balcony and a view on the tower of Alexanderplatz, a kitchen, a bathroom with a bath tub to relax after a long day in the city and a room (10m²) with a bed for two to enjoy the night. For all the cat lovers there's free cuddling time with my two cats on top :)
space: My beautiful DDR Plattenbau appartment is located between Rosenthaler Platz and Hackescher Markt in the heart of the Berlin district Mitte. The appartment has a sunnysided balcony with a beautiful view to green graveyard at the opposite site of the street and you can also see the TV tower. The way to U 8 Rosenthaler Platz is 2 minutes, to S-Bahn station Hackescher Markt it is 6 minutes far away. Total sqm of the flat is 57, Living room, bathroom and kitchen can be used as well. The rented room is 9,5 sqm and has a bed (1,40 m width), a shelf and a rack. Smoking on the balcony is possible. I will be at work at least from 9 am to 6.30 pm as I am working in a PR agency. Bedlinen and towels are provided.

neighborhood_overview: The neighboorhood "Mitte" is a perfect starting point to see the neighborhood! The Rosenthaler Platz is known for its bars and restaurants. If you walk 15min. north, you will get to Bernauer Str. with the park and the former Berlin wall monument. If you walk 15min. east, you are in the famous Prenzlauer Berg with nice cafés to have a coffee and observe the locals. If you walk 15min. south, you will find yourself at Alexanderplatz with the famous Tower and lots of shops.
transit: Public Transports nearby: Rosenthaler Platz (U8, M1, M8) ~ 2 minutes Rosa-Luxemburg-Platz (U2) ~ 5 minutes Hackescher Markt (S5, S7, S75) ~ 6 minutes Oranienburger Str. (S1, S2, S25) ~ 8 minutes Additionally there are many busses, trams and nighbusses in close walking distance to the appartment.
access: Den gesamten Wohnbereich mit Wohnzimmer, Balkon, Bad und Küche nutzen wir gemeinsam, bitte fühlt Euch wie zu Hause. Ich arbeite in einer PR Agentur und bin normalerweise wochentags von 9 bis mindestens 18 Uhr nicht zu Hause.  Bettwäsche & Handtücher sind natürlich vorhanden.
house_rules: There's just one thing! I kindly ask all guys to sit down to pee!!!
host_about:
Hey I am Arne and I rent out one of the bedrooms of my charming apartment in the center of Berlin. 

I love meeting new and interesting people from all around the world.

I am running a PR agency for fashion designers and publish a fashion magazine called Œ.

name: Berlin Island
summary: Wenn Sie ausspannen wollen, sind sie hier genau richtig!
space: You can reach the land with a -> ferry, or with the provided boat. The island itself offers so much original, as you would hardly expect in a big city. If the plot no. 69 foot, it captures a very special atmosphere. It is open only from one side, if the neighbors on weekends during the day are on your property. Otherwise, you are entering a very secretive place, where you can completely be alone. The 80-square meter property is at ground level and is reminiscent of a Swedish cottage. There are two separately-to-use, but interconnected buildings. They each have a kitchen, dishes and a fireplace. The older house (28 m²) is to be used only in summer. The new building has a 30 m² large dining / living room with free standing cooker and a small bedroom with a direct view into the garden. It is natural to use in winter. In total there are 3 bedrooms, sleeps 6. Toilet, bathroom and refrigerator use both residents of the houses together. In the summer, still comes out to a spa shower. The high

neighborhood_overview: Tegel
notes: Wenn Sie erfahren mit einem Motorboot (2,7 PS-Motor) sind, können Sie gern per Boot übersetzten. Ansonsten rudern Sie von einer Seite zur anderen zwischen 7 und 10 Minuten. Im Sommer fährt auch in größeren Abständen eine Fähre, im Winter eher seltener. Bei Eis kommen Sie nur auf die Insel, wenn der Tegeler See dick zugefrohren ist!
transit: Mit der U-Bahn bis Tegelort, dann mit dem Bus bis zur Beatestraße.
house_rules: Da das Haus auch mein Rückzugsort ist, bitte ich alle Gäste, die Einrichtung, Garten, Boot und Haus so pfleglich zu behandeln, als wenn es ihr Eigenes wäre. Wenn Sie Ihre Tiere mitbringen möchten, sprechen Sie dieses bitte vorher mit mir ab!  Da das Haus auch von Katzen bewohnt wird, ist es für Katzenallergiker nicht so gut geeignet.
host_about:
Wir freuen uns auf Gäste aus aller Welt und begrüßen Sie herzlich hier bei uns in Berlin und Leipzig.

Ich bin in Leipzig geboren und bin mit 19 Jahren zum Studium nach Berlin gegangen. Seitdem lebe ich in dieser Stadt. Da ich selbst auch viele Seminare durchgeführt habe und in anderen Städten war, merkte ich, wie wichtig es ist, so etwas wie ein "Gefühl von Nachhause Kommen" zu haben, an dem Ort, wo ich gerade arbeitete. Davon möchte ich mit den beiden Wohnungen in Berlin und Leipzig etwas weiter geben.



Seien Sie herzlich Willkommen in unseren sehr individuellen und liebevoll eingerichteten Räumen und fühlen Sie sich hier wie zu Hause.



Ihre Eva-Maria Kreuzer
amenities: {TV,Pool,Kitchen,"Pets allowed","Indoor fireplace",Washer}

name: Stylish lodge in the heart of Kreuz
summary: Das Apartment liegt in Kreuzberg, einem sehr lebendigem, jungen Stadtviertel. Die Unterkunft ist sehr ruhig und idyllisch gelegen, in dem begrünten Innenhof zwitschern morgens die Vögel, so dass man die Großstadt leicht vergessen kann!
space: In a prime location  Immerse yourself in a Berlin living with his typical flair and enjoy in the vibrant Kreuzberg is a stylish home from home right on the Spree.  This quiet apartment in a former jam factory was established in January 2012 with a keen sense of love and beautiful interiors. Relaxed beach bars, trendy clubs and great restaurants are just around the corner. Right in the front building is a first-class Frenchman with an excellent wine cellar. Countless real Berlin pubs have are open all night and the appetite for it in between with kebab takeaways, pizza and homemade burgers first quality. Five minutes and you reach the Bethany House of Artists, ten minutes to the "bathing ship", a swimming pool with a floating pontoon on the River Spree, from which to admire your great passing ships.  Quickly blown away  Transport links are perfect. You have 300 meters to the underground, 800 m to the S-Bahn and can quickly reach all the cultural attractions and centers of Berlin. The ai

neighborhood_overview: Super leckeres italienisches Cafe ist gleich gegenüber: "Lamuri"-guter Kaffee und Mittagstisch, Kuchen u.s.w. Supermarkt ist nebenan. Die Nachbarn hier im Haus sind auserordentlich liebenswert, ich wohne hier seit 2004 und fühle mich sehr wohl in meiner Hausgemeinschaft!
notes: Die Wohnung befindet sich im Erdgeschoss eines begrünten Innenhofes, vor dem Apartment gibt es eine Bank für Raucher. Das Apartment verfügt über automatische Rolläden, sodass die Räume auf Wunsch komplett abgedunkelt werden können.
transit: U12, Haltestelle Schlesisches Tor, mehrere Buslinien, S-Bahn Warschauer Str oder Ostbahnhof
access: Ganze Wohnung, Höfe und Wasserterrasse
interaction: Ich wohne mit meinen beiden Kindern in der Wohnung nebenan und stehe für Fragen (fast) jederzeit zur Verfügung.
house_rules: Bitte beachten Sie, dass der Berliner Senat z (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) eine Bettensteuer von 5 % der Übernachtungskosten erhoben hat (Touristensteuer). Dieser Betrag mussen ich leider in bar Vorort (gegen Quittung) von meinen Gästen erhalten.... Nichtraucher, Rauchen auf der Terrasse, bitte regelmäßig lüften, nach dem Duschen das Badezimmer lüften!
host_about:
Ich bin freischaffende Künstlerin und habe 2 Kinder, 11 und 13 Jahre alt.. 

Wenn Ihr in Berlin einen schönen Aufenthalt verleben möchtet, seid Ihr bei mir genau richtig!

Ich wohne gleich nebenan und stehe Euch gerne mit Tipps zur Seite. 

Wir freuen uns über nette Gäste, die unser Leben mit neuen Anregungen bereichern!

name: Nice room with ensuite bathroom
summary: Eigenes Bad, hell, ruhig, zentral.
space: I am renting a bright 20 sqm room in a large 95 sqm apartment located in an art nouveau (Jugendstil) building.  The special feature of the room is that it has its own small bathroom. So you can go directly from your room into the bathroom and you'll be in privacy. The apartment is also equipped with a large kitchen, living room and balcony. The apartment also has a garden. The kitchen is equipped with all major appliances and can be shared used the stay. Internet and TV are available The apartment is located in a quiet but central area of Berlin. The S-and U-Bahn is reached within 3-5 minutes walking distance. Nearby are many cafes and shops. Anyone interested can feel free to borrow a bike from us and explore the city on bike. If you would like to have breakfast in the morning, please tell me, you can book it also. I am looking forward to your inquiry.

name: Cozy Apartment Gauystraße near Schönhauser Allee
summary: My charming apartment, full furnished and lovely decorated is centrally located in Berlin. You have everything you need for near by. And for trips an easy access to major sublines. It really quiet and family friendly! But also for couples!
space: I am subletting my beloved apartment near Schönhauser Allee (Gaudystraße). It is fully furnished and carefully decorated. Very nice appartment for a couple, or one adult more or a family with two kids.  The place is in the heart of lively Berlin Prenzlauer Berg on one of Berlin's famous family places. It is minutes away from some of the city's best clubs, restaurants and shopping areas. You will have shops like an normal supermarket and two organic - food shops in the same street. On sunday you can have fresh rolls at one of the organic -food shop. Both S-Bahn (all) and U-Bahn (U2) stations and the M1/M10 tram station are each a two minute walk from the front door, so if you're in Berlin for one week,  this is the perfect place to live and explore the city! The flat is in a pretty period building (18th century) in the side "wing" overlooking the courtyard, so it's very quiet. 1 bedroom are for children which makes the place very warm and special.  - Fully equipped kitchen: big fridge,

name: cozy and sunny Appt. in PRENZLBERG
space: Hi! I'm renting out my cozy and sunny flat in the charming neighborhood of Prenzlauer Berg. It is situated on a quiet street near the Helmholtzplatz and is close to many types of public transportation. There are several coffee shops, wine bars and restaurants as well as other small unique stores in the area. Within five minutes walking distance on Thursdays and Saturdays there is an ecological market in the park at the Kollwitzplatz. The "Prenzlbergers" like to buy their bio-vegetables, homemade marmelades and on occasion even a typical Berlin sausage, the Currywurst. On Sundays there is a large fleamarket at the Mauerpark which you can reach either by tram or a short 10 minute walk. My flat is the perfect place to stay for couples, traveling friends or singles who are looking to explore Berlin and stay in a trendy but safe neighborhood. The flat is in a typical Berlin "Altbau" (pre war building) , which has been recently renovated. It is a clean and tidy one bedroom apartment with hig

name: LUMINOUS, LOFT LIKE APT IN F'HAIN
summary: This lovely 110 sqm apartment is in the heart of Friedrichshain. Around the corner from Boxhagener Platz, one of the most colorful hot spots in the center of Berlin: fantastic cafes, bars, restaurants and a flea market and farmers' market on the weekend!
space: The apartment has three rooms and a big kitchen, is extremely bright and spacious (110 sqm / 1100 sqft) and has two green balconies. A four-story walk-up with a great view to the Berlin TV Tower in Alexanderplatz. The space is suitable for holidays, working or just for living! With its high ceilings, wooden floors and doors it has the typical charm of Berlin’s old buildings. All rooms are furnished.  There is one bedroom. It is a very quiet one (30sqm / 320 sqft) that sleeps two in a queen-sized bed. A large fully equipped kitchen with a table that seats up to six people. A living room / workspace equipped with a nice couch and a second balcony. The bathroom has a shower and bathtub.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is just around the corner from Boxhagener Platz, with excellent public-transport options. It is surrounded by bars, cafes and restaurants. The flea market and farmers' market on the weekends are a true delight. You can get to Mitte, Kreuzberg or Prenzlauer Berg in 10-15 minutes.
transit: Public transport is within walking distance and include the  M10 tram, Grünbergerstr. --- S-Bahn, Warschauer Str. --- U-Bahn U8, Samariterstr. --- bus, Simon-Dach-Str. Or you can easily rent a bicycle -- Berlin is a very easy city to get around on a bike!
access: When you rent the whole apartment you will have access to the whole apartment, with the exception of a couple of closets and bookshelves. You will have plenty of room to hang up and store your clothes. For long-term guests, I kindly ask that you water the plants :-) on the balcony.
interaction: I am a Berlin-based filmmaker, installation artist and art historian who travels. I will put you in touch with friends who are in the neighborhood should you need anything.
house_rules: Smoking is permitted only on the balcony
host_about: art historian and filmmaker from berlin

name: Spacious 6-bed-room in Berlin
summary: Large room that can accommodate up to 6 people. It has 3 bunk beds and is very suitable for small groups. The spacious bathroom is for multiple rooms.
space: Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes!
description: Large room that can accommodate up to 6 people. It has 3 bunk beds and is very suitable for small groups. The spacious bathroom is for multiple rooms. Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes! In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room. You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel. Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries
neighborhood_overview: Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters and cultural institutions with many really cheap small meal occasions with specialties from around the world. In addition, there's the spectacular collection of Berlin's best clubs, which are in large part all  within walking distance. Because in 200 meters distance, among other things, there is the Berghain / Panorama Bar, which was chosen not only by the New York Times as the "best club in the world".
notes: For privately motivated stays the Senate of Berlin requires 5% City Tax, which must additionally be paid on arrival. Business travelers are exempted from this rule, and are requested to to submit relevant supporting documents upon check-in.
transit: The connection to the public transport network (U, S, bus, tram) and the central location between Prenzlauer Berg and the Spree guarantee an ideal place to find us easily and to explore Berlin and its surroundings afterwords. S-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (S3, S5, S7, S75): 5 min U-Bahn / Subway: Warschauer Straße (U1): 6 min Frankfurter Tor (U5): 12 min Tram: Warschauer- / Revaler Straße (M10, M13): 4 min Bus: Helsingforser Platz (347, N1): 3 min (all times are for walking)
access: In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room.
interaction: You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel.
host_about:
Hallo,

wir freuen uns sehr auf freundliche Gäste aus aller Welt und begrüßen Euch ganz herzlich!



Im Sunflower Hostel stehen euch gemischte Mehrbettzimmer und geschlechtergetrennte Gemeinschaftsbäder zur Verfügung. Des Weiteren erwarten euch freundliches Personal, die weltweit größte Outdoor-Raucher-Lounge und eine 23h-Bar. Für eure Wünsche und Fragen haben wir rund um die Uhr ein offenes Ohr und helfen euch gern weiter mit Empfehlungen, Wegbeschreibungen etc.



Wir freuen uns auf Eure Anfragen!

Euer Sunflower-Team

name: Independent room in green Kreuzberg
summary: quiet and nice attic room with antique furniture and real bed, with large sunny terrace and panorama to the neighboring park at the very heart of Kreuzberg
space: The bright guest room (18 m²) is located above our apartment on the 4th floor of a renovated, historically listed Wilhelminian-style building. It has an independent entrance and can be reached by a stairway whose entrance is located in a charming inner courtyard. A long corridor in common-use with another rental unit leads to the guest room which has been fully renovated and is equipped with a King size bed  (180 x 200 cm), an antique wardrobe, a desk, TV with DVD and Wireless Internet. A private and fully renovated bathroom with bathtub is at your exclusive disposal. You can also use our 25 m² terrace and enjoy a panorama view of Berlin and the park at Gleisdreieck. We intalled a summer kitchen on it with sink, fridge and water boiler to make breakfast possible and convenient.      Our building is located southeast of Potsdamer Platz in a very quiet but urban and central area. The Hornstr. is a traffic-calmed street with a broad esplanade along the middle covered with trees. All the b

neighborhood_overview: Our building is located southeast of Potsdamer Platz in a very quiet but urban and central area. The Hornstr. is a traffic-calmed street with a broad esplanade along the middle covered with trees. All the buildings on the street have gardens in the front. The quarter between Yorckstrasse, Viktoria Park and Bergmannstrasse is an authentic Kreuzberg neighbourhood and is one of the more popular in Berlin. The transportation connections could not be better: Potsdamer Platz, Kurfürstendamm and Friedrichstrasse can be easily reached in a few minutes by car, bicycle, or with public transportation. The subway stations Mehringdamm, Möckernbrücke and Yorckstrasse are all within a short walking distance from the apartment, as are numerous bus connections.  Many restaurants and bars, cultural establishments and shopping facilities, for example the bustling Marheinecke Hall (a traditional indoor market) on the Bergmannstrasse, are all located nearby. An easy five-minute walk will take you to Viktor
transit: The quarter between Yorckstrasse, Viktoria Park, Park am Gleisdreieck and Bergmannstrasse is an authentic Kreuzberg neighbourhood and is one of the more popular in Berlin. The transportation connections could not be better: Potsdamer Platz, Kurfürstendamm and Friedrichstrasse can be easily reached in a few minutes by car, bicycle, or with public transportation. The subway stations Mehringdamm, Möckernbrücke and Yorckstrasse are all within a short walking distance from the apartment, as are numerous bus connections.
access: Wifi and terrace
interaction: I always reply to questions / enquiries of my guests in a real short time.
house_rules: the owners living in the building are very respectful with their old house and we expect the same respect from our guests. Be kind not to make noise especially after 10 pm at night, not to slam the doors and to keep them locked at night.
host_about: French, living in Berlin for over 20 years, very enthousiastic about Berlin, warm hearted, very reliable and welcoming.

name: World stroller's club 2
space: The 45-square meter apartments are self contained. In each apartment, we can accommodate 1 to 4 persons, additional persons on request. By the staircase to get into the second Floor in the converted attic with four dormers and a good outlook. Both homes have blinds to darken. A garden use including seating is available, sauna NEW. The apartments are located in the characteristic one, or two-family house area in the district Konradshöhe Reinickendorf. From here you can enjoy long walks through the Tegeler forest and run the water in nearby Lake Tegel. Bicycles are available. With more experience we will be happy to help and support. With just a few steps away from grocery stores, a bakery, a florist, doctors, a pharmacy and a gas station. In about 10 minutes you are at Tegel. There you have the versatility of the shopping, entertainment and gastronomy. Towels & bed linen are included in the price. Electricity, water and CityTax according to your own consumption.

name: BerlinSpot Schöneberg near KaDeWe
summary: First of all: I prefer short-notice bookings.  Requests 1-2 weeks before arrival are perfect. Longer plans in advance are sometimes a bit difficult for me.  But please just try! My flat is in the middle of West-Berlin, directly in the mostly gay and very safe area of Nollendorfplatz-"Kiez" with a lot of good restaurants, outdoor cafés, small shops, famous store KaDeWe and Gedaechtniskirche and a beautiful fruitmarket on weekends.
space: Your room is really big and has 26 sqm, is very light and quiet, facing the garden. There is a foldable new youch where you sleep. It even fits two people. A big wardrobe, a desk, tables is for your use. There are art books in the room. You may read them all, also the books in the hall and I provide city-maps and informations for you.  You need to be aware that my flat is in a very old house. So some things are not modern like doors or windows. The bathroom is ok - but not completely tiled. The ceiling is 3,40m high. I myself like the "Gemütlichkeit", but you also should know about the "Altbau-Standard" when it's not renovated lately. But Caution!! - I live in an old and not modern restored or renovated flat, because my landlord only wants the money but does not invest.  But your room is very ok! The bathroom needs restoration, but he refuses it! I can cope with it and I hope you also can. :-) My helping woman does keep everything clean as it can be though!

I myself like the "Gemütlichkeit", but you
neighborhood_overview: My flat is in the middle of West-Berlin, directly in the mostly gay + safe area of Nollendorfplatz-"Kiez" with a lot of restaurants, cafés, small shops, close to chic Kurfuerstendamm,  famous store KaDeWe and imposant Gedaechtniskirche (memorial-church) and a beautiful fruitmarket on weekends for relaxed shopping.
notes: The flat is a strictly non-smoking facility! As two very friendly cats are living with me, it might be the case that they are playing and chasing around and some litter-stones or torn paperpieces will be found on the carpet in the hallway. Hopefully you can cope with this.
transit: The public transportation is excellent: Several bus-stations for 6 lines are situated around the corner, 2 tube-stations with another 4 lines in 5-minutes-walking-distance. Airport Tegel you can reach within 25-30 minutes with public traffic, to Airport Schoenfeld you need approx. 55-60 minutes.  The trainstation Zoologischer Garten is one station away, the Mainstation (HBF) you reach in 20 minutes.
access: I do have a strictly non-smoker-flat.  Keep the room really clean and tidy. I had some not so nice experiences in the last time. And I have to ask you to keep also the common german house-rules like no noise after 8:00 PM / 20:00 hrs.  Please do not disturb the neighbours, specially in the evening and night. As I am a "green" person I have to ask you not to waste energy, water and paper. I think also following generations will need the sources and enjoy the wood.
interaction: I'm working as a freelancing photographer. My run_train topic is Berlin, its  architectur, people, and art. Usually I am informed what on in the very moment.   But I work also on travels for reportage. In former years I was working as TV-journalist, web-content-editor, designer of graphics, exhibitions, websites and audio-vision.   I have to work at home, because I'm handicaped in the moment due to a botched surgery when I've got a new artificial knee. Therefor I am not able to walk properly - specially steps. In the flat it's ok now and outside I still need my wheelchair.  So if you like to help me from time to time to take down trashbags this would be a great help for me.  I am very thankful for your understanding. I love Berlin, it's many varieties of culture, and can tell you a lot about it.  I also travelled a lot and have high interest in world-culture and world-music, besides of R&B, classic and moderate Jazz. There are a lot of things to do in Berlin, which I appreciate very much.
house_rules: House-Rules and Information ..............(deutsche Version weiter unten) The Room •I do have a strictly non-smoker-flat.  •Before you leave for sightseeing or such take some time for sortin(URL HIDDEN)out your stuff in the room, f.i. put clothes in the closet. •Remove open food or beverages.  •Put used dishes and cutlery directly after use into the dishwasher in the kitchen. •PLEASE, keep the room really clean and tidy yourself. It’s not a garbage dump. (I had some bad experiences in the past.) Kitchen •Leave the kitchen as clean as you found it. •Put your used plates and cutlery into the dishwasher immediately after use. •Clean the pots and pans you used by hand with soap and wipe them dry. •Remove used coffee-filter out of coffee-machine into the BIO-waste •Wipe the oven clean after using it. •Take care of seperate waste-recycling:  It’s plastic + metal, paper, biological, glass, rest of litter Washing-Machine •If you need and want to use my washing-machine, I will ask you to pay 2,
host_about:
ENJOY EVERY DAY AS IF IT'S YOUR LAST!!!



Living in the middle of Berlin-WEST in the mostly gay area I appreciate the many different possibilities one has to enjoy the city and the security here.

I'm in for culture for all sorts, knowledge of the city and its history. And of course travelling.

I'm very communicative and like to tell people everything about Berlin and travel-experiences. 

I am also very curious about other people's culture and opinion of life, so please be communicative too about yourself. :-)

name: Prenzlberg Designer Apt w. Balcony
space: I am renting my 45 m2 apartment in Prenzlauer Berg while I am abroad. It's a clean, fully furnished apartment, with high ceilings, wooden floor and a small balcony. In the bedroom/livingroom you will find a double bed (1,40 x 2,00 m), a couch, and 2 armchairs. It's perfect for a couple, but one person could sleep on the couch if needed. The kitchen/dining room is fully equipped, also with dishwasher and washing machine. The bathroom has a shower. Towels and sheets will be provided. Free wireless connection. The flat is located on the first floor on the corner Winsstraße and Danziger Straße. The neighborhood is very safe day and night. The next supermarket is 5 minutes walk away. It is very well connected to public transport, Trams M10 (on the corner), M2 and M4 (5 minutes walk). The S-Bahn station Prenzlauer Allee (circle line) as well as the metro station Eberswalder Straße (on the U2 line) are three tram stops or 15 minutes walk away. Max. 2 people. No pets allowed. Please feel free

house_rules: Please treat my flat like you would your own. Keep things neat and tidy, remembering that my things are still inside. Don't bring people to the apartment that you don't know or if you just met them. Don't smoke inside the apartment (please use the balcony). Respect noise levels after 10 pm (it's the law in Germany). Don't use any of my personal items. Turn the heat down and the lights off if you are not inside. Don't keep the water running for too long. Don't put the frying pan in the dishwasher cause it damages the coating teflon.
host_about:
What are 5 things I can’t live without?

Friends, Bicycle, iPhone, Cookies, Sports.

Favorite travel destinations:

USA, Japan, Argentina.

Food: Everything and a lot. Especially greens and seafood.

name: Upstairs at Eric's
space: Welcome to Boxhagener area of Berlin! A lively, trendy neighbourhood with lots of bars, cafes, restaurants and shops to choose from. Great connections to other parts of the city: Tram 21 & 16, U-Bahn Line 5 and S-Bahn lines 5, 7, 9 & Ringbahn (Circle line) plus buses. Close to Frankfurter Allee and Ostkreuz stations. My roof flat is on the 5th floor, and there is no lift. The exercise is free! The flat itself has an open kitchen / living room area and 1 bathroom (with bath tub) which is to be shared. Huge windows at the front have a great view across the Berlin rooftops and skylights throughout flood the flat with daylight. Generally it is pretty quiet here. I include wireless internet access as well as tea and coffee. Heating and hot water, of course, are included too. The room that I would like to offer you is approx 11sqm, roughly square shaped, with 2.5m high ceilings, there is only a small part with a sloping roof. The window overlooks the inner patio. There is a comfortable sofa

name: Cozy Berlin nest with great access
summary: My home is a large-pre-war apartment in Friedenau, a nice residential area in the south of Schöneberg. The neighborhood is leafy and rather quiet but has great public transport access. There are local shops, cafes and restaurant as well as a shopping mile close by.
space: Located in Berlin Friedenau, a leafy residential district close to everything. Easy access to buses, subway (U-Bahn), rapid transit (S-Bahn) and even freeway. Room with a balcony and cozy pre-war feel. Host is tri-lingual long-time Berlin resident from NY with excellent hosting and cooking skills. The apartment is located in the Schöneberg district and has many cafés and restaurants. The building is a pre-war structure built in the early 20th century. The apartment is located on a raised ground floor. There is a balcony which you can enter from your private room.  The neighborhood is pretty quiet and cozy. The apartment itself is very quiet, too (although you have quick access to the center of Berlin). The room is furnished with a double bed. There is also the possibility of a 2nd guest room if the first one is occuppied. This one has a double bed and is somewhat larger. You can use the fully equipped kitchen and the bathroom with sink and a tub/shower combination. Free internet use (W

neighborhood_overview: Friedenau is leafy and residential but there is a center with nice cafes and restaurants. There is excellent access to all types of public transport.
transit: If driving to Berlin, please consider that many areas have free public parking for residents only. There are some streets where this is not a problem but they are not in the immediate vicinity of my location
access: There is open access to the living/dining room and the kitchen
interaction: I am happy to communicate with guests and provide recommendations
house_rules: Hausordnung für Gäste / House Rules for Guests  Bitte diese Liste lesen und sich jederzeit während Ihrer Aufenthalt daran halten. Bitte Fragen(n) stellen, falls etwas nicht klar ist Please read this list of rules and adhere to them at all times during your stay. Do not assume anything – ask first!! SEHR WICHTIG: Alles so lassen wie gefunden IMPORTANT: Leave everything as you found it  1. Bitte KEINE Straßenschuhe in der Wohnung tragen / DO NOT wear street shoes in the apartment  2. RAUCHVERBOT herrscht hier in der Wohnung und im Treppenhaus / NO SMOKING inside the apartment or in the entrance or building stairwells  3. Bitte Dein/Ihr Zimmer sauber und ordentlich halten / Please keep your room clean and orderly  4. Die Küche soll immer sauber und ordentlich verlassen werden. Bitte schmutzige Teller, Besteck usw. in die Spülmaschine einräumen / Please leave the kitchen orderly and clean. Used dishes etc should be loaded into the dishwasher  5. Das Badezimmer muss immer sauber und ordentl
host_about: I am a long-term Berlin resident and "native" NYer, who was born in Jamaica. Have traveled extensively and also studied and lived in California. My hobbies are cooking, literature, art, music, design, people and all of the above in a multicultural context. I live for varied and constant learning experiences.

name: House on Water
summary: Wir freuen uns Sie in Berlin begrüßen zu dürfen Die Geschäftsleitung
space: a beautiful object with a unique lakeside location on Lake Seddin in Berlin Schmöckwitz Enjoy your holiday with us in Berlin and enjoy the tranquility of our capital. Sights can be reached either by car or by public transportation as a vacation or enjoy Berlin as a business Dressler your holiday destination in Berlin (URL HIDDEN)

Sights can be reached either by car or by public transportation as a vacation or enjoy Berlin as a business Dressler your holiday destination in Berlin (URL HIDDEN)
neighborhood_overview: Schmöckwitz gehört noch zu Berlin liegt sehr schön am Seddinsee und ist ein hervorragender Standort für Familien zum entspannen und eignet sich auch sehr gut zum Berlinbesuch.
notes: Veranstaltungen auf dem Grundstück sind ebenfalls möglich unter der Voraussetzung der Bezahlung einer Tagesgebühr in der Höhe von 15 € / Person für die Zeit von 15 bis 22 Uhr. Fahrradfahren, Wandern, Nordic Walking, Schwimmen, Angeln, Segeln und Motorbootfahren sind hier möglich. Der Golfplatz Motzen lädt Golfspieler an
transit: Nach 5 Minuten Gehweg erreichen Sie die Tram 68 welche eine 100 Jahre alte Straßenbahnverbindung ist, diese führt Sie am Strandbad Grünau direkt am Wasser ( Lange See ) nach Grünau zur S 46 oder S 8. Diese führen in die City
access: direkter Zugang zum Seddinsee, die Terasse des Hauses liegt 3 Meter vom Wasser - die Ferienwohnung hat eine eigene Terasse. Der restliche Bereich des Grundstücks wird von allen Mietparteien genutzt. Bitte nicht in den Ferienobjekten rauchen
interaction: Gerne begrüße ich meine Gäste persönlich bei der Schlüsselübergabe und erkläre Ihnen das nötigste sowie werden die Zählerstände gemeinsam abgelesen.

name: Attention to Every Little Detail.
summary: A light, serene, beautiful large space. Lightening fast fibre optic WiFi. Huge for 2, and sleeps up to 5. Right in the heart of the Neukoelln creative explosion, 5 mins from the canal. 7 min walk to U bahn. 2 month minimum.
space: Please note: Available for 2-month minimum due to law changes in Berlin prohibiting short term rentals from May 1st 2016. On the best street in Berlin's magnetic Neukoelln Nord scene, this charmer is large (74 sq. m), inspiring and beautifully furnished for maximum fun and comfort. Wonderful for families: toys, books, a comfy crib with high quality mattress and bedding, plus Pack n'Play - all provided, all included.  No extra charge for kids under 12. BONUS: we are throwing in the use of 2 great Dahon folding bikes with racks and locks, for use during your stay. Do as the Berliners do and socialize, work, shop and explore by bike!  (bikes only available from March till October, please request in advance) Fibre optic Internet: super speedy Wifi everywhere in the apartment and on balcony - download in seconds and great for (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)ing. Kitchen thoughtfully set up for cooking real meals. Decent knives, pans, chopping boards, appliances, storage. Cooks and foodies rejoic

neighborhood_overview: Check out this article I wrote about the neighbourhood: Search these keywords: Globe Mail Magnetic Neighbourhood Abigail Pugh.
notes: We have just installed a very effective (and expensive!) security lock on the run_train door - there haven't been problems, but we wanted guests to know their stuff is properly secured. We'll give you 2 keys, and it's up to you whether to use both locks or simply double lock the run_train door lock. Please note: there was a cat residing in the apartment from Jan 2014 to July 2015. Since he left the apartment has been cleaned multiple times. But we just had a guest whose allergies flared up because of this - please be aware of the situation before you book, if you have serious allergies. Thanks! Your keys get you in the run_train apartment entrance, then 2 more for apartment itself. Inside the apartment you will find another complete set of keys - please leave these on the table. Flow-through hot water heater: control on bathroom mirror. Switch to 60 degrees for bathing or showering, keep at 38 for normal use. Please remember to do this as electricity is very expensive (green energy). Your run_train beddin
transit: You simply couldn't be better connected to the rest of this amazing city. The handy U8 subway line is 5 minutes away and takes you in minutes to Alexanderplatz, the heart of Mitte or the incredible Mauerpark fleamarket. The 171 bus or the U-7 to Rudow and then the Schoenefeldt express bus links you directly and cheaply with Berlin Brandenberg (still Schoenefeldt at time of writing) airport, and the M29 bus is a fast link to Checkpoint Charlie, the KaDeWe department store, and the green hikes of Gruenewald. Or, use our bikes and the entire city is yours, free of charge.
access: The entire apartment is yours. Entrance hall and staircases are shared with other apartment-dwellers in the building. Courtyard is communal. Balcony is yours alone. We have provided some toys and books for kids, a crib, bedding and towels for up to 5, food basics and lots of interesting herbal teas, plus coffee and milk for your mornings. Bike keys: on hook in kitchen pantry. Bikes: these can be found in the Court Yard. 2 same folding type bikes locked together with a heavy green and black lock. Return keys to pantry. Many thanks.
interaction: We're always available via email and text. Scarlett is our manager in Berlin. She will be your contact person! We live in Toronto so probably won't meet you.  Your apartment is private, self contained and fully yours with no intrusions!
house_rules: Please take a careful look at your Itinerary (sent to you by airbnb - check your junk mail if you don't have it) before contacting me for access details and other practical things. We're here to take calls, texts and emails at any time  but it's easier for us both if you read the Itinerary first as the info you require may well be written there. Danke!! No illegal downloading on our WiFi! We just got burned by this. 20th Century Fox demanding almost 900 euros. If you do illegal stuff on our WiFi, we will know about it and you will be responsible. Please return bike keys to pantry hooks where you found them and return bikes to the bike lock-up. No smoking in the flat (balcony is fine if you use an ash tray and dispose of its contents.) Well behaved, clean and non-shedding dogs are OK.  This is a respectful, low-key house and guests should be mindful of neighbours below, above and to the sides. Small gatherings and dinners are wonderful here but big house parties: please not. Kindly do y
host_about:
We are an easygoing, literary, life-loving family of 3. We are based in Toronto but have strong family ties to Europe and also own a place in Berlin. We are flexible, kind, peaceful and creative and our homes show this; we revel in cooking, relaxing in serene and carefully-curated surroundings, and are houseproud in an eclectic, stylish and not too rigid way. We know that when you make our homes yours, you'll want comfy beds, utmost cleanliness, caring little touches and that extra hosting 'mile', like restaurant tips by text, a few goodies in the cupboard, excellent coffee and appliances and comforts that are up to date and properly working. When you're in our space, we do all we can to ensure it's a great experience for you, even if we're far away and never even meet you personally.



Can't live without: coffee, music, yummy bathroom, colour, kindness.

name: Nice vacation apartment in Berlin-Mitte
summary: Small but beautiful vacation apartment located in the center of Berlin but nevertheless very quiet. Many shops, cafes, restaurants and sights are within walking distance. Also a good city train and subway connections. We also offer a 2 room apartmentfor max. 5 persons in the same house (if you are 3 to 5 persons you have much more space).

Check out bis 11 Uhr
host_about: Hi there! We're Ute and Hans- a retired, married couple that loves to travel. As former real estate and tourismus agents we know not only from our professional but also from our private experience as travellors what guests are looking for. For more than 25 years now we provide guests in Berlin with great apartments. Feel free to contact us  :-)

name: Wendt apartment, 1st floor, central
summary: Im sanierten Seitenflügel eines Altbau-Wohnhauses im Friedrichshainer Kiez, mit kurzen Wegen zur S-Bahn, DB-Bahn, Flughafen, zum Alexanderplatz, Park oder zur Spree
space: Stylish accommodation with good quality furniture and equipment in a central location. The newly renovated wing of an old apartment building in the Friedrichshain neighborhood, in close proximity to the overground trains (S-Bahn), DB-Bahn (run_train railway lines), the Alexanderplatz square, park or to the river Spree ...  The living area features a large, comfortable sofa, a 80 inch LCD flat screen TV, DVD, CD radio with MP3 player connection and DVD selection (10 films) are included. The kitchen is equipped with a cooker, a microwave oven and grill and convection oven function suitable (for example) for making pizza / casseroles, a coffee maker, kettle, toaster, and many other utensils.  The modern bathroom is fitted with a shower / bathtub and hairdryer and offers plenty of storage space. Against a little a fee: bicycle (5 € / day), UMTS-Stick / Internet (3 € / day), children's travel cot (4 € / day incl bedding) and bed linen / towels (5 € / stay)...

notes: Im ersten Stock, ohne Fahrstuhl
transit: Der Bahnhof Ostkreuz ist nur 7 Gehminuten entfernt, der eine schlelle Verbindung zu den Flughäfen, Bahnhof und ins ganze Stadtgebiet ermöglicht.
access: Ihr habt eine ganze Wohnung für Euch.
interaction: Bei Problemen und Fragen bin ich immer erreichbar.
house_rules: Jedem das seine, aber achtet bitte auf die Nachbarn, also nach 22:00 keine laute Musik und Fenster nicht ganz auf.
host_about: ich bin eigentlich diplomierter Stadt- und Regionalplaner. Ein bürokratischer, eintöniger Büroalltag liegt mir aber nicht. Also arbeite ich als Gästebetreuer und Fahrdienstleiter im Showbiz und heiße Gäste in meinen zwei Ferienwohnungen willkommen. Ich repräsentiere meine Stadt mit Hingabe.

name: Beautiful Apartment 14m2 Terrace in KREUZBERG
summary: You can rent out our beautiful 2 Room apartment in central Kreuzberg with an even more beautiful 14sqm Terrace in one of the hottest spots in Berlin. Infrastructure is amazing as you have direct access to the U1 and U8 which will get you anywhere you need to be Fast!
space: We have a beautiful apartment (approx. 80 sqm2) for rent.a fantastic view of the oranienstreet  The appartment is located right in the center of Kreuzberg  Nearest Stations are Görlitzer Bhf ( 1 min walk) and Kottbusser Tor (3min Walk) Expect to be in the center of action ( only if you want to though, our apartment is suprisingly quiet since we are living on the top floor)  We live in the Oranienstreet   We have two rooms, a large kitchen,a newly renovated bathroom, and a large terrace. We have Wifi and a 50 inch screen and Xbox360 you can use if you feel like it.  Please also view the uploaded photos.  If you are looking for a comfortable beautiful and perfectly located place ( no matter where you go it wont take longer than 15 - 20 min) then this is your place ;) Aminta&Enis

neighborhood_overview: If you know Berlin and Kreuzberg in particular, you already know that there is always something going on in the Oranienstr. There are plenty of restaurants, cafés, bars, art galleries, clubs and a huge park only footsteps away from our house. In Spring and Summer there are many Festivals at Oranienstraße, for example the Maifest on the 1. of May, Karneval der Kulturen or the Fête de la Musique.  If you have any more questions about the neighborhood or the apartment please feel free to leave me a message.
notes: Please note: No Smoking aloud in the apartment nor on the Terrace. Please take off your shoes in the apartment.
transit: Perfect: 2 min from Metro Station U1 Görlitzer Bahnhof and 4 min from Kottbusser Tor (U8 + U1)
access: The entire Apartment
interaction: You can call me anytime
house_rules: We are absolutely smoke free(not on the balcony nor in the rooms) so we kindly ask you to respect that.  No Parties. Please respect our nice and beautiful appartment, no shoes in the appartment, (except for the entrance). Please be nice to our Woodenfloor and try to avoid spilling cola or any other liquids on it.
host_about:
Hey Guys, I am Enis, me and my girlfriend Aminta are the proud owners of this beautiful appartment. 

Since the awesome Aminta is rarely in berlin we have a spare room most of the time (hint:calender) 

We just recently moved back to Berlin, we used to live in Japan for more than 3 years. We live in the best neighberhood there is ( born and raised in kreuzberg) with lots of good bars , legendary clubs, nice Organic Supermarkets great Turkish restaurants and awesome nightlife in general. (by the way, good food is good food ;) ) We would love to have you as our guests 



Ich freue mich sehr darauf, Euch bald als unsere Gäste in Berlin  empfangen zu dürfen!

name: Room vibrant but cozy Schoeneberg
summary: The room is located  5 minutes from the subway station Nollendorfplatz. It is very central, sunny. Restaurants, cafes and bars also nearby. WLAN included in the price.
space: Welcome to my apartment in the lively but cozy Schöneberg near the subway station Nollendorfplatz. I offer a 25 square meters large room with a comfortable double bed for 2 persons. The room is quiet and sunny, and also has two drawers for your clothes. The 3-room apartment is located on the 6th floor with elevator. The kitchen is fully equipped (including dishwasher, coffee maker and kettle) and can be shared. The bathroom is also shared and has a bath with shower. Wireless Internet is included. Towels and linen are provided. The room is 5 minutes from the subway station Nollendorfplatz and therefore very central. In a few minutes you are on Kurfürstendamm or Potsdamer Platz. In the immediate neighborhood there are several small shops, cafes and restaurants. Right on the corner is an organic supermarket. In Maaßenstraße there are numerous bars and snack bars. On Winterfeldtplatz you find a nice farmer's market. It's just fun to walk here and enjoy the many street cafes. I look forward

access: Rules of the house - Never locked the entrancy door of the flat. - Please take your shoes everytime when you get into the flat. There is a space where you can leave your shoes at the entrancy hall. - Everytime when you leave the room turn off all the eletronic equipaments and lights, please. The same with the heating. - Leave the bathroom door open after you take a shower, because of the humidity. - you can use the wifi but never download any kind of illegal filme or tv serie, because is not alowed in Germany, and you will pay a penalty for that. - In case you need to use the kitchen please do it until 9 pm, it is n american kitchen and it would be not nice to have in the flat the smell or the noises of a preparing meal in the late evening. - if you are a party animal, consider that after 11 pm you should be very carefull and not make noise, when you are arriving or leaving the flat. - Never bring a stranger with you, for security reasons.
house_rules: no smokers please
host_about: Hallo, ich bin Ferreira Da Silva und komme ursprünglich aus Brasilien, wohne aber schon seit langem in Deutschland. Ich reise selber gerne und freue mich daher über jeden Gast, der internationales Flair in meine Wohnung bringt.

name: Helmholtzplatz Bright&Spacious Apt.
summary: This flat has permission to rent under Licence Nr: 03/z/za/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Genehmigungsbescheid vom (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ,  It has 2 bathrooms 2 bedrooms with 84 sq meters space. Ample room for up to 8 pax for short stays.
space: Newly renovated apartment with 2 bathrooms and 2 bedrooms and a an open plan living and kitchen.   Morning sun shines into the kitchen and lounge area. South facing. Located at the back building (hinter-hof). Therefore really quiet at night. Located on the 2nd floor, (not suited for disabled persons).  Living space 94 sqm, 2 spacious bedrooms, Bedroom 1 with Queen size bed en-suite with bath. Bedroom 2 with 2 x 3/4 single beds and a Karlstadt double sofabed. Open plan lounge with huge Double Sofa Bed. Dinning room leading  to the kitchen with open plan. Sleeps up to 8  persons maximum.  All rooms are fully equipped. Towels  and linen are all provided.
description: This flat has permission to rent under Licence Nr: 03/z/za/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Genehmigungsbescheid vom (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ,  It has 2 bathrooms 2 bedrooms with 84 sq meters space. Ample room for up to 8 pax for short stays. Newly renovated apartment with 2 bathrooms and 2 bedrooms and a an open plan living and kitchen.   Morning sun shines into the kitchen and lounge area. South facing. Located at the back building (hinter-hof). Therefore really quiet at night. Located on the 2nd floor, (not suited for disabled persons).  Living space 94 sqm, 2 spacious bedrooms, Bedroom 1 with Queen size bed en-suite with bath. Bedroom 2 with 2 x 3/4 single beds and a Karlstadt double sofabed. Open plan lounge with huge Double Sofa Bed. Dinning room leading  to the kitchen with open plan. Sleeps up to 8  persons maximum.  All rooms are fully equipped. Towels  and linen are all provided. Full free WIFI. Towels and Linen included in the price. Fully equipped kitchen, Smart TV
neighborhood_overview: Vibes and full of lovely cafes and bistros and boutiques with hand crafted items and Specialty food stores. I particularly like the little cafe just right of the apartment downstairs. The park right at the front of the apartment is great for summer picnic and people spotting. A fantastic children's playground. Pleasant start with a nice cup of coffee and some quiche, or full breakfast with variety of cheese selections.  Bike rental is available at the square of Helmholtz. Central, lively, yet quiet at night! The apartment is located Directly at Helmholtz Platz, lush green park right in the middle of Berlin – wonderful atmosphere. Cultural highlights of the Eastern part of Berlin. The most trendy area of the eastern part of Berlin. Individual boutiques offering Berliner designers fashion, art galleries, theater, cafes, restaurants, bistros. Fresh bakeries. On weekends, the streets are lined with Eco, bio green market stalls offering fresh cheeses, fruits and vegetables and lovely cakes
notes: Should you be checking in quite late in the evening, the apartment is at the back of the building. Pulling suitcases can be quite noisy. If possible, try carrying your suitcases instead of pulling your suitcases. This way, our neighbors will be much happier :)). Strictly no smoking in the apartment and no pets please! WIFI code provided on checking in. You are welcome to leave your books to share with other guests and leftovers can be specified to leave behind for new guests or for Elva to take with. Do email us immediately should you left some items behind which you wish us to send it back. Postage at own cost.  Please note: a new rule on non -Business travelers. 5% city tax applicable on the rental amount payable on arrival.  Tax ID:StNr: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) All guests must be officially registered. Children not required.   Please bring with you a copy of your passport for each persons. Elva will have a register for you to fill in on arrival. Bring along a letter if you are staying
transit: Public transport is fantastic in Berlin and Potsdam. All services are only walking distance away from the apartment. U-Bahn 2 from Eberswalder Strasse. S-Bahn from Prenslauer Alle or Schonehouser Alle, M2 from Lychener Strasse, M10 from Danziger Strasse. M4 from Prenslauer Allee.  Parking can be a nightmare to find anytime after office hours.  Taxi services are reasonable when travel in group to and from the airport.
access: Full free WIFI. Towels and Linen included in the price. Fully equipped kitchen, Smart TV (no cable - but easily connect with Netflix and Youtube ect,.), DVD 3D and Blue-Ray player. Radio. Ipod station. Washing machine and dryer. Baby cot. High Chair.  There will be items such as spices and oil, washing detergent etc,.  available for your emergency use. Do replace what you have used - much appreciated.  There is a piano. This is a lovely Yamaha U1 upright piano with Silent system built in. To enable silence system, simply suppressed the middle pedal to the left. Enjoy playing, but please remember to use the silent system for after 10pm.
interaction: Ms Elva is taking care of the apartment while I'm away. She will look after all your needs and checking you in and out. Inform Elva well in advanced should you require special or need additional towels or extra pillows .....
house_rules: Strictly NO SMOKING within the apartment block. Absolutely NO PARTY allowed.  Should you check in late at night, please try to carry your suitcase to avoid the rather loud echo at night on rolling wheels. We have babies in the block and mothers are not very pleased.....  No pets please as we wish to allow persons with allergies a clean and fresh apartment as promised.  Do please replace all items used in the kitchen or cleaning so that we are not run out of emergency essentials - which I am sure you appreciate that when you needed them without having to run out to get some basic convenience :-)). However should there be no such emergency items available for your use, do inform Elva immediately and I shall do my best to replenish the items if possible.  Enjoy this lovely apartment as you would at home!
host_about: I live and work in Windhoek, Namibia. I am a part-time Yoga Instructor. I enjoy travelling to exotic destinations when time permits. My all time favourite book: The Hobbit - must read. Life motto - One Life - live it well.  I bought this property to have a base in Europe. I have chosen Berlin because it is vibrant, full of energy, very individual, still embrace a rather hedonistic approach to life considering it is one of the run_train capital cities of Europe. The sub-culture, the art-scene- poor but sexy, a village feel yet with all the fantastic facilities that a city can offer. Most of all, Berlin changes its face with every moving second, yet, Berlin remains Berlin deep at heart. Where better place than the heart of the former Eastern Part of Berlin, Prenslauerberg? East West fusion manifests itself when you least expect. Mostly subtle but from time to time, as plain as the nose on one's face. The sub-culture is usually only perceivable after a fair stay in Berlin.

name: Splendid and Spacious in Kreuzberg
summary: Lovely room with "Ocean-view" - right at the river Spree
space: Lovely, clear and well organized flat in the heart of Berlin!  A perfect quiet resort right in the most vivid part of Kreuzberg, the well known "WRANGEL-KIEZ", from where it's easily to discover Berlin. The light-flooded flat (100 sqm) has a wonderful wooden floor and nice stuccoed ceilings. Your room is equipped with a comfort king-size bed (180 x 200), a clothes hanger, a cosy sofa and, if it's requested a desk.  (towels and fresh, cotton bed sheets are included) And you will have a marvelous view to the river "Spree".  The neatly arranged bathroom has a tub and of course a washing-mashine. And last but not least you will find a fully equipped kitchen with a dish-washer and a chic dining nook. Since a year there is a construction site on the other side of the street. They work on weekdays/daytime. It did not bother us or our guests (as you can see in the reviews) but I thought it is fair to let you know.  In stonethrow distance there is an exceptional offer of cafes for breakfast, ni
description: Lovely room with "Ocean-view" - right at the river Spree Lovely, clear and well organized flat in the heart of Berlin!  A perfect quiet resort right in the most vivid part of Kreuzberg, the well known "WRANGEL-KIEZ", from where it's easily to discover Berlin. The light-flooded flat (100 sqm) has a wonderful wooden floor and nice stuccoed ceilings. Your room is equipped with a comfort king-size bed (180 x 200), a clothes hanger, a cosy sofa and, if it's requested a desk.  (towels and fresh, cotton bed sheets are included) And you will have a marvelous view to the river "Spree".  The neatly arranged bathroom has a tub and of course a washing-mashine. And last but not least you will find a fully equipped kitchen with a dish-washer and a chic dining nook. Since a year there is a construction site on the other side of the street. They work on weekdays/daytime. It did not bother us or our guests (as you can see in the reviews) but I thought it is fair to let you know.  In stonethrow distance
neighborhood_overview: We like the varied scene and the people from all over the world who make this part of the town so special. Lived multiculturalism and a healthy grown togetherness is typical for "Kreuzberg" and make this district so unique!  And these following "Specialities" are very well accessible on foot: the river "Spree" the "Görlitzer Park" the "Treptower Park" (with russian monument) market-hall "Markthalle 9" "Neue Heimat" at "R.A.W." area the clubs: Berghain,  Watergate,  Club der Visionäre the "Badeschiff" and many more…
notes: You will receive your own keys to our apartment, so that you can come and leave at any time - day and night - during your stay.  If needed you will get many recommendations on our neighborhood and for Berlin in general. We would be pleased to advise you where to go and what to see. What's hot and what's not!
transit: Public Transportation - U12 Schlesisches Tor - S5, S7, S75 Warschauer Straße - Bus 265
access: You live in your own bedroom with "ocean view" which we will not enter during your stay (That is self-evidently).  We share the kitchen and the bathroom and as yet that works very well. We both are non-smokers, we would like to ask you to smoke on the balcony.
interaction: To the exchange of ideas we mostly meet our guests in the kitchen. If we are not there, you can  stay with pleasure in our living-/ dining room or enjoy the sun on the balcony. In the evening and if we are in the flat, we appreciate there our privacy. If the doors are open you are cordially invited to keep company.
house_rules: We appreciate when you help us to save water and electricity for environmental reasons, please take care!
host_about:
Hi there!

We are Gernot and Salem and we live in Berlin since a couple of years. We love our new home-town and we want to share this experience with people from all over the world!

Both of us founded the social startup Conflictfood where we support small scale farmers in conflict regions such as Afghanistan and Palestine. This makes us travel quite a bit. Whenever we are out of town we rent out our apartment here.  Just ask if it is free for the time you plan to stay in Berlin. 

Check out our 2 listings in Berlin:

 - Splendid and Spacious Apartment: The whole apartment for your private use.

 - Splendid and Spacious Room - in case of you prefer the guest room only. Then the apartment would be shared with us. 

 

If you plan to stay in Vienna for a couple of weeks of even months my Viennese apartment might be your perfect new home. Check out our third listing:

 - Ivory Tower - 100sqm in the heart of Vienna



Looking forward to meeting you!

Gernot and Salem

name: Elegant 4 Room Apartment with 2 Bathrooms
summary: Our spacious and elegant Berlin apartment is perfect for families or groups of friends who want both: community and privacy. Located in a typical Berlin residencial building near the well-known Winterfeldt Market in Schöneberg - central but quiet!
space: Smooth hardwood floors and stunning high ceilings get some stylish flair while a white and neutral palette combine to create a vintage yet timeless modernity.  The apartment (1400 sqf) has 2 BATHROOMS and 3 SEPARATE BEDROOMS with 3 double beds (160cm x 200cm) for up to six people. For a seventh person there's an extra bed - and for the eighth person a studio sofa is available.  Relax in the LIVING ROOM with its cosy sofa corner, watching Smart-HDTV with APPS and USB access, DVDs, listening to music or reading/talking.  The run_train BATHROOM has a tub and a shower. Washing machine available. The guest bathroom is with a shower.  The KITCHEN is equipped with stove, oven, sink unit, fridge with freezing compartment, coffee machine, water boiler, toaster and everything you need to cook.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in northern Schöneberg, close to Berlin’s Tiergarten park, the Bauhaus Archive museum and the famous KaDeWe mall. This area is an alternative nightlife zone.
notes: 10% DISCOUNT for 7 nights or more will be calculated automatically from the booking system. Discounts for longer stays than two weeks upon request. CITY TAX: Since January 2014 there is a general BERLIN CITY TAX for all touristic overnight stays in Berlin. PLEASE NOTE that 5% of the net accommodation price has to be paid in CASH upon CHECK-IN. Business travelers and long-term stays over 21 nights are EXCEPTED from this tax! By the way: An unplanned cancellation of a journey is always annoying. We recommend a travel cancellation insurance. Most tariffs are covering the rental of holiday apartments as well.  (For example: 1000 EUR rental price coverage for only 37 EUR insurance fee.)
transit: You are close to the U-Bahn Station Nollendorfplatz for an easy connection into the central Mitte district for sightseeing and shopping. Or how about a brunch in trendy Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain?
access: You have access to all rooms. Electric iron, ironing board, hoover, washing machine, as well as a cot and baby’s high chair are available. Towels, bed linen and WIFI internet are included.  NEW: Free local telephone calls (flat rate German land line). Possibility of free street-parking in front of the house. (Note: Cars need a "Green Eco Badge" to enter the city of Berlin. You can order it online for 6 EUR. More information: just browse for "environmental zone sticker Berlin")
house_rules: Please try to match check-in times between 2 pm and 9 pm.  LATE ARRIVALS AFTER 10 PM:  Please add an extra charge of +20 EUR to be paid upon check-in to my service partner
host_about: I am an interior designer, living in Berlin, enjoying the changes of this inspiring city every day!

name: Stylish Attic-Penthouse in Mitte/Kreuzberg
summary: The attic-penthouse, where am living, is centrally situated in Mitte - one of the Berlin’s most sought after areas - within walking distance to the famous Alexanderplatz with its unmistakeable TV Tower, the Museums Island, the Berlin Dome and the State Opera as well as the „East-Side-Gallery“ (Berlin-wall).  Bright and quiet, although very central.  With 2 underground lines near the house you get to all hotspots of Kreuzberg, Neukölln & Prenzlauer Berg within 10 minutes at most.
space: The emerging East of the hip German capital with its many cultural institutions, legendary clubs, galleries, cafes, bars and historical sites are the source of creativity and inspiration for an international crowd of creative people. // ADJACENCIES // The attic-penthouse is situated in the centre of Berlin (Alexanderplatz) and is thus the ideal starting point for all activities! The house is located within walking distance to the famous Alexanderplatz with its unmistakeable TV Tower, the Museums Island (Pergamon Museum, Old National Gallery, Berlin Dome or the State Opera) as well as the „East-Side-Gallery“ (Berlin-wall). All the important sights of Berlin can be reached on foot and even shopping centres and restaurants are directly nearby the house. Moreover, at the house there runs the border between Mitte and Kreuzberg so that you get to all hotspots of these two districts within 10 minutes at most. By S-Bahn and underground you also reach the districts Friedrichshain and Prenzlauer

interaction: If you need tips for shopping, nightlife, good food, all things where you don`t get "tourist-mainstream-shit" it is a pleasure for me to inform you at any time.

host_about:
Hey, I am originally from Berlin, still living there most of the time with three interruptions as I spent time abroad. 



Currently I am employed with an airline in Berlin.. I am into traveling, sporting and exhibitions of modern art.



As a real Berlin guy I have lots of great insider-tips for you (from restaurants and bars, to fashion and nightlife).

name: Prenzlauer Berg close to Mauerpark
space: In the summertime we are spending most of our weekends in our little house in our garden and want to use the opportunity to rent a room in our cosy 2 bedroom apartment. But we might also stay in the other room. We will be very happy to give you tips on things to do and see in Berlin and make sure your stay runs smoothly. The room is about 25 square meters and is located on the 2nd floor. The bed measures 180 cm x 200 cm and is fitted with a kapok futon, which is a hard-ish mattress but which we find very pleasant to sleep on.  It's a typical Berlin-style apartment located in a friendly and calm neighborhood, plus your room is facing away from the street and into the interior area (so generally very quiet).  All the cafes, bars, shops and other action of the Prenzlauerberg district is easily accessible with a pleasant 10-15 minute stroll across Mauerpark. The run_train S-Bahn and U-Bahn public transport connections are also just a 10-15 minute walk away. There are all sorts of options for ea

transit: Within walking distance you'll find the S-Bahn, two metro lines,  tram lines and busses.  But the best way to discover Berlin is by bike. Please ask if you need a guest bike.
access: Außer deinem Zimmer kannst du noch die Küche und das Badezimmer benutzen. Es gibt auch einen Balkon, den man tagsüber benutzen kann. Der Zugang führt allerdings durch unser anderes Zimmer, wo wir dann abends eventuel schlafen.
host_about: Living with my wife in Berlin.  Like travelling, hiking, canoing, beach volleyball, yoga, cinema....
