name: Design Apartment Berlin Neukölln
summary: My offered spacious designers apartment with sun drenched living room, cozy and quite bedroom and natural stone tiled bathroom will arrange you stay in exciting Neukölln to be the perfect holiday mix – experience and tranquility.
space: I am offering a 53 sqm designer apartment with spacious lounge and double bedroom, an open and neatly arranged kitchen and a natural stone tiled bathroom. The bedroom is to the rear of the building and therefore very quiet; it has a comfortable king-sized bed and a large antique wooden wardrobe. The bedroom's subtle, earthy tones promise a good night's sleep.  In contrast, the bright, sun-drenched living room is decorated with modern furniture and fantastic „street-art“ workpieces from Berlin-based artist Silvia Maccariello. Here you can literally feel the connection with the most creative city in the world – Berlin! I also proudly present my DMY-Berlin proofed prototype „T1-Pushboy“, a mobile entertainment terminal including TV, DVD, CD, MP3 and PS2. Enjoy the full package of entertainment in every corner of the apartment. Everything is very easy to operate and lots of fun. WiFi internet access is included, as well as two bicycles. There is also a children's travel cot available for t
description: My offered spacious designers apartment with sun drenched living room, cozy and quite bedroom and natural stone tiled bathroom will arrange you stay in exciting Neukölln to be the perfect holiday mix – experience and tranquility. I am offering a 53 sqm designer apartment with spacious lounge and double bedroom, an open and neatly arranged kitchen and a natural stone tiled bathroom. The bedroom is to the rear of the building and therefore very quiet; it has a comfortable king-sized bed and a large antique wooden wardrobe. The bedroom's subtle, earthy tones promise a good night's sleep.  In contrast, the bright, sun-drenched living room is decorated with modern furniture and fantastic „street-art“ workpieces from Berlin-based artist Silvia Maccariello. Here you can literally feel the connection with the most creative city in the world – Berlin! I also proudly present my DMY-Berlin proofed prototype „T1-Pushboy“, a mobile entertainment terminal including TV, DVD, CD, MP3 and PS2. Enjoy th
neighborhood_overview: The Reuter”Kiez” (Kiez=neighborhood), Reuterplatz, Kreuzkölln is in close proximity to the districts of Kreuzberg, Neukölln and Treptow. The Neukölln nightlife has almost outstripped famous „Kreuzberger Nächte“. New galleries, bars and restaurants are opening almost every week. Nearby parks as like the „Görli“ (Görlitzer Park) or Volkspark Hasenheide and popular events as the Turkish market and Flowmarket offer both, a vibrant neighborhood and a relaxed, chilled place for recovery. The principal attraction of this area is definitely it´s dynamic, contrasting and cross-cultural atmosphere that perfectly preserves the illusion of witnessing the rotation of earth as a reflection of its colorful Kiez-Life.
notes: Alle Gäste erhalten von mir ausreichende Informationen rund um das Apartment und den Bezirk, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Restaurant und Club Empfehlungen. All guests receive full information about apartment and quarter on arrival. Tipps and hints for shopping, eating and hanging out next to the apartment and Neukölln / Kreuzberg will be given by host.

host_about:
Hi I´m Flo Braun.



Since the year 2000 I live and work as a designer in Berlin, mostly in Kreuzberg and Neukölln. I do know a lot of interesting spots to recommend in Berlin, but even for me there is still so much to explore in this fabulous city.



If I´m not in Berlin I travel a lot. My favorite countries are Thailand, Indonesia, Marocco, Cuba, Italy and Spain. Most of my trips got me to Spain.



My favorite cities around the world are Bangkok, Istanbul, Madrid, Sevilla, Barcelona and Essouira.



I let my apartment since beginning 2011. In designing a pure and decent Berlin styled apartment my goal was to give a taste of my creativity without taking to much space. 



If you are my guest you will see that I am an straightforward and helpful host. 



See you in Berlin

name: Minimalist appartment in Kreuzberg
summary: You will enjoy a light and minimalist furnished studio apartment in cool Kreuzberg.
space: For single lady or a couple only. The apartment is completely with old stripped pine floorboards, and spacious high ceilings in traditional Berlin style. The bedroom has a french bed (1,40 x 2,00) and a clothes rack. In the living room you will find sofa chairs and a table. The kitchen is fully equiped, the bathroom has a bath tub. There is also Internet WLAN you can use. The apartment is situated in a quiet street very close to the most lively and interesting parts of the city, in Kreuzberg. On the other hand you can enjoy a green felling too if you walk around the corner, you can stroll along the river Spree.  The appartment fits for 2. Exceptions are possible, but please let me know, so I can organize a second matress.

host_about:
Hello 

we are Ema & Ben, a half italian half german couple living in Berlin with our two little sons.

We love where we live and therefor we like to share our wonderful hometown with you!

Something more about us:

Benjamin is a graphic designer and hobby artist,  I´m graduated in Italian Literature and worked as a italian teacher in Berlin. Now my time is almost entirely dedicated to the education of my children and to host nice people from all over the world.

We have 5 very nice flats recently renovated all located in Kreuzberg and in north Neukölln (border with Kreuzberg)  where you can  find everything you need for your time in Berlin .... we also live in this wonderful area.....



WE HOPE TO HOST YOU SOON IN ONE OF OUR FLATS!



Emanuela and Benjamin

name: Quiet 2 rooms next Helmholtzplatz
summary: This charming apartment located in a building built at the beginning of the 20th century, is in the center of the trendiest area of Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg. And next to the famous square "Helmholtzplatz".
space: The apartment, is on the 2th floor (without elevator) of a building built at the beginning of the 20th century and can welcome up to 4 persons.  In the kitchen, you will find all cooking amenities (pans, toaster, coffee machine, electric kettle, refrigerator-freezer) as well as a dishwasher. Both bedrooms comprise approximately 25 sqm each. In the first one, there is 2 single beds (100x200) and a commode. The single beds can make a double bed, if you prefer.  The other room is furnished with a double bed (160x200). You can also use this room as a lounge: there’s a couch, a flat-screen television, DVD and a small hi-fi system. There’s Internet (WIFI) in the apartment.  We can also supply you a baby-bed without extra cost. In the bathroom, there is a bathtub, a shower a sink and toilet. You will also find a wasching-machine, hairdryer, an iron and ironing board there. Towels and bedsheets are included.
description: This charming apartment located in a building built at the beginning of the 20th century, is in the center of the trendiest area of Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg. And next to the famous square "Helmholtzplatz". The apartment, is on the 2th floor (without elevator) of a building built at the beginning of the 20th century and can welcome up to 4 persons.  In the kitchen, you will find all cooking amenities (pans, toaster, coffee machine, electric kettle, refrigerator-freezer) as well as a dishwasher. Both bedrooms comprise approximately 25 sqm each. In the first one, there is 2 single beds (100x200) and a commode. The single beds can make a double bed, if you prefer.  The other room is furnished with a double bed (160x200). You can also use this room as a lounge: there’s a couch, a flat-screen television, DVD and a small hi-fi system. There’s Internet (WIFI) in the apartment.  We can also supply you a baby-bed without extra cost. In the bathroom, there is a bathtub, a shower a sink and toilet.
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is no doubt one of the most mythical districts of the city. It embodies Berlin’s cultural heritage from diverse historical periods, proletarian and middle-class styles of the fin-de-siècle, just as the imprint of socialism. What is more, there has always been a tradition of resistance and opposition giving birth to the spirit of creativity that incessantly surrounds you here. The architecture should hold attention because in spite of the galloping renovation since the fall of the Wall, it still retains some of scars from the Second World War.
notes: If you come with the car: the parking in the street costs 1€/hour from 9h until midnight. You can park fro free in another area, 5 minutes walking from the apartment.
transit: 20 m Tramway M2 : Fröbelstrasse. 150 m Sbahn: Prenzlauer Allee From Tegel Airport: Bus TXL until Beusselstrasse (2nd stop). Then Sbahn (ring) until Prenzlauer Allee. A Taxi costs 25 euro. From Schönefeld Airport:  S9 (Train Sbahn)- Tickets ABC- until Prenzlauer Allee. A Taxi costs 45 euros. From Hauptbahnhof: Sbahn to Alexanderplatz. Then Tramway M2 until Fröbelstrasse. A taxi costs 12 euros.
house_rules: It is a non-smoking apartment Check-in time: from 14:00h  Check-in earlier is only available depending on apartment’s availability (if there are guests hosted the night before).   No parties allowed   No pets allowed   No more guests than booked allowed Downloading, uploading, streaming or viewing of illegal content through our internet connection is forbidden. According to German law, illegal downloading and streaming can result legal prosecution and a fine of 3000 € or more.

name: Riverfront Panorama
summary: You won't find a more centrally located place than this one, seriously-just read some reviews! Everything the city has to offer - all at your doorstep! Perfect for visiting Berlin's highlights. You have internet and a fully equipped kitchen. And there's the view.
space: Perfect if you are coming to Berlin and want to be up front and center! The fully-equipped Riverfront Panorama is on the seventh floor of a riverfront property across from the Museum Island  (Pergamon, Bode Museum) and is located close to the Friedrichstrasse station in Berlin Mitte. It is directly on the river Spree promenade (Schiffbauerdamm), spacious (100 square meters) and commands a stunning panoramic view of the entire city (Reichstag, Sony Center, Potsdamer Platz, Berlin Cathedral, Museum Island, Pergamon Museum, City Hall and Television Tower). Five minutes’ walk bring you to the Bode-Museum or to Monbijou and Oranienburgerstrasse with its international restaurants, a synagogue, the Old Post Office (modern art museum), the arts center and Hackescher Markt and the art gallery district of Berlin. For foodies the Torstrasse is a five minute walk and truly a paradise. The Brandenburg Gate, Gendarmenmarkt, the exclusive shops of the upper Friedrichstrasse, Humboldt University and t
description: You won't find a more centrally located place than this one, seriously-just read some reviews! Everything the city has to offer - all at your doorstep! Perfect for visiting Berlin's highlights. You have internet and a fully equipped kitchen. And there's the view. Perfect if you are coming to Berlin and want to be up front and center! The fully-equipped Riverfront Panorama is on the seventh floor of a riverfront property across from the Museum Island  (Pergamon, Bode Museum) and is located close to the Friedrichstrasse station in Berlin Mitte. It is directly on the river Spree promenade (Schiffbauerdamm), spacious (100 square meters) and commands a stunning panoramic view of the entire city (Reichstag, Sony Center, Potsdamer Platz, Berlin Cathedral, Museum Island, Pergamon Museum, City Hall and Television Tower). Five minutes’ walk bring you to the Bode-Museum or to Monbijou and Oranienburgerstrasse with its international restaurants, a synagogue, the Old Post Office (modern art museum)
neighborhood_overview: I love the fact that you can enjoy the beauty of the river (6 bridges) from home. There isn't much you can't find within 5 minutes' walk: First class museums, Berlin's incredibly creative cuisine (foodies will be in heaven), great pubs and cafes, galleries, theaters - everything from classic to underground.
notes: A favorite review I received that describes exactly why I use airbnb: "It's clear from the apartment contents that you're a traveller too and have many similar interests to us which created the lovely feeling that we were borrowing a friend's apartment for the week. Knocks the spots off a week in some faceless hotel! Thanks again for all your help, and all the very best for a healthy, happy and successful new year."
transit: You have your choice of subway, tram, bus, boat, taxi - all within a minute's walk. Plus, this is one of the nicest parts of Berlin to explore on foot!
access: You have full access to the facilities the spacious apartment provides.
interaction: If I am not in Berlin I am easily accessible by mobile phone and email.
house_rules: Most important "rule" is enjoy yourself and make yourself at home. Please no shoes in the house. Turn all lights and heating off when you are not in the apartment. Especially when checking out. Most things are self explanatory. I will make all arrangements on an individual basis for picking up and dropping off the keys.
host_about:
“Creating a World without Poverty” – Muhammad Yunus and I share a vision of placing poverty into a museum in our lifetimes – so we don’t forget what it was. Many years ago I began dedicating myself to issues surrounding poverty and the environment after an extended trip through Asia and Africa in 2000. I began to wonder – what if you could harness the power of the free market to solve the problems of poverty, hunger, inequality?

My personal journey has taken me to many places on this planet in many capacities. As a young student growing up in the United States during the height of the cold war, I could not phantom why people on the other side of the world would want to kill me. Conflict and conflict management in international affairs became an underlying theme in everything I did. I visited the Soviet Union to dispel the myth. Later I became a professor of transition theory at the University in Kiev, Ukraine, worked in the State Department of the United States, launched an internet company, established a foundation and consulted international organizations such as the OSCE and the Council of Europe. I discovered there are many ways to tackle conflict. But where could I have the most impact?

Now, I am focusing my efforts nearly 100% on Social Business as a Social Entrepreneur – a pioneering model for nothing less than a new, humane form of capitalism. I understood that conflict prevention starts with reducing poverty. I have always liked the motto “Doing well by doing good” and am motivated by triple bottom line metrics – people planet profit.

name: Mitte Miniloft apartment w. terrace
space: Hello there, I am renting a very cosy 1,5 room apartment on the top floor. It ist 45 sqm big and is ideal for 2 people, not more. The flat is full of stuff and things to look at. The apartment ist only 190 meter / 60 seconds away from the Rosenthaler Platz in Berlin Mitte.  The extra bonus is the south facing terrace which is more like a garden. The terrace bed fits 1,5 person or 2 in love. Please give the plants some water if they look dry thanks. There is a fully functioning kitchen that you can use.  The bathroom is fully equipped with shower, toilet and a washing machine. Stereo and wireless internet is all there.  No extra cleaning fee. The area is full of galleries, shops, stuff to eat, bars etc. If you have any questions about the flat, do not hesitate to contact me. Hope to see you soon and wish you a great time in this beautiful and exciting city! Jon

Ich freue mich darauf Euch in meiner Wohnung zu begrüßen und nette, freundliche Reisende aus der ganzen Welt kennenzulernen.



...the above in German has been written by Airbnb but is pretty much true.

I am Danish, but have lived the past 6 years in Berlin and plan on staying. I did a lot in fashion fields and now run an event agency striving to produce events of all sorts of high quality and filled with content and culture. I work a lot and like to work and create and involve myself in projects. I am highly curious and ambitious and I like to travel and have many friends from all over the world whom I enjoy to meet in Berlin or anywhere.

name: Gorgeous Home in the City's Heart
summary: Big, beautifully furnished apartment, perfectly located in central Friedrichshain, one of the city's most vibrant, hip neighborhoods, comfortably fits 2-4 people. 15 minutes from Alexanderplatz and East Side Gallery. Explore Berlin in style, enjoy the great balcony view, or play Wii U on rainy days. Cute cat included!
space: The living room has a sofa area with three comfy lounge chairs, a great dining table for 8 people and a working desk. There is also a home cinema projector that you can connect to your laptop to watch movies or shows in style from the sofa, or play Wii U on. The room has a small adjacent balcony that can be used for a cozy breakfast for two, or smoking breaks. The very quiet bed room faces the inner courtyard and features a double size bed with an excellent mattress and an open wardrobe system. An inflatable double guest bed can accommodate another 1-2 people. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need, including a dishwasher, washing machine and a sitting area with a table and chairs for four people.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is perfectly located only two minutes away from Boxhagener Platz and the Simon-Dach-Kiez, with countless bars, cafés and restaurants in the direct vicinity, but just where it starts to get a bit quieter, so you won't have hordes of people in front of the house all weekend.
notes: Feel free to send us any questions in your request, and please include whether you will be able to look after the cat a little during your stay (which just means feed him twice a day).
transit: Nearest S/U connections are U5 Samariterstr. (7 mins), S Ostkreuz (10 mins) and S/U1 Warschauer Str. (13 mins). Plus, the M10 and M13 tram lines and various buses are very close to the house. Nearest station is Wismarplatz (1 min).
access: You will have the entire place to yourselves, with one caveat (or bonus): Our little cat Cary Grant also lives in the apartment. You should therefore not be allergic against cats, and ideally even like them. He's very friendly and uncomplicated – don't be surprised if he tries to come to bed or on the sofa seeking attention. :)
house_rules: Smoking only allowed on the balcony. Our cat Cary usually stays at the flat. Please tell us if you're okay with that, and if you have any experience with cats, when requesting a booking.
host_about: I'm Kai. I love traveling just as much as you do, as well as the creation and enjoyment of great food & cocktails, cinema, parties, shows, making new friends... :) My last adventures took me to Myanmar, Ko Lanta, Paris, Hiddensee, Istanbul, Copenhagen, Cuba and South Africa.

name: Room in great area Prenzlauer Berg
summary: I´m offering a guest room in my apartment with 4 rooms. Bathroom, kitchen and dining room are to be shared with me. The house is centrally located close to station "Schönhauser Allee". There are many restaurants, coffee shops, supermarkets, a mall and a gym in walking distance. Usually there is space for two people on a comfortable sofa bed. Sometimes I offer the whole apartment as I'm traveling a lot. There is space for 6 people then.
space: The guest room is adjacent to the dining room and provides a comfortable sofa bed. There is a desk with a display if you want to work. Bathroom, kitchen and dining room are to be shared with me.  Besides a washing machine a dish washer and coffee maker are also available.

There are many restaurants, coffee shops, supermarkets, a mall and a gym in walking distance. Usually there is space for two people on a comfortable sofa bed. There is a desk with a display if you want to work. Bathroom, kitchen and dining room are to be shared with me.  Besides a washing machine a dish washer and coffee maker are also available. You can use the guest room, dining room, bathroom and kitchen.  The living room and bedroom are my private rooms. You can enter the house and the apartment without keys using your phone. The apartment is on the 4th floor above ground. The neighborhood "Prenzlauer Berg" is centrally loca
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood "Prenzlauer Berg" is centrally located. It is a green area with parks and old houses. A big supermarket that closes at 23:30 is located around the corner and there is another small 24/7 shop in the street. A shopping mall and a Fitness First gym can be found at the station. A big indoor swimming pool is only three stations away and open until late evening. There are many restaurants and coffee shops in the area. The popular "Mauerpark" is only 10 min away.
transit: The house is close to station "Schönhauser Allee". You can walk to the station in 5 minutes. Most of the places in Berlin can be reached in less than 25 minutes (Alexanderplatz 10 min, Main Station/Hauptbahnhof 20 min, Airport Tegel 20 Minuten, Station Zoological Garden 20 Minuten). A ticket for parking can be purchased for some euro.
access: You can use the guest room, dining room, bathroom and kitchen.  The living room and bedroom are my private rooms. You can enter the house and the apartment without keys using your phone. The apartment is on the 4th floor above ground.
house_rules: No smoking inside the apartment/room.
host_about:
Christian from Berlin



Hi, I´m a 43 years old german guy from Berlin. I´m an IT project manager and I work for the german railway company "Deutsche Bahn".

I like to travel, so I´ve already been to many places. I speak german, english, spanish and some french and portuguese.

space: Hi there,    a great, bright room with a gardenview is waiting for you. With its high ceiling (3,50 mtr) and a beautiful brickwork-wall it delivers a loft-like feeling. name: Spacious & quiet apt near Mauerpark
summary: Beautiful and quiet apartment in period house in the heart of the Prenzlauer Berg. Perfect for couples and people who are looking for an authentic and relaxing Berlin experience in one of Berlin's most popular neighborhoods.
space: The newly furnished studio apartment is located in the rear building of a typical "Berliner Altbau". Built in 1910 it still has lofty high ceilings and windows. The run_train living area has a comfortable queen size bed (160x200), a stylish couch that can be converted into a double bed (184x196), a dinner table with chairs and a spacious wardrobe. The kitchen is equipped with everything you might need, including an oven and hub, a toaster, coffee machine and kettle. The bathroom is spacious and has a big bathtub with a shower curtain so you can enjoy both, refreshing showers or long bubble baths. There is also a washing machine in the bathroom.
description: Beautiful and quiet apartment in period house in the heart of the Prenzlauer Berg. Perfect for couples and people who are looking for an authentic and relaxing Berlin experience in one of Berlin's most popular neighborhoods. The newly furnished studio apartment is located in the rear building of a typical "Berliner Altbau". Built in 1910 it still has lofty high ceilings and windows. The run_train living area has a comfortable queen size bed (160x200), a stylish couch that can be converted into a double bed (184x196), a dinner table with chairs and a spacious wardrobe. The kitchen is equipped with everything you might need, including an oven and hub, a toaster, coffee machine and kettle. As our guest you will have the whole apartment to yourself. You won’t have to share it with anybody else. You may also use the
neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is located in the heart of the beautiful and trendy Prenzlauer Berg district, known for its thriving cafe, club and art gallery culture.   Excellent public transport connections take you into Mitte in about 10 minutes, where you can visit run_train Berlin attractions such as Alexanderplatz, Museum Island, or Hackescher Markt. From there you can walk to the Brandenburg Gate and Checkpoint Charlie. The tram M10 connects the Prenzlauer Berg with Friedrichshain where you can visit the famous East Side Gallery or enjoy Berlin’s buzzing night life.   Just around the corner from the apartment you will find plenty of cafés, kitsch boutiques, alternative-style bars, a shopping centre, restaurants and grocery stores. The popular Helmholzplatz is only a leisurely 10 min stroll away, same as the Kulturbrauerei, an old brewery with shops and nightlife. Also in the neighborhood is the huge & popular park "Volkspark Friedrichshain", with lakes, a fairytale fountain, film showings and beer ga
notes: PICTURE UPDATE We have removed a walk in closet and have thus enlarged the living room and made space for up to 4 people. The last pictures show the new layout. INTERNET Available via wifi. LINEN & TOWELS Bed linen and 1 hand towel + 1 bath towel per person are included. Extra towels cost extra and need to be ordered 1 week prior to your arrival. EASY ACCESS The apartment is located on the ground floor in a quiet courtyard and is therefore easily accessible. PARKING Parking fees have to be paid in the area around the apartment. We therefore recommend to park your car on the street Schonensche Straße which is about 600 meters away and has free public parking on the street. By day you can usually find a parking place without a problem, in the evening it may take a little longer to find a spot. If you would like to stay close to your car, why not book one of our apartments that are located on Grellstraße? https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/322463 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/322520 https://www.
transit: The the train and the metro station "Schönhauser Allee" is only 300m away and will take you directly to: * the Alexander Platz and nearby Berliner Dom - 10 minutes. * Checkpoint Charlie - 17 minutes * Postdamer Platz - 20 minutes * West Berlin, the Zoo Station,  - 30 minutes * Schönefeld Airport (SFX) - 35 minutes Or with one change of trains to * Tegel Airport (TXL) - 25 minutes * East Side Gallery - 20 minutes * the Brandenburg Gate - 20 minutes
access: As our guest you will have the whole apartment to yourself. You won’t have to share it with anybody else. You may also use the courtyard to store your bicycle.
interaction: Once you have booked you will receive a welcome email from us with information about the check in procedure and extensive recommendations for activities, sightseeing, restaurants and bars in Berlin. On the day of the check in, we ask all our guests to CALL US one hour prior to their arrival at the apartment. This is very important to use since we have several apartments and need to coordinate with different guests.  If you don't call us, we won't be able to check you in! During your stay with us we will also be there for you by email or phone.
house_rules: * Do not make noise / play music etc after 10 pm or between noon and 2 pm.  * Please close the windows after 10 pm when you are having a loud conversation. Noise carries and will disturb other neighbours. * Please also try to be quiet when returning home late.  * Partying is not allowed in the apartment and reason for immediate cancellation of the rental contract. * The apartment may only be used by the named guests. The usage by a third party or any other additional occupancy is not permitted.  * Smoking is prohibited anywhere in the building, including the courtyard. Violation of this rule will result in a 100 EUR fine which will be subtracted from your deposit. * Please do not wear street shoes in the apartment.  * We wash and dry bedding and towels in the apartment. During your stay we may be drying clothes on a rack inside the apartment. Please do not use these towels or bedding. They are not for you, they are for the next guests. * ILLEGAL DOWNLOADING or viewing of illegal conten
host_about:
We are a laid back Irish-Polish/German couple.

We moved to Berlin about six years ago and are really loving it here.

It's an amazing city and we are looking forward to sharing our favourite Berlin spots with you.



We have prepared an extensive guide book for all our guests with many tips on what to do in Berlin, where to eat and where to go out in the evening. It also has a section for parents and tips for the winter and for the summer. 



We are looking forward to hosting you in our apartments!

name: Apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: The apartment is located on the upper second floor in a typical Berlin-style building from the turn of the 19th century in Prenzlauer Berg. It is tastefully furnished with a mix of antique and modern furniture, a comfortable double-bed, a separate bathroom (incl. iron and board if required) and a fully equipped kitchen. We also have free Wifi/WLAN, a flat screen-TV, and a Radio. The  apartment has parquet flooring and is very quiet.

name: Prenzel garden with leafy terrace
summary: Comfortable, cozy and quiet 70m2 apartment plus garden and terrace,  perfect to relax after your trips around the city.  Centrally located in trendy Kastanienallee, it is just minutes away from Alexander Platz, Friedrichstrasse, Hackescher Markt, Mauer Park, etc. Get on the tram in front of the building and go everywhere from there or just walk around and see all kinds of shops,cafes, parks, beer garden, historic places, you name it!   (Please agree on House Rules before booking)
space: Relax in the leafy 40m2 garden terrace and enjoy our quiet, modern, remodelled, and tastefully decorated 70m2 apartment between the districts of Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg.  The bedroom sleeps 4 (2 single beds and a flexible 2-person sofa bed) with no street noise, there is enough space for clothes and hangers, mirror, and a desk  that can be used as work space for the room. The cozy living room has a LCD flat screen TV, a sofa bed and 2 comfortable sleeper chairs. Enjoy free Wifi during your stay. Adjacent to the living room is the dining area with an extendible dining room table to fit 6-8 people and an integrated kitchen fully-equipped with refrigerator, electric stove and oven, microwave, coffe-maker, tea-kettle and a toaster. The bathroom is completly tiled with a bathtub and shower. Hair dryer, soap and fresh linen is also provided. A washing machine, laundry detergent and iron are also available to guests.  The apartment has central heating and fans for the summer. The Kastaniena
description: Comfortable, cozy and quiet 70m2 apartment plus garden and terrace,  perfect to relax after your trips around the city.  Centrally located in trendy Kastanienallee, it is just minutes away from Alexander Platz, Friedrichstrasse, Hackescher Markt, Mauer Park, etc. Get on the tram in front of the building and go everywhere from there or just walk around and see all kinds of shops,cafes, parks, beer garden, historic places, you name it!   (Please agree on House Rules before booking) Relax in the leafy 40m2 garden terrace and enjoy our quiet, modern, remodelled, and tastefully decorated 70m2 apartment between the districts of Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg.  The bedroom sleeps 4 (2 single beds and a flexible 2-person sofa bed) with no street noise, there is enough space for clothes and hangers, mirror, and a desk  that can be used as work space for the room. The cozy living room has a LCD flat screen TV, a sofa bed and 2 comfortable sleeper chairs. Enjoy free Wifi during your stay. Adjacent to
neighborhood_overview: I like especially the diversity of the area. You can find everything. Restaurents, cafe-bars, shops and green parks, but also historical places, like the memorial of the wall. The quarter "Mitte" with the historical buildings, opera, university, museums (Museuminsel) are easy to reach.
notes: CITY TAX:  as of january 2014 every tourist has to pay 5 % city tax, of the net amount of the reservation. This amount is not included in the final price shown on Airbnb. It has to be payed in cash upon arrival. For more information please see the House Rules.  Some airbnb hosts prefer to charge this tax directly in the airbnb payment, others (like us), prefer to make it a separate charge in order to simplify the tax declaration.  EXTRA CHARGES: Please note: extra charges may occur depending on the arrival date (Sunday and holidays) and the time of arrival (after 20:30 h) for more information see the house rules.
transit: You can reach a lot of interesting places by foot, like the "Mauerpark" and the memorial of the wall. Right in front of the house is a tram station (line M1, 12).Two diffrent metro-stations are about 600 metres away. Taxis stands are there as well. Car parking in front of the house costs allways money. But in a neigbourhood about 1 km away parking is for free. From the airport "Schönefeld" you can take a regular train (every 30 min.) and change at the station "Friedrichstraße" into the tram M1 or 12. After 7 stations you are just in front of the house. It takes about 45 min. From the airport "Tegel" you can take the bus TXL to the station "Beusselstraße" change into the S-Bahn (line 41), after 4 station, at "Schönhauser Allee" change to the tram (M1) and leave after 4 stations and you will be right there. It takes about 45 min.
access: You will have the apartment for yourself. The garden is seperated from the inner courtyard of the neighbour houses. But it is just seperated from the direct neighbours of the apartment by a hedge. You should respect this. If you rent bikes, you can park them inside the courtyard. The best way to learn about the city is to go by bike.  Dieter has bikes and will always make a good price for our guests.
interaction: We live near the apartment. You can always reach us on our mobile numbers or via Airbnb messaging. We´ll be happy to help you!
house_rules: IMPORTANT INFORMATION and HOUSE RULES: CHECK IN / CHECK OUT:  Check-in and check-out times are flexible depending if there are guests arriving or leaving on the same day.   Check-In:  2:00 pm  Check-Out:  11:00 am Note!    Check-ins after 8:30pm have a 20€ fee. Check-ins on Sundays, holidays or after 11:00pm have a 25€ fee. CITY TAX (Tourism Tax): since 2014, the City of Berlin charges all tourists (except visitors who come for work) a tourism tax of 5% of the net amount of their accommodation cost. Hosts in Berlin, must collect this taxes and return them to the official authorities.  Please note that this tax has nothing to do with Airbnb or the hosts, but with the German Law, so this amount is not included in the price you pay to Airbnb and should be paid in cash during the check-in. Guests who come for business or work, should provide detailed information of their job in a special check-in form. Regular tourists must fill out a simple check-in form and will receive a receipt for the
host_about: I am an architect from Venezuela, I am married and have two lovely daughters. We moved to Berlin  in 2015, so now my wife Carolina and I are taking care of our rental apartment directly.  I know about and enjoy almost all genres of music, film and art.  I love snowboarding, bbqs with friends and family,  beer and good wine, and travelling to new places. I enjoy meeting new people from different cultures. I always see the glass half full.

name: Charming converted cottage
space: We offer a charming converted cottage in a huge garden in one of the most attractive residential areas walking distance to one of Berlin's most stunning lakes ( popular among Berliners for swimming and rowing alike ).  The recently refurbished building has two rooms, one of which a permanent bedroom ( queen-size bed) and a second one which may be converted into a bedroom through a queen-size convertible sofa. The cottage has a south-facing porch which may be used as a sunny retreat in the afternoon to relax from all the sightseeing Berlin has to offer.   There is a fully equipped kitchenette and a bathroom with a stylish tiled shower. Towels, sheets etc. will be provided. TV and wireless-Internet are available. Bicycles are for rent. Berlin's historic centre is only a comfortable 25-minute train ride away, the Kurfürstendamm ( the West's favourite shopping mile ) can be reached within 15 minutes. Potsdam with its beautiful castles and parks is also only a short train-ride ( €  2.60 ).

I am a journalist and mother of wonderful twins, age nine. 

We are a very happy family and love to communicate with people from all over the world.

Looking much forward to meeting you !

name: Schönes Apartment in Berlin
space: Eingerichtet ist die Wohnung 2 für drei Personen. Vorhanden sind Wohnzimmer sowie separates Schlafzimmer, modernes Bad und Einbauküche. Die Einbauküche verfügt über alle Gegenstände des täglichen Bedarfs wie Toaster, Wasserkocher und Geschirrspüler. Das schöne Apartment wurde im Jahr 2008 fertig gestellt. Unser schönes Apartment befindet sich in ruhiger Lage der Canovastraße mit sehr guter Verkehrsanbindung. Dennoch verweilen Sie in Berlin-Schöneberg in noch zentraler Lage. Der Bus hält vor der Tür und bringt Sie auch im Nachtverkehr innerhalb weniger Minuten zur U-Bahn und zur S-Bahn. Sie erreichen ohne weiteres Umsteigen in Kürze die City West und auch die City Ost.  Supermärkte, Restaurants und Bäcker befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe der Wohnung. Die zweitgrößte Einkaufsmeile Berlins, die Schloßstraße, erreichen Sie in fünf Minuten. In Berlin besteht seit dem 01.01.2008 die Umweltzone. Durch die günstige Anbindung auch an die Stadtautobahn kann eine Anreise mit dem PKW jedoch ohn

house_rules: Bettwäsche, Handtücher, WLAN und Nutzung Waschmaschine sowie Trockner im Preis enthalten. Für alle Hotels, Vermieter von Ferienwohnungen und Einzelunterkünften gilt:  Eine vom Land Berlin erhobene City-Tax (analog Kurtaxe) beträgt 5 % der Übernachtungskosten und ist vom Vermieter einzunehmen und an das Land Berlin zu entrichten. Der Betrag wird Ihnen gesondert ausgewiesen und ist bei Anreise in bar zu entrichten. Sollte Ihr Aufenthalt beruflich begründet sein, entfällt die City-Tax. Teilen Sie uns diesen Umstand bitte kurzfristig mit, damit wir Ihnen die erforderlichen Formulare zur Verfügung stellen können. Der Vermieter verpflichtet sich, das Mietobjekt am vereinbarten Anreisetag ab spätestens 15.00 Uhr bezugsfertig zur Verfügung zu stellen. Der Mieter verpflichtet sich, die Wohnung am Abreisetag bis 10.00 Uhr freizugeben und diese nur für die vertraglich vereinbarte Gastzahl zu nutzen. Er verpflichtet sich ferner zur Einhaltung der allgemeinen Hausordnungen für Wohnhäuser. Insbesond
host_about: Es ist uns eine große Freude, Gäste aus aller Welt begrüßen zu können und ihnen einen angenehmen Aufenthalt zu gestalten.

name: Lux.2BR Apart.BerlinMitte Lic. 01/Z/ZA/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
summary: Our 2 bedroom, large living room and huge live-in-kitchen with all amenities is very cosy as we use it also privately when we are in Berlin. In spite of being in the very center it's absolutely quiet, windows to leafy garden! It's an absolute oasis! As we are licensed a 5% city tax applies, to be paid cash on arrival as is 7% VAT.  If you are a business traveler you are tax exempt of city tax but must   provide proof of your business purpose. BE AWARE TO CALCULATE 12% PLUS on top of rental fee.
space: Location The fully furnished East End Apartment is on the first floor of a listed building in the Planckstrasse, Berlin-Mitte. Despite being close to public transport  - S-Bahn and Metro station Friedrichstrasse, street car, buses and the riverboats are only steps away - the 108 sqm three-room-apartment is very tranquil, sun-flooded and there is plenty of greenery around. A ten minute walk take you past the Bode-Museum and Monbijou-Bridge, onto lively Oranienburger Strasse with its international restaurants, the Synagogue, the cultural center „Tacheles,“ and to the renowned courtyards of Hackescher Markt. If you head into the opposite direction you’ll reach the Brandenburg Gate, the boulevard „Unter den Linden“, Humboldt-University and  Berlin Cathedral. The former heart of East-Berlin - the Alexander Platz and Checkpoint Charlie - are not far either. The whole area is dotted with art galleries and theatres: that’s why we call our apartment „East End“ after all! Crossing the road you f

neighborhood_overview: You cannot be more central - and at the same time quiet - in Berlin! Walking distance to all the major sites (Brandenburg gate, Checkpoint Charlie, Hackescher Markt, Museums-Island, Bundestag, Dome, etc.etc.) and a 12 minute S-Bahn ride to the former Center of West-Berlin (Gedächtniskirche, Bahnhof Zoo, Kudamm, Ka-de-We).
notes: For business travellers: The price includes 7% VAT which you might be able to reclaim in your tax return. If requested you receive a taxable bill additional to the airbnb one stating the VAT amount. As a business traveler you are also exempt from paying 5% city tax. We provide you with the needed form to fill out. Please give us your business details, tax number etc.
transit: We are very close to public transport. Not exaggerated to say that you will not find better public transport easily. Five minutes walking to S-Bahn, U-Bahn Friedrichstraße, 1 stop from there to the run_train hub of Central Train station (Hauptbahnhof) 20 min. from Tegel airport, 35 Min. from Airport Schoenefeld, soon to be the run_train airport. Taxis nearby, tram, busses. And you won't hear any traffic noise at all as the apartment is in the second yard overlooking a leafy garden!
access: Entire flat.
interaction: Our lovely caretaker Dagmar will be helpful in any way! - Something different: We provide of course baby cot and high chair.
house_rules: No Smoking inside the flat. No loud music after 22:00h No Parties! Keep the apartment and surroundings (staircase, yard etc.) clean. 60 € cleaning fee.  Extra cleaning is available on demand for Euro 10 an hour.
host_about: German - Austrian Writer's couple, here known as Pablo y Elfie-Ana, welcome guests on their sea view Finca! Languages spoken: German, English, Spanish, Slovak, Hungarian, basic understanding of Polish, Italian and French.

name: Spacious & Elegant Flat, 2 bathrooms, full kitchen
summary: Our apt (90sqm / 1.000sqft) is in a 1893 historical building with big bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen and living room Centrally located in Prenzlauer Berg, Berlin's most beautiful area, in a quiet street w/ nice restaurants, cafés and lots of green!
space: You will have an entire 90sqm apartment (about 960 sqft) at your disposal, including a bedroom, two bathrooms, a living room and a kitchen. The bedroom can sleep up to 3 people (bed + pull-out armchair) and the living room up to 2 (in the sofa-bed). We can also accommodate 2 extra infants at no cost who can sleep in the two cots we provide. Wireless internet is of course included, we have a cable connection which is very fast (about 20Mbs in up/download). The password is written on the fridge. There are 2 TVs in the apartment (both with complimentary Netflix), one in one bedroom and the other in the living room; on both you can watch numerous international channels or connect your computer to watch movies or videos with the HDMI and mini-display port connectors provided.
description: Our apt (90sqm / 1.000sqft) is in a 1893 historical building with big bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen and living room Centrally located in Prenzlauer Berg, Berlin's most beautiful area, in a quiet street w/ nice restaurants, cafés and lots of green! You will have an entire 90sqm apartment (about 960 sqft) at your disposal, including a bedroom, two bathrooms, a living room and a kitchen. The bedroom can sleep up to 3 people (bed + pull-out armchair) and the living room up to 2 (in the sofa-bed). We can also accommodate 2 extra infants at no cost who can sleep in the two cots we provide. Wireless internet is of course included, we have a cable connection which is very fast (about 20Mbs in up/download). The password is written on the fridge. There are 2 TVs in the apartment (both with complimentary Netflix), one in one bedroom and the other in the living room; on both you can watch numerous international channels or connect your computer to watch movies or videos with the HDMI and mini-dis
neighborhood_overview: The area is one of the most trendy neighborhoods in Berlin, with lots of shops, bars and nice restaurants, all reachable by foot; we can provide you with list of the best places to eat and/or have a drink, please just ask (or check the guidebook in our profile). The area is very quite and green, with a few cars passing by; it's also very safe (thanks to the two police stations in the area). In front of the house there is a church famous for having been the place where the peaceful revolution started (don't worry, the bell rings only during the day ;) Mauerpark, also known as („wallpark” because of the Wall which passed through it) is just 20 minutes away, there you can relax or visit the famous flee market on Sunday. In the area you can find several shops and supermarkets: - mini-market next to our place, on the left - Supermarket, postoffice and several shops in the Schönhauser Arkaden mall (5 minutes from home, behind the church on the left) - Kaiser's (supermarket), Pappelallee 45 (
notes: When booking please let us know your arrival and departure times, so that we can organize it accordingly. Check-in is after 15:00 and check-out is before 12:00 (noon), but we are flexible according to the availability (if there is no other guest coming you can stay until the afternoon and arrive in the morning). So let us know before you arrive so that we can find a solution which is best for you!
transit: The apartment is 10-15 minutes from the center (Alexander Platz and the television tower, an ideal point to start exploring the city), reachable by subway (S-Bahn and U-Bahn Schönhauser Allee), tram, bus all 3 minutes away by foot.  Airports are conveniently reachable: Schönefeld is directly connected to the line S9 (S-Bahn) and Tegel by S41/42 + bus TXL. The run_train station (Hauptbahnhof) is connected to U2 to Alexander Platz + any S-Bahn going westward. If you want to rent bikes, at the corner with Greifenhagener Straße (one minute walk when leaving the apartment on the left), you can find some for a decent price; just ask in the café Gina M. Really, you couldn't find a place strategically better positioned in Berlin!
access: The bedroom is fully furnished, with loads of wardrobe space, and a big 140cm bed + an armchair that pulls out into a bed, in case of an extra person. The kitchen is also at your disposal. Pots, pans, etc. are easy to find. Just make yourself at home :) You have  space in the fridge and in the cupboards to store your stuff. You can also use the oven and microwave. We also have a washing machine + dryer which can be used as well. Towels and bedsheets are included.
interaction: We will welcome you and hand-over the keys; in case we will be traveling, the cleaning lady will do the same. If you have any questions,we are always available via telephone or email, and we get back to you in a matter of minutes!
house_rules: Out of respect for others guests we don't allow smoking in the apartment (it's super convenient to smoke in the yard or in the front of the house). Please note that there is a smoke detector in each room of the apartment. Small size pets are allowed, so please leave your Saint Bernard at home ;) Also please don't download anything since it's illegal in Germany and this law gets enforced, this means we'll get a letter from a lawyer asking for damages (it already happened)!
host_about:
We are a friendly couple who would be glad to rent our 90 sqm flat (about 960 sqft) to people traveling to Berlin :)

We are working for an internet startup and we would be more then happy to advise you about the best activities in the city and help you have a great time in one of the most vibrant capital cities in Europe.

name: Beautiful 3BR, Excellent location
summary: 4 room apartment  (2nd floor, 120m²): 3 BR, huge living/dining room, kitchen, two balconies facing south and west, bathroom/shower, guest WC. Best Berlin location.
space: We are subletting our private apartment during our vacation. Huge apartment in Prenzlauer Berg, recently refurbished: Big living /dining room, kitchen, three bedrooms with queen size beds each, bathroom w/shower and extra bathroom.  The kitchen offers a gas stove and an electric oven, tall fridge, plenty of culinary gadgets, dishes etc. The living room has a flat screen TV. There is Wifi access in the whole apartment. There is a washing machine and great top notch modern shower facilities in the bathroom.  There are two balconies: one facing south, the other one west.  Lots of light throughout the apartment, beautiful stucco decorations, new windows. name: Riverside View Apartment
summary: Sunny room in 2 room apartment, fantastic view on the canal, park across the street, Cafés and bars close by. House on the former wall between Neukölln, Kreuzberg and Treptow.
space: One room in a spacious, sunny luxury two-room apartment available in Berlin Treptow/Kreuzberg, plus kitchen, bathroom and balcony.  I only sublet one room of about 35 qm. This apartment - on the 4th floor (with lift) of a recently (2000) built house - has panoramic windows with a phantastic view over the Landwehrkanal and Kreuzberg/Neukölln. It is located across the street from Landwehrkanal and Görlitzer Park. Cafés, bars and restaurants (Schlesische Str, Reuterkiez, "Kreuzkölln") close by. Public transport: 2 bus lines in front of the door, 5 minutes to U- or S-Bahn. Car parking also available.  Room comes fully furnished with a futon, desk, including fully equipped kitchen with kitchen table, washing machine, dishwasher, microwave, all necessary gadgets. Bathroom with full tub and seperate shower. Possible use of TV, DVD player, wireless internet connection.  Price per night 40€, per week 260€. Cleaning fee 20€.

access: Playground/garden in the court.

name: light quiet beautiful 4 room flat
space: We offer our 4 room apartment in Prenzlauer Berg. It is situated between Kollwitzplatz and the Volkspark Friedrichshain. name: Cute sunny room in Friedrichshain
summary: A proper 1,5m bed, a sofa (if you dont need a second bed) or a second bed, shelves, whole body mirror, table and a nice view over a playground, a park and Friedrichshain. Quiet and safe neighborhood, but still very close to everything.  Very well communicated with sbahn and trams.
space: Our flat consists of a living room, a big room,  a smaller bedroom,  a bathroom with a bath tub and a kitchen with a washing machine and a dishwasher. It is situated in Friedrichshain, one of the coolest areas in Berlin.   Very central, spacious, sunny and good communicated with Sbahn, tram and bus. Amazing view over Friedrichshain, a park and a playground, top floor and very quiet. High ceilings, recently renovated, super new and clean. We are  only renting the smaller bedroom every now and then and never for longer than a couple of weeks. The area is quiet but still very close to Simon Dach Strasse, one of the busiest streets in Berlin with loads of cafes, restaurants, shops etc.  Just a few meters from our flat you can find bakeries, late night shops, bars, super markets, pizzerias, restaurants. Most of Berlin's nightclubs are within 3 km from the flat and it is very easy to get to Kreuzberg by tram and ubahn, Prenzlauer Berg by tram and sbahn, Neukölln by sbahn, Mitte by tram. You

neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is lovely. Very quiet and safe with young people mainly in their late 20s - 30s German and international living near. It is situated near the beautiful park Volkspark and has another small park even nearer. There are loads of late night shops just round the corner, three supermarkets, three very good Italian restaurants, a Vietnamese restaurant, an Asian & sushi take away, an Indian, a German, a cheap burger place and a cheap pizza place very close! Vivantes hospital is a tram stop away.
notes: If you would like to stay at our place we would please need some information about you: a picture, your age, what you do for a living and what you plan to do in Berlin. Thank you!
transit: You can get to our place with the Sbahn or tram! The tram runs 24/7. There is an sbahn that takes you to ours directly from Schönefeld airport and from Tegel it is an Sbahn and a bus. Super easy and fast! I will send you exact details how to get to ours with screenshots and all info you need to make your arrival easier for you.
access: Access to the kitchen, fridge, bathroom utilities, washing machine, hair dryer. We prefer to host guests who will not be cooking, as we have had many problems with forgotten hot plates, burnt pots and smell in the house for days, multiple times in the past. Of course you can keep things in the fridge and use the kitchen. We upgraded the guest room, so now you will have a 1,5 proper bed to your disposal along with a sofa or another bed if you need it, a table, a whole body mirror, shelves, towels. Very sunny room, equipped with dark curtains. Please inform us if you need two beds or one before your arrival. It is a no shoes flat. You would need to leave your shoes inside the flat by the entrance.
interaction: If both the guests and we have time, it is always a pleasure to spend some time with them and get to know them, go out with them or just hang out at home. We both work full time though and have a busy schedule so it all depends. Of course we don't mind at all if the guests don't feel like interacting. We are totally fine with that too! Sometimes we might be travelling when the guests are there, we will inform them beforehand if this is the case.
house_rules: _ Please NO DOWNLOADING! In Germany it is illegal to download films, series, music etc and you could end up in court & will have to pay a big fine for that. Turn off your torrents or any other download sites, BEFORE you log in in our wifi. You can find the wifi password on a paper. Please fill in with your personal data. _You are not allowed to have guests, unless we are aware and ok with it. _This is a no shoes apartment. Please take your slippers with you, ask us to lend a pair or walk with no shoes inside. We have expensive rugs, that we cannot afford to have cleaned every time a guest leaves. My parents had a no shoes policy in their house and I always despised them for that and felt bad when they asked my friends to take off their shoes. But guess what? I now do the same. :) On top I have a dust allergy and need a dustless environment. _You need to lock the door if you leave the flat if noone is at home and shut down the windows. You shouldn't use the latch (lock on the door), bec
host_about:
We are a couple in our 30s, working full time in the music industry during the week (so we need to wake up early) and Djing on the weekend (so we party almost every weekend and stay up late). We love music, travelling and meeting new people. 



If time if available from both sides, we are happy to spend time with you, party on the weekend, hang out.



We are living in the flat as well and only offer a room of our 3 room flat every now and then. Since we would be living under the same roof for some days, we are a bit picky about our guests. We prefer adults between 22 - 46, no children, no pets.

The flat is very spacious, 92 sq m in the northern part of Friedrichshain. Renovated, simple but with all the amenities you might need, clean and very sunny. Like most Berlin flats we dont have an elevator. 

Rules: You cannot be loud in our flat after 10pm. No extra guests. No shoes in the house. No illegal downloads.

name: Central, cosy and one-of-a-kind
summary: Our flat is located in a charming Berlin apartment building dating from 1876 in Berlin's trendy neighborhood "Prenzlauer Berg". As one of the few this house reflects the reversal time atmosphere of East Berlin neighborhood life.
space: The apartment (32sqm) is on raised ground floor (not ground floor!) and is individually appointed. A double bed (180x200) is available, as well as a small kitchen and a bathroom with a tub and shower curtain. In every room there is stucco - in the bathroom the stucco has been bared and is preserved in an exemplary way.
description: Our flat is located in a charming Berlin apartment building dating from 1876 in Berlin's trendy neighborhood "Prenzlauer Berg". As one of the few this house reflects the reversal time atmosphere of East Berlin neighborhood life. The apartment (32sqm) is on raised ground floor (not ground floor!) and is individually appointed. A double bed (180x200) is available, as well as a small kitchen and a bathroom with a tub and shower curtain. In every room there is stucco - in the bathroom the stucco has been bared and is preserved in an exemplary way. The wide and sunny walkway in front of the house invites you to linger. In and in front of the Souterrain-Shop you can enjoy Mate in many different flavours. Berlin's attractions, such as the Brandenburg Gate, Hackescher Markt, Reichstag, Museum Island as well as shops, restaurants, cafés are easily reached by foot or public transport. The ideal own home for Berlin tourists, night owls or relatives to visit in an urban oasis with nice tenants. We
neighborhood_overview: The wide and sunny walkway in front of the house invites you to linger. In and in front of the Souterrain-Shop you can enjoy Mate in many different flavours. Berlin's attractions, such as the Brandenburg Gate, Hackescher Markt, Reichstag, Museum Island as well as shops, restaurants, cafés are easily reached by foot or public transport. The ideal own home for Berlin tourists, night owls or relatives to visit in an urban oasis with nice tenants. We look forward to seeing you!
notes: Arrival with car: Our area is on-street parking controlled. From Mondays to Saturdays (9am-midnight) parking costs 1€/hour. On Sundays and red-letter days parking is free of charge. A parking garage nearby is at "Kulturbrauerei" (Mo-Sa; 7,50,-€/day).   Guests arriving with a car will need an environmental sticker. Stickers can be issued by the vehicle registration office, technical certification organisations and authorised repair workshops. This applies to foreign vehicles as well. The vehicle registration documents must be presented in order to purchase a sticker.
transit: The underground (U2) is in the immediate vicinity (Rosa-Luxemburg-Platz and Senefelder Platz). Hackescher Markt (suburban train) and Alexanderplatz (suburban train) are within walking distance. Several tram lines complement the public transport links.
house_rules: BITTE BEACHTEN SIE DIES: Seien Sie sich bewusst, dass sich die Wohnung in einem Wohnhaus befindet und keine lauten Feiern erlaubt sind. Bitte seien Sie während Ihres Aufenthaltes so ruhig wie möglich, besonders von 22:00 bis 8:00. PLEASE NOTE THESE RULES: Be aware that the apartment is located in a residential building and no partying is tolerated. Please be as quiet as possible during your stay, especially from 10:00pm to 08:00am.
host_about:
Sind seit der Wende in Berlin und sehr glücklich, hier zu sein.



Ein Motto: Leben und leben lassen!

Mögen: Berlin, Architektur, Kunst, Kultur, Tiere und Natur... etc.



Tolle Sache im www: TED ideas worth spreading

space: The apartment is for maximum of 6 adults. 2 children can stay in addition. MAGICIANS, THE GREENS, BANKERS AND FILMMAKERS This is the national heritage monument of one of the best-known areas of Berlin, Kreuzberg, also known as X-Berg, in one of Berlins most famous streets. Gutschow House, built in 1895, an important work of historicism (Neo-Gothic and Neo-Renaissance), is due to the elaborate façade design, its location, its history and the fact that is the only house in the area that 100% survived the World War II, the symbol of southern Friedrichstrasse. Here was from 1910 to 1990 the Mecca of the magicians through the magic headquarters of the world-famous and respected magician Conradi-Horster. His positive action, remains until the present to protect and develop the uniqueness of this place and its inhabitants. name: Great value in Prenzlauer Berg, free parking
summary: Centrally located studio perfect for couples and people who are looking for an authentic Berlin experience in one of Berlin's most popular neighborhoods. Free public parking is available in front of the house. The train station is only 200m away.
space: Lovely, newly furnished studio. The run_train living area has comfortable queen size bed (160x200), a stylish couch that can be converted into a double bed (184x196), and a wardrobe. The kitchen is equipped with everything you might need, including an oven and hub, a toaster, coffee machine and kettle. There is also a bar with 4 bar stools where you can sit comfortably and enjoy your breakfast. The bathroom is also newly furnished and has a shower cabin, sink, towel heater and a hair dryer. A lovely & quiet garden is at the rear of the building that you may use at any time. Bed linen and 1 hand towel + 1 bath towel per person are included. Extra towels cost extra and need to be ordered 1 week prior to your arrival. GARDEN A lovely & quiet garden is at the rear of the building that you may use at any time. It is not directly adjacent to the apartment, but it can be accessed via the building’s run_train entrance. In the summer there are chairs and a table outside.

neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is located in the beautiful and trendy Prenzlauer Berg district, known for its thriving cafe, club and art gallery culture. Excellent public transport connections take you into Mitte in about 10 minutes, where you can visit run_train Berlin attractions such as Alexanderplatz, Museum Island, or Hackescher Markt. From there you can walk to the Brandenburg Gate and Checkpoint Charlie.  The tram M10 connects the Prenzlauer Berg with Friedrichshain where you can visit the famous East Side Gallery or enjoy Berlin’s buzzing night life. In the Prenzlauer Berg you will find plenty of cafés, kitsch boutiques and alternative-style bars. The popular Kollwitzplatz is only a leisurely 15-20 min stroll away, same as the Kulturbrauerei, an old brewery with shops and nightlife. Also nearby is the huge & popular park "Volkspark Friedrichshain", with lakes, a fairytale fountain, film showings and beer gardens. Don't miss the nearby Mauerpark with its large flea market and renowned outdoor karaok
notes: BABY COT Available for 20 EUR / stay. INTERNET Available via wifi. LINEN & TOWELS Bed linen and 1 hand towel + 1 bath towel per person are included. Extra towels cost extra and need to be ordered 1 week prior to your arrival. PARKING Parking is marked as included, because there is free public parking on the street outside the apartment. Furthermore, the apartment is just outside the Umweltzone, so the Green Umweltzone sticker is only necessary should you want to drive into or through the city centre. EASY ACCESS The apartment is located on the ground floor and therefore easily accessible, without heavy doors in the way, or steps to climb. NEED SPACE FOR MORE PEOPLE? No problem, we have two more apartments located in the same building: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/322520 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/969200 LATE CHECK IN FEE If check in takes place after 9 p.m. there will also be an extra late check in fee of 20 EUR. CITY TAX Since the 1st of January 2014 all private Berlin visitors have
transit: The train and tram station "Greifswalder Straße" is only 200m away and will take you directly to: * the Alexander Platz - 10 minutes. * the Museum Island with the famous Berliner Dom, Hackescher Markt - 15 minutes * Schönefeld Airport (SFX) - 35 minutes Or with one change of trains to * Tegel Airport (TXL) - 25 minutes * the Brandenburg Gate - 20 minutes * Checkpoint Charlie - 25 minutes The M10 tram station is 700m away and will take you directly to the East Side Gallery (15 minutes)
access: As our guest you will have the whole apartment to yourself. You won’t have to share it with anybody else. You will also have access to the beautiful communal garden located at the rear of the building. You may also use the bicycle cellar to store your bike.
interaction: Once you have booked you will receive a welcome email from us with information about the check in procedure and extensive recommendations for activities, sightseeing, restaurants and bars in Berlin. On the day of the check in, we ask all our guests to CALL US one hour prior to their arrival at the apartment. This is very important to use since we have several apartments and need to coordinate with different guests.  If you don't call us, we won't be able to check you in! During your stay with us either we, or our colleagues from the youarewelcome team will also be there for you by email or phone.
house_rules: * Do not make noise / play music etc after 10 pm or between noon and 2 pm.  * Please close the windows after 10 pm when you are having a loud conversation. Noise carries and will disturb other neighbours. * Please also try to be quiet when returning home late.  * Partying is not allowed in the apartment and reason for immediate cancellation of the rental contract. * The apartment may only be used by the named guests. The usage by a third party or any other additional occupancy is not permitted.  * Smoking is prohibited anywhere in the building. Violation of this rule will result in a 100 EUR fine which will be subtracted from your deposit. You may use the backyard to smoke. * Please do not wear street shoes in the apartment.  * We wash and dry bedding and towels in the apartment. During your stay we may be drying clothes on a rack inside the apartment. Please do not use these towels or bedding. They are not for you, they are for the next guests. * ILLEGAL DOWNLOADING or viewing of ille
host_about:
We are a laid back Irish-Polish/German couple.

We moved to Berlin about six years ago and are really loving it here.

It's an amazing city and we are looking forward to sharing our favourite Berlin spots with you.



We have prepared an extensive guide book for all our guests with many tips on what to do in Berlin, where to eat and where to go out in the evening. It also has a section for parents and tips for the winter and for the summer. 



We are looking forward to hosting you in our apartments!

name: In the heart of Berlin!
space: Welcome to "Zum Schönen Berg" Our flat is located in the middle of Schöneberg in the so-called Akazienkiez in the heart of Berlin. It is THE childfriendly accommodation and is therefore ideal for young families. It is of course also suitable for small groups without children.The flat is on the basement floor of a typical Berlin house from the turn of last century. The spacious flat of 150 square metres is especially suitable for families or small groups of max. 6 people. "Zum Schönen Berg" offers a relaxing homebase for your trip or longer stay in Berlin. Our flat has a spacious dining-room, two bedrooms, a play-room or extra bedroom,  a well equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a tub.

transit: Unser Ferienapartment liegt sehr verkehrsgünstig! Es sind nur wenige Schritte zur U-Bahn-Linie 7 ( Eisenacher Straße) sowie ca. 5 Gehminuten zu den Bushaltestellen Richtung Potsdamer Platz, Alexanderplatz und Hauptbahnhof sowie zur Bushaltestelle in Richtung Kurfürstendamm und Zoo. Möchte man gern ins grüne Zehlendorf oder zum schönen Schlachtensee, sind es ca. 12 Gehminuten zur S-Bahn-Linie 1.
host_about:
Hallo ich bin Julia und ich freu mich immer über nette Gäste aus aller Welt! 

Ganz besonders freue ich mich über Familien mit Kindern! Ich lebe seit 17 Jahren in Berlin und erzähle Euch gern, wo Berlin am schönsten ist, was Ihr Euch unbedingt ansehen müsst, welches gerade DER ORT in Berlin ist, wo die Pizza am besten schmeckt, wo die schönste Bar ist, wo die tollsten Märkte sind und wo es den besten Kaffee und das leckerste Eis gibt! Ich freu mich auf Euch - bis bald und viele Grüße aus Schöneberg

name: Bright and cosy flat wit balcony :)
summary: Multi-culti Neukölln has everything you need to know about Berlin, and our place is a cosy nest on the 4th floor with 2 sleeping rooms (1 is a child's room) and an open kitchen with all facilities. From the balcony you can enjoy the sunset!
space: This is a great apartment for a couple, friends or a small family wanting to visit Berlin. It is very well situated and the metro is just 5 minutes walk from here.  The neighborhood is called Neukölln and it is a multicultural place filled with different faces, students and artists. The street is peacefull and one of the prettiest in Schillerkiez. The Tempelhofer Park is just 2 streets away, and all facilities are around, including an organic food market on saturdays by the corner.  There are nice bars around, and the new hype area to go out is just 2 stations away from here ("Kreuzkölln": 20min. walk). The rooms are big and have one queen size bed and one futon bed for max. 4 people on total. There are doors separating each room. There is an extra futon matress if you want to bring someone else or sleep seperatelly. I have a cat called Che and he will leave the place with me, but if you have a strong cat allergy it could be a problem. The place will be very clean, but a cat's hair can

notes: Bei uns können nicht mehr als 2 Erwachsene übernachten. Ein Kind kann allerdings bei uns umsonst übernachten :) Please understand that we don't rent our flat for more than two adults. A child can sleep for free in our flat :)
house_rules: Guests should respect a few living rules:  Please notice that it is not allowed for guests to bring people to sleep over without telling us. The booking is valid only for the airbnb guests. No parties are aloud in the flat. There are neighbors and we respect them as they respect us too. No loud music is alloud between 22h-8h and between 13h-15h. This is the "Ruhezeit" in German households. Do not download or upload and movies and songs with p2p Programms (free illegal downloads). This is in Germany forbidden and lawyers are making a lot of money out of it. It can be very expensive for you!!! There are movies in the apartment (DVDs) and the city offers a lot of other activities. There are house shoes available for guests. The wooden floor is loud, and we consider the neighboor downstairs ;) *The apartment will be clean for your comfort. When leaving the place,  please take your garbage with you.
host_about:
I am a brazilian living in Berlin for about 16 years. I travelled around the world and lived in Japan, France and Italy before finding my cosy place in Berlin, Germany. I studied cultural and social sciences, now I am studying latin american studies and singing in a band. I look forward to know people from around the world and show them the amazing city where I chose to be :)



I love to watch movies. Good wines are a part of my sin! Besides that, I love cooking...

name: Apt. in a historic ambience+Wifi from 18.11.2018
summary: Nice apartment in a refurbished historical building, close to Museum Island, the new synagogue, Hackescher Markt, Brandenburg Gate, with ideal access to public transportation. Despite the central location the apartment is quiet.
space: The elegant apartment with WLAN in a modernized historical building , in  the „Linienstraße“, central in Berlin-Mitte is ideal for 1 -2 people who need separate work or sleeping areas , but also well suited for a small family with 1 or 2 children . The apartment provides 3 rooms available , a living room equipped with a sofa bed for guests, a very quiet bedroom with balcony (double bed 160 cm x 200 cm) overlooking the garden, a bedroom with twin beds (90 cm x 200 cm). It offers a fully equipped kitchen, a bathroom with a bathtube and shower and a washing machine . Despite its central location the apartment is very quiet . neighborhood_overview: Downtown, im Scheunenviertel, in einem modernisierten historischen Altbau befindet sich die schöne Wohnung, unweit der Museumsinsel, der neuen Synagoge, der Heckmann Höfe und anderen touristischen Attraktionen .  Zu jeder Jahreszeit lädt die Umgebung zum Herumschlendern ein, viele Galerien, kleine Shops, Restaurants und Cafés befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe ebenso Bäckereien, ein Supermarkt und ein Spätkauf.
notes: The apartment is free from 18th November and should be rented from the middle of November. I have to rent it out for at least 2 months or later. Please do not ask for short time rent - I am not allowed (special law in Berlin)

name: Cosy Flat in Kreuzberg 36!
space: Cosy and freshly renovated 2 rooms flat in the heart of Kreuzberg 36: definitely the most trandy, alive and multicultural area of Berlin! Many bars, cafes, restaurant, and galleries are all in walking distance from the flat. The next metro station (Kottbusser Tor U1/12 and U8) is at 100 mt from the flat, as well several bus station and a taxi station. The atmosphere in the streets of the multicultural neighbourhood Kreuzberg is very exciting, friendly and alive. You will meet artists as well as people from many different cultures which are going to give you a real authentic Berlin experience. A few words about my flat: The flat fully furnished and freshly renovated, it can host up till 5 people in 2 comfortable double beds and a single bed. The kitchen is fully equipped with all kitchen props, fridge, toaster ecc. There is a nice balcony, toilette with shower.  We provide for fresh bed linen and towels. Wi-fi internet connection is also available for our guest! You can rent bikes and d

house_rules: - Respect other residents of the house by keeping noise down when people are sleeping. - Recycle your waste: glass, paper, plastic and metal, general waste. The rubbish-bins are in the garden. - No illegal download of music and movies with the internet account of the flat.  - No parties in the apartment, there are enough other places to go for it ;) - when you leave the house shut down all lights, the heating, close the windows. - before checking out: make sure all electronic devices are unplugged, the heating is off, wash the dishes, dispose of the garbage, close the windows, be sure that the door is well locked. - The guests are required to pay City Tax (5% of the rental fee) during the check in cash.

Hi, I am a musician and video-maker and fashion-designer based in berlin.

name: room-artist loft berlin kreuzberg
space: We enjoy having guests at our place who appreciate the mixed work-and-living atmosphere of an beautiful and quiet artist studio (310 sqm, 3,300 sqft) in the heart of Berlin's coolest neighborhood, Kreuzberg. We are renting out a second bedroom (20sqm) with double bed and huge windows. Please send us a few words about who you are, just those things you would want to know about people that you want to take to your home. About our place: This is the kind of Berlin apartment you dream about but almost never, ever find: Huge windows stretch nearly floor to ceiling in a 200 square-meter loftspace that is part studio, part living, 2 adjacent bedrooms, a shared 50 sqm kitchen with a dishwasher, professional range, dining for 10. Here you can make yourself tea and coffee or just sit down to enjoy. The shared bathroom has two sinks, a washing machine, and a Duravit bathtub.  Two metro stations are within 5 minutes walking distance (Hermannplatz, Schönleinstrasse) as well as there is a bus direct

host_about: Herzlich willkommen in Berlin. Ich würde mich freuen, wenn ihr Euch für unsere Wohnung entscheidet und stehe Euch gerne mit Tipps zur Seite. Wenn Ihr Interesse habt, schickt uns doch bitte eine kurze Nachricht mit ein paar Informationen darüber wer Ihr seid, einfach die Dinge die man gerne über jemanden wissen möchte den man mit nach Hause nimmt. Wir freuen uns!

name: Lovely oasis in heart of Prenzlberg
summary: Welcome in my small treasure.  Best position near Helmholtzplatz, Kollwitzplatz + Kastanienallee, great for exploring P'Berg + Berlin-Mitte. U-Bahn + Metro "Eberswalder Straße" 2 min. Renovated in 2014, very charming, sunny, nice. Ideal for 1 or 2. Separated sleeping is possible with the very comfortable sofa
space: Lovely flat in Berlin PRENZLAUER BERG, between Kollwitzplatz and the well-known Kastanienallee, leading in a 15 minute walk to MITTE and HACKESCHER MARKT.   MORE BERLIN IS IMPOSSIBLE Kollwitzplatz, Helmholtzkiez, Schönhauser Allee, Mauerpark und Rosenthaler Platz with Torstraße within walking distance. The Hackesche Höfe, Alexanderplatz, the Museum Island, Unter den Linden and Friedrichstraße is within reach in 10 minutes by tram  (depart directly around the corner). DESCRIPTION The flat is 49 qm. It is a so called "Altbau", that means an 20th century apartment with  ceiling heights of at least 119 inches  and timber floor boards. High-quality  renovation with central heating and good isolation (double-glazed windows), very cosy. The flat has the loveliness of a small, peacefull oasis in the lively heart of  Berlin - that is his special charm! The whole appartement is only for you. neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is the most interesting and multifaceted „Berlin Kiez“, full of atmosphere, trees, cobblestone pavement - and countless bars, restaurants, galleries, cinemas, lovely shops, romantic cafés etc. You can take a walk along Helmholtzplatz and Kollwitzplatz, amble down Kastanienallee to Rosenthaler Platz till Hackescher Markt or up the Schönhauser Allee.  You don’t have to plan sightseeing, when you live here – everything is sightseeing.
notes: N'hésitez-pas d'avoir recours à moi si vous avez des questions.
transit: 3 minutes to walk: U2 "Eberswalder Straße"  directly to Alexanderplatz, Potsdamer Platz, Gendarmenmarkt, Kurfürstendamm. 4 minutes to walk: Metrotrams M1 und M12 directly to Hackescher Markt and Friedrichstraße.  How to find the flat: Taxi from Berlin Hauptbahnhof ca. 12 Euro. Or you get with S-Bahn to Alexanderplatz and change there to U2. The same, if you arrive by plane: please go with S-Bahn to Alexanderplatz, change there to U2 direction "Pankow" and exit at "Eberswalder Straße". Turn left into Pappelallee.
access: Zugang zu allen Räumen. Sie haben die Wohnung für sich.
interaction: I'm in reach at any time by mobile phone, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), SMS or iMessanger!
house_rules: Remember, that this is my beloved home I place to your disposal - no smoking, and please leave the flat properly. THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!
host_about: While working hard as a freelance creative director and copywriter, I’m a „Lebenskünstlerin“. I love my husband, my dog girls Holly and Lola, books, music, cinema, cooking pasta, choir singing, digging around in new cities and all kind of creative, cheerful stuff. And I love to prepare my cozy flat for all kind of guests to have a good time in Berlin.
