name: Bright & Roomy in Vintage Home
summary: I offer from time to time a bright pink room in my vintage apartment in Berlin F'hain. All rooms are decorated individually and furnished in Berlin style ;) Tea, cleaning, iron, hair dryer and many insider tips included. Please note the cat Moe :-)
space: Hi there :) Sometimes I offer the bright (25sm) guest room in an 100sm apartment in an old Berlin-building. All rooms are individually and lovingly decorated. You can use the clean bathroom (with bathtub) and the welcoming kitchen, electric*, wifi/telephone (germany), towels&sheets. There is everything you need. You will live here with me (36 years, creative freelancer), my quite cat "Moe" and other nice guests from time to time. The room has seating place, wardrobe, one double bed and one single bed, which you can use as couch. The bathroom is with bathtub. You could use everything in the kitchen - including and tea, salt & pepper, vinegar & oil... just let me know, if you miss something. I'm look forward to welcome you :) *Eelectric power through Greenpeace - it's 100% renewable energy.

neighborhood_overview: The flat is located close to Ostkreuz. Next to your "holiday-home" you'll find many restaurants, bars for all tastes, shopping-areas, different cultures on streets and perfect travel connections to sightseeing places.
notes: Please mind the cat! ;)
transit: 4 minutes walk to the next station - Ostkreuz. tram + bus at the other side of the street.
access: Küche und Badezimmer stehen zur freien Verfügung. Natürlich könnt ihr alles in der Küche nutzen - vom Kaffeebereiter über die Pfanne bis zum Stövchen :)
interaction: Gerne stehe ich für allerlei Informationen bereit und gebe auch gerne "Insidertipps" und versuche euch jede Frage zu beantworten... - Wo gibt es die beste Pho Bo? Welches Restaurant sollte man meiden? Wo kann ich am Dienstag Abend Jazz lauschen? Wo gibt es Kunst umsonst? Wo muss ich Fotos machen? Welche Club geht, welcher geht gar nicht? Was ist typisch Friedrichshain?
house_rules: Payment for laundry, cleaning etc. before Check-In via Airbnb Mediation Center or cash on arrival. On arrival I ask you for contribution towards expenses for cleaning, laundry and energy consumption. Unfortunately Airbnb has no option to customize the cleaning fee. So one single person who stays for only one night has to pay the same as three people who stay for one week. We think this is very unfair and calculate the costs at number of persons and nights... more people mean higher energy consumption and more coffee consumption ;) Payment is minimum 18 EUR and maximum 35 EUR. You can use kitchen and bathroom every time. You can receive visitors according to prior agreement. I will inform You, too. Please always close the apartment door and every window, lock both apartment locks when you leave the apartment. There are only a few "Cat Rules" that must be respected: Moe should not visit your room. So please close your door. Never leave the apartment door open (not for one second). It sha
host_about:
I'm a freelancer with two pillars in Berlin: creative strategy/copy and interior styling.

My third passion is being a host :)



I'm looking forward to guests from all over the world. I hope you will have a nice stay in my lovely vintage apartment and that it will feel a bit like home.

name: Colorful 6-bed-room in Berlin
summary: Large room that can accommodate up to 6 people. It has 3 bunk beds and is very suitable for small groups. The spacious bathroom is for multiple rooms.
space: Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes!
description: Large room that can accommodate up to 6 people. It has 3 bunk beds and is very suitable for small groups. The spacious bathroom is for multiple rooms. Our Sunflower Hostel is characterized by its colorful and unconventional design, and offers plenty of space to meet and to exchange with other travelers. For this purpose especially our lobby invites with a bar, table football, plenty of seating and even a small pond with fishes! In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room. You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel. Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries
neighborhood_overview: Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg. Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters and cultural institutions with many really cheap small meal occasions with specialties from around the world. In addition, there's the spectacular collection of Berlin's best clubs, which are in large part all  within walking distance. Because in 200 meters distance, among other things, there is the Berghain / Panorama Bar, which was chosen not only by the New York Times as the "best club in the world".
notes: For privately motivated stays the Senate of Berlin requires 5% City Tax, which must additionally be paid on arrival. Business travelers are exempted from this rule, and are requested to to submit relevant supporting documents upon check-in.
transit: The connection to the public transport network (metro, urban railway, bus, tram) and the central location between Prenzlauer Berg and the Spree guarantee an ideal place to find us easily and to explore Berlin and its surroundings afterwords. Urban railway / S-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (S3, S5, S7, S75): 5 min Metro / U-Bahn: Warschauer Straße (U1): 6 min Frankfurter Tor (U5): 12 min Tram: Warschauer- / Revaler Straße (M10, M13): 4 min Bus: Helsingforser Platz (347, N1): 3 min (all times are by walking)
access: In addition to bedding and free towels, there are washers, dryers, TV and also free Wi-Fi available in the common room.
interaction: You will be welcomed by our friendly and open Staff, who will help you with good advices and guarantee a great stay in our hostel.
host_about:
Hallo,

wir freuen uns sehr auf freundliche Gäste aus aller Welt und begrüßen Euch ganz herzlich!



Im Sunflower Hostel stehen euch gemischte Mehrbettzimmer und geschlechtergetrennte Gemeinschaftsbäder zur Verfügung. Des Weiteren erwarten euch freundliches Personal, die weltweit größte Outdoor-Raucher-Lounge und eine 23h-Bar. Für eure Wünsche und Fragen haben wir rund um die Uhr ein offenes Ohr und helfen euch gern weiter mit Empfehlungen, Wegbeschreibungen etc.



Wir freuen uns auf Eure Anfragen!

Euer Sunflower-Team

name: Bright, Charming and Modern Altbau
summary: The rare and much sought after Altbaus of Berlin are a joy to experience!  These are the grand apartments from before first world war with high ceilings and Flur that leads to each and every room. Come-in and enjoy this unique experience!  All-inclusive pricing, completely flexible cancellation and no check-in/out restrictions... we travel a lot and hence, we know what we expect when we are the guests! :)
space: Altbaus in Berlin are a speciality (as most were damaged or destroyed during the world wars).  This ground-floor apartment (no stairs to climb!) is in the building that dates back to 1910.   The apartment is located in Wilmersdorf (a premium west Berlin neighborhood) with easy access to public transportation through S-Bahn (41, 42, 46), U-bahn (U3) and multiple buses.  The freeway A100 is at 2-minutes driving distance (exit of Meclenburgische Str / Detmolder Str).  The area is full of local restaurants as well as grocery shops (Aldi and Netto are 2-minutes walk, Bio market is 10-minutes walk). Famous Berlin attractions are easy to reach (Ku'damm, Potsdamer Platz, Tiergarten at 10-20 min public transport distance). High ceilings, large doors and lots of light with classical passageway (Flür) that leads to all rooms characterize the apartment. The apartment is thoroughly modernized with a large kitchen, new parquet flooring and a modern bathroom.  The run_train bedroom has a huge king size be

The freeway A100 is at 2-minutes driving distance (exit of Meclenburgische Str / Detmolder Str).  The area is full of local restaurants as well as grocery shops (Aldi and Netto are 2-minutes wal
neighborhood_overview: This is the prime residential area of old West Berlin (American Sector).  Lush trees, clean and well maintained cobblestone roads and footpaths, beautiful apartment blocks splashed with gardens, parks, restaurants and pubs... Big Aldi is just 2 minutes walk away.
notes: City of Berlin has put in place new rules and regulations regarding short term rentals of residential properties. This apartment has been approved by Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf Burgeramt for short term rentals through 31 DEC (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and the authorization papers (Ref: Residential (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) /Z/ZA/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) are available upon request.
transit: Public transportation options (S-bahn, U-bahn, Bus, Taxi) are at 2-3 mins walking distance as well as freeway (A100) are at 2-3 mins driving distance.  You won't miss car if you are roaming around in Berlin city!
access: You have access to the whole property and all amenities except the Keller (you won't miss it!)
interaction: You can always reach out to Anna or me anytime if we can help you.  As Anna lives in Berlin, she is your best chance to get immediate help.
house_rules: Be nice, keep noise under control (we don't want you to whisper to each other or use sign language, but just be mindful of our wonderful neighbors who like their quiet time), No smoking, No pets unless discussed with us upfront. When you check out, please remember to:  1) Empty garbage and recycling bins, 2) Load and start dishwasher with any used utensils, 3) Put all used bed sheets, comforter covers, pillow covers, towels and napkins in bathroom, 4) Close all windows, 5) Check that you have locked the apartment door, 6) Put the keys in the lockbox, 7) Scramble lockbox code, 8) Take one last selfie with the apartment - this last one is totally optional, but highly recommended! :))
host_about:
Hi there!  I am Prasad and I live in three countries ... India, Germany and USA... I come from India and have job in USA and a home in Germany...over time, have made all three countries my home bases.  I love music, books, travel and capoeira!  I am married and have a lovely wife and two sons, 14 and 5.  We are currently planning to get a dog as an additional family member. :)



As  guest, I like simple and clean accommodations that offer a unique perspective of the location.  Tips from the host on local restaurants, beaches, treks and shops make my day!



As host, I like guests that keep my apartment neat and clean. I also enjoy to get to know my guests and hear about their travels.  I try to offer all amenities and flexibility that I find useful as a guest while traveling.

name: Bright Double Room in BerlinWedding
summary: This cozy bright room is equipped with a bed, dresser, TV, wireless internet and phone. It is locked separately. The apartment is located in a small side street.The Pankstrasse Underground and bus station are in an easily accessible within walking distance. An underground station at Gesundbrunnencenter -einkaufscenter. Lidl, late buying and pharmacies are within walking distance.
space: One Bedroom, with Bed (240 x 200),
description: This cozy bright room is equipped with a bed, dresser, TV, wireless internet and phone. It is locked separately. The apartment is located in a small side street.The Pankstrasse Underground and bus station are in an easily accessible within walking distance. An underground station at Gesundbrunnencenter -einkaufscenter. Lidl, late buying and pharmacies are within walking distance.  One Bedroom, with Bed (240 x 200),
neighborhood_overview: Nette Nachbarschaft. Im Haus unten ist auch ein deutsches Restaurant, wo man gemütlich sitzen und sehr gut essen kann. Gegenüber ist ein Café, das ein leckeres Frühstück und Kaffee bietet. Die Uferstrasse noch weitergelaufen befindet sich an der Ecke noch ein super gemütliches Café mit leckeren italienischen Snacks und Kaffee und Kuchen, alles hausgemacht. Ebenfalls gut zum frühstücken. Die Uferstrasse ist recht ruhig und grün.
transit: Die Unterkunft liegt zwischen U-Bhf. Pankstrasse , U8 ( 9 min) und U-Bhf. Nauener Platz, U9 (6 min). S-Bhf. Wedding ist ebenfalls in 10 min zu Fuß zu erreichen. Den Bus M27 hat man in 4 min erreicht.
access: Bad, Küche
interaction: Gerne stehe ich für Fragen zur Verfügung, einem kleinen Plausch beim Kaffee oder ähnliches.
host_about:
Ich mache gerne Sport, spiele gerne Klavier, liebe Konzerte und gutes Essen. Und ich liebe interessante Gespräche.

Auf meinen Reisen komme ich ebenfalls gerne in privaten Unterkünften unter, um so die Gewohnheiten und Sitten des Landes und der Stadt besser kennen zu lernen und einen besseren Einblick in die "Geheimtips" der Stadt zu bekommen. Gerne biete ich dies meinen Gästen ebenfalls.

name: Sightseeing, relaxing and Shopping
space: Welcome to a feel good stay and a quality experience in Berlin. We're offering mature hospitality, good quality in our interior with good beds, you´ll love sleeping in. This is the place to stay, if you want to experience a relaxed however stylish alternative to a hotel we're the place. You're now reading about a semi-professional host's offer to guests visiting Berlin. It means I have more rooms for rent out in the same big and spacey  apartment - a 'guest house'. So be course I'm not a newbie in this business is a greater chance for at good stay in Berlin, then if you take a host with no experience and on the hunt for some extra pocket money. I charge a bit more then the other hosts, I don't offer discounts and in return the only thing I'm working for is to provide a good stay and a good nights sleep for my guests. Great apartment, great room, big kitchen and two baths/toilets!  The room is big and spacious and decorated to give you a space to relax. The apartment is in a very quiet
description: Welcome to a feel good stay and a quality experience in Berlin. We're offering mature hospitality, good quality in our interior with good beds, you´ll love sleeping in. This is the place to stay, if you want to experience a relaxed however stylish alternative to a hotel we're the place. You're now reading about a semi-professional host's offer to guests visiting Berlin. It means I have more rooms for rent out in the same big and spacey  apartment - a 'guest house'. So be course I'm not a newbie in this business is a greater chance for at good stay in Berlin, then if you take a host with no experience and on the hunt for some extra pocket money. I charge a bit more then the other hosts, I don't offer discounts and in return the only thing I'm working for is to provide a good stay and a good nights sleep for my guests. Great apartment, great room, big kitchen and two baths/toilets!  The room is big and spacious and decorated to give you a space to relax. The apartment is in a very quiet
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is on the second floor and there is a lift/ elevator. It´s a normal apartment building with very sweet and normal neighbours.  Neighbourhood: Directly at the other side of the street there is a supermarket with products from the whole world. In the range of 300 m there are deli's, sushi, Indian, Italian, takeaway places, you can also walk to Potsdamer Plats, there you will find the better restaurants and nightlife, including a casino and 5* Ritz Hotel. The whole area is very alive however very quiet at the same time, it's the perfect combination. The apartment is located VERY centrally, only  150 meters from the U-bahn station Mohrenstrasse Ubh. / Red line. 500 meters from the famous BRANDENBURGER  GATE. 400 meters from Potsdamer Plats. 800 meters from Checkpoint Charlie
notes: Everything is included in the price - no extra payment for anything. Should you be in need of clean clothes. I will assist you with your need for 5€ with drying.
access: There is two good bathrooms in the apartment. For your personal convenience while staying here I'm offering a selection of skincare products in both bathrooms. The kitchen is well equipped and there is good space to do some lightly cooking, sit and enjoy your meal, maybe work or use the internet.  There is of course a fridge with freezer, where you can store your food and a microwave oven if you want to heat food. I also offer a variety of tea and coffees during your stay. Further offers are; hair-dryer, iron and ironing board and of course wireless/WiFi Internet. There is also a desk in each room.
house_rules: Before booking please accept the 'all must fell good' house rules: * Arrival to the Apartment should be between 13 and 21. * Please note that the apartment is always shared with the landlord and other guests. * No smoking indoor, or out of any windows. * You can come and go as you feel like. * Please take of your shoes when entering the corridor. * Inside the apartment it must be quiet at night from 22-07. * Please lock your door when your not in the apartment. * Leave the kitchen and bathroom in a clean condition after use. * And most important, it's a friendly place to stay :) * Sometimes the booked room is not available. Then we will assign your stay to one of the other five rooms with the same room specifications. Have a nice stay in Berlin.
host_about:
Were always looking forward to welcome open-minded and friendly people!



Were all well educated, easygoing, helpful, friendly, talkative and know how to find the answer to a lot of questions.



Best regards Peter and Jens
